date_attribute.weather: Clear, cold, with a light north wind.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the New Year holiday, Ma Xiulan, adhering to traditional family values, welcomed the new year with homemade dishes. The day’s activities centered around family, creating a warm and harmonious festive atmosphere, though the holiday diet resulted in slight fluctuations in weight.

events.name: Preparing New Year's Breakfast
events.description: On the morning of New Year's Day, Ma Xiulan got up at 06:45, put on a clean apron, kneaded the dough, and prepared the filling to make Tianjin-style steamed buns. The kitchen was filled with a fragrant aroma, while her husband looked after the children. The whole family gathered around the table to enjoy breakfast, and the new year began amid the delightful scents and cheerful laughter.

events.name: Preparing a Holiday Lunch
events.description: After breakfast, the busyness continues as preparations are made for the noodle sauce. Carefully selecting pork, wood ear mushrooms, and other ingredients, a savory and umami-rich sauce is simmered, with every step revealing the heartfelt care for the family.

events.name: Enjoy the reunion lunch
events.description: The lunch table was laden with steamed buns and noodles with gravy. The whole family chatted while eating, with Ma Zhiqiang sharing stories from his trucking trips and the children recounting amusing incidents from school, making Ma Xiulan feel content and happy.

events.name: Afternoon Family Time
events.description: After lunch, they relaxed in the living room, where the television was playing New Year's Day programs. Ma Xiulan watched TV while doing plain needlework, and the children either did their homework or played with building blocks. The room was warm and cozy.

events.name: Organizing and Praying for Blessings
events.description: In the evening, I tidied up the living room, lit incense in front of the ancestral tablet to pray for blessings, and silently wished for my husband's safety, my children's health, and family harmony.

events.name: Call to Greet Parents
events.description: Called my parents in the evening to send blessings, shared how the celebration went, reminded them to keep warm, and arranged to visit during the winter break. Hearing my mother's gentle response warmed my heart.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, carrying the anticipation for the new year and the habitual sense of responsibility for managing the household.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm contentment, a sense of inner fulfillment and tranquility after spending the holidays with family.

state.今日运动: Light activities of daily housework and meal preparation

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the New Year holiday, life returns to its routine. Ma Xiulan prepares for family planning and her community roles, but holiday eating has led to a slight weight gain, and learning needlework techniques has kept her up a bit later.

events.name: Learning new acupuncture techniques in preparation for the new role.
events.description: In the morning, I organized my craft books at home and recalled the suggestion from the community grid worker. I searched for tutorials on chain stitch and cross-stitch on short video platforms, practiced with fabric scraps, and gained a preliminary grasp of the basic stitching methods. I plan to seek advice from my childhood friend.

events.name: Plan the Family Purchases for January
events.description: In the afternoon, check the stock of rice, flour, and oil, and compile a procurement list. Inquire about the prices at the supermarket via WeChat from neighbor Zhang Shufen. After comparing the prices, plan to conduct a bulk purchase in two days to stock up on supplies for the month.

events.name: Changing dinner plans at the last minute
events.description: Due to leftover New Year's Day dishes in the refrigerator, Ma Xiulan made a last-minute decision to prepare sweet and sour pork tenderloin and seasonal vegetables to avoid waste. Seeing the children enjoy the meal, she felt a sense of satisfaction from practicing frugality.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Adjusting back to the daily routine from the holiday relaxation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured by having a preliminary plan for the family in an orderly manner, but slightly concerned about a slight weight gain.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a typical winter family day, Ma Xiulan took care of the children and handled household chores. With her husband away driving and not yet returned, she managed everything alone. Due to exhaustion, she went to bed early, and her weight remained stable.

events.name: Household chores and checking children's homework
events.description: After sending the child off in the morning, I focused on washing and air-drying the laundry. In the afternoon, I tidied up the living room and bedrooms, putting away the New Year's Day decorations. While preparing dinner in the evening, I checked my son's homework and urged him to correct his mistakes.

events.name: Phone Reminder for Husband to Add Clothing
events.description: Seeing the light snow outside the window, she called her husband to remind him to be careful of the slippery roads and to wear a thick coat. Her husband responded briefly to reassure her.

events.name: Adjusting daily routine due to physical discomfort.
events.description: Experiencing a slight headache in the afternoon, likely due to weather changes, I decided to finish the household chores early, rest earlier in the evening, and cancel the originally planned handicraft activity.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to tackle the day's routine chores.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but fulfilled, having completed the duties of a homemaker, with physical discomfort alleviated.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the weekend, when her husband returned home in the evening, Ma Xiulan took care of the child and handled household chores alone. She went out for shopping and prepared handmade items. Due to the fatigue from shopping, she slept late, and her weight returned to normal.

events.name: Weekend Shopping and Accompanying My Youngest Daughter
events.description: In the morning, I took my younger daughter to the vegetable market and supermarket to purchase items according to the list. I exchanged greetings with Aunt Sun, the stall owner, bought rice, flour, and oil at Zhang Shufen Supermarket, and asked them to keep an eye out for manual odd jobs. After returning home, I organized the items and accompanied my daughter in recognizing word cards.

events.name: Prepare Handcraft Teaching Patterns
events.description: After finishing the afternoon chores, I took out the old pattern book and embroidery cloth, selected simple and auspicious designs, and traced them onto new fabric to create teaching samples. The process was both focused and enjoyable.

events.name: Temporarily received a manual odd job.
events.description: In the evening, Zhang Shufen notified via WeChat that there was an urgent embroidery order. Ma Xiulan accepted it and planned to start the work tomorrow, which brought her joy at the opportunity for additional income.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The busyness of an ordinary weekend, with thoughts preoccupied by shopping and household chores.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly anticipating her husband's return, she felt a sense of relief after completing the shopping and craft preparations.

2025-01.daily_overview: The community grid worker officially invited Ma Xiulan to serve as the instructor for the handicraft corner, providing an opportunity to transform her hobby into a community role and a modest source of income. Both she and her husband were delighted to support the offer and were so excited that they stayed up late into the night.

events.name: Accept the invitation to join the community handicraft corner.
events.description: In the morning, community grid member Zheng Xiuying visited to invite her to serve as a volunteer instructor for the community neighborhood handicraft corner every Wednesday afternoon, guiding elderly residents and homemakers in learning embroidery, with a monthly subsidy of 200 yuan provided. Sister Zheng recognized her craftsmanship.

events.name: Decided after discussion with the husband.
events.description: After discussing with her husband in the evening, Ma Xiulan analyzed that she could pursue her passion for handicrafts, earn a stable small income to supplement the household expenses, and gain recognition from the community. With her husband's support, she considered it a good opportunity and made up her mind to accept it with anticipation.

events.name: Start preparing embroidery works for the community market
events.description: With excitement, I began planning a large embroidery piece to participate in the community market at the end of the month. I selected traditional Tianjin embroidery patterns and planned to complete it over several days, aiming to contribute to the family savings.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a hint of anticipation for the community invitation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Joy, the satisfaction of being recognized, and anticipation for the new role and market works.

2025-01.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan actively prepared for her new role by consulting friends for skills, formally confirming work arrangements, and initiating market projects. Due to prolonged sedentary study, she experienced a slight weight gain.

events.name: Seeking embroidery techniques from childhood friends
events.description: In the afternoon, childhood friend Liu Chunmei came to the house for tea. Ma Xiulan showed her chain stitch and cross-stitch embroidery pieces to seek advice on techniques. The two studied the direction of the stitches and discussed patterns suitable for beginners. Liu Chunmei shared her experience, while Ma Xiulan took notes on the key points.

events.name: Formal Response to Community Invitation
events.description: After seeing Liu Chunmei off, contact Zheng Xiuying by phone to formally accept the invitation, and confirm the time, venue, materials, and support for the first tutoring session, such as tables, chairs, and projection equipment in the community activity room.

events.name: Plan the First Teaching Process
events.description: In the evening, make specific preparations for the teaching session the day after tomorrow. Organize white cotton fabric, embroidery threads, needles, and embroidery hoops. Plan the teaching process from introducing the tools to the basic satin stitch technique. Prepare pre-drawn fabric pieces with patterns as alternatives.

events.name: Continue the market embroidery works
events.description: Finding time to continue working on the market piece, the intricate design symbolizes family reunion. Due to prolonged sitting while working, I'm experiencing slight discomfort in my lower back, reminding myself to take breaks.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Positive, ready to embrace new work with a clear sense of mission

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly tense, the teaching preparations and market works made her feel the weight of responsibility, while the discomfort in her waist brought a touch of anxiety.

2025-01.daily_overview: A peaceful day was unexpectedly interrupted by a leaking kitchen pipe. Ma Xiulan calmly handled the situation by relying on the community network for a solution, while also making final preparations for tomorrow's teaching. She went to bed late due to anxiety.

events.name: Detect and address water pipe leakage
events.description: While preparing dinner in the kitchen in the afternoon, I noticed the floor under the sink was damp. Upon inspection, I found a slight leak at the pipe joint. I used an old cloth to dry the accumulated water to prevent slipping and floor damage, and determined that professional assistance is required.

events.name: Contact a familiar plumber for repairs.
events.description: After cleaning, call plumber Master Liu Jianguo to describe the location and situation of the leakage. Master Liu agreed to come the next morning and arranged an approximate time.

events.name: Improving Teaching Materials and Psychological Preparation
events.description: After dealing with the plumbing issue, I continued refining my teaching preparations by placing the patterns, sewing kit, and notes into a cloth bag. Before going to bed at night, I mentally rehearsed the teaching steps, feeling a mix of nervousness and anticipation.

events.name: Staying up late temporarily due to anxiety.
events.description: Worried about tomorrow's teaching and plumbing issues, I stayed up until nearly 23:00 to review materials. After receiving a comforting call from my husband, I felt slightly relieved, but my sleep quality was still affected.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Usually, I'm thinking about tomorrow's teaching and the plumbing repairs.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calmness tinged with slight fatigue after handling trivial matters, feeling both nervous and anticipatory about tomorrow's teaching, with anxiety somewhat alleviated.

2025-01.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan made her successful teaching debut as a community handicraft corner instructor, gaining social recognition. The water pipe repair at home was completed. The evening news stirred concerns about her husband's safety, leading her to express emotions through handicrafts, and she stayed up late with excitement.

events.name: Master Liu provides on-site plumbing repair services.
events.description: In the morning, Master Liu arrived as scheduled to inspect and replace the aging rubber gasket. Ma Xiulan handed him tools and poured tea. Master Liu swiftly resolved the leakage issue. After the payment was settled, they chatted casually. Master Liu reminded her to keep an eye on other aging connections.

events.name: First Community Handicraft Corner Teaching Session
events.description: Arriving at the community activity room promptly at 2 p.m., Ma Xiulan initially felt nervous facing the trainees. After explaining the threading process, she relaxed and patiently demonstrated the running stitch technique, providing hands-on guidance. As the trainees progressed from being unfamiliar to getting the hang of it, Ma Xiulan felt a sense of achievement and satisfaction.

events.name: Weaving a safety knot lanyard for my husband.
events.description: While watching the evening news about a local truck accident, her heart tightened with concern for her husband's safety, as he was often on the road for transportation work. She decided to weave a safety knot keychain to convey her blessings, starting the stitches with dark blue and ink-green silk threads.

events.name: Small Gathering to Celebrate Teaching Success
events.description: After class, several students invited her for a simple tea to celebrate. Ma Xiulan politely declined but felt accepted. After returning home, she shared her joy with her husband over the phone, and his praise made her even more excited.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat nervous and expectant, thinking about the maintenance in the morning and the teaching in the afternoon.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The satisfaction and pride from successful teaching, coupled with the anxiety over her husband's safety, were somewhat alleviated through manual activities, leaving her too excited to sleep.

2025-01.daily_overview: As the initial excitement of teaching subsided and life returned to its daily routine, Ma Xiulan consulted on insurance for family risk management, prepared for a small gathering with friends, continued her weaving and market projects, and experienced a slight weight gain due to dietary changes during her outings for consultations.

events.name: Inquiry Regarding Husband's Accident Insurance
events.description: This morning at the vegetable market, I met Zheng Xiuying, who inquired about truck driver accident insurance. Sister Zheng recommended an insurance company and provided the contact information of a sales representative. After returning home, I had a preliminary phone conversation and scheduled a detailed discussion at the community service center tomorrow.

events.name: Preparing for a childhood friends gathering
events.description: In the afternoon, I tidied up the living room to make it clean and cozy, found a new embroidery piece depicting magpies on a plum branch ready for display, took out the jasmine tea and cleaned the tea set, looking forward to tomorrow's tea gathering.

events.name: Consulting with fellow craftsmen on knitting patterns
events.description: To weave a more aesthetically pleasing peace knot, WeChat consulted Zhou Xiuqin, who shared traditional peace knot weaving patterns via video call and provided guidance on key steps. Ma Xiulan listened attentively, took notes, and felt confident in her understanding.

events.name: Jinzhan City Embroidered Works
events.description: Took some time to continue working on the market project, completing part of the outline. Due to prolonged focus, I experienced eye strain and decided to reduce manual work time tomorrow to protect my vision.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relatively calm, carrying the residual warmth from yesterday's successful teaching and a pragmatic mindset for handling family matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling secure, making preparations for tomorrow, having a clear direction for addressing concerns about the husband after consulting on insurance, and experiencing slight discomfort due to eye fatigue.

2025-01.daily_overview: A day filled with rich emotions: meeting with an insurance agent in the morning to enhance family security, engaging in deep conversations with childhood friends in the afternoon for emotional support, informing my husband about the insurance in the evening while continuing knitting, and maintaining weight through mindful eating during gatherings.

events.name: Meeting with an Insurance Agent
events.description: In the morning, I met with an agent at the community service center to learn about the coverage, claim conditions, and prices of different traffic accident insurance products. After comparison, I am inclined toward the basic coverage plan with an annual premium of 800 yuan, but I did not make an immediate decision as I need to discuss it with my husband.

events.name: Tea Talk with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: In the afternoon, Liu Chunmei visited. They drank jasmine tea and did handicrafts in the living room. Ma Xiulan demonstrated and explained the techniques of the "Magpie on Plum Blossom" embroidery, exchanging skills. Liu Chunmei shared amusing anecdotes from the supermarket, bringing laughter. Ma Xiulan confided about the pressure from her counselor and anxiety over her eldest son's school transition, receiving comfort and encouragement.

events.name: Inform Husband of Insurance Decision and Continue Knitting
events.description: In the evening, after returning home, the husband was informed that the insurance consideration was explained as a symbol of peace and stability. Initially, he felt it was a waste of money, but under persistence, he nodded in agreement. Late into the night, the weaving of the peace knot continued, infused with blessings.

events.name: Temporarily joining the community evening walk
events.description: In the evening, neighbor Wang Guilan invited Ma Xiulan for a walk in the neighborhood. Ma Xiulan accepted, and as they strolled, they chatted about community gossip and the handicraft corner. This light activity helped her relax, and she decided to occasionally join in as a form of low-intensity exercise.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Starting the day with a clear goal of consulting about insurance and looking forward to a gathering with friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm yet complex: the solace of receiving emotional support from friends, the reassurance after communicating with one's husband, the intertwined sense of responsibility for the family's future, and a slight relief after taking a walk.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the community service center, performing light household chores, and taking an evening walk.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Saturday, the husband rested at home. Ma Xiulan handled household finances by organizing insurance policies and proposed a family meeting to plan for the future. She continued working on the Peace Knot and market projects, and her weight returned to normal due to frugal eating habits.

events.name: Organize Insurance Policies and Documents
events.description: This morning, the insurance company delivered the paper policy and invoice. After carefully verifying the information and confirming its accuracy, I filed them along with the household register and property ownership certificate into the family document folder. It felt like building a risk barrier for the family.

events.name: Propose to convene a family meeting.
events.description: After dinner, taking advantage of her husband and children being present, Ma Xiulan proposed holding a family meeting the following evening to discuss plans for the new year and the eldest son's high school entrance exam. Briefly stating her ideas, she received agreement from her husband and eldest son. In her mind, Ma Xiulan began organizing the key points for the discussion.

events.name: Improve the Weaving of the Chinese Knot
events.description: In the evening, I continued weaving and completed the main body of the hanging rope, focusing on the details of the peace knot closure to ensure symmetry and tightness. During this time, my husband called to let me know he was safe and nearby, which put my mind at ease, allowing my weaving to proceed gently and smoothly.

events.name: Embroidery Works Encounter Difficulties at the Market
events.description: While working on the market piece in the afternoon, I encountered a complex stitching technique problem and had to temporarily set it aside, planning to consult Zhou Xiuqin about it tomorrow. This presented a challenge, but she remained patient.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Stability; having her husband at home makes her feel relaxed and gives her a sense of reliance.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Organized and full of anticipation, family financial matters have been properly handled, with a positive outlook for tomorrow's family meeting, though the work project presents a slight setback.

2025-01.daily_overview: Two tasks of long-term significance for the family were accomplished: purchasing accident insurance for the husband and establishing, through a family meeting, the highest priority goal of saving for the eldest son's high school entrance examination. Ma Xiulan, in her role as the planner, reinforced these efforts and stayed up late handling the related matters.

events.name: Apply for insurance coverage for the husband
events.description: In the morning, I went to the community service center again and, under the guidance of the sales representative, formally filled out the insurance application form, providing my husband's information. I selected an annual payment of 800 yuan for traffic accident insurance, paid the first-year premium in cash, and received the confirmation slip, which finally put my mind at ease.

events.name: Family Meeting Establishes High School Entrance Examination Reserve Fund Plan
events.description: After their child finished homework in the evening, the family held a meeting in the living room. Ma Xiulan brought out the household account book and reviewed savings and expenses with her husband. They focused on discussing the estimated costs for their eldest son's high school entrance examination and unanimously agreed to prioritize it as the highest-level expenditure. Her husband contributed 300 yuan from his savings, while she supplemented 200 yuan, forming a monthly special savings fund of 500 yuan.

events.name: Solving the Market Works Conundrum
events.description: In the afternoon, I took some time to consult Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat about a needlework challenge. Zhou Xiuqin provided video guidance to resolve the issue, and Ma Xiulan successfully completed part of the work. She felt a sense of joy in her progress and plans to finish the piece next week.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Determined to complete the insurance purchase and convene an important family meeting.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of responsibility and steadfastness, substantial progress has been made in family risk management and future planning. Collaborating with my husband brings a strong sense of support, and the progress of my work brings deep satisfaction.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new week began with implementing the family meeting's decision to prepare for savings. I had an in-depth conversation with my eldest son, and my husband presented a safety knot charm before heading out for work. The heavy pre-New Year cleaning has shown initial results but brought physical fatigue, leading to slight weight gain due to exhaustion and an earlier bedtime.

events.name: Pre-New Year cleaning of windows and curtains
events.description: Taking advantage of the fine weather, I started the pre-Spring Festival thorough cleaning early in the morning. Using a long-handled brush and homemade detergent solution, I scrubbed all the windowpanes inside and out until they were sparkling clean. In the afternoon, I took down the heavy curtains from the living room and bedrooms, washed them in the washing machine, and hung them out to dry in the yard. Standing for long periods, raising my arms, and bending over resulted in soreness in my back and arms.

events.name: A Heart-to-Heart Talk with Eldest Son Ma Mingxuan
events.description: After dinner, find an opportunity to have a private conversation with the eldest son. Gently inform him that the parents are fully supportive of his high school entrance exam preparations and have started saving a contingency fund. Encourage him to focus on his studies with peace of mind and inquire about specific difficulties, such as tutoring materials, to bring mother and son closer at heart.

events.name: Complete and gift a peace knot hanging cord.
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan found time to finish the final stitching and thread trimming of the peace knot keychain. In the evening, as her husband was packing his luggage before heading out on the road, she handed it to him softly, saying it was for his safety. Her husband took it and carefully attached it to his keychain, which brought Ma Xiulan a sense of relief.

events.name: Temporary Dinner Adjustment Due to Fatigue
events.description: Exhausted after the thorough cleaning, Ma Xiulan made a last-minute decision to prepare simple noodles with gravy instead of the planned stir-fried dishes. The children understood and helped set the table, for which Ma Xiulan was grateful for the family's support.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, planning to start a thorough cleaning and implement the decisions made at the family meeting.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted yet spiritually fulfilled: The thorough cleaning has shown initial results, communication with my son has been smooth, my husband accepted the peace knot with emotional satisfaction, but soreness in my waist and arms has made me aware of the intensity of the labor.

state.今日运动: High-intensity household chores: window cleaning and curtain removal for washing

2025-01.daily_overview: A day focused on both information acquisition and goal implementation. In the morning, I attended the eldest child's parent-teacher meeting to gather information about the high school entrance exam and gain a sense of urgency. In the afternoon, I put the family meeting decision into practice by depositing the first installment of the high school entrance exam reserve fund, marking the launch of a new financial plan. Weight management remains consistent.

events.name: Attend the Parent-Teacher Conference at Changzi School
events.description: In the morning, I attended the parent-teacher meeting at the school and had a one-on-one conversation with the homeroom teacher, Ms. Han Mei, to learn about my son's performance. His strengths include being introverted and needing encouragement. During the centralized presentation, I listened attentively to the latest changes in the high school entrance examination policies, including subject adjustments, key timelines, and important points for filling out application forms, and took detailed notes.

events.name: Exchange information with other parents
events.description: During the parent-teacher meeting, I took the initiative to chat with several mothers of ninth-grade students, exchanging experiences on enrolling in tutoring classes and purchasing review materials to alleviate exam preparation pressure. The practical information gained was invaluable.

events.name: Consolidate savings and open a special account
events.description: In the afternoon, I returned home and organized this month's embroidery side jobs, saving 200 yuan. In the evening, my husband saved 300 yuan as promised. The 500 yuan in cash was placed in an envelope, with plans to open a fixed deposit account at the bank the following morning.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to stress
events.description: The information from the parent-teacher meeting brought pressure regarding school advancement, leading to mild anxiety in the evening. After discussing it with my husband over the phone, the feeling eased slightly. I decided to relax by doing some handicrafts, though my sleep was somewhat affected.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling both valued and slightly nervous, about to attend an important meeting concerning the child's future.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Information-rich and goal-oriented, parent-teacher meetings bring a sense of urgency and direction, while initiating savings actions fosters a feeling of security and responsibility, yet anxiety lingers.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from school and handling household chores

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Wednesday, the fixed community handicraft corner workday, Ma Xiulan conducted her second teaching session with greater ease and confidence. In the morning, she completed the savings for the high school entrance examination backup fund account and began making specific adjustments to family life to support her child's goals, ultimately achieving a healthy state.

events.name: Handle the special account for high school entrance examination reserve funds
events.description: In the morning, after settling my younger daughter, I walked to the Jinghai District Agricultural Bank. At the counter, I explained that I wanted to open a new fixed-term account to deposit the reserve fund for the high school entrance examination. After comparing interest rates, I chose a one-year fixed-term deposit. Once the process was completed, I asked the teller to handwrite "Mingxuan's High School Entrance Examination Reserve Fund" on the cover of the passbook. Holding the passbook, I felt a sense of reassurance, as if taking the first step toward securing my family's future.

events.name: Organizing Parent-Teacher Meeting Information and Preliminary Planning
events.description: After returning home, I took time to carefully organize yesterday's parent-teacher meeting notes, categorizing them in a dedicated notebook. I then mentally calculated how to further save money from daily expenses and arrange time to supervise my eldest child's studies, integrating this with our savings plan.

events.name: Second Community Handicraft Corner Teaching Session
events.description: In the afternoon, I returned to the community activity room for the second teaching session. With experience, I felt much more composed. After guiding the students in reviewing the basic satin stitch, I taught them the slightly more complex basic techniques of satin embroidery. Moving among them to provide individual guidance, I was delighted to see an aunt proudly displaying the outline of a small flower she had embroidered. Ma Xiulan felt a sense of accomplishment and gratification, and the students addressed her more affectionately and naturally.

events.name: Synchronize progress with the husband and prepare for the arrival.
events.description: In the evening, I showed my husband the high school entrance examination reserve fund passbook, informing him that the first deposit of 500 yuan had been made. I reaffirmed our determination to continue implementing the monthly plan. At the same time, I learned that my husband will return home tomorrow for a rest, and I plan to buy groceries and tidy up the house to create a warm atmosphere for our reunion.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Methodically, with a dual plan of organizing information and completing teaching tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and at peace, the smooth progress of teaching work brings a sense of satisfaction, the initiation of major family plans provides a feeling of steadiness, there is a warm anticipation for tomorrow's family reunion, and health remains in good condition.

state.今日运动: Walking to handle bank affairs and returning from teaching at the community activity center

2025-01.daily_overview: A day centered around household chores and family emotional exchanges. Ma Xiulan devoted herself fully to the preparations for the pre-Spring Festival deep cleaning, creating a tidy environment for her family. In the evening, her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned home, filling the household with a warm atmosphere. Through the gift of a hand-knotted safety knot, Ma Xiulan subtly expressed her concern for her husband's well-being.

events.name: Start the pre-New Year cleanup and organize the children's room.
events.description: After seeing the children off in the morning, Ma Xiulan began the first task of the pre-New Year cleaning: tidying up the rooms of her three children. She carefully sorted out old books and toys that the children no longer needed, packed them into categories, and prepared to give some to the younger children of the neighbors and sell the rest. Next, she removed and washed all the bed sheets and duvet covers for the entire family. Taking advantage of the rare sunny winter weather, she carried the heavy cotton quilts and mattresses into the yard to air them out, repeatedly beating them to remove dust and fluff them up. In the afternoon, she bent down and crawled under the beds and the bottoms of cabinets to clean up accumulated dust and clutter. This series of strenuous physical tasks left her with slight soreness in her back and waist. Recalling recent warning signs, she deliberately slowed down her pace.

events.name: Preparing Dinner for the Returning Husband
events.description: Learning that her husband would return home in the evening, Ma Xiulan went to the market in the afternoon specifically to buy fresh pork tenderloin and noodles. She carefully prepared a table of dishes her husband loves, including sweet and sour pork tenderloin, noodles with gravy, and several light seasonal vegetables. The aroma of the food filled the entire house.

events.name: The whole family gathers for dinner and shares recent updates.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Zhiqiang returned home, weary from his journey. The whole family gathered around the table for dinner, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere. Ma Xiulan asked her husband about his trip, and Ma Zhiqiang gave a brief account. The children, excitedly, shared amusing stories from school with their father, especially the second son, Ma Mingzhe, who animatedly imitated his classmates, making everyone burst into laughter. As Ma Xiulan listened, she felt that all the hardships of the past few days had been worthwhile.

events.name: Presenting a peace knot to convey heartfelt concern
events.description: After dinner, while the children were playing around their father, Ma Xiulan took out the peace knot keychain she had secretly woven over several nights and handed it to her husband. She softly reminded him, "When you're away from home, you must stay safe." Although Ma Zhiqiang was a man of few words, he handled the keychain with great care. He examined the intricate knot closely, nodded, and immediately attached it to his truck key ring, murmuring, "I'll keep it with me always." This simple gesture brought Ma Xiulan a great sense of reassurance.

events.name: Family Planning Meeting the Day Before the Big Cleanup
events.description: After the children went to bed in the evening, Ma Xiulan gathered her three children together and held a brief family meeting in the living room. She announced that the Spring Festival cleaning would officially begin the next day and worked with everyone to create a cleaning plan, assigning tasks according to each person’s abilities. The eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, was responsible for cleaning the high windows, the second son, Ma Mingzhe, was tasked with sweeping the floor and delivering supplies, while the youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, was in charge of organizing her own toys. Ma Xiulan then checked the household cleaning supplies, such as detergents, cloths, and gloves, to ensure they were sufficient, guaranteeing an efficient start the following day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, preparing for the upcoming thorough cleaning, yet feeling somewhat fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and heartwarming, with a slight physical fatigue but a pleasant mood, and a mild soreness in the lower back.

state.今日运动: Household physical labor (tidying up, moving, hanging laundry to dry)

2025-01.daily_overview: The deep cleaning entered a critical phase, with Ma Xiulan conducting thorough cleaning of the kitchen and bathroom, her body signaling signs of fatigue. Meanwhile, the family's financial planning was getting on track—she and her husband opened a dedicated account for their child's high school entrance exam reserve fund and made preparations for the upcoming craft market. On her husband's day off, the couple shared household chores and engaged in in-depth family communication in the evening.

events.name: Deep Cleaning of Kitchen and Bathroom
events.description: Today was the key day for the thorough cleaning. Ma Xiulan put on gloves and a mask and plunged into the kitchen. She removed and washed the range hood filter, repeatedly wiped down the greasy cabinet doors and stovetop with degreaser, and crouched on the floor to meticulously scrub the gaps between the tiles. In the afternoon, she moved to the bathroom, cleaning the toilet, sink, and wall tiles with the same meticulous care. Maintaining crouching and bending positions for extended periods caused a dull ache in her lower back, leaving her noticeably fatigued by the end.

events.name: Contact fellow artisans to confirm market arrangements.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ma Xiulan contacted her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat to confirm in detail the specific time, location, and booth number for the market the next day. Over the phone, they discussed how to arrange the booth to make it more appealing, with Zhou Xiuqin suggesting that small ornaments embroidered with the character "Fu" be placed at the front. They eventually agreed to meet at the bus station the next morning and go together.

events.name: Record and plan the high school entrance examination reserve fund
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan took a moment to retrieve the family ledger. With great care, she turned to a fresh page and wrote in her neatest handwriting: [January 17, 2025, went to the bank with Zhiqiang to open a special account for Mingxuan's high school entrance examination reserve fund and deposited the first installment]. Closing the ledger, she began calculating in her mind: the subsidy for the community handicraft classes she taught would be issued soon this month, and combined with the money saved from grocery expenses, she should be able to set aside a few hundred yuan to deposit next month. She decided that tomorrow at the market, she would promote her products more actively and take on more custom orders.

events.name: Husband's Collaboration Day at Home
events.description: Today, Ma Zhiqiang rested at home. Seeing his wife busy with chores, he proactively took on some physically demanding tasks: he checked the safety of the household's water and electrical circuits and used tools to tighten several slightly loose faucets. In the afternoon, he also tutored his eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, in mathematics and spent some time playing games in the yard with his energetic younger son, Ma Mingzhe, and his daughter, Ma Yuxin. The couple worked together seamlessly, handling a backlog of household chores.

events.name: Open a special account for the high school entrance examination reserve fund.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang went together to a bank near their home. They opened a new savings account in the family's name, with the purpose clearly designated as [Reserve Fund for Eldest Son Ma Mingxuan’s High School Entrance Examination]. This was a crucial step in implementing the decision made during last week’s family meeting. The couple deposited the first sum of money saved from this month's daily expenses and agreed that Ma Zhiqiang would transfer a fixed amount to this account every month after receiving his salary. As they walked out of the bank holding the passbook, Ma Xiulan felt a sense of responsibility and reassurance for the family's future.

events.name: Evening Heart-to-Heart Talk Between Husband and Wife
events.description: After the children had gone to bed, only Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang remained in the living room. Ma Xiulan brewed a pot of tea and detailed to her husband the children’s recent academic progress, the household expenses, and some amusing anecdotes about their neighbor Wang Guilan. She repeatedly reminded him to drive safely and not to push himself too hard while on the road. Ma Zhiqiang listened quietly, occasionally nodding, and briefly shared some of his experiences from his journeys. He reassured his wife, "With you at home, I have nothing to worry about. Please don’t overwork yourself either." Though their words were few, their mutual care flowed naturally through the simple conversation.

起始状态.心情: Determined and ready to tackle the heavy cleaning tasks, but a faint discomfort lingers in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted (especially in the waist), yet inwardly at peace due to the progress of family plans.

state.今日运动: High-intensity household chores (deep cleaning)

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is the community handicraft market day. Ma Xiulan temporarily sets aside her heavy household chores to enjoy the pleasure of crafting and the satisfaction of earning modest income with her friend Zhou Xiuqin. After the market concludes, her husband Ma Zhiqiang is also preparing to set out for work again, as the family experiences a brief reunion followed by separation.

events.name: Meet up with the Craftsmen's Association and head to the market.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan carefully packed her recent embroidery works—including several 'Fu' character pendants, handkerchiefs, and coasters—and also brought along a tablecloth and a small display stand. She met Zhou Xiuqin at the bus stop, and the two chatted and laughed together as they headed to a handicraft market located in a small square in Jinghai District.

events.name: Set up booths to create an atmosphere
events.description: After finding their booth, Ma Xiulan and Zhou Xiuqin immediately got busy. They spread out an elegant tablecloth, arranged their works one by one, and hung small ornaments on the display rack. Ma Xiulan deliberately placed a meticulously embroidered red "Fu" character pendant in the most prominent position, while Zhou Xiuqin arranged her crocheted animal figures beside it. The collaborative booth soon exuded a warm and exquisite handmade atmosphere.

events.name: Communication and Sales at the Marketplace
events.description: The market gradually grew livelier. Ma Xiulan mustered her courage and began introducing her works to customers who stopped to look, sharing insights into embroidery and the meaning behind each stitch. She successfully sold several small accessories and exchanged WeChat contacts with two customers interested in custom embroidery, scheduling follow-up discussions on patterns. During her free moments, she also took great interest in admiring the works of other stallholders, exchanging new stitching techniques and patterns with Zhou Xiuqin and other familiar artisan friends, feeling that her horizons had broadened a little more.

events.name: Packing up and settling accounts, feeling content and satisfied.
events.description: As the evening market concluded, Ma Xiulan and Zhou Xiuqin carefully packed up their stall, repacking the unsold pieces. They settled the day's earnings, which, though modest, represented value created by their own hands, leaving both women content. Afterwards, they gathered their belongings, bid each other farewell under the setting sun, and headed home.

events.name: Seeing off the husband and settling the emotions
events.description: When Ma Xiulan returned home, her husband Ma Zhiqiang had already packed his belongings and was preparing to set off in the afternoon to continue his driving work. She quickly prepared dry provisions for his journey, filled the thermos with hot water, and helped him organize his change of clothes. The whole family saw him off at the door, with the children bidding farewell to their father one by one. Ma Xiulan watched her husband's car drive away, feeling a sense of reluctance in her heart. However, thinking of the emergency funds they had just saved and the peace knot on her husband's keychain, she felt a renewed sense of determination. Turning back home, she began washing the clothes her husband had changed out of, transforming the brief reunion into motivation to continue managing the household.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation tinged with a hint of nervousness (regarding the market sales), with slight relief in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, interwoven with concern for her husband, her body relaxed from the movement.

state.今日运动: Outdoor walking (to and from the market), with prolonged standing.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is family day. Ma Xiulan proactively sought out more odd job opportunities to supplement the household income and meticulously planned and led a family craft activity, seamlessly blending her personal hobby with quality family time. The entire family worked together to create decorations for the Spring Festival, enjoying a process filled with collaborative fun and warm interactions.

events.name: Actively seek more gig opportunities
events.description: With her mind on the backup funds for the high school entrance exam, Ma Xiulan sent WeChat messages in the morning to Zheng Xiuying, a community grid worker, and Zhou Xiuqin, a fellow handicraft worker. She politely inquired whether there would be more handicraft orders or opportunities like yesterday’s market stall in the near future, tactfully expressing her wish to take on more work to supplement the family income. Zheng Xiuying replied that she would keep an eye out for opportunities, while Zhou Xiuqin said she would definitely call Ma Xiulan the next time there was work available.

events.name: Preparing Materials for Family Handcraft Day
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan began preparing for the family craft day the next day. She retrieved her sewing kit and various colored threads from the cabinet, then dug out leftover colored cardstock, scissors, glue, and colored markers. She carefully checked whether each material was complete and usable, organizing them by category on the living room coffee table, looking forward to creating with her children the following day.

events.name: Initiate a family handicraft activity
events.description: On Sunday morning, after breakfast, Ma Xiulan announced to the whole family that they would make Spring Festival decorations together in the afternoon. She showed the children the abundant materials she had prepared and assigned preliminary tasks: the eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, was responsible for designing paper-cut patterns for window decorations; the second son, Ma Mingzhe, was tasked with cutting them out; and the youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, was in charge of coloring. Seeing the beautiful colored paper and paintbrushes, the children were all eager to get started.

events.name: Guide children in creating window paper-cuttings
events.description: The activity began. Under his mother's guidance, Ma Mingxuan carefully traced traditional patterns of "abundance year after year" and the character "Fu" (meaning good fortune) on red cardstock with a pencil, adding some of his own geometric designs. Ma Mingzhe cautiously used safety scissors to cut out the paper-cut window decorations along the lines drawn by his older brother, with Ma Xiulan occasionally reminding him to pay attention to safety and details. Ma Yuxin busily colored the edges of the finished window decorations with a golden marker, holding up each completed piece to show her mother and smiling even more sweetly after receiving praise.

events.name: Focus on embroidered "Fu" character hanging ornaments
events.description: In the intervals of guiding the children, Ma Xiulan herself picked up a needle and thread, focusing intently on embroidering a three-dimensional 'Fu' character on a piece of red silk. She used gold thread to outline the edges, stitching with meticulous care, intending to use this small ornament as a festive decoration for her home during the Spring Festival.

events.name: The husband assists in making the support frame.
events.description: Noticing that some of the larger paper-cuts made by the children tended to curl at the edges, Ma Zhiqiang found a few thin wooden strips and some glue, and began crafting simple support frames for these window decorations. Though not particularly talkative, he was skilled at handiwork and quickly completed several frames, allowing the paper-cuts to be displayed flat and smooth.

events.name: Appreciate the achievements, reap the joy.
events.description: The handicraft activity was drawing to a close, and the whole family laid the completed works on the table for appreciation. The colorful paper-cuttings for window decoration, Ma Xiulan's exquisite embroidery of the character "Fu" (meaning "fortune"), and Ma Yuxin's golden-painted patterns brightened up the entire living room. Ma Xiulan temporarily stored the works away, planning to put them up tomorrow. The afternoon of collaboration filled the home with a sense of accomplishment and cheerful laughter.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, planning enjoyable family activities, with tolerable lower back sensation.

结束状态.心情: Contentment, happiness, and enjoying the warmth of family interaction.

state.今日运动: Light Household Chores and Family Activities

2025-01.daily_overview: On Monday, the children officially began their winter vacation. Ma Xiulan's daily focus shifted from primarily household chores to a dual mode of managing both chores and caring for and supervising the children. She led them in another task of the pre-New Year deep cleaning—cleaning the windows and furniture—and arranged the handmade crafts created by the whole family, bringing a preliminary festive atmosphere to the home.

events.name: Tally the market results and plan the orders
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan carefully stored away the remaining works she had brought back from the market the day before yesterday. She counted the meager income for the day and set it aside with care. More importantly, she recorded the client information and preliminary requirements for the two agreed-upon custom orders in a dedicated notebook and began brainstorming suitable patterns and color schemes.

events.name: Lead children in cleaning windows and sanitary ware
events.description: The thorough cleaning continued. Today's objective was to clean the windows and furniture. Ma Xiulan assigned the tasks: the eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, being tall, was responsible for cleaning the high windows with a long-handled window cleaner; the second son, Ma Mingzhe, helped by changing and washing the cloths and cleaning the buckets; the youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, learned to wipe her own small desk and chairs. Ma Xiulan herself took charge of cleaning the cabinets, tabletops, and other surfaces in the living room and bedrooms. The family worked hard all morning. Although the children occasionally played around, they generally completed their tasks, leaving the home bright and spotless with clean windows and surfaces.

events.name: Putting up Spring Festival decorations
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan brought out the paper-cuttings made the day before and the embroidered "Fu" character ornament. She directed the children, who eagerly helped, as they pasted the paper-cuttings onto the glass windows of the living room and bedrooms and hung the "Fu" ornament at the entrance. The home was instantly filled with a strong festive atmosphere of the Spring Festival, and the children were all delighted to see the fruits of their labor.

起始状态.心情: Calm and prepared for the first day of the children's holiday at home, with a slight burden on the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary but comforted by the new look of the home.

state.今日运动: Household chores (cleaning) and supervising children's activities

2025-01.daily_overview: The New Year goods purchased before the holiday have been arriving one after another, and Ma Xiulan has begun the heavy task of organizing and storing them. At the same time, the thorough cleaning has entered a critical stage, with cleaning the ceiling and tidying up the storage room consuming a great deal of her energy. The continuous exertion has caused her body to send more distinct signals of fatigue.

events.name: Sorting and Organizing New Year Goods
events.description: In recent days, the New Year goods purchased sporadically had been piled at the entrance of the storage room. Today, Ma Xiulan began a systematic organization. She moved heavy items such as rice, flour, and cooking oil into the storage room and placed them against the wall; dried goods like wood ear mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms were stored in sealed containers; as for the meat, part of it was portioned and placed in the freezer, while the other part, such as prepared sausages, was hung on the balcony in a cool and ventilated area (the natural "cold storage" in the north). Vegetables and fruits were placed in a visible spot in the kitchen, while snacks were hidden in high cabinets to prevent the children from sneaking them. The entire process required repeated bending, standing up, and carrying, making it a labor-intensive task.

events.name: Cleaning Dust from High Places and Organizing the Storage Room
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan continued with the thorough cleaning. Using a long bamboo pole tied with an old towel, she carefully swept away cobwebs and accumulated dust from the corners of the ceilings in the living room and bedrooms. Next, she led the children in organizing the cluttered storage room and the corners of the living room. They sorted and stored infrequently used items and cleared out a large number of old cardboard boxes, bottles, cans, and broken toys that were ready to be discarded. The children were responsible for organizing their own books and toys and helped move the cleared-out clutter to the yard.

events.name: Disposal of Waste Items and Final Cleaning
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan sorted the collected waste items, bundling up recyclable cardboard boxes and bottles. She and her children carried out the final cleaning tasks of the day: mopping the floor and wiping down the kitchen stove and bathroom countertops. Finally, the family worked together to deliver the bundled recyclables to the community-designated recycling point. Upon returning home, Ma Xiulan felt the soreness in her back and waist becoming more pronounced, and she decided she must make adjustments tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Aware of the heavy workload, feeling slightly stressed, with increased discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted with intensified lower back pain, yet a sense of accomplishment arises from seeing the newly organized home.

state.今日运动: High-intensity physical labor (carrying, organizing, cleaning)

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is the scheduled teaching day for the community's [Neighborhood Handicraft Corner], and Ma Xiulan needs to temporarily set aside her heavy household chores. In the morning, she completed the final touches of the thorough cleaning, and in the afternoon, she conducted her third embroidery class in the community under the identity of "Teacher Ma." After the intense and continuous labor, the physical discomfort could no longer be ignored.

events.name: Final Cleanup and Physical Warning Signs
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan completed the final touches of the thorough cleaning: mopping all the floors and wiping away the dust from the surfaces of all the furniture. The fatigue accumulated from days of intense labor finally took its toll, as she felt an unusual soreness and stiffness in her lower back. In the afternoon, she had to lie on the sofa to rest for over half an hour. In the evening, she simply prepared dinner and earnestly said to her husband, "During the New Year period, I'll really have to rely on you for all the heavy lifting and moving. My back can't handle it anymore."

events.name: Third Community Handcraft Teaching Session
events.description: Despite feeling unwell, Ma Xiulan still arrived at the community activity center on time in the afternoon. Today was the third session of the handicraft workshop, where she guided several interested residents in combining satin stitch and seed stitch to complete a small flower or leaf. She shared her accumulated embroidery tips on how to make stitches more even and how to change threads without tangling. The participants learned attentively, and the class atmosphere was harmonious. At the end of the session, one of the participants gave her a small handmade accessory as a token of gratitude, which warmed Ma Xiulan’s heart. She informed everyone that the activity would be suspended for the following week due to the upcoming Spring Festival. Thinking about how she had managed to complete a full cycle of teaching, she felt a small sense of pride.

起始状态.心情: Physically exhausted, I forced myself to stay alert to complete the final tasks and teaching duties, with noticeable pain in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, yet there is a hint of relief upon completing the teaching tasks; beginning to feel concerned about physical health and deciding to seek medical attention tomorrow.

state.今日运动: Light housework and community teaching (prolonged standing)

2025-01.daily_overview: The warning signals from her body had become unmistakably clear. While cleaning the last neglected corner of her home—the attic—Ma Xiulan experienced a worsening of her lumbar strain. This served as the direct trigger that prompted her to begin paying attention to her own health and adjusting her pace of life.

events.name: Cleaning the attic, the body sends out serious alarms.
events.description: As the New Year approached, Ma Xiulan decided to thoroughly clean the attic as well. She climbed up to the attic, which was filled with old items and miscellaneous objects accumulated over the years. Bending down, she moved heavy old cardboard boxes and shifted unused old furniture, stirring up dust in the process. Several hours later, when she finally finished cleaning and came downstairs, she clearly felt stiffness and intense soreness in her lower back, even finding it difficult to bend over or squat. This was not the usual fatigue from exertion but a clear, significant signal of exhaustion and strain that demanded attention. Leaning on the staircase, she slowly made her way down, realizing that she could no longer push herself so hard without regard for her physical well-being.

events.name: Consult the community clinic doctor
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan visited the community clinic to consult Dr. Wang about her back pain. After an examination, Dr. Wang diagnosed it as muscle fatigue in the back and advised her to rest, apply heat, and avoid heavy physical labor. He also reminded her that she could try light activities such as walking to alleviate the discomfort. Upon hearing this, Ma Xiulan felt relieved and decided to adjust her lifestyle habits starting from that day.

起始状态.心情: Planning to complete the last major project before the New Year, but the back pain has intensified.

结束状态.心情: Physical pain brings anxiety and reflection, leading to a determination to change, and reassurance is found through the doctor's advice.

state.今日运动: Extremely high-intensity physical labor (carrying heavy objects, cleaning at heights) and walking to seek medical treatment

2025-01.daily_overview: Driven by physical discomfort, Ma Xiulan proactively adjusted her pace. She reduced heavy labor, attempted to alleviate pain with hot compresses, and began considering how to seek help from her family. Meanwhile, with the Spring Festival drawing closer, she started contacting relatives by phone to confirm arrangements for New Year visits.

events.name: Actively adjust the rhythm to try to alleviate the pain.
events.description: After becoming aware of the severe discomfort in her lower back, Ma Xiulan decided to slow down her pace today. She deliberately reduced heavy tasks that required prolonged bending, simply wiping the table with a cloth and preparing three meals. In the afternoon, she boiled water, applied a hot towel to the sore area of her waist, and felt the tight muscles relax slightly. She also tried leaning against the wall and performed a few very simple stretching exercises. She reminded herself inwardly: "I must pay attention to my posture when working in the future and take breaks after working for a while."

events.name: Phone Confirmation of Spring Festival Greeting Arrangements
events.description: During her break, Ma Xiulan called her parents and younger sister, Ma Xiufen. She confirmed the specific times for New Year visits on the first and second days of the lunar new year, thoughtfully asking her parents if there were any special festive dishes they wanted to eat and checking with her sister if the household lacked anything so she could prepare accordingly. The phone calls were filled with lively conversations about the upcoming celebrations, which helped alleviate some of her physical discomfort.

events.name: Try the folk remedy suggested by the neighbor.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan recalled the suggestion from her neighbor Wang Guilan. She heated coarse salt, placed it in a cloth bag, and applied it to her lower back, feeling warmth and comfort as the pain eased. She decided to incorporate this folk remedy into her daily care routine.

起始状态.心情: Experiencing physical discomfort and a somewhat low mood, but determined to respond proactively.

结束状态.心情: Through self-regulation and connecting with loved ones, the mood has improved and health awareness has been enhanced.

state.今日运动: Extremely light housework, attempted simple stretching and hot compress care.

2025-01.daily_overview: This marks the starting point of positive change. Ma Xiulan proactively invited her neighbors for walks, incorporating light social activities into her daily routine to alleviate physical discomfort. Meanwhile, she began learning to express her needs to family members, requesting help with household chores, and planning the details of the Spring Festival together with her husband.

events.name: Inviting neighbors for an evening walk
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan proactively contacted her neighbor Zhang Shufen via WeChat, inviting her to take a walk and get some fresh air at the nearby Jingwen Park in the evening. Zhang Shufen readily agreed, and the two arranged a specific meeting time and location.

events.name: Taking a walk and chatting with the neighbor.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan and Zhang Shufen met at the entrance of the park and strolled along the path for about half an hour. The air on the winter evening was crisp and invigorating. As they walked, they chatted about topics ranging from preparations for the Spring Festival and managing their children during the winter break to the daily trivialities of neighborhood life. Ma Xiulan felt the stiffness from prolonged sitting and fatigue gradually easing as she walked, and her mood relaxed considerably. Zhang Shufen suggested they could make it a habit to take walks several times a week, to which Ma Xiulan readily agreed.

events.name: Share feelings, give rise to new ideas
events.description: After returning home from the walk, Ma Xiulan said to her husband Ma Zhiqiang, "I went for a walk in the park with Sister Zhang today, and I feel much more relaxed and in a better mood." She expressed her hope to make such light activities a daily habit in the future. Ma Zhiqiang nodded and said, "It's good to get some exercise. Don't always stay cooped up at home working."

events.name: Seek help from family members to share household chores
events.description: Taking advantage of the topic of physical discomfort, Ma Xiulan formally explained her back and waist pain to her husband Ma Zhiqiang and her eldest son Ma Mingxuan during dinner. She gently but clearly requested that they take on more physically demanding household chores in the future, such as moving heavy objects, cleaning high windows, and replacing bottled water. The family expressed understanding and support upon hearing this, and Ma Mingxuan immediately offered to help carry heavy items during the next day's shopping.

events.name: Planning the Spring Festival itinerary and budget with my husband.
events.description: After the children went to bed in the evening, Ma Xiulan took out the account book and discussed the arrangements for the Spring Festival in detail with Ma Zhiqiang in the living room. They finalized the visiting itinerary for the New Year, deciding to go to their parents' home first and then to their sister's. They carefully listed the gifts to be prepared (health supplements and pastries for their parents, red envelopes for their sister's children, etc.) and budgeted for the ingredients for the New Year's Eve dinner. The couple meticulously calculated every expense to ensure that the holiday social exchanges were both dignified and within the family's financial means.

起始状态.心情: Decided to attempt a change, harboring some expectations, with slight relief in lower back pain.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and at ease, warmed by the support of family, with a new direction for managing health.

state.今日运动: Take a half-hour walk in the park.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, suitable for going out shopping.

2025-01.daily_overview: The last Sunday before the Spring Festival is the peak day for shopping. Ma Xiulan conducted multiple rounds of batch purchases for New Year goods, carefully budgeting and comparing prices. Her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, fulfilled his promise by helping carry heavy items. During the shopping trip, conversations with neighbors also provided her with practical advice on alleviating back pain.

events.name: Procurement of heavy goods such as rice, flour, cooking oil, etc.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took her eldest son Ma Mingxuan to the Xingwang Vegetable Market in Jinghai District and the surrounding grain and oil stores. She compared prices at several shops and purchased, in batches, essential New Year supplies such as rice, flour, cooking oil, vermicelli, wood ear mushrooms, and shiitake mushrooms—items that are durable for storage and relatively heavy. With her son's help, carrying these heavy goods home became much easier.

events.name: Procurement of Meat and Fish
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market again, heading straight for the familiar meat stall and fish stall. She purchased the pork needed for the New Year's Eve dinner, a whole chicken, and several fresh carp. In front of Aunt Sun's meat stall, she chatted with the vendor for a few minutes about holiday arrangements and asked Aunt Sun to help cut the large pieces of meat as needed for easier handling at home. She also specifically bargained, saving a few yuan.

events.name: Procurement of Fresh Vegetables, Fruits, and Snacks
events.description: After buying the meat, Ma Xiulan moved to the vegetable section, where she purchased relatively perishable fresh vegetables such as greens, celery, and garlic sprouts. She also selected some fruits like apples and oranges. Finally, she stopped at a dried goods stall and weighed out some sunflower seeds, peanuts, and candies for the children, strictly controlling the quantities to avoid waste.

events.name: Encountering a neighbor and exchanging health tips
events.description: On her way home after shopping, Ma Xiulan ran into her neighbor Wang Guilan at the entrance of their residential complex. Seeing Ma Xiulan carrying several bags, Wang Guilan struck up a conversation. Ma Xiulan casually mentioned that she had been suffering from back pain after a thorough cleaning a while ago. The warm-hearted Wang Guilan immediately shared her own experience: "Heat some coarse salt, put it in a cloth bag, and apply it to the sore area—it works wonders! If that doesn’t help, go to the community clinic and have Dr. Wang take a look. Don’t delay." Ma Xiulan quickly expressed her thanks and kept this folk remedy in mind.

起始状态.心情: Preparing for the final procurement push, feeling slightly busy, with the back and waist still feeling acceptable.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured as the procurement is largely completed, my body actually feels better than in the past few days when I was solely doing housework, perhaps due to the increased physical movement.

state.今日运动: Making multiple trips on foot to purchase and transport items.
