2025-01.daily_overview: Preparations for the New Year shift from purchasing to the kitchen. Ma Xiulan begins preparing complex festive dishes and traditional preserved foods in advance to ease the pressure on New Year's Eve. After a thorough house cleaning, the whole family mobilizes to put up Spring Festival couplets and arrange decorations, bringing the festive atmosphere to its peak.

events.name: Prepare complex Chinese New Year dishes in advance
events.description: Ma Xiulan was busy in the kitchen all day. She prepared the filling for Tianjin-style baozi, wrapping dozens of them—some to freeze, and some to take to her parents' home. She simmered a large pot of noodles with savory sauce, filled with diced meat, daylily flowers, wood ear mushrooms, and eggs, giving off an enticing aroma. She also pre-fried the pork strips for sweet and sour pork tenderloin and prepared the fish, making things much easier for New Year's Eve.

events.name: Pickling Traditional New Year's Goods
events.description: In addition to freshly prepared dishes, Ma Xiulan also followed the old method taught by her mother to cure a small jar of preserved meat, stuff some sausages to hang on the balcony, and make a small jar of pickled cucumbers. Although these traditional steps are cumbersome, for her, they are an indispensable "sense of ritual" for the Chinese New Year, filled with the nostalgic flavor of the holiday.

events.name: Complete the thorough cleaning and arrange the Spring Festival decorations.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan led the children in the final cleanup—putting all the cleaning tools back in place and thoroughly mopping the floor. After that, the whole family mobilized to start decorating: Ma Zhiqiang pasted the Spring Festival couplets and the character "Fu" on the main door, while Ma Xiulan and the children adorned the windows with paper-cuttings and hung up red lanterns. In no time, the home was transformed, brimming with a vibrant and festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year. Looking at the fruits of their labor, the entire family was filled with joy.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to handle manual orders
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan received an urgent modification request from a custom embroidery client. She worked late until 11:30 p.m. to complete it. Though exhausted, she persevered for the sake of her reputation and income.

起始状态.心情: Focusing on kitchen work, looking forward to the holidays, with lower back pain mostly relieved.

结束状态.心情: Looking at the newly decorated home and the prepared New Year goods, I feel a sense of accomplishment and festive joy, though I am slightly fatigued from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Kitchen Labor and Household Chore Arrangement

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: New Year's Eve, the most important and most family-reuniting moment of the year. Ma Zhiqiang rushed home, where the whole family put up Spring Festival couplets, made dumplings, and prepared a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner. They gathered around to watch the Spring Festival Gala, welcoming the arrival of the new year amidst warm and lively traditional customs. The family's cohesion reaches its peak on this day.

events.name: The husband returns home, and the whole family reunites.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Zhiqiang completed his final transport assignment before the Lunar New Year and returned safely to his home in Jinghai District, weary from the journey. Not only did he bring himself back, but he also brought some local specialties from other regions as gifts for the children. The family reunion added the greatest sense of fulfillment to the New Year's Eve celebration.

events.name: Pasting Spring Festival couplets and window decorations together
events.description: After Ma Zhiqiang returned, the whole family worked together to carefully paste the remaining Spring Festival couplets, "Fu" characters, and the embroidered window decorations handmade by Ma Xiulan onto the doors and windows. The children ran around, laughing and playing, filling the entire home with the festive joy of the holiday.

events.name: The whole family makes dumplings together.
events.description: In the evening, following the tradition of celebrating the Chinese New Year in northern China, the whole family gathered around the dining table to make dumplings together. Ma Xiulan was responsible for preparing the filling (pork and cabbage) and rolling out the wrappers, while Ma Zhiqiang and the children gathered around to learn how to wrap them. Although the dumplings made by the children varied in shape, with some even having the filling exposed, the process was filled with joy. Everyone chatted and laughed, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Preparing and Enjoying a Sumptuous Reunion Dinner
events.description: While making dumplings, Ma Xiulan began cooking hot dishes in the kitchen. She prepared sweet and sour pork using pre-fried pork tenderloin, braised the cleaned fish, made noodles with gravy using the pre-prepared sauce, and stir-fried several seasonal vegetables. In the evening, the table was laden with a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner. The whole family raised their glasses (with drinks instead of wine) to toast one another, wishing for peace and smoothness in the coming year.

events.name: Watch the Spring Festival Gala, stay up late to welcome the New Year.
events.description: After dinner, the whole family gathered on the sofa in the living room to watch the CCTV Spring Festival Gala. The children received the long-awaited red envelopes from their parents and happily put them away. The family snacked on treats and fruits, chatted, and together awaited the ringing of the New Year's bell in a warm and lively atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Excited, busy, preparing for the most important family moment, with no discomfort in the waist or back.

结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied and happy, filled with beautiful expectations for the future.

state.今日运动: Household Preparation and Family Activities

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, a day for New Year visits and blessings, Ma Xiulan received her first subsidy as a community handicraft instructor, marking recognition of her new role. Afterwards, the whole family went to her parents’ home to pay New Year visits and reunite, spending a warm and affectionate first day of the Spring Festival surrounded by family love.

events.name: Received the first manual teaching subsidy
events.description: In the morning, community grid member Zheng Xiuying visited Ma Xiulan at her home and handed her an envelope containing 200 yuan in cash. This was the transportation and material subsidy for her first month serving as an instructor for the community handicraft corner. Ma Xiulan took the thin envelope, feeling a profound sense of reassurance and joy in her heart. This was a stable income, backed by the community, earned through her own skills and efforts—a reward with a significance unlike any before.

events.name: Household Chores and New Year Greetings via Phone Calls
events.description: On the morning of Chinese New Year's Day, Ma Xiulan got up a little later than usual and prepared a simple breakfast. She quickly tidied up the living room and kitchen after the New Year's Eve celebrations. Later, she sent voice or video New Year greetings via WeChat to her elder sister Li Xiuyun's family in Beijing, as well as other relatives whom she couldn't visit in person. She also received many blessings and digital red envelopes in return.

events.name: Returning to parents' home for New Year's reunion.
events.description: Around 10 a.m., Ma Xiulan and her family of five set off with prepared gifts to visit her parents' home, also located on Shengli Street in Jinghai District. Upon entering, they were greeted by a strong festive atmosphere and the warmth of family bonds. They presented gifts and New Year's blessings to her father, Ma Jianguo, and mother, Li Xiuying. The children obediently paid their New Year respects to their grandparents and received thick red envelopes in return. At noon, the entire family gathered around the table to enjoy a sumptuous lunch prepared jointly by the mother and Li Xiulan. Throughout the meal, they shared updates on family matters, with laughter and cheerful conversations filling the air. After the meal, as usual, Ma Xiulan helped her mother clean up the dishes and utensils while engaging in heartfelt conversation.

events.name: Taking a walk with the neighbor in the evening.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ma Xiulan took the initiative to invite her neighbor Zhang Shufen for a half-hour walk in Jingwen Park, continuing to cultivate her walking habit and feeling physically relaxed.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, immersed in the festive atmosphere, with comfortable back support.

结束状态.心情: Feeling warm and fulfilled due to family reunions and new sources of income, with good health conditions.

state.今日运动: Visiting relatives and friends on foot during the Spring Festival and taking evening walks

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Chinese New Year, visiting relatives and friends continued. Ma Xiulan and her family drove to her sister's home in the Binhai New Area to extend New Year greetings. The sisters share a deep bond, and the children played together happily. In the evening, she discussed the planning of subsidy income with her family, further strengthening the consensus on household finances.

events.name: Visiting my younger sister's home for New Year greetings, sisters reunite.
events.description: Today, Ma Xiulan and her family drove for over an hour to visit her sister Ma Xiufen’s home in Tanggu Street, Binhai New Area, to extend New Year greetings. The two sisters, who had not seen each other for a long time, had endless things to talk about. They enthusiastically exchanged updates about their lives, their children’s education, and, of course, topics related to their shared passion for handicrafts. Ma Xiulan brought along homemade Tianjin-style steamed buns and pickles, which Ma Xiufen praised highly for her sister’s excellent culinary skills. The children (Ma Mingxuan, Ma Mingzhe, Ma Yuxin, and Ma Xiufen’s child) quickly became acquainted and played together. The two families enjoyed a lively and harmonious dinner together.

events.name: Plan the use of subsidies and strengthen family consensus.
events.description: Returning from her younger sister's home in the evening, Ma Xiulan took out the 200 yuan subsidy during dinner. She said to her husband Ma Zhiqiang and their children, "This is the subsidy I earned by teaching handicrafts in the community. Although it's not much, it is still part of our family's financial plan." She reiterated the previous family decision: half of the 200 yuan (100 yuan) would be deposited into Mingxuan's reserve fund account for the high school entrance examination, while the other half (100 yuan) would be used to purchase higher-quality embroidery threads and fabrics. This would improve the quality of her own work and enhance her teaching. The whole family expressed support for her decision, and Ma Zhiqiang even praised her for "planning well."

events.name: Remote Video Exchange with Fellow Craft Enthusiasts
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan chatted with her craft friends Zhou Xiuqin and Aunt Wu via WeChat video, sharing Spring Festival experiences and new craft ideas. Aunt Wu suggested she try incorporating zodiac element patterns.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to reuniting with my sister, and I am in good health.

结束状态.心情: Feeling comforted and empowered by the support in family interactions and financial planning.

state.今日运动: Outdoor visits, light social activities

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, the pace of life began to transition from intensive festive activities back to the daily routine. Ma Xiulan carried out several wrap-up and planning tasks: exchanging greetings with craft friends, extending remote New Year wishes, depositing emergency funds, reviewing household finances, and starting to outline post-holiday handicraft teaching and family arrangements, all in preparation for the start of a new cycle.

events.name: Sharing Teaching Experiences with Fellow Craftspeople
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arranged to meet with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin on a stone bench in the residential community. The two of them sat in the sun, drinking tea and chatting. Ma Xiulan excitedly shared her experiences from the past month of teaching in the community, the progress of her students, as well as the interesting moments and challenges encountered during her classes. Zhou Xiuqin was also delighted for her, and the two exchanged some teaching methods for beginners and new ideas for pattern designs.

events.name: Remote New Year Greetings and Receiving Blessings
events.description: During her spare time, Ma Xiulan once again chatted via WeChat video with her elder sister Li Xiuyun, who lives in Beijing, sharing details about her visit to her younger sister's home the previous day. She also made phone calls or sent voice messages to distant relatives such as her aunt Li Shen and her husband's colleague Zhao Jianguo, offering belated or renewed New Year's greetings. At the same time, she received blessings and greetings from neighbors and relatives from all directions.

events.name: Deposit the high school entrance examination reserve fund
events.description: In the late afternoon, Ma Xiulan walked to a nearby bank branch with the 100 yuan in cash she had decided to save the day before and deposited the money into the dedicated savings account for [Mingxuan's High School Entrance Examination Reserve Fund]. Looking at the increased figure in the passbook, she felt that she had taken another small, tangible step toward the family's goal.

events.name: Monthly Household Financial Review and Planning
events.description: On the last evening of January, after the children had gone to sleep, Ma Xiulan took out the account book and briefly reviewed the family's expenses for the month with her husband, Ma Zhiqiang. They focused on verifying major expenditures related to the Spring Festival, such as water, electricity, and gas bills, as well as expenses for New Year goods and social interactions. They discussed Ma Zhiqiang's salary income for the month, along with Ma Xiulan's earnings from odd jobs and subsidies. Based on this, the couple conducted a preliminary discussion on the family budget for the following month (February), paying particular attention to the children's school tuition fees and potential social expenses, ensuring a smooth financial transition after the holiday spending.

events.name: Brainstorming new embroidery works with the Spring Festival theme
events.description: During a quiet afternoon moment, Ma Xiulan sat at her desk and sketched a few rough drawings on paper based on her observations and feelings from the Spring Festival: there was a "Ruyi knot" shaped like a traditional Chinese button, as well as small animal patterns incorporating zodiac elements. She thought she could use these new designs to create a batch of more festive embroidered ornaments, which might come in handy at the next market.

events.name: The Habit of Taking Regular Evening Walks Is Reinforced
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan and her neighbor Zhang Shufen took a 30-minute walk as scheduled in Jingwen Park, discussing post-holiday life arrangements. She felt that walking had become a part of her daily health routine.

起始状态.心情: Relax, enjoy the end of the holiday, with no discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Calm and methodical, having completed a series of concluding tasks and planning, there is both preparation and some reflection on the upcoming daily life. Health is in good condition, and a walking habit has begun to take shape.

state.今日运动: Walking for errands and evening strolls

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with a gentle breeze, cooler temperatures in the morning.
date_attribute.holiday:

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, Ma Xiulan returned to her daily role as a homemaker, completing post-holiday tasks such as organizing finances, tidying up items, and planning savings. She also began preparing for the family's goals and personal interests in the new year, smoothly transitioning from the festive atmosphere back to a regular routine and resuming her healthy walking habit.

events.name: Organizing Spring Festival Finances and Planning Savings
events.description: All the Spring Festival visiting activities have concluded. In the morning, Ma Xiulan gathered the red envelopes the children had received, sat in the living room to carefully count them, and recorded the amounts and the givers one by one in the family account book. She then washed and put away the dishes and local specialty gifts brought back from her parents' and sister's homes. After lunch, she reviewed the experiences of visiting relatives and friends during the Spring Festival with her husband and children, selected some photos taken during the gatherings, and shared them in the family WeChat group named "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity." In the evening, she calculated the family's recent expenses and decided to set aside a portion of the red envelope money (approximately 500 yuan) separately, planning to deposit it into the dedicated education reserve account for her eldest son during her next visit to the bank in a couple of days.

events.name: Procurement of Handicraft Materials
events.description: In consideration of the upcoming community handicraft corner teaching sessions requiring better material demonstrations, Ma Xiulan took out the 100 yuan subsidy she had saved from her last part-time job and specifically walked to the town's "Qiaoshoufang" material store, which she and her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin often visited. In the shop, she carefully compared embroidery threads of different brands and textures, ultimately selecting several types of Suzhou embroidery threads with brighter colors and softer textures, along with a few pieces of plain cotton-linen fabric suitable for teaching purposes. She spent exactly her budget and returned home feeling satisfied.

events.name: Resuming the habit of taking evening walks
events.description: After finishing the household chores in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan took a 20-minute walk with her neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan, in Jingwen Park. They chatted about their post-Spring Festival life arrangements and health-related topics. They agreed to take regular walks together every week to maintain a basic level of physical activity.

events.name: Select patterns and prepare materials for handicraft instruction.
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Ma Xiulan sat on the sofa and browsed the "Jinmen Qiaoshou" WeChat group on her phone. She had a video discussion with Zhou Xiuqin and Aunt Wu, who was far away in Cangzhou, and the three of them finally selected a traditional peony pattern symbolizing "blossoming wealth" as the primary practice design for the handicraft corner teaching session next week. Afterward, she got up and rummaged through the old embroidery thread basket at home, checking the available threads against the pattern list and jotting down on a slip of paper the specific colors that were missing (such as goose yellow and lake blue). She planned to buy the missing threads and new embroidery cloth when she visits the Jinghai District small commodities market tomorrow or the day after.

events.name: Daily Household Chores and Care
events.description: Preparing three meals a day and cleaning up afterward, supervising the three children in completing their winter vacation assignments (the eldest son Ma Mingxuan works on test papers, the second son Ma Mingzhe practices handwriting, and the youngest daughter Ma Yuxin draws), and checking whether the children's clothes need mending.

起始状态.心情: Calm and somewhat fulfilled, gradually settling back from the bustling Spring Festival and beginning to contemplate upcoming family matters.

结束状态.心情: Methodically, I feel reassured about completing the post-holiday organization and clarifying the preparations for manual teaching, with a slight contemplation on family financial planning.

state.今日运动: Household chores (light) and a 20-minute evening walk

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: Sunday, Family Day. In the morning, Ma Xiulan stayed at home to organize and plan, contemplating how to enhance her handicraft skills and teaching methods. In the afternoon, she engaged in outdoor labor, tending to the small vegetable garden in her yard to prepare for spring planting. The rhythm of her life was well-balanced between work and rest, but she went to bed early due to fatigue.

events.name: Organize new materials and conceptualize their applications
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took out the embroidery threads and fabrics she had bought from 'Qiaoshoufang' the previous day and examined them carefully by the window where the light was good. She sorted them by color and material, placing them back into her craft supply box, and cleared out a dedicated space for teaching materials. Stroking the soft-textured embroidery threads, she began to contemplate how to use these better materials to create more exquisite samples in the upcoming community handicraft tutorial class, aiming to inspire the participants' interest. At the same time, she also considered embroidering a more intricate pendant for herself.

events.name: Cleaning the Courtyard Vegetable Garden
events.description: The afternoon sun was just right. Ma Xiulan put on her old gloves, took a small rake and a broom, and went to the small vegetable garden in her own courtyard. The vegetable beds were full of withered branches and fallen leaves left over from the previous year. She patiently and carefully cleared them out, piled them into a discarded foam box in the corner, and prepared to compost them into fertilizer. Her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, was playing with dolls on the open ground nearby. As she worked, Ma Xiulan would occasionally look up to check on her daughter's safety and respond to the child's curious questions. Due to the heavy workload, she felt somewhat tired.

events.name: Food Preparation and Family Interaction
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan began preparing dinner, heating and processing some semi-finished ingredients she had brought back from her parents' house the day before. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, was resting at home over the weekend and helped repair a slightly loose cabinet door in the kitchen. During dinner, the family discussed their respective plans for the following week, with Ma Zhiqiang mentioning that the transportation company's workload had started to increase after the Spring Festival.

events.name: Check the child's homework and urge them to wash up.
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan checked the progress of her children's winter vacation homework, particularly reminding her playful second son Ma Mingzhe not to forget to practice handwriting. She then supervised the three children as they took turns bathing and brushing their teeth, and arranged for them to go to bed. Due to fatigue from the afternoon's labor, she herself went to bed early to rest.

起始状态.心情: Relax, weekend mornings are more leisurely than usual.

结束状态.心情: Content yet weary, having completed the planned tidying and labor while also enjoying the time of family reunion, but the body is in need of rest.

state.今日运动: Yard Work (Moderate Intensity)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered light rain, damp and chilly weather.
date_attribute.holiday: Make-up workday (for January 26)

2025-02.daily_overview: It was a make-up workday, but as a homemaker, Ma Xiulan's rhythm primarily revolved around her family. Today, she focused on handling core household matters and, due to the weather, canceled her walk, altering her plans accordingly.

events.name: Planning Weekly Family Menus and Shopping Lists
events.description: After seeing off her family members who were heading to school and work in the morning, Ma Xiulan took out her account book and the inventory list from the refrigerator. Taking into consideration her family's taste preferences and the principle of balanced nutrition, she drafted a daily menu for the upcoming week on paper. Then, by cross-referencing the menu with the existing ingredients, she carefully compiled a detailed shopping list for the market, specifying quantities and estimated costs to ensure it stayed within the monthly living expense budget of 5,000 yuan.

events.name: Turn over the soil in the vegetable garden and apply fertilizer.
events.description: Before the rain began, Ma Xiulan returned to her small vegetable garden. She used a shovel to deeply turn the soil she had cleared the day before, breaking up the hardened clods and raking the ground level. While turning the soil, she remembered the wood ash her neighbor Wang Guilan had given her a few days earlier. She went back inside to fetch it, then evenly spread it over the surface of the freshly turned soil, lightly mixing it in with a rake. Feeling the loose, crumbly earth, she thought to herself that once the weather warmed up a bit more, she could start sowing tomato and cucumber seeds.

events.name: Canceling the walk due to weather and temporarily taking on manual orders.
events.description: The rain stopped in the afternoon, but the ground remained slippery. Ma Xiulan decided to cancel her walking plan with Wang Guilan. While at home, she received a WeChat message from grid member Zheng Xiuying, introducing an urgent order for hand-embroidered coasters that required the completion of 10 pairs within three days. After consideration, Ma Xiulan accepted the order and began preparing the materials.

events.name: Preparing Dinner and Family Communication
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan prepared a simple dinner according to the menu. The eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, mentioned that there might be a parent-teacher meeting next week, which Ma Xiulan silently noted in her mind. After the meal, while tidying up the kitchen, she listened to her younger daughter recount amusing stories from kindergarten, all the while contemplating how to arrange her time to complete the handmade orders.

起始状态.心情: Down-to-earth, a new week begins with many family tasks at hand.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment with slight pressure: menu planning and garden organization have been completed, but the newly added handmade orders bring a sense of time pressure.

state.今日运动: Yard Work (Moderate)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny to cloudy with moderate wind
date_attribute.holiday: Make-up Workday (for February 8)

2025-02.daily_overview: On another adjusted holiday, Ma Xiulan went out for shopping and prepared for the handicraft teaching session. Meanwhile, due to increased food intake from social gatherings, her weight saw a slight increase.

events.name: Prepare teaching materials for manual corner
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan made final preparations at home for the next day's handicraft corner teaching session. She packed embroidery needles, threads of different colors, pre-cut fabric pieces, and photocopied patterns of the "Flowers Blooming in Wealth" design into several small bags. She then silently reviewed the key steps for teaching the running stitch and backstitch in her mind once more, ensuring that her first session as an instructor would start smoothly.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients at the vegetable market
events.description: After preparing her teaching materials, Ma Xiulan walked to the 'Xingwang Vegetable Market' carrying a shopping basket. She first stopped at the familiar vegetable stall run by Aunt Sun Guifang, where she purchased seasonal vegetables such as potatoes, cabbage, and tomatoes according to her list. Aunt Sun greeted her warmly, rounded down the total after weighing the items as usual, and even handed her a bunch of fresh scallions. The two also chatted briefly about the recent slight increase in vegetable prices and some gossip about whose child in the community was getting married.

events.name: Exchanging health tips and having a small gathering with neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: At the meat stall, Ma Xiulan coincidentally met Wang Guilan, who had also come to buy groceries. Ma Xiulan proactively mentioned that she had started learning Baduanjin the day before, feeling that this gentle, slow-paced exercise was well-suited for people their age. Wang Guilan showed great interest upon hearing this and invited Ma Xiulan to her home for a cup of tea. The two chatted over tea at Wang Guilan’s house, enjoying some snacks. Ma Xiulan relaxed socially and ended up eating a bit more than usual.

events.name: Preparing meals for family members
events.description: After returning from the grocery shopping, Ma Xiulan sorted and stored the ingredients properly, then began preparing lunch and dinner. She intentionally cooked extra rice, setting aside a portion to make fried rice with eggs for breakfast the next morning.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly nervous and expectant, as tomorrow will be the first time teaching in the community as a counselor.

结束状态.心情: A state of calm readiness prevails, with teaching materials and household ingredients all prepared, instilling greater confidence in tomorrow's activities, though a slight sense of fullness lingers from the gathering's fare.

state.今日运动: Walking Procurement (Mild)

2025-02.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone in Ma Xiulan's community role development—her first time teaching as a volunteer instructor at the community craft corner. From receiving subsidies to implementing the teaching and conducting post-class reflections, the entire process has provided her with a strong sense of community identity and value. Her professional identity perception is beginning to shift, and she stayed up late due to excitement.

events.name: Receive community counselor subsidy
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan first walked to the community service center, where she received her first monthly transportation and material subsidy of 200 yuan in cash from the familiar grid worker Zheng Xiuying for serving as a handicraft corner instructor. Sister Zheng encouraged her with a smile to teach well, saying that everyone was looking forward to it.

events.name: Go to the community activity center to prepare for teaching.
events.description: After receiving the subsidy, Ma Xiulan walked to the community activity center with her prepared teaching materials. On the way, she encountered several familiar neighbor aunties who, upon learning she was going to teach, praised her for being capable. She arrived twenty minutes early, arranged the tables and chairs together with the community staff, and placed the materials on each table.

events.name: First Teaching Session of the Community Handicraft Corner
events.description: The handicraft corner started on time, with about a dozen participants, mostly middle-aged and elderly women, along with two young mothers. Ma Xiulan was initially a bit nervous, but she relaxed upon seeing the friendly gazes of the attendees. She began by introducing herself, then picked up a needle and thread, hung a pattern diagram on the blackboard, and proceeded to explain and demonstrate the basic running stitch step by step. Her explanation was clear, and her technique was skilled.

events.name: Guide trainees in practicing social interactions
events.description: After the demonstration, the trainees began to practice. Ma Xiulan stepped down from the podium and patiently moved among the trainees, bending down to guide them through threading needles and stitching with hands-on assistance. During the break, everyone chatted over tea, with the conversation naturally shifting from embroidery patterns to topics such as their grandchildren's schooling and recently watched TV dramas, creating a relaxed and harmonious atmosphere. Ma Xiulan felt that she had truly integrated into this small community group.

events.name: Conclusion of Instruction and Feedback
events.description: After the two-hour teaching session, the community staff once again expressed their gratitude to Ma Xiulan. Ma Xiulan, along with several trainees, cleaned up the venue and organized the remaining materials. She then walked home together with Zhou Xiuqin, a trainee who also lives on Jingwen Road, discussing on the way how well the trainees had grasped the content of the day's lesson.

events.name: Post-Class Review and Planning
events.description: In the evening, after putting her youngest daughter to sleep, Ma Xiulan briefly recorded the day’s teaching progress under the lamp: most of the students had learned how to start with a plain stitch, but they needed more practice with casting off; two elderly aunties had difficulty threading needles due to presbyopia, so she could prepare a few needle threaders for the next session. Next, she checked the embroidery thread inventory, noting the colors that were running low and planning to restock them soon. Excited by the success of the teaching session, she stayed up late organizing her notes.

起始状态.心情: Nervous and excited, as if about to undertake an important task.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, the joy of her first successful teaching experience and the feeling of being needed brought her happiness, though she felt slightly fatigued from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the community center, teaching standing (light intensity)

2025-02.daily_overview: After gaining community recognition and earning her first related income, Ma Xiulan actively channeled the economic gains today into advancing her family's long-term goals. She strictly adhered to family financial discipline by depositing a sum into her eldest son's education fund. To celebrate the completion of the deposit, she gathered with her family for a modest meal, during which they indulged slightly more than usual.

events.name: Organize monthly household accounts
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took out the family account book and carefully calculated the household expenses for January and the expenditures from February up to the present. She factored in the household allowance contributed by her husband Ma Zhiqiang last month, her own part-time income, and the community subsidy received yesterday. After meticulous budgeting, she confirmed that there would be a surplus of approximately 800 yuan this month, which could be allocated to savings. She clearly wrote in the book: This savings goal—education reserve fund for eldest son Ma Mingxuan's high school entrance examination.

events.name: Go to the bank to make a deposit.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan walked to the Agricultural Bank of China branch in Jinghai District, carrying 800 yuan in cash (including 200 yuan in community subsidies and 600 yuan in household savings) along with her passbook. At the counter, she deposited the money into the savings account specifically opened for her eldest son.

events.name: Check Account Progress
events.description: After making the deposit, Ma Xiulan asked the teller to help check the cumulative balance of the account. Seeing that the number had increased again, she felt reassured and requested the teller to print the latest account statement, which she then clipped into her ledger as proof.

events.name: Received a new job offer
events.description: Shortly after returning home from the bank, Ma Xiulan received a WeChat voice message from grid member Zheng Xiuying. Sister Zheng first congratulated her on the successful teaching session from the previous day, then mentioned that an acquaintance needed a batch of handmade embroidered coasters to be produced urgently, with good pay, and asked if she would take on the job. Following that, Sister Zheng said in a mysterious tone that the community was planning a more formal "Handicraft Skills Enhancement Class" project and was looking for reliable teaching assistants. She felt Ma Xiulan was a good fit and wanted to visit her the next day to discuss the details. Ma Xiulan was both surprised and delighted and promptly agreed.

events.name: A Small Family Celebration
events.description: In the evening, to celebrate the successful deposit, Ma Xiulan prepared a slightly more sumptuous dinner than usual, including sweet and sour pork tenderloin and noodles with gravy, which the whole family enjoyed together, allowing themselves a bit more indulgence in their diet. After the meal, she helped the children with their homework as usual, but in a cheerful mood.

起始状态.心情: Structured, focusing on family financial management.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and hopeful, not only have I achieved my savings goal, but I also see the possibility of turning my hobby into a more stable source of income, feeling slightly satisfied from celebratory dining.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the bank (light intensity)

2025-02.daily_overview: Today was a significant day for in-depth exchanges with Zheng Xiuying, a key figure in the community, which sparked professional reflections. From specific gig opportunities to long-term project planning, this conversation prompted Ma Xiulan to seriously consider the possibility of systematizing and professionalizing her craft hobby. She also engaged in important family decision-making discussions with her husband and stayed up late contemplating the future.

events.name: Discussing Gig Work and Career Planning with Zheng Xiuying
events.description: In the afternoon, Zheng Xiuying arrived at Ma Xiulan's home as scheduled. She first provided a detailed explanation of the requirements, quantity, and compensation for the embroidery coaster piecework (completing 20 pairs for a payment of 200 yuan). Ma Xiulan felt it was acceptable to take on the task. Next, Sister Zheng focused on introducing the concept of the community's "Handicraft Skills Enhancement Class": this is a course spanning several months with a fixed schedule, aimed at systematically passing down local craftsmanship. The community hopes to invite key individuals like Ma Xiulan, who possess excellent skills, patience, and a good reputation among residents, to serve as teaching assistants, offering more stable hourly subsidies. The two engaged in an in-depth discussion regarding the course content, schedule, potential income, and the responsibilities Ma Xiulan would need to undertake.

events.name: Discuss family plans with husband
events.description: In the evening, after her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned home, Ma Xiulan eagerly told him about Zheng Xiuying's proposal while serving the meal, including the part-time job making coasters and the opportunity to serve as a teaching assistant in the skills training class. After dinner, the two sat in the living room and had a practical discussion regarding the family's schedule, the potential contribution of this income to the household, and the care of their three children. After listening, Ma Zhiqiang expressed his support for her trying a more stable part-time job, believing it to be a positive step.

events.name: Personal Reflections and Aspirations
events.description: Late at night, lying in bed, Ma Xiulan was still deep in thought. She felt both excited about the prospect of a stable income and social recognition, yet worried about whether she could handle a more formal teaching role. She considered that if she took on the teaching assistant position, she could occasionally ask her mother or younger sister to pick up her youngest daughter from afternoon classes. In the end, she decided to first steadily accept the coaster piecework introduced by Sister Zheng, proving her capabilities through practical action while patiently waiting for further news about the skills training program. With her mind racing, she stayed up a little later than usual.

events.name: Share news with fellow craft enthusiasts
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan couldn't help but share the news about the community possibly opening a skills training class with her closest craft friend, Zhou Xiuqin, via WeChat. The two chatted excitedly on the phone for quite a while, both feeling it was a rare opportunity. They agreed that if the project truly launched, they would sign up or apply together, so they could look out for each other.

起始状态.心情: With a mix of anticipation and slight unease, I await a conversation that may shape the future.

结束状态.心情: Her thoughts were scattered yet focused, with her husband's support giving her great confidence. She began to envision a clearer and more valuable future role, though she felt slightly fatigued from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Household chores (light)

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of emotional solace and health exploration. Ma Xiulan engaged in a deep afternoon tea conversation with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, sharing life pressures and gaining emotional support. Meanwhile, she proactively began practicing Baduanjin to improve her health, marking the awakening of her health management awareness, with a slight decrease in weight due to increased activity.

events.name: Preparing for Guests
events.description: Knowing that her childhood friend Liu Chunmei would visit in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan carefully cleaned the living room in the morning, wiped the coffee table clean, and prepared a pot of jasmine tea in advance. She also set out homemade mung bean cakes and fried dough twists to create a warm and comfortable atmosphere for conversation. Additionally, she placed the half-finished coaster she was embroidering beside the coffee table.

events.name: Afternoon Tea with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: Liu Chunmei arrived as promised, carrying a bag of fruit. The two of them sat down in the living room, sipping tea and enjoying some snacks while chatting casually about their children, husbands, and the health of their parents, creating a relaxed atmosphere. Then, they each picked up their needlework, and as they worked on their crafts, the conversation deepened. Liu Chunmei confided about the monotony of her job at the supermarket and the pressure of getting along with her younger colleagues, while Ma Xiulan expressed her anxiety over her eldest son’s upcoming high school entrance exam and her underlying worries about the family’s persistently tight finances. Listening and comforting each other, both felt a significant easing of the knots in their hearts.

events.name: Exchange Practical Life Information
events.description: After sharing their thoughts, the conversation shifted to more practical matters. Liu Chunmei shared details about the upcoming member discount day at the supermarket next week, advising Ma Xiulan on which daily necessities would be more cost-effective to purchase then. Ma Xiulan, in turn, discussed information she had gathered from the parents' group about the local middle school's admission policies and the emphasis their homeroom teacher, Ms. Han, placed on reading. Both felt they had gained a great deal from the exchange.

events.name: Farewell and Aftertaste
events.description: After nearly three hours together, Liu Chunmei stood up to say goodbye, and the two agreed to meet again next month. After seeing off her friend, Ma Xiulan tidied up the tea set, reflecting on their afternoon conversation. She felt that the unadorned understanding and support between old friends was a precious treasure in life, bringing her a sense of calm and warmth.

events.name: First attempt at learning Baduanjin
events.description: During a break from evening chores, Ma Xiulan recalled her recent agreement with Wang Guilan and her growing focus on health. She asked her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, who had just finished his homework, to help her search for "beginner's guide to Baduanjin" on his phone. They bookmarked a tutorial from the General Administration of Sport of China, which featured clear explanations and gentle movements. She then spent over half an hour sitting on the sofa, repeatedly watching the breakdown of the first two postures and their coordination with breathing. After trying to mimic the movements a few times, she found that while they appeared simple, they actually required considerable coordination.

起始状态.心情: Pleasant, looking forward to meeting old friends.

结束状态.心情: Comfortable and fulfilling, the power of friendship alleviates stress, while taking the first step towards proactive exercise, resulting in a slight decrease in weight due to physical activity.

state.今日运动: Learn and practice the Eight-Section Brocade movements for 15 minutes (extremely mild intensity).

2025-02.daily_overview: Sunday, a day that intertwines family time with personal growth. On one hand, Ma Xiulan immersed herself in the world of handicrafts, seeking to refine her skills; on the other, she put yesterday's theoretical learning into practice by starting her first morning session of Baduanjin exercises. Though still unfamiliar with the movements, it marked a significant step toward building a healthy habit.

events.name: First morning practice of Baduanjin
events.description: After seeing her husband off to work in the morning and before the children woke up, Ma Xiulan took her phone to the relatively quiet courtyard. She opened a video she had saved the day before, pressed play, and attempted to follow along with the music and instructions to practice the first two movements of Baduanjin: "Lifting the Sky to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing the Bow to Shoot the Eagle." Her movements were stiff and unfamiliar, often falling out of sync with the rhythm, with poor coordination between her hands and feet and irregular breathing. She persisted for about 15 minutes, feeling a slight warmth in her body. Although she felt a stretch in her shoulders, waist, and back, the effort was noticeable.

events.name: Embroidery Practice and Request for Guidance
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan began embroidering the intricate pattern of 'Blooming Flowers and Prosperity,' intending to create it as a fine sample of her work. When she reached the stamen part, she was stumped by a special seed stitch technique. She paused and sought advice from Aunt Wu, who was far away in Cangzhou, via a WeChat video call. Aunt Wu patiently demonstrated the winding technique and force control of the stitch in front of the camera. Ma Xiulan followed along and, after several failed attempts, finally grasped the key points. Delighted, she thanked Aunt Wu.

events.name: Cutting and Tracing Embroidery Patterns
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan began working on the upcoming coaster orders. She carefully cut the plain cotton fabric she had purchased into 20 pairs of squares according to the coaster dimensions. Then, using tracing paper, she transferred the pre-designed simple ruyi pattern to the center of each piece of fabric, preparing for the subsequent batch embroidery. Her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, watched curiously nearby, so Ma Xiulan gave her a small scrap of fabric and a blunt needle to "help" alongside her.

events.name: Family Dinner and Weekend Wind-Down
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan prepared a slightly more sumptuous dinner than usual, as her husband was home for the weekend. After the meal, she urged the children to check their school bags and prepare their stationery and red scarves for the start of school the next day (marking the end of the winter vacation), helping them transition back from their holiday mindset.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of curiosity about trying new things.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired yet satisfied, I overcame a difficulty in manual work and bravely started my first morning workout, feeling that I am gradually making progress.

2025-02.daily_overview: A new week begins, with children returning to school and life rhythms returning to normal. Ma Xiulan's thoughts and decisions today revolve around the family's long-term planning. Due to foggy weather, outdoor activities were canceled, and her weight slightly increased due to dietary changes after the lecture.

events.name: Plan the Spring Vegetable Garden Planting
events.description: After seeing off the children who had left for school at the start of the new term, Ma Xiulan took out paper and pen and began carefully planning the planting scheme for her spring vegetable garden, taking into account the climate of the Tianjin area and the sunlight conditions in her own courtyard. She decided to sow the seeds in two batches: the first batch (mid-March) would include trellised vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumbers, and beans, while the second batch (early April) would consist of leafy greens like bok choy and cilantro. While sorting through the tomato and bean seeds left over from the previous year, she realized she did not have enough cucumber seeds, so she added "purchase cucumber and cilantro seeds" to her shopping list.

events.name: Inspired by Participating in a Community Health Lecture
events.description: In the afternoon, the community organized a health lecture on the prevention of common diseases among middle-aged and elderly individuals. The speaker was Dr. Wang Jianguo from the community clinic. Ma Xiulan attended the lecture, during which Dr. Wang specifically addressed the shoulder, neck, and back issues caused by prolonged sitting and household chores. He recommended gentle exercises such as Baduanjin and Tai Chi. Ma Xiulan was deeply moved by the lecture and reflected on her own recent frequent shoulder and neck pain. During dinner at home, she mentioned the lecture content to her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, and expressed her desire to consistently practice Baduanjin. Ma Zhiqiang expressed his support, saying that any movement is better than none. After the lecture, the community provided light refreshments, and Ma Xiulan consumed slightly more than usual due to social interactions.

events.name: Discover and discuss the replacement of the old refrigerator.
events.description: While tidying up the kitchen in the evening, Ma Xiulan noticed that the back wall of the refrigerator compartment in their old fridge, which had been in use for over a decade, had accumulated a significant amount of ice. However, the vegetables inside still wilted quickly, and the machine emitted a louder humming noise than usual during operation. She called her husband over to inspect it together. Ma Zhiqiang touched the side of the refrigerator and remarked that it was heating up noticeably. The couple then compared their electricity bills from the past few months and discovered a gradual upward trend in consumption. Considering that the refrigerator was a large appliance running year-round, and that repairs would be neither cost-effective nor energy-efficient, they discussed the matter and tentatively decided to adopt a more frugal approach. Starting from the next month, they would begin saving money, aiming to replace the old refrigerator with a new energy-efficient model before the peak electricity consumption period in summer.

events.name: Walking cancelled due to foggy weather.
events.description: Originally planning to take an evening walk, Ma Xiulan decided to cancel due to the poor weather with fog and opted to do handicrafts at home instead.

起始状态.心情: Returning to the normal pace of busyness, the new semester begins, requiring an adjustment of rhythm.

结束状态.心情: Thoughtful and considerate, having made considerable plans and arrangements for the long-term functioning of the family, but feeling slightly satiated from the meal.

state.今日运动: Household chores, no specialized exercise conducted.

2025-02.daily_overview: While managing family and community affairs, Ma Xiulan today proactively maintained important familial bonds by having a video call with her sister who lives far away in the coastal city. They shared updates on their lives, providing her with emotional comfort. Meanwhile, she is meticulously preparing for this week's second community handicraft workshop session and has begun working continuously on pieces for the upcoming handicraft market.

events.name: Video call with younger sister Ma Xiufen
events.description: After finishing the cleanup after dinner, Ma Xiulan realized she hadn't been in touch with her sister for a while, so she picked up her phone and sent a WeChat message to her sister, Ma Xiufen. They soon connected via video call. Ma Xiulan asked with concern about how her sister's clothing store business had been since the start of the year. Ma Xiufen complained a bit about the fierce competition but also shared a few interesting customer stories. They then chatted about their children's studies and their parents' health. The sister warmly invited her older sister to go shopping together on the city's commercial street once the weather got warmer. The half-hour call ended in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Share call information with husband
events.description: After hanging up the video call, Ma Xiulan was in a good mood. She walked to the living room and said to her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who was watching TV, "I just chatted with Xiufen for a while. Business at her shop is doing fine, and our parents are still in good health." Ma Zhiqiang nodded and asked a few questions about his brother-in-law. This simple sharing helped keep the family updated.

events.name: Prepare teaching materials for manual corner
events.description: Afterwards, Ma Xiulan began preparing for the second teaching session of the community handicraft corner scheduled for the day after tomorrow. Based on the progress of the participants from the previous week, she decided to introduce backstitch embroidery this week for outlining contours. She sorted out several types of embroidery threads with contrasting colors, cut new pieces of fabric, and prepared a few simple patterns combining running stitch and backstitch as samples in advance. She also prepared several large needles and needle threaders for the older participants to use.

events.name: Start preparing works for the handicraft market.
events.description: Inspired by her agreement with Zhou Xiuqin yesterday, Ma Xiulan began to conceptualize and prepare her works for the handicraft market at the temple fair in April. She selected a simple traditional pattern, cut the fabric, and planned to embroider it over several consecutive days as a multi-day continuous project.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, after finishing the household chores during the day, there is some time of my own in the evening.

结束状态.心情: A sense of warmth and joy, the bond of sisterhood, and the preparations for teaching have all brought fulfillment, along with great anticipation for the market project.

2025-02.daily_overview: In the second community handicraft workshop, Ma Xiulan displayed greater composure and confidence. The teaching theme deepened, evolving from the instruction of single stitching techniques to facilitating exchanges of completed works. Social interactions also advanced, with participants transitioning from a teacher-student relationship to collaborative partnerships, agreeing to jointly participate in market events. This marked the further expansion of her community network and influence, though her weight increased due to post-workshop group meals.

events.name: Set up the craft corner venue in advance.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived early at the community activity center with her teaching materials. Together with several participants who had also arrived ahead of time, she rearranged the tables and chairs into a U-shaped layout to facilitate better interaction. She then placed samples, sewing kits, and pattern diagrams in front of each seat.

events.name: Second Handicraft Corner Session: Teaching Backstitch Embroidery
events.description: The activity began with Ma Xiulan briefly reviewing the basic running stitch from the previous lesson before introducing this week’s theme—the backstitch, used for outlining patterns. Using a leaf she had embroidered as an example, she drew the stitch path on the blackboard and demonstrated step by step, emphasizing even stitch spacing and smooth lines. The participants listened attentively and quickly began practicing.

events.name: Guided Practice and Works Exchange
events.description: While the trainees were practicing, Ma Xiulan provided individual guidance, paying special attention to several aunties who had learned more slowly the previous week. Once everyone had grasped the basics, she organized a small showcase session, encouraging the trainees to present their semi-finished pieces or newly started small projects that they had worked on at home after the previous session. They took turns displaying and offering feedback on each other's work. Ma Xiulan also shared some innovative color schemes she had recently seen online, sparking lively discussions among the group.

events.name: Post-Class Communication and Arrangements
events.description: After the event concluded, Ma Xiulan, along with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin, neighbor Wang Guilan, and several other familiar participants, tidied up the venue together. As they chatted, they heard that there would be a traditional temple fair in Jinghai in April, accompanied by a handicraft market. They discussed the possibility of preparing some small works together to set up a stall, supporting and encouraging each other in the process. This suggestion greatly appealed to Ma Xiulan.

events.name: Post-Teaching Gathering
events.description: To celebrate the success of the teaching program, several students including Ma Xiulan and Zhou Xiuqin had a simple gathering at a small restaurant near the community activity center. They enjoyed some home-style dishes, ate a bit more than usual, and experienced a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Composed, confident in handling the second teaching session.

结束状态.心情: The teaching was successful and invigorating, expanding new possibilities for collaboration. A sense of community belonging and personal value was further enhanced, though the dinner gathering left a slight feeling of fullness.

2025-02.daily_overview: As the Spring Festival approaches, Ma Xiulan's day involves both the routine review of family finances and the final purchases before the holiday. While ensuring the family's financial security is stable, she is also busy preparing for the upcoming reunion dinner and continues working on her crafts for the market, treating it as a continuous event spanning multiple days.

events.name: Verify Family Insurance Status
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan logged into the bank app on her phone, located the automatic payment records, and carefully verified the annual premium for the accidental injury insurance she had purchased for her husband, Ma Zhiqiang. She confirmed that the automatic deduction had been successfully processed in January, and the coverage would remain valid until next year. This gave her peace of mind regarding the family's basic risk protection.

events.name: Update Family Financial Records
events.description: Afterwards, she printed out the deposit receipt for the 800 yuan from February 6th and a screenshot of the insurance deduction from her phone (using her neighbor’s printer) and pasted them into the family financial record book. When her husband returned home in the evening, she verbally informed him of the progress of the education savings and that the insurance had been renewed. Ma Zhiqiang nodded and said, "Okay."

events.name: Preparing for the Parent-Teacher Conference
events.description: Thinking about the parent-teacher conference for her eldest son the next day, Ma Xiulan specifically called Ma Mingxuan to her side after dinner and gently asked him how he had been feeling at school recently, especially whether he found any parts of the Chinese language class particularly difficult to understand. Ma Mingxuan hesitated and said he always struggled to grasp the main points in reading comprehension questions. Ma Xiulan quietly took note of this, then found a notebook and a smooth-writing pen, preparing to carefully record the teacher's suggestions the following day.

events.name: Supplemental purchase of New Year goods
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market again to stock up on supplies for tomorrow's New Year's Eve dinner and for potential guests during the Spring Festival. She bought a carp (symbolizing abundance year after year), a piece of pork belly, and some dried goods such as wood ear mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms. While buying vegetables at Aunt Sun's stall, Aunt Sun enthusiastically shared her family's exclusive recipe for curing bacon this year and wished Ma Xiulan's family a happy New Year and all the best in advance.

events.name: Continue preparing the market works
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan spent time embroidering pieces for the craft market, marking the second consecutive day of preparation, as she focused on completing the embroidery of a traditional pattern.

起始状态.心情: Everything is in good order, with numerous tasks being handled methodically as the holiday approaches.

结束状态.心情: Well-prepared with clear finances, everything is set for tomorrow's parent-teacher meeting and the upcoming Spring Festival, and the market project is progressing smoothly.

2025-02.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone in the shift toward more targeted family education support. Ma Xiulan attended the parent-teacher meeting for her eldest child, where she received clear feedback on her child's academic performance and engaged in in-depth discussions with the teacher and other parents. Upon returning home, she promptly translated the information into action by collaborating with her child to develop a specific tutoring plan. This reflects her strong emphasis on educational goals and her ability to execute them effectively, even staying up late to thoughtfully plan the approach.

events.name: Attending the Parent-Teacher Conference for the Eldest Child
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at a middle school in Jinghai District to attend the parent-teacher meeting for the second year of junior high school. During the class session, the homeroom teacher, Han Mei, provided an overview of the class's academic performance and the preparatory atmosphere for the high school entrance examination. After the meeting, Ma Xiulan proactively stayed behind to have a private conversation with Teacher Han. Teacher Han clearly pointed out that Ma Mingxuan's weakness in Chinese lies in his ability to extract and integrate information during reading comprehension, while his writing suffers from unclear logic and a limited vocabulary. She suggested that the family could strengthen daily reading and note-taking practices at home. Ma Xiulan diligently noted down each point in her notebook.

events.name: Exchange experiences with other parents
events.description: When leaving the classroom, Ma Xiulan encountered several parents who were also concerned about their children's Chinese language learning. They chatted while walking in the school corridor. They shared the books they had their children read (such as *Reader* and some biographies of famous figures) and methods for encouraging their children to take reading notes. Ma Xiulan found the discussion very inspiring, and they exchanged WeChat contacts for future communication.

events.name: Develop a Family Tutoring Plan
events.description: On her way home, Ma Xiulan began to formulate a plan based on Teacher Han's suggestions and the experiences of other parents: she could ask Mingxuan to read a short passage aloud without fail every day after dinner and verbally summarize the main points, while practicing a short essay on weekends. She pondered how to communicate with her rebellious son to ensure he would not resist these additional tasks.

events.name: Communicate with the eldest son and formulate a plan
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan conveyed the details of the parent-teacher meeting to Ma Mingxuan without blame, objectively analyzing the issues instead. She took out the notes she had made and discussed them with her son, ultimately working together to create a simple "Daily Chinese Improvement Plan": 20 minutes of reading aloud and summarizing each day, along with one writing exercise per week. Seeing his mother's dedication, Ma Mingxuan felt some pressure but reluctantly agreed. Ma Xiulan later discussed the plan with her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, who expressed his support and promised to assist in supervising its implementation.

events.name: Borrowing tutoring materials from neighbors
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan remembered that her neighbor Zhang Shufen's child was already in high school and might have some unused tutoring books. She sent a WeChat message to Zhang Shufen, tactfully inquiring about it. Zhang Shufen quickly replied, saying she happened to have a few junior high school Chinese reading comprehension exercise books and composition material books, and could give them to her the next day. This made Ma Xiulan feel the warmth of community support.

events.name: Continue preparations for the market exhibition works
events.description: After finalizing the plan, Ma Xiulan still took time to continue embroidering her market pieces. This was the third consecutive day of preparation, and the work was nearing completion.

起始状态.心情: A significant and somewhat tense meeting concerning the child.

结束状态.心情: With clear objectives and a concrete plan in place, I feel a strong sense of responsibility, but I now have a defined direction to strive toward, which has alleviated the anxiety and confusion I felt before. However, I am slightly fatigued due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from school (light intensity)

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday, a day for family socializing. Ma Xiulan spent the entire day busily and joyfully preparing to host her husband's colleague and his family. From shopping for ingredients and preparing dishes to cooking and entertaining, followed by a delightful meal and conversation between the two families, the entire process showcased her exceptional household management skills and the traditional virtue of warm hospitality. It also strengthened her husband's social network, while she maintained her morning Baduanjin exercise routine to conclude the day in a healthy state.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: At 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in her courtyard by following a video. Her movements were more proficient than before, and she felt physically relaxed and mentally refreshed. This is part of her healthy routine.

events.name: Advance Procurement and Ingredient Preparation
events.description: Upon learning that her husband's colleague Zhao Jianguo and his family were coming to visit, Ma Xiulan went to the market early in the morning for a big shopping trip. She bought fresh pork tenderloin, pork belly, live fish, and a variety of vegetables. After returning home, she immediately got busy: she sliced the pork tenderloin into strips and marinated them to prepare sweet and sour pork; stewed the pork belly; kneaded a batch of dough and let it rest, planning to make hand-pulled noodles with gravy. She also deep-fried a plate of peanuts in advance and soaked some wood ear mushrooms.

events.name: Cleaning and Arranging the Guest Reception Environment
events.description: During the intervals of meal preparation, Ma Xiulan seized the time to clean the living room and dining area, tidying the children's toys into boxes. She wiped the coffee table and dining table spotless, then set out teacups for guests, along with fruit platters and trays of melon seeds and candies, creating a tidy and warm atmosphere.

events.name: Cooking Homestyle Dishes for Guests
events.description: After a simple lunch, Ma Xiulan began preparing the formal midday meal. In the kitchen, she skillfully cooked sweet and sour pork, braised fish, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables, and prepared a large pot of fragrant noodles with gravy. Each dish was a specialty loved by her family, and she also took the guests' tastes into consideration.

events.name: Receiving guests and hosting a dinner gathering
events.description: Zhao Jianguo arrived as scheduled with his wife and son, carrying a large bag of homegrown cabbage and sweet potatoes. Ma Xiulan and her husband warmly greeted them at the door. The children quickly became acquainted and ran off to play. The adults gathered around a table, chatting while they ate. Ma Zhiqiang and Zhao Jianguo mainly discussed their work experiences and the situation in the transportation industry; meanwhile, Ma Xiulan and Zhao Jianguo's wife exchanged parenting tips, complained about their children's picky eating habits, and shared where to buy groceries cheaply in Jinghai. The atmosphere was very harmonious.

events.name: Post-Meal Cleanup and Farewell
events.description: The gathering lasted until a little past two in the afternoon. After it concluded, Ma Xiulan began clearing the dishes, and Zhao Jianguo's wife also stood up to help. The two continued chatting while washing dishes in the kitchen. Meanwhile, the men drank tea in the living room. It was not until after three o'clock in the afternoon that Zhao Jianguo's family rose to take their leave. Ma Xiulan packed a small box of homemade mung bean cakes and pickled radishes as a return gift, which she insisted the guests take with them. Both parties bid each other a warm farewell at the door, agreeing to meet again when they had the chance.

events.name: Evening Rest and Organization
events.description: After seeing off the guests, Ma Xiulan felt a wave of exhaustion, but she was very happy inside. She tidied up the living room briefly and returned the borrowed tables and chairs. In the evening, she only prepared some simple porridge, and the family went to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Busy and full of energy, preparing to host guests for the family, and maintaining a morning exercise routine.

结束状态.心情: Tired but immensely pleased, having successfully entertained the guests, maintained her husband's professional relationships, and fulfilled her role as a hostess with a sense of value and satisfaction, all while continuing her healthy habits.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning Baduanjin and high-intensity household chores

2025-02.daily_overview: Today is the last Sunday of the first lunar month, with the festive atmosphere gradually fading and life returning to its usual rhythm. After a busy Spring Festival, Ma Xiulan welcomed a quiet and leisurely afternoon. The visit from her craft-loving friend Zhou Xiuqin made the afternoon fulfilling and pleasant, though a slight ache in her wrist reminded her to take some rest.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Practice
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin for about 10 minutes in her courtyard by following an instructional video. Her movements were still unfamiliar, but she felt some relaxation in her shoulders and neck. This marked a new beginning in her health plan.

events.name: Management of Mild Wrist Soreness
events.description: Due to recent intensive hand embroidery work, Ma Xiulan has experienced slight soreness and stiffness in her right wrist. She has decided to reduce the amount of handwork today and has started applying warm compresses to avoid aggravating the condition.

events.name: Friends Visiting and Handicraft Exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin visited Ma Xiulan's home as scheduled. The two drank tea and chatted, exchanged embroidery techniques, and discussed future market plans. However, Ma Xiulan paid attention to resting her wrists and only participated lightly.

起始状态.心情: Calm, but with slight concern about wrist discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and joyful, but remind yourself to balance craftsmanship with health.

2025-02.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Ma Xiulan immersed herself in the daily duties of a housewife while maintaining her healthy habits, though she adjusted her plans due to a neighbor’s unexpected request for help.

events.name: Post-Holiday Cleaning and Organization
events.description: Ma Xiulan spent the morning doing a thorough cleaning, clearing away the clutter from the Spring Festival to restore tidiness to her home. During this time, due to soreness in her wrist, she avoided heavy tasks and focused on lighter physical labor.

events.name: Handle daily household affairs
events.description: She checked the children's homework, prepared dinner, and managed the household alone as her husband was away, but adjusted her afternoon schedule upon receiving a last-minute request from her neighbor Wang Guilan to help look after a pet.

events.name: Try Continuing the Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: In the evening, I completed a 15-minute Baduanjin practice in the courtyard. The movements were smoother than the previous day, and I felt an improvement in my mental state, which strengthened my determination to persist.

events.name: Calling Mother
events.description: In the evening, she called her mother, chatting about daily life and health matters. Her mother advised her to rest her wrist more, which made Ma Xiulan feel warm and supported.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired yet content, healthy habits bring a sense of positivity.

2025-02.daily_overview: An unexpected situation disrupted the plans. The second son caught a cold and developed a fever, so Ma Xiulan devoted herself to caring for the child. The soreness in her wrist began to ease after applying a warm compress.

events.name: Discovering the second son's illness and providing initial treatment
events.description: In the morning, upon discovering that her second son, Ma Mingzhe, had a low-grade fever and cough, Ma Xiulan immediately decided to observe him at home and planned to seek medical attention. Meanwhile, she continued applying warm compresses to her wrist, feeling that the soreness had lessened.

events.name: Take the second son to the community clinic for medical treatment.
events.description: Walking to the community health service center with her son, Dr. Wang Jianguo diagnosed him with a common cold, prescribed medication, and advised rest. Ma Xiulan inquired about wrist care and received recommendations.

events.name: Follow Medical Advice for Medication and Care
events.description: After picking up the medicine, I returned home, administered it to my son, and adjusted household chores. Due to busyness, I temporarily set aside my Baduanjin practice, but my wrist condition improved further through rest.

events.name: Prepare a light dinner with care.
events.description: Preparing white radish soup and stir-fried green vegetables, the whole family is eating a light diet. Ma Xiulan herself also feels comfortable in her stomach and intestines, and her weight has slightly decreased due to the healthy eating habits.

events.name: A temporary friend called to confide.
events.description: In the evening, her childhood friend Liu Chunmei called to confide her family troubles. Ma Xiulan patiently listened and offered comfort, which temporarily diverted her attention from her worries about her child.

起始状态.心情: Calm, but prepared for a child's illness

结束状态.心情: Worried yet somewhat relieved, the child's condition is stable and the wrist is recovering.

2025-02.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan switched roles to become a community handicraft corner instructor. The successful activity brought a sense of achievement, while her wrist had basically recovered, and her child's condition had improved.

events.name: Depart for the community activity center.
events.description: In the afternoon, I entrusted my second son to my neighbor Wang Guilan and walked to the activity center. Accompanied by Wang Guilan, I mentioned that my wrist was no longer causing trouble and felt relieved.

events.name: Handicraft Corner Teaching Activity
events.description: As the main speaker, Ma Xiulan enthusiastically teaches crochet techniques, guides both new and experienced students, and shares tips she learned from Aunt Wu. Thanks to her wrist recovery, she is able to demonstrate more flexibly.

events.name: Post-Activity Communication and Organization
events.description: Zheng Xiuying and Zhou Xiuqin tidied up the venue together. Zheng Xiuying praised the teaching, while Ma Xiulan felt an enhanced sense of community value and planned to strengthen cooperation.

events.name: Continue to care for the second son and observe for improvement.
events.description: Upon returning home, I found my son's body temperature normal and his spirits improved, which eased my anxious heart. The soreness in my wrist completely disappeared, and I decided to resume normal manual measurements.

events.name: Relaxing by watching TV series in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, I watch TV and follow TV series while doing light handicrafts, enjoying leisurely time. Due to the many activities during the day, I go to bed a bit earlier.

起始状态.心情: Slightly distracted but highly responsible.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and gratifying, a dual satisfaction from community success and a child's recovery.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the community activity center, engaging in light manual activities.
