2025-02.daily_overview: As life returns to its normal pace, Ma Xiulan advances vegetable garden seedling cultivation, adheres to a healthy diet, and acquires dietary therapy insights from neighbors. Her weight continues to decrease due to the consistent practice of light eating habits.

events.name: Confirm the recovery of the second son and prepare for his return to school.
events.description: The second son has recovered from his cold. Ma Xiulan contacted the teacher to inform him of the child's return to school and prepared his schoolbag and uniform, feeling that family life is returning to normal.

events.name: Start Spring Garden Seedlings
events.description: Sowing tomato and pepper seeds on the windowsill and covering them with plastic film, she looks forward to her future garden—this is a step toward her long-term goal.

events.name: Maintaining a light diet and receiving family affirmation
events.description: For dinner, millet porridge and steamed vegetables were prepared. Her husband praised the comfort it brought to his digestive system, prompting Ma Xiulan to decide to make healthy cooking a regular practice, which led to a slight decrease in her weight.

events.name: Exchanging dietary therapy experiences with neighbors
events.description: At the market, Ma Xiulan met Wang Guilan, who shared home remedies such as pear stewed with rock sugar. Ma Xiulan found the advice highly beneficial and plans to try them.

events.name: Complete manual order finalization
events.description: She completed the embroidery pendant in the evening. With her wrist recovered, she was able to work efficiently and felt a heightened sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Temporary Community Notice
events.description: Upon receiving notification from Zheng Xiuying about a health lecture next week, Ma Xiulan decided to attend to further her knowledge on exercise.

起始状态.心情: Easy, Family Health Improvement

结束状态.心情: Peaceful contentment, healthy living progressing smoothly.

2025-02.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan summarized her experience with healthy eating, planned activities for the Lantern Festival, and persisted in practicing Baduanjin. However, due to strong winds, she temporarily canceled her walk, and her weight reached a new low.

events.name: Summarize healthy eating experiences and form new habits
events.description: Confirming that a light diet is beneficial for the whole family, Ma Xiulan decided to solidify it as a family habit and planned to share it with the neighbors, feeling an improvement in self-management ability.

events.name: Planning Family Activities for the Lantern Festival
events.description: Discussing the idea of making paper lanterns at home with family members, the children were excited. Ma Xiulan began gathering materials, looking forward to enhancing family interaction.

events.name: Inspect and clean handmade embroidery
events.description: Clean and iron the embroidered hanging ornaments to ensure delivery quality. With her wrist fully recovered, she can complete the task efficiently.

events.name: Adhere to the practice of Baduanjin.
events.description: In the evening, I practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the yard. My movements were more fluid, and I felt a smooth flow of qi and blood. However, due to the strong wind, I canceled the originally planned walk.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to household chores
events.description: Due to a minor disagreement over her eldest son's homework, Ma Xiulan felt a brief moment of pressure, but it was alleviated through communication, reminding herself to remain patient.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, planning to improve the details.

结束状态.心情: Full of anticipation yet slightly fatigued, progressing healthily and positively.

2025-02.daily_overview: Family Day was filled with joy. Ma Xiulan purchased and prepared for the gathering. The homemade lantern-making activity was a success, but staying up late for the event and indulging in rich food led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Daily Procurement and Neighborhood Information Exchange
events.description: In the morning, I went to the vegetable market for a big shopping trip. While chatting with Aunt Sun, I learned about the community's Lantern Festival event. Ma Xiulan plans to attend and has purchased abundant ingredients for the occasion.

events.name: Tutoring the eldest son in his studies and communicating with him
events.description: Tutoring Mingxuan in essay writing, guiding him to provide specific descriptions, and reporting progress to the teacher via WeChat have strengthened the parent-child relationship.

events.name: Purchasing gifts to visit parents
events.description: Buying peach shortbread, fruits, and sweet dumplings for parents to show filial piety, and feeling slightly tired due to the heavy shopping.

events.name: Collecting Materials for Homemade Lanterns
events.description: Gathering materials from home and neighbors, preparing bamboo strips and colored paper, Wang Guilan praised the idea as excellent, while Ma Xiulan felt the support from the community.

events.name: The whole family collaborates to make traditional lanterns.
events.description: After dinner, the whole family made lanterns. Ma Xiulan provided guidance, her husband built the frame, and the children painted. Amid laughter and joy, they completed their creations, lighting up the festive night.

events.name: Casual Friend Gathering Invitation
events.description: Upon receiving an invitation from her younger sister Ma Xiufen to go shopping over the weekend, Ma Xiulan gladly accepted, planning to adjust the pace of her life.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to family time.

结束状态.心情: Extremely happy but exhausted, with a rich array of activities.

2025-02.daily_overview: During the Lantern Festival family reunion, Ma Xiulan enjoyed the warmth of family bliss. However, due to the sumptuous feast, she gained a little weight. After returning home, she went to bed early to recover.

events.name: Take the children to their parents' home.
events.description: In the morning, I took the bus to my parents' home. On the way, I reminded my child to be polite, and I looked forward to the family reunion with anticipation.

events.name: Collaborative Kitchen Preparation for a Family Banquet
events.description: Making dumplings and cooking dishes with my mother in the kitchen, chatting about daily life, I felt the warmth of family affection, though I was a bit tired from helping out a lot.

events.name: Sharing the Lantern Festival Family Feast
events.description: The whole family enjoyed a sumptuous dinner, which included fried glutinous rice balls and braised fish. Although Ma Xiulan usually pays attention to her diet, she ate a little more than usual due to the festive occasion.

events.name: Heart-to-heart Communication between Mother and Daughter
events.description: Her mother handed her some pickled vegetables and urged her to take care of her health. Touched by this, Ma Xiulan resolved to pay more attention to her own well-being.

events.name: Farewell and Homecoming
events.description: Returning home in the evening, the children were tired, and Ma Xiulan was also weary, but her heart was content, as the family reunion led to an early bedtime.

2025-02.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan has returned to a regular routine, experiencing the benefits of exercise. She completed an embroidery piece that received positive feedback and is preparing for the market. Her weight has returned to normal due to increased activity.

events.name: Experience the Benefits of Regular Exercise
events.description: In the evening, Wang Guilan took a 30-minute walk, during which Ma Xiulan clearly felt a reduction in back pain and improved sleep quality, further strengthening her resolve to maintain this habit.

events.name: Completed a large-scale embroidery work and received favorable reviews.
events.description: After completing the peony embroidery piece, I shared it in the crafts group and received praise from Aunt Wu and Zhou Xiuqin. We discussed displaying it at the market, which greatly boosted my confidence.

events.name: Preparing materials for the craft market
events.description: Organize the market tote bag, prepare change and payment QR codes, and feel a strong sense of control due to being well-organized.

events.name: Cleaning up the site of the homemade lanterns
events.description: Sweep up the debris in the living room, store the remaining materials, look forward to using them again next year, and reminisce about the warm moments.

events.name: Emotions fluctuate due to order pressure.
events.description: Concerned about sales at the market, Ma Xiulan felt a brief moment of anxiety. However, she alleviated it by taking deep breaths and chatting with her husband, ultimately deciding to let things take their natural course.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for the new week.

结束状态.心情: Confidence and fulfillment, with the rewards of exercise and the recognition of craftsmanship enhancing the sense of value.

events.name: Preparing for the Handicraft Corner Achievement Exhibition
events.description: Organize the students' works to arrange the display board, write names and titles, prepare carefully for tomorrow's event, and feel the heavy responsibility of community duty.

events.name: Parent-Child Vegetable Garden Time
events.description: Taking my young daughter to inspect the seedling trays, explaining plant knowledge, enjoying parent-child outdoor time, and advancing long-term garden goals.

events.name: Obtain and decide to participate in agricultural training
events.description: Upon learning about the free vegetable cultivation training class from Wang Guilan, Ma Xiulan registered by phone, reviewed previous knowledge, and learned new techniques with great interest.

events.name: Continuation of Learning Baduanjin
events.description: In the morning, I practiced the Eight-Section Brocade in the yard for 15 minutes. The movements were fluid and continuous, leaving me feeling a smooth flow of qi and blood, with good morning energy.

events.name: Hold a family meeting to establish a study convention for exam preparation.
events.description: Signing the high school entrance exam preparation agreement with her husband and eldest son, the whole family affixed their signatures. Mingxuan felt supported, while Ma Xiulan found the family's goals clear.

events.name: Temporary Community Activity Adjustment
events.description: Upon receiving the notice of a minor adjustment to the manual corner schedule, Ma Xiulan flexibly adapted her plans, demonstrating strong adaptability.

events.name: Hosting the Handicraft Corner Achievement Presentation and Summary
events.description: In the afternoon, she hosted a handicraft corner demonstration, where participants evaluated and encouraged each other. Ma Xiulan felt a strong sense of accomplishment and was pleased to see the progress of the participants.

events.name: Discuss Future Collaboration with the Community
events.description: Discussed the market zone and next month's theme with Zheng Xiuying, with a preliminary plan for Mother's Day embroidery. Ma Xiulan showed strong interest.

events.name: Activity Wrap-up and Gaining Recognition
events.description: Upon receiving a 200-yuan teaching subsidy, Zheng Xiuying expressed gratitude for the effort invested, while Ma Xiulan felt a sense of value recognition and increased confidence.

events.name: Deliver Orders, Receive Payment, and Establish Cooperation Intentions
events.description: Bringing embroidered pendants to the craft store, the shop owner paid 600 yuan in cash and proposed a long-term collaboration. Ma Xiulan was pleasantly surprised, as her craftsmanship had gained market recognition.

events.name: Register for the Agricultural Technology Training Course
events.description: Confirm training registration via phone call, note down the date and required items, and look forward to learning and improving gardening skills.

events.name: Search for and save the Baduanjin tutorial
events.description: Bookmark detailed Baduanjin tutorials online for daily practice to strengthen healthy habits.

events.name: Emotions soar with success.
events.description: Due to the successful order and community recognition, Ma Xiulan was emotionally excited and shared the joy with her husband, but reminded herself to remain humble.

Due to the lengthy conversation, she went to bed late, and her weight has returned to a stable level.

events.name: Review and Planning with Craft Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, I had tea with Zhou Xiuqin to review teaching sessions, designed embroidery patterns for Mother's Day, discussed silk thread preparations, and collaborated with seamless coordination.

events.name: Constructing Cold Protection Facilities for the Vegetable Garden
events.description: With her husband, Ma Xiulan used bamboo poles and plastic film to build small arched shelters to protect the seedlings. The efficient collaboration between the couple made her feel strong family support.

events.name: Selection and Preparation of Market Sale Items
events.description: Inspected embroidery works with Zhou Xiuqin, cleaned and ironed them, sorted and packed them into boxes, making final preparations for tomorrow's market.

events.name: Late-night in-depth communication between husband and wife
events.description: Discussed with my husband about supporting our eldest son for the high school entrance exam, planning the vegetable garden, and adjusting the budget. We reached a consensus and felt like comrades-in-arms.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of a Successful Order
events.description: After sharing her order revenue with her husband and receiving praise, Ma Xiulan felt a doubled sense of achievement and decided to deposit the money into the education fund.

events.name: Temporary Children's School Activity
events.description: Upon receiving notification of an extracurricular activity at her second son's school tomorrow, Ma Xiulan adjusted her schedule to ensure she could balance family commitments.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of February, Ma Xiulan achieved success by participating in a handicraft market, honed her business skills, and consistently practiced the Eight-Section Brocade exercise in the morning, ultimately reaching her health goal with stable weight.

events.name: Regular Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: Practice Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard at 6:00 AM. The movements are performed skillfully, improving shoulder and neck flexibility, and it has become part of a healthy routine.

events.name: Participating in Craft Fairs and Exhibition Setup
events.description: Accompanied by Zhou Xiuqin, we brought the goods to the market, displayed the works, and the peony painting attracted attention, with the exhibition proceeding smoothly.

events.name: Market Sales and Proactive Communication
events.description: Proactively introduced the craftsmanship and symbolism to customers, flexibly adjusted strategies, successfully sold multiple pieces including the peony painting, and received both cash and bank transfers.

events.name: Exchange and learn with peers
events.description: Engage in conversations with stall owners specializing in weaving and wood carving, inquire about pricing and distribution channels, exchange contact information, and expand professional networks.

events.name: Market Closure and Profit Settlement
events.description: Count the goods, settle the income, distribute profits according to the proportion, and discuss best-selling products and feedback.

events.name: Review the gains and losses of the market with partners
events.description: Conduct a WeChat voice call review in the evening to analyze data, plan future product development, and generate ideas for collaborative series.

events.name: Plan the Use of Handmade Income
events.description: Deciding with my husband to allocate the majority of our income to an education fund and a smaller portion for household expenses brings a sense of security and hope for the future.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet immensely fulfilled and proud, seeing one's own potential.

events.name: First Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: On Saturday morning, Ma Xiulan played a Baduanjin instructional video on her old phone in her courtyard and began her first practice session. Her movements were stiff and her breathing was uneven, but she persisted for 15 minutes. After completing the session, her body felt slightly warm and her mind was calm.

events.name: Schedule regular walks with neighbors
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan met her neighbor Zhang Shufen at the door. They chatted about spring health preservation and agreed to take evening walks together every Tuesday, Thursday, and Sunday starting next week, confirming the arrangements via WeChat.

events.name: Evening Household Inspection and Study Supervision
events.description: Handle household chores in the afternoon, supervise the children's studies after dinner, and ensure that daily family tasks are completed.

events.description: On Sunday afternoon, Ma Xiulan summarized the family's income and expenses for February during a quiet moment. events.description: On Monday morning, Ma Xiulan got up early to practice Baduanjin. Her movements were more relaxed than the first time, and she tried to imitate the breathing rhythm, feeling the freshness of the morning air as it entered her lungs.

2025-03.daily_overview: An ordinary yet fulfilling day saw Ma Xiulan implementing the family meeting resolution, adjusting the budget and communicating with her child, while her younger sister prepared a surprise gift for her in Binhai.

events.name: Record Budget Adjustment and Notify the Eldest Son
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan meticulously recorded the budget adjustments in the ledger, earmarked the reserve fund for the high school entrance examination, and carefully calculated the food expenses due to the allocated funds. During breakfast, she casually informed her eldest son about the matter.

events.name: (Implicit Event) The younger sister selects a gift.
events.description: In Binhai New Area, Ma Xiufen used her year-end bonus to pick out a practical smartphone for her sister, imagining the delight her sister would feel upon receiving it.

events.name: Canceling the planned walk due to rainy weather.
events.description: The original plan was to take an evening walk, but due to a light rain in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan canceled it at the last minute and switched to doing handicrafts at home, feeling a slight sense of regret.

起始状态.心情: Peacefully, commence the affairs of a new day.

结束状态.心情: Anran, complete daily tasks.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is a day for knowledge acquisition and skill exchange. Ma Xiulan studied modern agricultural techniques in the morning and participated in an online handicraft workshop in the evening, enriching her life through continuous learning.

events.name: The Third Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: Due to rushing to training, Ma Xiulan hurriedly completed her morning exercise. She was already familiar with the starting movements and no longer needed to frequently check her phone for prompts.

events.name: Attending Vegetable Cultivation Training (Day 1)
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the agricultural extension station to learn about green pest control methods for seasonal vegetables. She took careful notes and discussed the aphid problem affecting her cabbage crop with her classmates.

events.name: Prepare for the Online Seminar
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan prepared in advance for the handicraft workshop, retrieved the semi-finished products, and checked the internet connection to ensure smooth communication in the evening.

events.name: Online Seminar for the Handicraft Community
events.description: At 8 p.m., Ma Xiulan participated in an online meeting with the theme of innovative applications of traditional flat needle embroidery. She showcased a coaster, raised a question about edge-locking techniques, received suggestions from Aunt Wu, and took part in a discussion on collaborative embroidery projects for the Qingming Festival.

events.name: Stayed up late due to excitement about the seminar.
events.description: After the seminar, Ma Xiulan was excited by the intense discussions and the new knowledge she had gained, staying up late browsing through craft information and going to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, filled with interest in new knowledge.

结束状态.心情: Enrich oneself by absorbing new knowledge in cultivation and handicrafts.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of Baduanjin, with movements becoming increasingly familiar.

2025-03.daily_overview: With her life's focus shifting toward her children's education, Ma Xiulan attended the parent-teacher meeting for her eldest son, taking careful notes and adjusting her communication methods, demonstrating a mother's attentiveness and personal growth.

events.name: Preparing to attend the parent-teacher meeting.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan prepared dinner in advance, retrieved the report card and notebook, briefly inquired about her eldest son's school situation, and mentally noted down a few questions.

events.name: Attending the Parent-Teacher Conference for the Eldest Son
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went alone to the middle school to take notes on the teacher's emphasis on the importance of the high school entrance examination. After the meeting, she proactively added the homeroom teacher's WeChat to discuss her child's psychological state.

events.name: Sharing Parent-Teacher Meeting Information with Family
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan did not press for details about the studies. Instead, she gently conveyed the teacher’s advice, focusing on the child’s psychological and emotional well-being and adjusting the communication approach.

events.name: Communicating with Husband about School-Home Situation
events.description: Late at night, Ma Xiulan discussed the parent-teacher conference situation with her husband, specifically conveying the psychological attention recommendations. The two discussed paying attention to their communication methods with their child in the future.

events.name: Going to bed early due to pressure from the parent-teacher meeting.
events.description: Thinking of the pressure her child faces in the high school entrance examination, Ma Xiulan felt exhausted and decided to go to bed early to rest, so as to better handle tomorrow's affairs.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, attaching importance to the parent-teacher meeting.

结束状态.心情: Profoundly moved, I realized the need to adjust my communication approach.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday morning workouts have become a pleasure. Ma Xiulan savors the tranquility of solitude while actively implementing ideas for handicraft collaborations, refining plans to integrate personal interests with productive output.

events.name: The Fourth Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin with slow movements, striving to coordinate deep breaths with each motion. The courtyard was quiet. After finishing, her mind felt refreshed, and she enjoyed a moment entirely her own.

events.name: Refine the Handicraft Cooperation Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan contacted Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat to discuss the division of labor for their collaborative embroidery project for the Qingming Festival. She would be responsible for the floral sections, while Zhou Xiuqin would handle the layout, estimate costs, and keep an eye on market stall arrangements.

events.name: Received an urgent manual order at short notice.
events.description: In the evening, a regular customer urgently needed a custom embroidery piece as a gift. Ma Xiulan accepted the order and decided to work through the night to ensure timely delivery.

起始状态.心情: Relax and welcome the eve of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant yet weary, morning exercise and handicraft exchanges bring good moods, but staying up late to rush work takes its toll.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is International Women's Day, a day filled with warmth and surprises. The expressions of love and gratitude from her husband and children made Ma Xiulan feel deeply touched, and the family's bond shone brightly.

events.name: The husband prepares holiday gifts.
events.description: At noon, Ma Zhiqiang deliberately queued up to buy his wife's favorite three-ingredient stuffed buns, packed them in an insulated bag, and planned to bring them home as a gift in the evening.

events.name: The children secretly made gifts.
events.description: In the afternoon, while their mother was busy, the children prepared gifts in the living room: the eldest son sketched a profile portrait of his mother, while the second son and the youngest daughter made greeting cards to express their gratitude for her hard work.

events.name: A Cozy Holiday Dinner
events.description: At the dinner table, moved by the steamed buns brought by her husband and the gifts prepared by the children, Ma Xiulan felt her eyes grow warm with emotion. The family laughed continuously, creating a joyful and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: The husband takes on household chores.
events.description: After dinner, the husband took the initiative to clear the dishes, allowing Ma Xiulan to rest and watch television. Watching her husband's busy figure, she felt a warm glow in her heart.

events.name: Share joy with family and friends
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan used an old mobile phone to take photos and share them with her mother and childhood friend, her voice filled with laughter as she shared the simple joys of life.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to holiday feasting
events.description: After enjoying the festive dinner, Ma Xiulan realized she had eaten a bit too much and decided to adjust her diet tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a normal mindset, without deliberately anticipating the festival.

结束状态.心情: Moved and happy, feeling the deep love of family.

2025-03.daily_overview: On a Sunday filled with family affection and interaction, Ma Xiulan took the children back to her parents' home to enjoy the warm moments of three generations together, while also purchasing materials for the handicraft cooperative.

events.name: Procurement of Embroidery Materials for Cooperation
events.description: On Sunday morning, Ma Xiulan went to the fabric market to select cotton-linen base cloth and silk threads with Qingming Festival themes, carefully comparing prices and paying in cash.

events.name: Preparing gifts for visiting parents
events.description: After returning from the market, Ma Xiulan steamed Tianjin-style buns and picked fresh vegetables from her own small garden to bring to her parents.

events.name: Visiting Parents with Children
events.description: After lunch, Ma Xiulan took the children on foot to her parents' home. Her father inquired about the eldest grandson's performance in the high school entrance examination, while her mother pulled her into the kitchen to chat about neighborhood anecdotes.

events.name: Family Lunch and Reunion
events.description: The lunch was sumptuous, featuring steamed buns, braised pork ribs, and seasonal vegetables. The family gathered around the table, chatting in a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Afternoon Chores and Farewell
events.description: After the meal, Ma Xiulan insisted on doing the dishes, while the children kept their grandparents company. In the afternoon, they bid farewell and returned home, reminding their parents to take care of their health.

events.name: Due to slightly excessive eating during a family gathering.
events.description: At the family gathering, the food was abundant, and Ma Xiulan ate a little more than usual, feeling that her weight might have increased.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and cheerful, looking forward to the family gathering.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, enjoying fulfilling family time.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today marks the starting point of change and responsibility. My sister gifted me a new phone, opening the door to a digital life, while a family meeting laid the foundation for a new order in the sprint toward the high school entrance examination.

events.name: The Fifth Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: Entering the second week, Ma Xiulan attempted to perform the Eight Section Brocade without playing the video, relying on memory. Most of the movements were executed smoothly, with her focus placed on stretching the body and regulating breathing. After completing the routine, her shoulders and neck felt relaxed.

events.name: Sister Gives a New Phone as a Gift
events.description: Ma Xiufen came from Binhai and presented a new mobile phone to her sister after the meal, making it convenient for video calls and internet access. Ma Xiulan was deeply moved as she accepted the generous gift.

events.name: Proposal to Formulate a Family Study Preparation Convention
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan gathered her family and proposed establishing household rules for the eldest son's high school entrance exam, such as muting the television after 8 p.m., having the younger siblings play in their rooms, and moving handicraft work to daytime hours.

events.name: The entire family discusses and confirms the convention.
events.description: The husband supported and reinforced the idea of taking the children out on weekends. The eldest son expressed gratitude, the second son nodded in agreement, and the youngest daughter gave her consent, albeit somewhat cluelessly. The family concretized the agreement and decided to implement it starting from the next day.

events.name: Stayed up late due to excitement over the new phone.
events.description: After receiving her new phone, Ma Xiulan excitedly explored its features, browsed through handicraft information, and stayed up a bit later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Both moved and solemn, feeling a clearer sense of responsibility.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of Baduanjin, now able to practice without video guidance.

2025-03.daily_overview: A blend of novelty and challenge, the new phone brings learning enjoyment. The family study pact encountered minor tests on its first day of implementation, while the arrival of a handicraft order enhanced focused productivity.

events.name: Learning to use a new mobile phone
events.description: During the day, with remote guidance from her sister and help from the children, Ma Xiulan clumsily explored her new phone. She learned fingerprint unlocking, WeChat video calls, taking photos, and searching for embroidery patterns, feeling both novel and delighted.

events.name: First Day Implementation of the Exam Preparation Convention
events.description: The convention was reiterated during breakfast. During the day, everyone quietly engaged in handicrafts. At 8 p.m., the children were reminded. The second son reluctantly turned down the TV volume, and Ma Xiulan gave a gentle but firm reminder.

events.name: Receive and confirm manual orders
events.description: In the afternoon, a regular customer placed a custom order for embroidered coasters via WeChat. Ma Xiulan carefully discussed the details using her new phone, confirming the order, price, and delivery time through voice messages, successfully closing a deal via mobile for the first time.

events.name: Start Custom Embroidery Order
events.description: After confirming the order, Ma Xiulan immediately took action, retrieving the fabric and silk thread, outlining the pattern, and beginning to embroider the lotus petals with full concentration on the handcraft.

events.name: Additional Energy Consumption Due to Convention Implementation
events.description: Adapting to the new rules required extra effort, leaving Ma Xiulan feeling somewhat fatigued, yet she persisted in completing her tasks.

起始状态.心情: With the excitement of learning new things

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly fatigued, adapting to new regulations

2025-03.daily_overview: Digital skills bridge the distance with faraway family members. Ma Xiulan continues to learn agricultural techniques, proactively communicates with teachers about her child's mental health, and broadens her educational perspectives.

events.name: The Sixth Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: With smooth morning exercise movements and natural breathing that follows the rhythm of the actions, Ma Xiulan could spare a moment to admire the new buds in the courtyard, feeling joyful.

events.name: First In-Depth Interaction with a New Mobile Phone
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan proactively initiated a video call with her sister in Beijing. They excitedly chatted about their children, parents, and the weather, feeling that distance was no longer a barrier.

events.name: Continue to implement and adjust the convention
events.description: On the evening of the second day of implementing the convention, Ma Xiulan reminded the children and noticed that the young girl sometimes forgot to control her volume. She patiently explained and adjusted her position.

events.name: Attend the second planting training session
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the agricultural extension station to learn about the production and use of household organic fertilizers. She listened attentively to the lecture and asked questions. After the class, she received lettuce seeds and planned to try them out at home.

events.name: Proactively contact the homeroom teacher of the eldest son.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan called Teacher Han using her new phone to inquire about her child's overall condition and emotional state at school. Teacher Han affirmed the parent's approach of paying attention to the child's psychological well-being.

events.name: Waking Up Early with Excitement for Training
events.description: Interested in the planting training, Ma Xiulan got up slightly earlier than usual, full of energy.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the training and the plan to connect with my sister.

结束状态.心情: Enhanced sense of connection, broader educational perspectives

2025-03.daily_overview: Progress is made through the daily grind of life. Minor conflicts arise in the study agreement but are resolved. The embroidery for the handmade order enters the meticulous stage. Ma Xiulan immerses herself in creation, finding inner peace.

events.name: Expressing Gratitude to My Sister and Sharing the Joy
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan sent a voice message to her younger sister using the new phone, once again expressing gratitude for the device and sharing the clear experience of video chatting with her eldest sister.

events.name: Handling Minor Conflicts in Convention Implementation
events.description: In the evening, the younger son wanted to play with his older brother's game console but was refused, which led to a tantrum. Ma Xiulan comforted him and played with toy cars together, patiently explaining that his brother needed understanding as he was preparing for exams. After her husband returned home, they had a serious conversation, reiterating the importance of the family agreement.

events.name: Continue Embroidery Order (Fine Stage)
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan embroidered lotus leaves using gradient silk threads, took on the challenge of crafting a goldfish pattern, meticulously adjusted the arrangement of the scales, and contemplated a unique edging design, fully immersed in her handiwork.

events.name: Feeling relaxed due to proper conflict resolution.
events.description: After successfully resolving the minor family conflict, Ma Xiulan felt relaxed, and the sense of achievement from her embroidery work eased her fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Despite some interruptions, they were handled properly, and embroidery brought a sense of accomplishment.

2025-03.daily_overview: A fulfilling and well-organized day: the handmade orders were completed satisfactorily, the morning exercise routine is firmly established, the family agreement is beginning to show results, weekend leisure and social activities are well arranged, and life is busy yet balanced.

events.name: The Seventh Morning Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: In the final practice of the two weeks, Ma Xiulan was fully familiar with the sequence and rhythm of the movements. She performed the techniques with ease, her breathing deep, long, and even. After concluding the routine, she felt a sense of calm and fulfillment, deciding to persist with this early morning ritual.

events.name: Completion of Embroidery Orders and Preparation for Delivery
events.description: Ma Xiulan completed the embellishment of goldfish eyes and embroidery of aquatic plants, implemented wave-patterned edging, inspected five pairs of coasters, photographed them, and sent the images to the client for confirmation. After receiving praise, she wrapped the coasters in tissue paper in preparation for delivery the following day.

events.name: Summary of Family Convention Implementation
events.description: Observing the quiet atmosphere at home in the evening, it appears to be taking shape initially. The children are largely adhering to the rules. After discussing with my husband, we feel the start is promising and have agreed to reward the children with an outing over the weekend, allowing our eldest son to have a quiet morning.

events.name: Arrange weekend leisure social activities
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan confirmed via WeChat that she would have tea and chat with her childhood friend tomorrow afternoon. She also suggested to her husband that they go for an outing in the suburbs on Sunday, and her husband agreed, asking her to prepare some food.

events.name: Feeling satisfied due to the completion of multiple tasks.
events.description: After completing the manual orders and household chores, Ma Xiulan felt satisfied and accomplished, looking forward to relaxing over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: Focus on completing multiple wrap-up tasks.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and accomplished, with the weekend in sight.

2025-03.daily_overview: A relaxed Saturday: delivering orders and handling household chores in the morning, enjoying quality time with a childhood friend in the afternoon. Family life runs smoothly within the framework of shared agreements, with plans for spring leisure activities.

events.name: Confirm Weekend Family Arrangements
events.description: At breakfast, the husband announced that he would take the children to the park to play tomorrow morning, while the eldest son would stay home to study. Ma Xiulan reminded the children to remain quiet and abide by the agreement both tonight and tomorrow morning.

events.name: Deliver handmade orders and collect payment
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan personally delivered the embroidered coasters. The customer was satisfied and paid the remaining balance via WeChat. She carefully confirmed the payment, filled with the pride of a craftsman.

events.name: Physical Sensations Brought by Morning Exercise
events.description: There was no morning exercise today, but Ma Xiulan felt that after persisting for two weeks, the stiffness in her shoulders and neck had eased. Her body felt more relaxed in the morning, and she had more energy during the day, all thanks to Baduanjin.

events.name: Preparing to visit a childhood friend
events.description: At noon, Ma Xiulan prepared mung bean cakes and jujube paste pastries, along with small embroidery pieces and fruits, ready to share and discuss them with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei.

events.name: Afternoon Tea Gathering with Childhood Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, at my childhood friend's home, the two of us drank tea, enjoyed snacks, and chatted freely. We shared our worries about exam preparation, the conveniences of mobile phones, and interesting anecdotes from training sessions. We also studied embroidery patterns, and my childhood friend gifted me some new embroidery threads.

events.name: Sharing Party Experiences with Family upon Returning Home
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan returned home with a cheerful mood and embroidery thread. Her family was preparing dinner, and she briefly recounted her experience at the gathering. Over the meal, they chatted casually about plans for a spring outing.

events.name: Adjusting Daily Routine Due to Insufficient Sleep
events.description: Recently, due to late nights caused by her new phone and family matters, Ma Xiulan realized she was not getting enough sleep and decided to go to bed a bit earlier tonight to improve her energy.

起始状态.心情: Easy, weekend begins

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and relaxed, enjoying social leisure, with family matters proceeding smoothly.

2025-03.daily_overview: A typical family leisure Sunday. In the morning, the family splits up: the father takes the younger son and daughter out for fun, fulfilling the family agreement, while the mother stays at home to create a quiet study environment for the eldest son and handle household chores. In the afternoon, the whole family drives to the outskirts for a spring outing and flower viewing, enjoying quality family time in the spring season, and sharing the joy with distant relatives via mobile phone. In the evening, due to browsing information on a new phone, they go to bed later than usual.

events.name: A Morning of Family Collaboration Through Division of Labor
events.description: To honor the family study agreement and fulfill his promise to the children, Ma Zhiqiang took the lively Ma Mingzhe and the well-behaved Ma Yuxin to the nearby Xicheng Park for some fun early in the morning. Ma Xiulan stayed at home, first organizing and storing away the winter clothes for the season change, then cleaning the kitchen. Throughout the morning, she deliberately kept her movements quiet to ensure that her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, who was reviewing his lessons in the living room, could have an absolutely peaceful study environment. With the occasional chirping of birds outside the window and the faint rustling sounds at home, Ma Mingxuan maintained high efficiency in his review.

events.name: Meticulous Preparations for a Spring Outing
events.description: Estimating that her husband and children would be back soon, Ma Xiulan began preparing for the afternoon outing. She took the steamed buns made the day before out of the refrigerator, washed some apples and cucumbers, and packed them neatly into clean lunch boxes. Then, she found the family's old camera (with low resolution but still functional), checked that the battery was charged, and urged Ma Mingzhe and Ma Yuxin, who had just returned home and were still in high spirits, to change out of their soiled clothes and put on sneakers and jackets suitable for outdoor activities. Ma Mingxuan had also finished his morning study tasks and joined the preparations.

events.name: A Pleasant Journey to the Peach Blossom Forest
events.description: Around two in the afternoon, Ma Zhiqiang drove the family's somewhat aged van, carrying the whole family from Jingwen Road toward the peach blossom grove in the suburbs. The vehicle was filled with the cheerful laughter and chatter of the children. Ma Mingzhe kept asking how big the peach blossom grove was, while Ma Yuxin leaned against the window to watch the scenery. Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang chatted about everyday matters as they drove, mentioning the recent vegetable prices and her husband's work. The spring sunlight streamed through the car window, making the journey relaxed and pleasant all the way.

events.name: Strolling Through Peach Blossom Woods and Sharing Family Moments
events.description: Upon arriving at the peach blossom grove, a sea of pink flowers unfolded before our eyes. The whole family strolled leisurely through the orchard, while the children excitedly chased and played along the flower-lined paths. Ma Xiulan used an old camera to take photos for the family, capturing her husband's rare relaxed smile and the innocent, joyful faces of the children. When she saw the most beautifully blooming peach blossom tree, she thought of her sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing. With the remote guidance of her younger sister Ma Xiufen, she clumsily but successfully took a few photos with her phone and sent them to her sister via WeChat, along with a voice message: "Sister, look how beautifully the peach blossoms are blooming back home!" Soon, she received her sister's reply and a "like."

events.name: Family Picnic Under the Flowers
events.description: Tired from walking, the family found a flat and clean patch of grass to sit on. Ma Xiulan took out the snacks and fruits she had brought, and everyone gathered around to share them. Ma Mingxuan, for once, set aside his textbooks and chatted with his younger siblings about amusing stories from school. Ma Zhiqiang also shared tales of the landscapes he had seen during his transport journeys. With the spring breeze brushing their faces and the fragrance of flowers filling the air, the tension and fatigue of the past week seemed to dissipate in that moment. As Ma Xiulan watched her laughing and chatting family, her heart swelled with immense satisfaction.

events.name: Returning with Satisfaction and Lingering Aftertaste
events.description: In the evening, the setting sun cast a golden edge over the peach blossom grove. The family packed up all their trash and drove back home. After arriving, Ma Xiulan washed and hung out the picnic blanket, then transferred the photos from the camera to the old family computer. Looking at the smiling faces frozen on the screen, especially the relaxed brow of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan, she felt the family outing was well worth it. That night, the children went to bed early, tired but content from the day’s excursion. Still excited from using her new phone during the day, Ma Xiulan browsed a bit more lifestyle information and did not fall asleep until around 23:10.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the family day arrangements.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, warm, and brimming with happiness

state.今日运动: Moderate (approximately 1.5 hours of outdoor walking, equivalent to an evening stroll)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with moderate winds, slightly cool in the morning and evening.

2025-03.daily_overview: The start of the new week saw family life return to the rhythm of exam preparation. During the day, Ma Xiulan had her personal time, during which she tried a new health exercise in the courtyard and identified a safety hazard that required repair. In the evening, a brief family meeting was held to make minor adjustments to the exam preparation agreement, demonstrating the flexibility and cohesion of family collaboration. Due to the child's mild discomfort, she stayed up late to provide care.

events.name: First Experience of Baduanjin in the Morning Courtyard
events.description: After seeing off her husband and children who had left for school and work, the house fell quiet. Ma Xiulan recalled the illustrated guide for Baduanjin she had seen a few days earlier on the community health bulletin board and decided to give it a try. She went to her small courtyard and began mimicking a few movements from memory. Though her movements were not entirely accurate, the slow stretches and deep breaths made her feel noticeably more relaxed in her shoulders and neck. She planned to continue tomorrow and, if she felt good, to stick with it.

events.name: Discover courtyard safety hazards
events.description: After finishing her Baduanjin exercises, Ma Xiulan went, as usual, to check on her small vegetable garden. When she reached the corner, she noticed that several sections of the wooden fence surrounding the garden had become noticeably loose and tilted, with rusted nails exposed at the joints. She gave the fence a push, and it wobbled significantly. "This is too dangerous," she thought with a start. "Mingzhe and Yuxin often play around here. If they bump into it or if the fence collapses, it could be serious." She immediately decided that she must discuss repairs with her husband when he returned home in the evening.

events.name: Mild Fever in Children and Staying Up Late to Provide Care
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Mingzhe, the second son, returned home from school looking listless, and his temperature was measured at 37.8 degrees Celsius. Ma Xiulan promptly gave him fever-reducing medicine and applied a damp towel to his forehead. At night, Ma Mingzhe slept restlessly, and Ma Xiulan got up multiple times to check on him. It was not until the early hours of the morning that she finally felt at ease and fell asleep, resulting in insufficient rest.

events.name: Review Meeting on the Implementation of the Family Convention
events.description: After dinner, while the whole family was gathered, Ma Xiulan brought up the implementation of the study agreement over the past week. She first praised the children for their overall cooperation, specifically mentioning that Ma Mingxuan had become more focused in his studies. Then, she gently pointed out that Ma Mingzhe sometimes still couldn’t resist speaking loudly or running around in the evening. Ma Mingzhe lowered his head in embarrassment. After discussion, everyone agreed to extend the "absolute quiet study time" after 8 p.m. by another half hour, until 9:30 p.m. Meanwhile, Ma Mingzhe promised to be more mindful. Ma Zhiqiang also expressed that he would supervise more strictly.

events.name: Fine-tuning and Encouragement One Week Later
events.description: At the end of the review, Ma Xiulan once again emphasized that the agreement was established to support their brother's high school entrance examination—a shared goal—and not to restrict anyone. She expressed gratitude for the children's understanding and cooperation, encouraging everyone to persist in their efforts and make home the warmest support. After hearing this, Ma Mingxuan nodded silently and took the initiative to clear the dishes. Following the communication, the family atmosphere became more harmonious, with everyone aligned toward the same goal.

起始状态.心情: Serenity, carrying the lingering afterglow of yesterday's joy and the composure of a new week's beginning, yet with concern for the child's health.

结束状态.心情: Steady yet weary, satisfied with the discovery and resolution of family issues, but sleep-deprived from taking care of the child.

state.今日运动: Mild (try Baduanjin for about 20 minutes, daily household chores)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered light rain in the afternoon, humid air.

2025-03.daily_overview: A plain yet fulfilling Tuesday. The day primarily revolved around household chores, handicrafts, and neighborhood interactions. While completing her daily tasks, Ma Xiulan found simple satisfaction in life by preparing dinner for her family and engaging in brief conversations with an old neighbor. Her husband's late return from overtime work heightened her awareness of the importance of family support. Thanks to a neighbor sharing food, the dinner was more abundant.

events.name: Deal with the backlog of household chores and manual tasks
events.description: There were no special plans for the day, so Ma Xiulan focused on handling the household chores that had accumulated. She washed a large bucket of clothes and, taking advantage of the overcast weather without harsh sunlight, hung them to dry under the well-ventilated eaves. In the afternoon, she sat by the window and continued a piece of embroidery work she had taken on earlier, using the natural light—stitching a simple orchid pattern onto a handkerchief. As she worked stitch by stitch, time quietly passed by.

events.name: A casual chat at the doorway with neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: When stepping out to take out the trash in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan happened to meet Wang Guilan from across the hallway, who was also tidying up by the door. The two stood by the alley and started chatting. Wang asked about her weekend plans, and Ma Xiulan shared her trip to the peach blossom forest, mentioning that her eldest son was under great pressure preparing for exams. As someone who had been through similar experiences, Wang Guilan comforted her, saying that having a sensible child was more important than anything else. She then handed Ma Xiulan a handful of pickled potherb mustard she had made and some homemade pastries, suggesting she add them to dishes for extra flavor. The brief exchange made Ma Xiulan feel the warmth of neighborly kindness.

events.name: Prepare hot meals for the husband returning home late.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan received a call from her husband, saying that there was a lot of cargo to handle that day and he would be home later than usual. Ma Xiulan deliberately delayed cooking by half an hour, preparing her husband's favorite stir-fried cabbage with vinegar. She also stir-fried the pickled potherb mustard given by Sister Wang with minced pork and made braised pork. She left a bowl of rice and dishes in the pot to keep them warm. Around eight o'clock in the evening, Ma Zhiqiang arrived home exhausted. As he ate the warm meal, a smile appeared on his face. Watching him, Ma Xiulan felt a pang of heartache and gained a deeper understanding of the difficulties he faced in supporting the family.

起始状态.心情: Calm and prepared to go through the day step by step, the child's fever has subsided.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet fulfilled, empathizing with the husband's hard work, the sumptuous dinner led to a slight weight gain.

state.今日运动: Mild (daily household chores, no structured exercise)

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with a noticeable rise in temperature and a sense of warmth under the afternoon sun.

2025-03.daily_overview: A fulfilling yet slightly eventful day. The morning was disrupted by emotions while tutoring my child with homework, but I managed to self-regulate through exercise in the afternoon. Later, I attended the final vegetable planting training session, gaining knowledge and expanding my social circle. At the same time, I finalized an important appointment with my sister for smartphone instruction, preparing for tomorrow's skill learning. Due to a deadline for handmade orders, I stayed up late working on them.

events.name: The Frustration of Tutoring Homework and Self-Awareness
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan urged her second son, Ma Mingzhe, to work on his math homework. Ma Mingzhe struggled to concentrate, repeatedly making mistakes on simple problems and remaining confused even after multiple explanations. Unable to hold back, Ma Xiulan raised her voice, her tone growing impatient. Ma Mingzhe pouted, feeling wronged. Later, as Ma Xiulan looked at her son's timid expression, she felt a pang of regret, realizing that her own anxiety had been passed on to the child.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade in the Afternoon to Calm the Mind
events.description: While Ma Mingzhe was taking his afternoon nap, Ma Xiulan returned to the courtyard to practice Baduanjin once again. This time, she deliberately slowed down her pace, focusing entirely on her breathing and physical movements. As she completed the routine, the frustration that had built up from tutoring homework in the morning gradually dissipated, and her mind grew calmer. Reflecting on the situation, she realized that for an active and lively child like Mingzhe, more patience and different approaches might be necessary, rather than simply urging him on.

events.name: Participate in the final planting training and practical exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at the community activity center to attend the final session of the spring vegetable planting training. The instructor explained comprehensive management techniques such as crop rotation, intercropping, and water-saving irrigation, which were highly practical. During the final hands-on exchange session, she had a pleasant conversation with several neighbors who also lived in single-story houses with small courtyards. They exchanged phone numbers or added each other on WeChat, agreeing to consult one another if they encountered any issues with planting in the future and to exchange surplus seedlings.

events.name: Schedule a mobile phone tutorial session with my sister.
events.description: On her way home after the training session, Ma Xiulan remembered that her younger sister Ma Xiufen had mentioned teaching her how to use the new phone (the gift from her sister was still with Ma Xiufen, who had promised to bring it when she came to teach). She called her sister, and they agreed that Ma Xiufen would come over tomorrow afternoon after finishing her household chores. Ma Xiulan felt both anticipation and a hint of nervousness, as she knew almost nothing about smartphones. That evening, she deliberately placed paper and a pen on the table, preparing to take notes on the key steps of the operation the next day.

events.name: Staying up late to complete handmade orders
events.description: Receiving an urgent embroidery order that needed to be delivered the next day, Ma Xiulan began working after dinner, focusing on the orchid grass pattern on the handkerchief. She continued working late into the night and completed the task around 23:30. Though exhausted, she felt a sense of accomplishment from finishing the work on time.

起始状态.心情: A calm mind, ready to start the day.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, I feel both anticipation and slight nervousness about tomorrow's study, but also a bit fatigued due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately 25 minutes of Baduanjin practice, walking to the community center)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to clear, with diminishing winds and pleasant weather.

2025-03.daily_overview: Information Reception and Skill Enlightenment Day. During the day, I learned about public welfare activities from neighbors and the community, and completed the organization and sharing of training materials. In the evening, with the help of my family, especially my younger daughter, I officially embarked on the journey of learning to use a smartphone, starting with the most basic operations and taking the first step toward embracing digital life. Excited by the learning process, I stayed up late using the phone.

events.name: Notification of Community Spring Cleaning
events.description: After dropping off her younger daughter at kindergarten in the morning, Ma Xiulan paused for a moment in front of the community bulletin board and noticed a newly posted notice: a spring community cleanup would be organized this Saturday morning, and residents were encouraged to bring their own tools to participate. Just then, her neighbor Zhang Shufen also came out of the supermarket, and the two chatted about it. Zhang Shufen said she would go too, so they could keep each other company. Ma Xiulan noted down the time and meeting location.

events.name: Organize Training Notes and Express Gratitude to the Recommender
events.description: During her free time in the morning, Ma Xiulan organized the notes from the three-day training, the distributed materials, and several packets of high-quality vegetable seeds she had received, placing them all in a dedicated folder. Recalling that her neighbor Wang Guilan had recommended her for the training, she gave Sister Wang a call to express her gratitude for the recommendation. Excitedly, she shared the knowledge she had gained about soil improvement and organic fertilizer production, and Wang Guilan on the other end of the line listened with great interest.

events.name: Received and initially engaged with a new smartphone.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiufen arrived as promised, bringing the brand-new smartphone as a gift. Under the watchful eyes of her sister and her curious younger daughter Ma Yuxin, Ma Xiulan carefully opened the box. Her sister helped her turn on the phone, insert the SIM card, and demonstrated how to charge it and connect to the home Wi-Fi. Ma Xiulan tried swiping the screen with her finger, finding the experience quite novel.

events.name: Learning Basic Operations: Making Phone Calls and Using WeChat
events.description: Under Ma Xiufen's guidance, Ma Xiulan learned how to make phone calls and save contacts. Then, her younger sister helped her install WeChat and demonstrated how to add friends, send voice messages, and text messages using her own phone. Ma Xiulan attempted to send her first message to her husband’s WeChat: "Zhiqiang, what are you doing?" She received a reply quickly, which she found quite interesting.

events.name: First time using the WeChat search function
events.description: After dinner, Ma Yuxin took the initiative to act as a "little teacher." Holding her mother's phone, she taught her how to use the search bar at the top of WeChat. Under her daughter's guidance, Ma Xiulan tried searching for "Jinghai District weather" and saw the forecast for the next day. She then searched for "Tianjin baozi recipe," which brought up many illustrated recipes. From being completely unfamiliar with the process to stumbling through a search, Ma Xiulan felt she had taken a big step forward.

events.name: Sharing Healthy Exercise Tips with Neighbors
events.description: During the day, I ran into my childhood friend Liu Chunmei at the door, and we chatted for a while. Ma Xiulan mentioned that she had recently started practicing Baduanjin in the yard and felt her body stretch out afterward, with her shoulders feeling less stiff. Liu Chunmei was very interested upon hearing this and said she would send Ma Xiulan the illustrated guide later. Ma Xiulan realized that sharing good life experiences could also bring happiness.

events.name: Browsing mobile phone information late at night
events.description: Excited by learning about smartphones during the day, Ma Xiulan could not resist browsing WeChat and short videos a little longer in the evening to explore new features, which delayed her bedtime until around 23:00 and resulted in a later sleep schedule.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, with a clear plan for the new day.

结束状态.心情: A mix of excitement and a sense of accomplishment, filled with curiosity about new things, but feeling slightly sleep-deprived.

state.今日运动: Mild (daily household chores, no focused exercise)

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, with abundant sunshine and a vibrant spring atmosphere.

2025-03.daily_overview: A day packed with intensive smartphone tutorials. My younger sister spent the entire afternoon systematically teaching various operations, ranging from basic settings to core applications. After the tutorial, Ma Xiulan successfully made her first high-definition video call with her sister who lives far away, instantly bridging the emotional distance. Meanwhile, she also made corresponding preparations for tomorrow's community activities and the upcoming vegetable garden work.

events.name: Systematic Smartphone Instruction (Part 1)
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiufen visited her sister again and began systematic instruction. She started with the most basic operations, such as turning the device on and off, adjusting the volume, and changing the screen brightness. Then, step by step, she taught her sister how to use the app store to download applications, how to manage photo albums, and how to use scan-to-pay functions (for informational purposes only). Ma Xiulan diligently took notes in her notebook, asking questions whenever she encountered something she didn’t understand. Her sister patiently explained using everyday analogies, such as, "Adjusting the brightness is like adjusting a light bulb."

events.name: Systematic Smartphone Tutorial (Part 2) – Casual Chat with My Sister
events.description: The core functions teaching focused on WeChat: sending photos, shooting short videos, initiating group chats, viewing Moments, etc. Ma Xiufen also taught her how to use a mobile browser to search for information. After the main teaching session, under her sister's watchful eye, Ma Xiulan attempted to independently operate several functions to reinforce her learning. Subsequently, the two sisters brewed tea, enjoyed some snacks, chatted about amusing stories of their respective children and recent community news they had heard, savoring a relaxed and pleasant afternoon.

events.name: First Video Call with My Elder Sister Who Lives Far Away
events.description: After her younger sister left, encouraged and assisted by Ma Yuxin, Ma Xiulan mustered up the courage to use the WeChat app on her new phone to initiate a video call to her elder sister, Li Xiuyun, who was far away in Beijing. When her sister’s clear, smiling face appeared on the screen, accompanied by her familiar voice, Ma Xiulan was both astonished and delighted. “Xiulan, your phone is so clear! You look great!” The two sisters chatted for over twenty minutes through the screen, sharing everyday matters as if they were right beside each other. This call brought Ma Xiulan immense astonishment and joy.

events.name: Prepare Tools for Community Cleanup
events.description: After the video call, Ma Xiulan remembered the big cleaning scheduled for the next day. She retrieved a broom, a dustpan, several clean old rags, and a bucket from the storage room. She checked whether the broom head was secure and then placed these items in a conspicuous spot by the door to avoid forgetting them the next morning.

events.name: A Heartwarming Moment of Mother and Daughter Practicing Baduanjin Together
events.description: Before preparing dinner in the evening, Ma Xiulan practiced the Eight-Section Brocade in the courtyard as usual. Her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, saw her and hopped over to her side, imitating her mother's movements. Though her actions were a bit clumsy, her expression was earnest. Ma Xiulan was amused by her daughter and slowed down her movements appropriately to let the child follow along. The silhouettes of the mother and daughter under the setting sun appeared especially heartwarming, turning the exercise into a part of their parent-child interaction.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward, ready to embrace intensive learning.

结束状态.心情: Exceptionally excited and filled with a sense of accomplishment, feeling the emotional connection brought by technology.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice, including parent-child interaction)

2025-03.daily_overview: A busy and fruitful Saturday. In the morning, I actively participated in community volunteer work, which strengthened the bonds with my neighbors. In the afternoon, my husband and I worked together to repair the fence in the yard, addressing safety concerns and planning for its beautification. Meanwhile, my digital life continued to expand as I began exploring short videos and delved deeper into the advanced features of WeChat. After the community event, I joined a dinner gathering with neighbors and returned home late.

events.name: Participate in the Community Spring Cleaning
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan arrived at the gathering point on time with her tools. She was grouped with her neighbors Wang Guilan and Zhang Shufen, responsible for cleaning up fallen leaves and debris along a section of Jingwen Road and wiping down the public information boards by the roadside. Dozens of residents worked together, creating a lively scene. Everyone chatted while they worked, and after three hours, the community environment was refreshed. Ma Xiulan had broken into a light sweat but felt content and cheerful.

events.name: Neighborhood Communication During Work Breaks
events.description: After the cleanup, everyone gathered in the shade to take a short break, and the neighborhood committee distributed bottled water. Ma Xiulan stood with Wang Guilan, Zhang Shufen, and several other familiar neighbors, chatting casually. The conversation shifted from the day’s achievements to children’s education and then to the recent prices at the local market. This relaxed exchange after working together helped foster a more harmonious relationship among the neighbors.

events.name: Demonstrating new smartphone skills to neighbors
events.description: On the way home, I ran into Wang Guilan again at the entrance. Unable to contain her excitement, Ma Xiulan took the initiative to take out her phone and said to Sister Wang, "Sister Wang, look, I can now send voice messages on WeChat." As she spoke, she demonstrated to Wang Guilan how to press and hold to speak and send the message. Wang Guilan watched in amazement, praising her for learning quickly, and said that she was too old to learn such things. Ma Xiulan quickly encouraged her, saying, "Ask your children to teach you. It’s really simple."

events.name: First time browsing short videos
events.description: After the lunch break, Ma Yuxin came over again to play with her mother's phone. She skillfully opened a short video app and searched for "kittens" to show her mother. Ma Xiulan was immediately captivated by the various interesting short videos. Later, she tried searching for "home-cooked dishes" and "embroidery for beginners" herself and found many intuitive tutorial videos, feeling they were much easier to understand than merely looking at pictures and text.

events.name: Learn to Follow Official Accounts and View Messages
events.description: Under Ma Yuxin's continued guidance, Ma Xiulan learned how to search for and follow official accounts. She followed "Jinghai Community Service," which would allow her to receive activity notifications directly in the future. Then, her daughter taught her how to view articles pushed by subscription accounts, as well as how to open the WeChat chat interface to read and reply to messages from family and friends. She saw the morning greetings sent by her husband and successfully replied with a voice message.

events.name: Repairing the Yard Fence with Husband (Survey and Decision-Making)
events.description: In the evening after Ma Zhiqiang returned from work, Ma Xiulan immediately took him to see the loose fence. After a careful inspection, Ma Zhiqiang concluded that it needed immediate reinforcement, or it would not hold up for long. The two discussed and decided to first use the available wooden strips and nails for emergency reinforcement. After their eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, completes his high school entrance examination in June, they would purchase new lumber and paint. The whole family would then work together to renovate and repaint all the fences in the courtyard, making the small yard more aesthetically pleasing and secure.

events.name: Prepare repair tools and materials
events.description: After making the decision, Ma Zhiqiang retrieved a hammer, some long nails, and several leftover wooden strips from the previous renovation from the tool room at home. Ma Xiulan picked up a small shovel to clear the overgrown weeds at the base of the fence and moved aside the clutter piled nearby, creating sufficient space for the repairs.

events.name: The couple collaborated to reinforce the fence.
events.description: Ma Zhiqiang was primarily responsible for the hammering and reinforcement, while Ma Xiulan assisted by holding the wooden strips steady and passing tools. As they worked, they chatted. Ma Xiulan mentioned the community cleanup that had taken place that day, and Ma Zhiqiang talked about where he had seen the most beautiful peach blossoms blooming along his transport route. Amid the clanging of hammers and occasional conversation, the loose wooden strips were reinforced one by one.

events.name: Clearing the Scene and Planning for the Future
events.description: After completing the repairs, Ma Xiulan swept away the scattered wood chips and weeds, then put away the tools. The couple looked at the now sturdy fence, exchanged a smile, and both breathed a sigh of relief. During dinner, they announced to the children their plan to paint and beautify the courtyard together after the high school entrance exams. The children were all looking forward to it, treating it as a family project.

events.name: Neighbors Returned Late from a Dinner Gathering
events.description: After dinner, neighbor Zhang Shufen invited several familiar neighbors to her home for a small gathering to share the results of today's thorough cleaning. Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang attended with their children. Everyone chatted and enjoyed snacks, not returning home until around 23:00 in the evening, which led to a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Positive and ready to participate in group activities.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet content, feeling both the fulfillment of public welfare work and the steadiness of resolving family issues, with a slight weight gain from the gathering.

state.今日运动: Moderate (approximately 3 hours of community labor, with auxiliary tasks including household chores and fence repair)

2025-03.daily_overview: A relaxing and connection-focused Sunday. In the morning, I joined an online handicraft community, expanding my social circle of shared interests. In the afternoon, I shared healthy habits with my neighbors and conducted a simple demonstration. In terms of family life, the eldest child proactively took on the responsibility of looking after the younger siblings, allowing the couple to enjoy a rare evening walk together, engaging in deep emotional communication. Due to the humid weather, there was slight discomfort in the joints.

events.name: Join the Online Handicraft Enthusiasts Group
events.description: In the morning, at the invitation of her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat, Ma Xiulan joined an online group named "Skilled Sisters Gathering." Besides Zhou Xiuqin, the group included Aunt Wu, whom she had mentioned, and several other friends who share a passion for handicrafts. Encouraged by Zhou Xiuqin, Ma Xiulan learned to send a smiling emoji in the group as a greeting and briefly introduced herself: "I am Xiulan from Jinghai, and I enjoy embroidery." She soon received welcoming replies from several group members, making her feel as though she had found a community.

events.name: Sharing the Experience of Baduanjin with Neighbors
events.description: In the afternoon, neighbor Wang Guilan came over for a visit. Ma Xiulan poured her a cup of tea, and the two sat in the living room chatting. Ma Xiulan mentioned that she had been practicing the Eight-Section Brocade exercises for almost a week and felt much more relaxed in her lower back and shoulders. Even during the day, doing household chores didn’t tire her out as easily as before. Wang Guilan was very interested, so Ma Xiulan stood up and gave her a simple demonstration of two movements, "Holding Up the Heavens with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing the Bow to Shoot the Eagle," in an open space in the living room. Wang Guilan followed along, mimicking the movements a couple of times, and said with a smile, "It really feels like my muscles and joints are being stretched."

events.name: The Responsibility of the Eldest Son and the Parents' Contentment
events.description: In the evening, the eldest son Ma Mingxuan, seeing his parents had been busy all week, took the initiative to say, "Dad, Mom, why don't you go out for a walk? I'll watch over my younger siblings while they do their homework and play." Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang were both surprised and touched upon hearing this. They gave some instructions, left their mobile phones with the children in case they needed to contact them, and then went out with peace of mind.

events.name: A rare walk for the couple
events.description: Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang strolled slowly along the familiar Jingwen Road. With no children making noise, the two walked in step, savoring the tranquility of the spring evening. It had been a long time since they had enjoyed such pure time alone together.

events.name: In-depth spousal communication
events.description: During their walk, the conversation between the two delved deeper than usual. Ma Xiulan mentioned that their eldest son’s study habits had stabilized recently, though it was clear he was still under considerable pressure. Ma Zhiqiang shared how he had resolved a troublesome issue at work and noted that this month’s income would be slightly better than expected, allowing them to contribute a bit more to the "high school entrance exam reserve fund." They exchanged simple hopes for their children’s future and reminisced about the early days of their marriage. This walk helped them better understand the burdens each carried and the thoughts weighing on their minds.

events.name: The Warmth of Returning Home
events.description: After a half-hour walk home, they found Ma Mingxuan reading a storybook to his younger siblings, with everything in the house neatly arranged. The couple praised their eldest son and took out a bag of sugar-roasted chestnuts they had bought at a small shop at the intersection during their walk, distributing them to the children. The family gathered around, peeling and eating the chestnuts together, filling the Saturday evening with warm and simple happiness.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the lazy comfort of a Sunday morning, yet with slight joint pain due to the damp weather.

结束状态.心情: Warm and gratified, feeling deeply happy because of the child's growth and the communication between husband and wife.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately half an hour of walking)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with fresh air and significant temperature differences between morning and evening.
