2025-03.daily_overview: A new week's self-improvement day. After morning exercise, inspiration struck, and I prepared brain-boosting snacks for my eldest son who is preparing for exams. During the day, I proactively used my new phone to search for traditional handicraft tutorial videos for in-depth learning. At the same time, I actively prepared various supplies for the upcoming spring planting in the vegetable garden, ready to put the training I received into practice. Thanks to the early morning exercise, I felt energetic throughout the day.

events.name: Inspiration and Caring Actions After Morning Exercise
events.description: After practicing Baduanjin in the courtyard in the morning, Ma Xiulan felt refreshed and clear-headed. She suddenly recalled recently hearing that walnuts and black sesame seeds are beneficial for children who use their brains frequently. Thinking of her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, who studies late into the night every day, she decided to go to the market. She bought some walnut kernels and black sesame seeds, planning to roast them until fragrant, grind them into powder, mix them with white sugar, and give them to her son as a snack between classes or as a spread for steamed buns. This was her way of showing support and care.

events.name: Utilizing Mobile Phones for Deep Learning of Embroidery Techniques
events.description: After finishing her morning chores, Ma Xiulan took out her phone and, with her daughter’s help, opened a short video platform. She proactively searched for "traditional Tianjin embroidery needle techniques" and found several highly detailed tutorial videos, with a master craftsman as the instructor. She tried using the pause and replay functions, watching the videos while picking up her embroidery hoop and needlework to mimic and learn a new "seed stitch" technique. Though her movements were still unskilled, she gained a deeper understanding of the method.

events.name: Making final preparations for spring planting in the vegetable garden
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan began making final preparations for planting the vegetable garden planned for the next day. She took out tools such as hoes and shovels, wiped them clean, and checked whether the wooden handles were secure. Next, she mixed kitchen waste that had accumulated at home over several days—such as fruit peels and vegetable scraps—with plant ash collected from the stove, placed it into a covered plastic bucket, added a small amount of water, and began fermenting a simple organic liquid fertilizer. All of this was learned from the training course, and she looked forward to putting it to good use.

起始状态.心情: Fresh and energetic, in great shape after morning exercise.

结束状态.心情: Filled with anticipation and excitement for the upcoming spring sowing.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately 25 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade)

date_attribute.weather: The weather is fine, with bright sunshine and gentle winds, making it an excellent day for farming.

2025-03.daily_overview: The core spring planting practice day. After systematically organizing the knowledge gained from the training sessions she attended in recent days, Ma Xiulan immediately put it into practice. From tilling the soil and fertilizing to sowing seeds and pest control, she meticulously managed her small vegetable garden following scientific methods, marking the substantial implementation phase of her long-term gardening goals. Simultaneously, she continued to practice her digital skills, becoming increasingly proficient. Due to the fine weather, her physical activity also increased.

events.name: Organize and Review Planting Training Notes
events.description: In the morning, before starting her work, Ma Xiulan took out the notebook she had used during community training and sat at the table, carefully reviewing it page by page. She used a pen to highlight the appropriate sowing depth and spacing for a small home vegetable garden, as well as the natural pest control methods that had left a deep impression on her. This organizing process helped her clarify the next steps in her work, giving her more confidence.

events.name: Garden Soil Tilling and Soil Improvement
events.description: Putting on gloves and a sun hat, Ma Xiulan picked up a hoe and headed to the small vegetable garden. She selected a sunny plot of land and began turning the soil vigorously, breaking up the hardened earth while carefully picking out small stones and stubborn weed roots. The tilled soil became loose and well-aerated, marking the first step in promoting healthy root growth for the crops.

events.name: Application of Homemade Organic Fertilizer and Sowing
events.description: After tilling the soil, Ma Xiulan diluted the simple organic fertilizer solution she had prepared the day before and evenly sprinkled it over the soil surface, then lightly mixed it into the soil with a hoe. Next, following the instructions in her notes, she used a small shovel to dig shallow furrows and carefully sowed the tomato, cucumber, and lettuce seeds she had received during the training into separate vegetable beds, covering them with a thin layer of soil. She carried out each step with exceptional care.

events.name: Implement green pest prevention
events.description: After completing the sowing, Ma Xiulan did not stop. She inserted several homemade yellow sticky traps (made from discarded cardboard coated with yellow paint and smeared with engine oil) around the vegetable garden. Then, she took out the pre-prepared garlic and chili pepper solution and carefully sprayed it around the sown area and on the soil surface using a spray bottle. These are physical and biological control methods recommended by the training instructor, and she hopes to reduce pesticide use.

events.name: Complete sowing and mulching for moisture conservation
events.description: Finally, Ma Xiulan used a spray bottle to thoroughly water the seeded area. To prevent rapid evaporation and retain warmth, she brought some clean, dry straw from the haystack and gently spread it over the surface of the seeded vegetable beds. Looking at the land she had meticulously tended, she could almost envision the lush green seedlings of the future, her heart filled with a sense of accomplishment and anticipation.

events.name: Independent review of mobile phone operations
events.description: On a post-work afternoon, Ma Xiulan took out her phone and, under the supervision of her daughter Ma Yuxin, reviewed the operations she had learned a few days earlier. She attempted to independently search for "hand embroidery patterns" and successfully followed a relevant public account. She then opened WeChat, listened to a voice message from her neighbor Wang Guilan inquiring about rapeseed seeds sent earlier in the morning, and pressed the voice button to reply. Although the entire process was slow, she hardly needed any assistance, which greatly boosted her confidence.

起始状态.心情: Focused and driven, ready for the crucial spring sowing.

结束状态.心情: A strong sense of accomplishment and satisfaction, physical fatigue yet mental delight.

state.今日运动: Moderate (approximately 2.5 hours of vegetable garden work, mainly physical tasks such as tilling soil and sowing seeds)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to light rain, with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-03.daily_overview: A day of cultivation both internally and externally. Externally, I courageously took the first step of sharing in an online handicraft community, receiving positive social feedback. Internally, I persisted in maintaining healthy habits despite the rainy weather and gladly shared knowledge and achievements with neighbors. Digital skills and real-world social interactions, personal hobbies and neighborhood relationships, were well integrated on this day. Due to fewer indoor activities caused by the rain, food intake was slightly higher.

events.name: First time sharing works in an online community
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan completed a small embroidery piece—a coaster embroidered with a begonia pattern. Encouraged repeatedly by Zhou Xiuqin, she mustered the courage to take a photo with her phone, then opened the "Skilled Sisters Group" WeChat chat, fumbled to select the image, and clicked send. Shortly after, she sent a voice message: "This is the begonia flower I just embroidered, using the set stitch technique. Please take a look, sisters." Soon, several likes and praising emojis flooded the group chat, with Zhou Xiuqin and Aunt Wu offering specific compliments and suggestions. For the first time showcasing her craftsmanship in a "public setting" and receiving recognition, Ma Xiulan felt her face flush and her heart race, but she was very happy.

events.name: Persisting with Indoor Baduanjin Exercises on Rainy Days
events.description: In the afternoon, rain began to patter outside, making it impossible to go to the courtyard. Ma Xiulan thus moved her practice location to the living room. She played the Eight-Section Brocade music she had saved on her phone just the day before and, within the limited space, still diligently completed a full set of exercises. The sound of rain became the background noise, and she found herself even more focused. After finishing her practice, she felt a sense of accomplishment: once a habit is formed, even when external conditions change, one can find ways to persist.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Spring Sowing with Neighbors
events.description: During a break in the rain, Ma Xiulan met Wang Guilan at the doorway. With great enthusiasm, she pulled Sister Wang aside and pointed toward her small vegetable garden, sharing the process of yesterday’s planting and the new methods she had learned, such as using garlic water to prevent pests. She also gave Wang Guilan a small portion of each type of high-quality vegetable seeds distributed during the training, saying, "Sister Wang, you should try these too—these seeds are excellent." Wang Guilan happily accepted them, and the two agreed to exchange updates on the growth of their seedlings once they sprouted.

events.name: The walk was postponed due to rain.
events.description: In the evening, as the rain started again, Ma Xiulan decided to cancel today's walk and instead focused on tidying up at home. She used this time to wash the accumulated laundry and attempted to create a simple household ledger, recording recent expenses to better manage the family finances.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a touch of laziness brought by the rainy day.

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and confident, uplifted by the success of online sharing and the persistence of habits, but experiencing a slight weight gain due to reduced activity on rainy days.

state.今日运动: Mild (Indoor Eight-Section Brocade for about 20 minutes)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, clearing up later, suitable for outdoor planning.

2025-03.daily_overview: Digital Skills Deepening Day and Spring Planting Preparation Day. The use of WeChat has become increasingly proficient, even extending to practical tasks such as handling utility bill payments. Meanwhile, detailed planning and tool preparation are underway for the expansion of the vegetable garden, breaking down long-term goals into actionable steps. Due to handling these tasks, bedtime has been slightly delayed.

events.name: Actively use WeChat and learn new features.
events.description: Today, Ma Xiulan began to use WeChat more actively. She read an article on spring health preservation posted by the "Jinghai Community Service" official account and tried sending a text message to her sister Li Xiuyun to inquire about the recent situation in Beijing. While browsing the official account, she came across an article about good local spots for spring outings and wanted to forward it to her younger sister Ma Xiufen, but she did not know how to do it. In the evening, she asked her daughter Ma Yuxin for help, who taught her how to use the "forward" function. After learning it, she successfully forwarded the article to her sister, feeling that her ability to handle family social matters had improved further.

events.name: Decided to try and prepare for online payment.
events.description: Upon seeing the promotional material for paying utility bills via WeChat Pay, Ma Xiulan recalled her younger sister mentioning how convenient it was, sparking her interest. She called her sister to inquire in detail about the safety and reliability of online payments, as well as whether the process was cumbersome. Over the phone, her sister reassured her and agreed to guide her remotely the next morning through a phone call. After hanging up, Ma Xiulan immediately retrieved the household electricity bill, carefully copied the lengthy customer number onto a slip of paper, and charged her phone, all in preparation for the "practical assessment" scheduled for the following day.

events.name: Plan the vegetable garden planting areas meticulously
events.description: The weather was fine in the afternoon, and Ma Xiulan came to the small vegetable garden. Holding a wooden stick and a rope, she measured and marked the ground according to her notes. She divided the remaining open space in the garden into several neat squares, planning the positions for the tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuce, and leaf lettuce she intended to plant next. Taking into account the light requirements of different vegetables and the principles of crop rotation, she made simple markings with the wooden stick. Once the planning was complete, the entire planting layout was clear at a glance.

events.name: Cleaning and Organizing Garden Tools
events.description: After finishing the planning, Ma Xiulan brought out all the gardening tools stored in the utility room, including small shovels, hoes, watering cans, and spray bottles. She fetched a basin of water and carefully scrubbed off the dirt and rust from the tools with an old brush, checking whether the wooden handles were loose. Once everything was cleaned and inspected, she neatly hung the tools back on the wall-mounted tool rack for easy access whenever needed.

起始状态.心情: With clear goals, ready to learn new skills and handle affairs

结束状态.心情: Methodical and prepared, with confidence in facing tomorrow's challenges.

state.今日运动: Mild (Garden planning and tool organization, approximately 1.5 hours)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, warm, with a gentle spring breeze

2025-03.daily_overview: A day of peak skill application and creative inspiration. In the morning, I successfully completed an online payment independently, achieving a breakthrough in the practical application of digital skills. In the afternoon, inspired by online videos, I used locally available materials to make Jiangnan-style green rice cakes for the first time, which received praise from my family. Additionally, my healthy habits gained family recognition, and I began systematic kitchen waste composting. Delighted by the successful payment, I stayed up late video chatting with friends.

events.name: Successfully completed online payment under remote guidance from my sister.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan, following the agreement, operated her phone step by step under the guidance of her sister Ma Xiufen over the phone. She searched for and followed the "State Grid Tianjin Electric Power" official account, typed in the household number she had copied beforehand with slightly trembling hands to complete the binding, and successfully retrieved this month's electricity bill. Finally, encouraged by her sister, she completed the payment using WeChat balance. When the "Payment Successful" page popped up on the screen, Ma Xiulan let out a long sigh of relief and excitedly said to her sister on the other end of the line, "It's done! So convenient!"

events.name: Share the joy of successful payment
events.description: After successfully paying the bill, Ma Xiulan spent the whole day immersed in the joy of mastering a new skill. When her husband and children returned home in the evening, she eagerly took out her phone to show them the payment confirmation page, proudly displaying her achievement like a child. "From now on, I can pay our electricity bills at home without having to go out anymore," she said. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, nodded with a smile and agreed, while the children praised their mother for being amazing.

events.name: Inspired to create by food videos
events.description: During her free time in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan was scrolling through short videos when she came across a tutorial on making Jiangnan-style sweet bean paste qingtuan. The vibrant green dumplings, the delicate preparation process shown in the video, along with the caption "limited to spring," deeply captivated her. Recalling that a patch of mugwort grew in a corner of her small vegetable garden, she was immediately struck by the impulse to "give it a try."

events.name: Picking Mugwort and Preparing Ingredients
events.description: Action was taken immediately. Ma Xiulan took a small basket to the vegetable garden and carefully picked a handful of the freshest and most tender tips of mugwort. Returning to the kitchen, she thoroughly washed the mugwort, then retrieved glutinous rice flour, rice flour, leftover red bean paste from the New Year, sugar, and other ingredients from the cupboard. She also prepared tools such as a steamer and a mixing bowl.

events.name: First attempt at making Qingtuan
events.description: Ma Xiulan propped her phone to the side, replaying the tutorial video while she worked step by step. After blanching the mugwort and blending it into a paste, she mixed it with rice flour and kneaded it into a smooth green dough—a process that required some effort. When wrapping the filling, her technique was still a bit unpracticed: the red bean paste either leaked out or the wrapper was too thick, resulting in qingtuan of uneven sizes and shapes that were not perfectly round. Nevertheless, she remained patient and made adjustments slowly.

events.name: Steaming and Tasting
events.description: The wrapped qingtuan were placed in a steamer lined with a cloth liner and steamed over high heat for about 15 minutes. The moment the lid was lifted, the distinctive fragrance of mugwort filled the air. The qingtuan had turned a deep emerald green, and although their appearance was ordinary, each one was plump and had not collapsed. After dinner, she brought the qingtuan to the table for everyone to taste. Her husband and children took a bite and all agreed they were delicious—the sweet red bean filling was not overly rich, and the outer layer was chewy with a refreshing herbal aroma. The family’s praise made Ma Xiulan beam with joy.

events.name: Sharing exercise experiences with my husband
events.description: While practicing Baduanjin in the evening, Ma Xiulan's husband happened to return from work and watched from the side. After finishing the exercise, Ma Xiulan wiped her sweat and said to her husband, "I've been practicing these past few days, and I feel a bit lighter and more energetic. I also sleep more soundly at night." Ma Zhiqiang, noticing her improved complexion, nodded and said, "If you feel it's good for you, keep it up. I'll take on more of the household responsibilities."

events.name: Launch a Food Waste Composting Program
events.description: Inspired by planting training and to implement the concept of green cultivation, Ma Xiulan officially started kitchen waste composting today. She cleaned an unused plastic bucket with a lid and placed it in a shaded corner of the vegetable garden as a composting bin. Starting today, she will no longer discard kitchen waste such as vegetable leaves, fruit peels, and eggshells generated during cooking at will. Instead, she will collect and pour them into this bucket, taking the first step in a long-term practice toward producing genuine organic fertilizer.

events.name: Staying up late video chatting with friends
events.description: Delighted by the successful payment and the making of qingtuan, Ma Xiulan had a video chat with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei in the evening, sharing today's achievements. They talked until around 23:00 before going to sleep.

起始状态.心情: Eager to give it a try and ready to tackle today's skills challenge.

结束状态.心情: Highly satisfied and proud, brimming with creativity and confidence in mastering life.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice, physical activity during cooking)

date_attribute.weather: It was a sunny day, and the Saturday sunlight was exceptionally bright.

2025-03.daily_overview: A Saturday for relaxation and social sharing. In the morning, I shared digital life experiences with neighbors, followed by household shopping in the afternoon. In the evening, thanks to the eldest son's initiative in taking charge, the couple enjoyed a precious walk and engaged in deep emotional communication. The family support system demonstrated its strength in subtle ways. During the shopping trip, I ran into an old friend, and we chatted while sitting for a long time.

events.name: Sharing Online Payment Experience with Neighbors
events.description: In the morning at the entrance, Ma Xiulan met Wang Guilan again. She proactively mentioned that she had paid her electricity bill via her mobile phone the day before and enthusiastically gave Sister Wang a brief introduction to the steps: "First, follow the official account, then bind the number on your electricity bill..." Wang Guilan listened attentively and remarked with admiration, "That is convenient. I'll ask my daughter to teach me later." Having transformed from a "student" into a "little teacher," Ma Xiulan felt a great sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Procurement of Supplementary Supplies for the Vegetable Garden
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan rode her bicycle to a familiar agricultural supply store in town. Following her previous plan, she purchased tomato and cucumber seedlings (worried that her own seedling-raising skills were not up to par), along with two packets of lettuce and leaf lettuce seeds. She also took a small bag of nutrient-rich soil and compound fertilizer for backup. The shop owner, a fellow townsman she had known for many years, exchanged ideas with her about this year's spring planting plans and offered some localized cultivation advice.

events.name: Chatting with an old friend
events.description: At the entrance of the agricultural supplies store, Ma Xiulan ran into her primary school classmate Zhao Xiaohong. Having not seen each other for a long time, they stood by the roadside and chatted for half an hour. Zhao Xiaohong shared updates about her child, while Ma Xiulan talked about her handicrafts and spring planting plans. The long sit-down chat made her feel relaxed, but it also reduced her physical activity.

events.name: The Eldest Son's Renewed Responsibility and the Couple's Stroll
events.description: In the evening, seeing their parents had been busy all week, the eldest son Ma Mingxuan once again volunteered to look after his younger siblings so they could go out for a walk. Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang gratefully accepted his thoughtful gesture, gave a few instructions, and then left the house.

events.name: In-depth communication between two individuals
events.description: The two took another walk along Jingwen Road. This time, their conversation delved deeper. Ma Xiulan mentioned that their eldest son seemed somewhat down recently, likely due to the pressure of mock exams; Ma Zhiqiang shared a potential opportunity for a stable supply source at work—if successfully negotiated, it would ensure a more stable income in the coming months, allowing them to save more money for their family goals. They also discussed plans for their youngest daughter, who would soon start elementary school. These conversations about their family’s future and practical realities brought their hearts even closer together.

events.name: Returning Home and Cherished Family Moments
events.description: After a half-hour walk, they returned home to find everything in order. Ma Mingxuan had even helped his younger siblings check their homework. The couple praised their eldest son and distributed the tanghulu they had bought during the walk to the children. On Saturday night, the family gathered around watching television, sharing the tanghulu—a simple yet heartwarming scene.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the leisurely pace of a weekend morning

结束状态.心情: Warmth, consolation, and happiness derived from the tacit understanding and support within the family.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately half an hour of walking, cycling for shopping)

2025-03.daily_overview: Deepening Interest-Based Social Connections on Labor Day. Received cross-regional video guidance in an online handicraft community, upgrading the method of skill acquisition. Simultaneously, learned to efficiently manage online learning resources. In the afternoon, taking advantage of the fine weather, completed the tilling of the remaining area in the vegetable garden, preparing the soil for upcoming sowing. The outdoor labor was somewhat tiring due to the strong wind.

events.name: Accept video guidance from remote craft friends
events.description: In the "Crafty Sisters" WeChat group this morning, Ma Xiulan mentioned that she was having trouble with a complex crochet pattern and couldn't get the stitches even. Aunt Wu, a skilled member living in Cangzhou, saw the message and kindly offered, "Xiulan, how about we start a video call? Let me see exactly which step is causing the issue." Ma Xiulan accepted the invitation with some nervousness. After the video connected, Aunt Wu watched her hand movements on the screen, patiently pointed out the problems step by step, and demonstrated the correct finger techniques and tension. This was Ma Xiulan's first time receiving remote "hands-on" instruction via video call, and the result was surprisingly effective—the problem that had troubled her for several days was resolved instantly.

events.name: Learning to Collect and Manage Short Videos
events.description: After solving the manual craft challenge, Ma Xiulan continued browsing short videos. She noticed that there were more and more videos on embroidery, gardening, and home cooking tutorials that she liked, but it was inconvenient to find them. With her daughter's guidance, she learned how to "favorite" videos and created several categorized folders such as "Handicrafts," "Gardening," and "Cooking." She organized useful videos into these folders, building her own mobile skill library for easy review and learning whenever needed.

events.name: Turn over the planned vegetable garden soil
events.description: The afternoon was sunny but quite windy. Ma Xiulan put on her hat, picked up her hoe, and headed to the area she had planned the day before for planting lettuce and leaf mustard. She swung the hoe with force, thoroughly turning over the soil in the plot, breaking up the large, hardened clods, and carefully removing small stones and weed roots. After more than an hour of labor, the land became as loose and level as the previously sown area, ready for the seeds to be scattered in a few days. The wind increased the intensity of the work, and she broke into a sweat.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the leisurely ease of a Sunday morning

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, gaining new knowledge while also achieving physical labor goals.

state.今日运动: Moderate (approximately 1.5 hours of garden soil-turning labor, with significant physical exertion due to wind conditions)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning overcast in the evening, the weather at the end of the month is somewhat subdued.

2025-03.daily_overview: The end of March is also a time for reflection and looking ahead. Ma Xiulan reviewed the transformation of her Baduanjin practice from a task into a habit over the past half-month, as well as the health improvements brought by regular walks. She exchanged spring planting plans with her neighbors, sharing experiences and resources. In the evening, she showcased her digital world achievements to her family, bringing a perfect conclusion to this March filled with learning, change, and growth.

events.name: Baduanjin Becomes a Natural Part of Life
events.description: In the early morning, while practicing Baduanjin in the courtyard, Ma Xiulan no longer needs to remind herself that "it's time to exercise." As the soothing music begins, her movements flow naturally. After finishing her routine, she reflects on her persistence over the past half-month and realizes that it is no longer a deliberate "task" to be completed but has seamlessly integrated into her daily rhythm, much like washing her face and brushing her teeth in the morning. It has become a "refueling station" for her—a place to stabilize her mind and gather energy amidst busy household chores and the emotional fluctuations of her children.

events.name: Summarizing the Health Benefits of Regular Walking
events.description: While taking an evening stroll with her neighbor Zhang Shufen in the open area of their residential community, Ma Xiulan mentioned that since she and her husband started taking regular walks several times a week (sometimes just the two of them, sometimes with family), she has felt less fatigued after a busy day and sleeps more soundly at night. Zhang Shufen shared the same sentiment, saying she feels lighter and more energetic after walking. The two agreed to maintain this good habit as long as the weather permits, and to try extending their walks to 40 minutes to enjoy more thorough relaxation.

events.name: Communicating Spring Planting Plans with Neighbors
events.description: Before going for a walk, Ma Xiulan encountered Wang Guilan at the door. Naturally, the two started chatting about spring sowing. Ma Xiulan shared the scientific methods she had learned from training, while Wang Guilan, drawing on decades of local planting experience, offered her some very practical advice on topics such as "the best time to plant beans" and "what kind of winds are common in Jinghai during spring and how to guard against them." Wang also promised to give her some old, disease-resistant vegetable seeds from her own stock in a couple of days. This exchange of experience and knowledge made Ma Xiulan feel particularly reassured.

events.name: Showcasing Digital Life Achievements to Family
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan gathered her husband and children around her and eagerly took out her phone to show them her "digital achievements" from the past half-month: photos of the embroidery she had taken, various useful short videos she had saved, public accounts she followed, and screenshots of her exchanges with netizens from all over the country in handicraft groups. She shared interesting stories and challenges from her learning journey, her face glowing with enthusiasm. Her family gathered around her, listening and watching, all delighted for her. Ma Mingxuan said, "Mom, you're more trendy than I am now." The remark made the whole family burst into laughter.

起始状态.心情: Serene, imbued with the reflective mood characteristic of month-end.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 156, Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, serene, and filled with hope, I take comfort in the growth of March and look forward to the life of April.

state.今日运动: Mild (approximately 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin, and about 40 minutes of evening walk)

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan began the first day of April by persistently practicing Baduanjin in the early morning to reinforce her health habits. She then focused on seasonal home organization and spring garden planting, concluding her day with an evening walk. This routine reflects her meticulous planning and pragmatic approach to family life.

events.name: Morning Exercise of Baduanjin
events.description: At half past six in the morning, Ma Xiulan practiced the eight movements of Baduanjin slowly and carefully in her small courtyard, following the rhythm of a mobile video tutorial. She focused on coordinating her breathing with the movements, feeling a slight warmth in her body. This was a continuation of the habit she had cultivated in March.

events.name: Organize the entire family's wardrobe and identify seasonal change needs
events.description: In the morning, while organizing the family's wardrobe for the season change, Ma Xiulan carefully inspected each piece of clothing. She noticed that her eldest son's sweatpants had become too short, her second son's sweatshirt was too small, her daughter lacked a light jacket, and her husband's vest was worn out. Taking out the small notebook she always carried, she meticulously recorded each person's specific needs and estimated size adjustments.

events.name: Sowing tomatoes and cucumbers in the courtyard
events.description: In the warm afternoon sunlight, Ma Xiulan carefully loosened the soil in the sunlit area she had planned in the courtyard, adding a small amount of homemade base fertilizer. Following the required row and plant spacing, she sowed tomato and cucumber seeds separately, covered them with a thin layer of soil, and watered them thoroughly, adding new greenery to the family's small vegetable garden.

events.name: Assess spring clothing procurement needs and set a budget
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan assessed the types and quantities of clothing that needed to be added based on the recorded wear and tear of garments and the changes in spring weather. She reviewed the family savings book, referred to previous years' expenses, set a budget limit of 800 yuan for this purchase, and mentally outlined a preliminary shopping list.

events.name: Prepare breakfast and send the children to school.
events.description: After her morning exercise, Ma Xiulan prepared a simple breakfast for her family, such as porridge and steamed buns. She urged her three children to finish their meal, then sent her second son and youngest daughter to school, while the eldest son went to junior high school on his own.

events.name: Evening Walk and Conversation with Neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan took her customary 40-minute walk near Jingwen Road, enjoying the spring scenery. Along the way, she met her neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan. The two walked together, chatting about recent vegetable prices and community news. Ma Xiulan also shared her joy from planting seeds earlier that day.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, filled with anticipation for the new month.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, as multiple family plans have been completed.

state.今日运动: Approximately 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, followed by 40 minutes of evening walking.

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan continued her morning practice of Baduanjin and felt progress, then refined her clothing purchase list and budget. Meanwhile, she replanted leafy greens in the vegetable garden. However, due to a last-minute notification about a manual odd job, she stayed up slightly late to handle it.

events.name: Feeling Progress in Morning Baduanjin Practice
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan continued practicing Baduanjin in the courtyard. Today, she felt that her movements were smoother than yesterday, especially during the "lifting the sky to regulate the triple energizer" posture. Her arms could be raised higher, and her breathing was more fluid.

events.name: Refine the Spring Clothing Purchase List and Budget
events.description: Based on the previous day's needs assessment, Ma Xiulan sat down at the kitchen table, took out a small notebook, and detailed the types, quantities, approximate sizes, and priorities of clothing to be purchased for each family member. Considering the family's financial situation, she carefully calculated and ultimately set a strict total budget of no more than 800 yuan, deciding to shop at the cost-effective clothing wholesale market in Jinghai District.

events.name: Replanting lettuce and leaf lettuce in the vegetable garden
events.description: In another slightly shaded area of the vegetable garden, Ma Xiulan sowed seeds of lettuce and leaf lettuce, similarly covering them with a thin layer of soil and watering them thoroughly. She also inserted homemade crop labels made from popsicle sticks along the edges of the vegetable beds, writing down the crop names and sowing dates for easy identification.

events.name: Daily Purchasing and Bookkeeping
events.description: When purchasing ingredients for the day at the morning market, Ma Xiulan habitually compared prices and recorded the expenses in the household account book upon returning home, maintaining her frugal spending habits.

events.name: Received an urgent manual task and stayed up late to handle it.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan received an urgent embroidery piecework introduced by Zheng Xiuying via WeChat, which required completing part of the pattern that evening. To supplement the family income, she decided to work late until 23:30, feeling slightly fatigued during the process.

events.name: Tutoring the second son with his homework
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan supervised her second son, Ma Mingzhe, in completing his homework, patiently explaining the math problems he couldn't solve, while also keeping an eye on her young daughter playing nearby.

起始状态.心情: Focused, planning the day's schedule.

结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, with a slight sense of relief due to the extra income.

state.今日运动: The practice of Eight-Section Brocade takes approximately 20 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with some clouds, light breeze

2025-04.daily_overview: On the eve of Qingming Festival, while maintaining her morning exercise routine and carefully managing daily purchases, Ma Xiulan began preparing offerings for the tomb-sweeping the next day. She also discussed clothing purchase plans with her family, but due to anxiety over holiday arrangements, she went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: The practice of Baduanjin in the morning emphasizes the coordination of mental focus.
events.description: In the morning light, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin, her breathing becoming deeper and more prolonged as she attempted to focus her mind on the movements. After the practice, she felt clear-headed and well-prepared for the day's household chores.

events.name: Comparing vegetable prices with careful calculation
events.description: Before going to the market to buy groceries, Ma Xiulan took out her phone, opened the calculator function, and carefully calculated which purchasing method was more cost-effective based on the prices at Aunt Sun's stall, which she frequently visited, and the prices listed in the supermarket flyers. She then recorded the results in her phone's memo.

events.name: Communicating Clothing Procurement Plans with Family Members
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan shared the preliminary procurement list and budget ideas with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, and inquired about the children's preferences regarding clothing colors and styles. Her husband expressed support for the budget, and the children excitedly made some simple requests, ensuring that the procurement plan aligned with the family's actual needs and wishes.

events.name: Purchase Qingming Festival grave-sweeping offerings in advance.
events.description: Considering that tomorrow is Tomb-Sweeping Day, Ma Xiulan took some time in the afternoon to go to the market, purchasing offerings such as flowers, pastries, and fruits. She also returned home to prepare traditional sacrificial items like incense, candles, and joss paper, ensuring that the tomb-sweeping activities the following day would proceed smoothly.

events.name: Making Natural Insect Repellent
events.description: Following the method she had learned from a previous community lecture, Ma Xiulan crushed dried chili peppers and garlic, soaked them in water, and prepared a simple natural insect repellent for pest and disease prevention during the seedling stage in her vegetable garden.

events.name: Routine Call with Mother
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan, as usual, called her mother Li Xiuying, chatted about daily life, and confirmed the arrangement to have a meal at her parents' home after the tomb-sweeping the next day. Concerned about the details of the holiday, she stayed up a bit later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Serene, with the solemnity preceding a festival

结束状态.心情: Ready to go, looking forward to the family gathering but feeling slightly anxious.

state.今日运动: Eight-section Brocade practice for about 20 minutes

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slightly cool weather.
date_attribute.holiday: Qingming Festival

2025-04.daily_overview: On Tomb-Sweeping Day, Ma Xiulan and her family visited the graves to pay respects to their ancestors, followed by a warm family gathering at her parents' home. The traditional holiday activities strengthened family bonds, but the lavish meal led to a slight weight gain, and the festive atmosphere resulted in staying up late.

events.name: Morning Exercise of Baduanjin Adapts to the Cool Weather
events.description: The weather was slightly cool today, so Ma Xiulan put on a jacket and practiced in the courtyard. She noticed that her balance had improved in the "Shaking the Head and Wagging the Tail to Relieve Heart Fire" movement compared to before. After the practice, she felt her shoulders and neck relax, and it served as a warm-up for the day's outdoor activities.

events.name: Family Tomb Sweeping and Ancestor Worship
events.description: On the morning of Tomb-Sweeping Day, Ma Xiulan, along with her husband Ma Zhiqiang and their three children, visited the family cemetery located in the Jinghai District. They cleared fallen leaves and weeds around the tombstones of their grandparents, wiped the tombstones clean, and then respectfully arranged offerings such as fresh flowers, pastries, and fruits. They lit incense and candles, burned paper money, and led the children in bowing and observing a moment of silence to honor their ancestors, following the traditional ritual of paying respects.

events.name: Family holiday dinner at parents' home
events.description: After the tomb-sweeping, the whole family went to the home of Ma Xiulan's parents. Ma Xiulan, along with her mother Li Xiuying and younger sister Ma Xiufen, busied themselves in the kitchen preparing a sumptuous lunch, including homemade dishes such as noodles with gravy and sweet and sour pork tenderloin. At the dining table, the family chatted while eating, reminiscing about the small details of their ancestors' lives and sharing recent updates in a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Assistance with Packing and Returning Home
events.description: After the dinner gathering, Ma Xiulan helped clear the dishes and clean up. In the evening, the family bid farewell to their parents and younger sister, and returned to their own home with the children.

events.name: Tending the Garden and Observing Sprouting
events.description: Water the vegetable garden twice a day, in the morning and evening, to keep the soil moist. She observed carefully and noticed that some of the lettuce and leaf lettuce seeds had begun to sprout, which delighted her. She then showed this progress to her husband.

events.name: Staying up late watching TV due to the holiday.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan watched television programs with her family, immersing herself in the festive atmosphere and staying up a bit later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Solemn, with thoughts drifting far due to the festival

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, contented by family reunion.

state.今日运动: Approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice, light household chores.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the weekend, Ma Xiulan begins her day with morning exercises and household chores, handles family financial records, and prepares for upcoming clothing purchases. During her evening walk, she experiences initial anxiety over her eldest son's high school entrance examination, and while shopping, she encounters the concept of mobile payment for the first time.

events.name: Record last month's household expenses
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan created a new note in her phone's memo app, meticulously recording last month's household expenses, including utilities, her child's tuition and miscellaneous fees, and grocery purchases, in order to better plan this month's budget. This is her routine financial organization at the beginning of each month.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise on Weekends
events.description: Ma Xiulan still got up early to practice Baduanjin, her movements steady and her breathing even and prolonged. After finishing the practice, she felt a sense of tranquility in both body and mind, full of energy, and then began preparing breakfast for her family.

events.name: Clean and organize old clothes in preparation for the change of seasons.
events.description: Ma Xiulan washed and dried some old clothes that the children could still wear but were out of season. At the same time, she organized the wardrobe space to make room for the new clothes to be purchased soon and planned to dispose of the old clothes that were too small later.

events.name: Composting Kitchen Waste into Organic Fertilizer
events.description: Ma Xiulan placed the vegetable leaves, fruit peels, and other kitchen waste she had collected over the past few days into a dedicated composting bin. She added an appropriate amount of water, stirred the mixture evenly, and covered the bin to begin fermenting organic fertilizer, which will be used for fertilizing her future vegetable garden.

events.name: Evening stroll contemplating eldest child's high school entrance examination
events.description: During her evening walk alone, Ma Xiulan repeatedly pondered the issue of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan’s high school entrance exam preferences. She worried about whether her son’s grades would be sufficient to secure admission to his ideal high school and was also concerned about future education expenses. Her mind was filled with anxiety and pressure, her brow furrowed as she walked, and her steps felt heavier than usual.

events.name: First Encounter with Mobile Payment at the Grocery Market
events.description: While purchasing cucumbers at Aunt Sun's stall in the vegetable market, a brief awkwardness arose during the payment process due to Aunt Sun's lack of small change. Her accompanying daughter, Ma Yuxin, observed the situation and innocently mentioned, "Teachers all use mobile payments," which for the first time sparked Ma Xiulan's curiosity and reflection on mobile payment.

events.name: Briefly discussing daily trivialities with my husband
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan discussed today's expense records and their child's studies with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just returned home from work. Her husband comforted her, advising her not to worry too much.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, slightly eased by the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Slightly anxious, but comforted by family communication.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for about 20 minutes, and take a 30-minute walk in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Sunday, Ma Xiulan took advantage of the quiet early morning hours to practice Baduanjin, then went to the clothing market to complete the family's spring clothing shopping. She managed the budget carefully and did not exceed it. In the evening, upon learning that her mother was feeling unwell, she proactively took on the responsibility of caring for her. Due to worry, she went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: Weekend Additional Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: On a weekend morning, while the children were still asleep, Ma Xiulan practiced the entire Baduanjin routine twice in the quiet courtyard. She became more familiar with the transitions between the movements and felt her body fully stretched.

events.name: Go to the clothing wholesale market for procurement
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took the list and budget, and traveled by bus to a familiar clothing wholesale market in Jinghai District. She moved between various stalls, carefully comparing the fabric, workmanship, and prices of tracksuits, hoodies, trousers, and light jackets, and skillfully bargained with the stall owners. In the end, she purchased two sets of tracksuits for her eldest son, hoodies and trousers for her second son and youngest daughter, and a light jacket for her husband, with a total expenditure of 780 yuan, staying within the budget.

events.name: Handling Newly Purchased Clothing and Old Garments
events.description: After returning home with the purchases, Ma Xiulan immediately washed and dried the newly bought clothes. At the same time, she carefully sorted and cleaned the old clothes that her children had outgrown. Those still in decent condition and suitable for her younger daughter's size were set aside separately, ready to be passed down to her. The remaining old clothes that could no longer be worn were packed up and placed into the community's used clothing recycling bin.

events.name: Family members try on new clothes and share joy.
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took out the newly purchased clothes to show her husband and children, and asked them to try them on. The children were excited about the new clothes, and the husband also expressed satisfaction with the jacket. Ma Xiulan briefly explained the expenses and once again emphasized the importance of frugality in managing the household.

events.name: Upon learning that my mother needed physical therapy, I took the initiative to accompany her.
events.description: During her regular phone call with her mother, Li Xiuying, Ma Xiulan learned that her mother's back and leg pain had recently worsened, and she wanted to go to the community clinic for moxibustion therapy. Considering her mother's advanced age and her father's inability to accompany her, Ma Xiulan offered to accompany her mother to the clinic over the following week.

events.name: Plan the family schedule for next week.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan marked the days on the calendar when she needed to accompany her mother for physical therapy in the coming days. She also considered how to adjust her household chores and stayed up slightly later due to concerns about her mother's health.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, with a slight sense of busyness due to procurement tasks.

结束状态.心情: Enriched yet burdened with new concerns, worried about my mother's health.

state.今日运动: The practice of Baduanjin takes approximately 30 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: As the new week began, Ma Xiulan infused more vitality into her morning exercises, tended to the seedlings in her vegetable garden, and exchanged life experiences with her craft-making friends. Evening family conversations further strengthened her resolve to learn mobile payment, though she retired slightly earlier due to fatigue.

events.name: Morning Practice of Baduanjin Strengthens the Spirit
events.description: As the new week began, Ma Xiulan maintained her morning exercise routine. Today, she paid special attention to coordinating her gaze with the force of her punches during the "clenching fists and glaring to boost energy" movement, feeling a surge of vitality that set a positive tone for the busy week ahead.

events.name: Thinning Seedlings and Pest Control in Vegetable Gardens
events.description: The lettuce and leaf lettuce seedlings have grown true leaves. Ma Xiulan diluted the previously prepared chili and garlic solution and carefully sprayed it on the seedlings using a spray bottle. At the same time, she thinned out the overly dense seedlings by removing weaker plants to ensure the healthy growth of the crops.

events.name: Online Communication with Craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan chatted with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin on WeChat, mentioning her experience of going to the clothing market for shopping yesterday. She shared where to find cost-effective children's clothing and some tips on how to bargain effectively. The two also exchanged information about recent trends in the fabric market and new embroidery patterns.

events.name: The daughter brought up mobile payment again, sparking a family discussion.
events.description: After dinner, the daughter Ma Yuxin brought up mobile payment again and demonstrated it by imitating her teacher. Ma Xiulan discussed the matter with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who expressed support and willingness to help teach. Ma Xiulan initially decided to try learning it to address the inconvenience of daily payments.

events.name: Check the study progress of the eldest son.
events.description: Ma Xiulan inquired about her eldest son Ma Mingxuan's studies that day, reminding him that the midterm exams were approaching and he should focus on reviewing.

events.name: Rest early due to fatigue.
events.description: Having slept poorly the previous night due to concerns about her mother's health, Ma Xiulan felt somewhat fatigued and decided to go to bed earlier than usual to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Cheer up and welcome the new week.

结束状态.心情: Inspired, feeling both anticipation for learning new skills and slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for approximately 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: When her mother's chronic illness suddenly flared up, Ma Xiulan's daily routine was disrupted. She immediately returned to her parents' home and began accompanying her mother for medical treatment. At the same time, she started working on a new embroidery order at home, demonstrating her ability to manage multiple responsibilities under pressure. Due to her busy schedule, she stayed up late.

events.name: The movements of the Eight-Section Brocade morning exercise are becoming increasingly natural.
events.description: During practice, Ma Xiulan noticed that her breathing could now naturally follow the rise and fall of her movements, without needing deliberate thought. Her motions had also become smoother and more fluid, indicating that her morning exercise routine had become deeply integrated into her daily life.

events.name: Received an urgent call from mother and rushed to the scene immediately.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan received a phone call from her mother, Li Xiuying, at home, learning that her mother's chronic leg pain had worsened to the point where she could no longer walk on her own and needed assistance. Ma Xiulan comforted her mother over the phone and immediately decided to ride an electric bike back to her parents' home.

events.name: Taking mother to the hospital and listening to the diagnosis
events.description: Ma Xiulan hurried to her parents' home, carefully helped her mother onto the electric bike, and took her to the Jingwen Road Community Health Service Center. At the clinic, Dr. Wang diagnosed the condition as an acute flare-up of chronic arthritis and recommended a course of moxibustion therapy. Ma Xiulan listened attentively to the doctor's instructions and inquired about the necessary care precautions.

events.name: Accompanying mother for her first moxibustion therapy session and making an advance payment.
events.description: That afternoon, Ma Xiulan accompanied her mother for the first moxibustion therapy session. When it came time to pay, she saw her mother reaching for money and quickly stepped forward to pay the approximately 30 yuan therapy fee with her own cash. She then said to her mother, "I'll cover it this time."

events.name: Discuss follow-up care arrangements with father.
events.description: After returning home from the clinic, Ma Xiulan discussed with her father Ma Jianguo and decided that she would take primary responsibility for accompanying her mother to subsequent physical therapy sessions. She reviewed her family schedule, coordinated with her mother to arrange the moxibustion therapy sessions for the next week or so, and tentatively planned to visit the clinic every other day.

events.name: Confirm the embroidery order and commence conceptualization.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan communicated with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat to confirm the specific requirements for the custom embroidery order (mandarin duck pattern pillowcases). Based on the requirements, she began conceptualizing the design in her home study and took inventory of the necessary materials such as silk threads and fabrics, preparing to start the work.

起始状态.心情: Smooth

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet driven by a strong sense of responsibility, burdened with concern over the mother's illness.

state.今日运动: Baduanjin practice lasts approximately 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan added fun to her morning exercise by interacting with her daughter, found joy in the new sprouts emerging in the vegetable garden, accompanied her mother for the second physical therapy session as planned, and took time to purchase materials needed for embroidery. The day was balanced between family care and personal hobbies, though she went to bed slightly earlier due to fatigue.

events.name: Practicing the Eight-Section Brocade with My Daughter in the Morning
events.description: During today's practice, her younger daughter Yuxin curiously imitated her nearby. Ma Xiulan practiced while explaining the movements to her daughter in simple language, such as "spread your wings like a little bird." The mother-daughter interaction added fun and made the morning exercise more lively.

events.name: New Shoots Emerge in the Vegetable Garden and Are Shared with Neighbors
events.description: The seedlings of tomatoes and cucumbers have also begun to sprout one after another. Ma Xiulan watered all the vegetable seedlings and checked for any signs of pests or diseases. She also excitedly shared the joy of the sprouts emerging with her neighbor Wang Guilan, who had come to visit. Aunt Wang praised her for her excellent gardening skills.

events.name: Accompanying mother for her second moxibustion treatment.
events.description: As planned, Ma Xiulan once again rode her electric bike to her parents' home to pick up her mother and take her to the community clinic for the second moxibustion treatment. During the treatment, she stayed by her mother's side, chatting with her to help distract her, while carefully observing her mother's reactions to the therapy.

events.name: Purchase embroidery materials
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the fabric store and handicraft shop in town to purchase or replenish specific colored silk threads for embroidery, suitable pillowcase fabrics, embroidery hoops, and other tools, ensuring all materials were complete and ready for the formal embroidery work.

events.name: Preparing dinner while attending to children's homework
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ma Xiulan quickly prepared a simple dinner. Following the meal, she supervised her children as they completed their homework, paying particular attention to her eldest son Ma Mingxuan's review progress.

events.name: Rest early due to fatigue.
events.description: After two consecutive days of traveling to care for her mother, Ma Xiulan felt physically exhausted and decided to go to bed early to regain her strength.

起始状态.心情: Gentle and joyful with the company of his daughter.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, holding hope for mother's recovery.

state.今日运动: The practice of Baduanjin takes approximately 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan proactively focuses on her eldest son's studies, finds morning exercise enjoyable, binds mobile payment with her husband's assistance, decides to participate in the community handicraft exhibition, helps her neighbor repair a sewing machine to strengthen neighborhood bonds, continues accompanying her mother for medical treatment, experiences back discomfort for the first time, and finds her day fulfilling and multidimensional.

events.name: Focus on the eldest child's midterm exam and contact the teacher.
events.description: In the parent WeChat group of her eldest son's class, Ma Xiulan saw the midterm exam schedule notice posted by Teacher Han. She proactively sent a private message to Teacher Han to inquire about her son's recent classroom performance and key review areas, demonstrating her emphasis on academic performance.

events.name: Morning Practice of Baduanjin Becomes a Pleasure
events.description: Ma Xiulan feels that morning exercise has become a pleasure. After completing her full routine today, she did some extra stretches and felt her body was very relaxed, remaining energetic throughout the day.

events.name: Bound mobile payment with the help of her husband.
events.description: After work, Ma Zhiqiang took out his mobile phone to demonstrate and assisted Ma Xiulan in binding a family savings card to her WeChat account. He provided a detailed explanation of security precautions and set up a payment password, while Ma Xiulan carefully noted down each step.

events.name: Decided to participate in the community craft exhibition and selected the works.
events.description: Encouraged by her craftswoman friend Zhou Xiuqin, Ma Xiulan decided to participate in the community handicraft exhibition. She looked through her previous embroidery works at home and finally selected a circular embroidery piece depicting the scenery of the Jinghai Canal as her entry. She then began to contemplate how to refine its details.

events.name: Help neighbor Wang Guilan repair the sewing machine
events.description: In the morning, Aunt Wang Guilan, a neighbor, brought an old sewing machine to seek help. Ma Xiulan called her husband to ask him to come home at noon to assist. After getting off work, Ma Zhiqiang examined and repaired the sewing machine. During this time, Ma Xiulan chatted with Aunt Wang, exchanging everyday conversations. While helping to move the sewing machine, Ma Xiulan felt a slight ache in her lower back.

events.name: Preparing to trace the pattern for embroidery.
events.description: Ma Xiulan arranged the needles, thread, embroidery hoops, and fabric needed for embroidery in the living room. She carefully checked the traditional mandarin duck pattern shared by Zhou Xiuqin and meticulously traced the outline of the design onto the pillowcase fabric using a water-soluble pen.

events.name: Accompanied mother for her third therapy session and paid the fees.
events.description: Following the physiotherapy plan, Ma Xiulan once again accompanied her mother to the clinic. With the experience from the previous two visits, this time she went directly to the billing department and paid approximately 30 yuan. Although her mother, Li Xiuying, felt a bit embarrassed, she was deeply touched in her heart.

起始状态.心情: Positive, motivated by learning new things

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and gratified, content from helping others and family progress, yet with slight discomfort in the lower back.

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan prepared refreshments in advance for tomorrow's gathering with friends, meticulously tended to her vegetable garden, practiced mobile payment operations under her daughter's guidance, received a gift of thanks from a neighbor, and officially began embroidering a custom order, but retired slightly early due to discomfort in her lower back.

events.name: Preparing tea snack ingredients for entertaining childhood friends
events.description: To entertain her childhood friend Liu Chunmei the next day, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market and supermarket a day in advance. She purchased high-quality jasmine tea and ingredients such as mung beans and sugar for making mung bean cakes, ensuring the snacks would be fresh and delicious.

events.name: Weeding and Pest Control Maintenance in Vegetable Gardens
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan arrived at the courtyard vegetable garden, carefully inspecting the growth of the leaf lettuce and lettuce, and manually removing the weeds between the vegetable beds. She meticulously sprayed all the seedlings with freshly prepared chili and garlic water to prevent and control pests such as aphids.

events.name: Daughter teaches mobile payment operation.
events.description: After school, Ma Yuxin excitedly took on the role of a little teacher, patiently guiding her mother on how to find and open the WeChat payment code. Sitting together on the sofa, the mother and daughter practiced repeatedly. Gradually, Ma Xiulan memorized the steps, though she was still a bit unfamiliar with the process.

events.name: Received a thank-you gift from neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: To express gratitude for the help from Ma Xiulan's family, Aunt Wang Guilan specially brought a jar of pickled sweet garlic she had made to Ma Xiulan's home as a token of appreciation. Ma Xiulan politely accepted the gift and reciprocated with some homegrown scallions.

events.name: Commence embroidering the custom order mandarin duck outline
events.description: After her children went to school, Ma Xiulan took advantage of the quiet morning hours to begin her embroidery. Using dark-colored silk threads and employing basic stitching techniques such as even stitching and layered stitching, she first outlined the main bodies and heads of two mandarin ducks, ensuring accurate shapes and smooth lines.

events.name: Confirming the next day's physical therapy arrangements with mother over the phone.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan called her mother to confirm the time for accompanying her to physical therapy the next day and inquired about how her mother was feeling physically that day.

events.name: Rest early due to back discomfort.
events.description: Due to several consecutive days of fatigue, Ma Xiulan experienced increased soreness in her lower back and decided to go to bed early to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Joyful, in anticipation of a gathering with good friends.

结束状态.心情: A strong sense of achievement due to smooth progress on multiple tasks, though with slight physical discomfort.

state.今日运动: Approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice, light gardening work

2025-04.daily_overview: On Saturday, Ma Xiulan enjoyed a pleasant afternoon tea and handicraft gathering with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, gaining emotional support while preparing for the family activities on Sunday. She continued to make progress on her embroidery work, and due to the relaxing nature of the gathering, she went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: Making Traditional Mung Bean Cake
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan carefully prepared mung bean cakes in her home kitchen using the traditional method passed down by her mother, ensuring the pastries were fresh and delicious for entertaining friends in the afternoon.

events.name: Setting up the living room for a party
events.description: Before the afternoon gathering, Ma Xiulan cleaned the living room, washed the tea set, and prepared embroidery hoops and needles, creating a comfortable and cozy environment for the gathering.

events.name: Tea and Handicraft Exchange with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: In the afternoon, Liu Chunmei arrived as scheduled. The two sat in the sunlit living room, sipping jasmine tea and savoring mung bean cakes, while taking out embroidery hoops to exchange techniques on the new gold-thread embroidery method. They also shared updates and concerns from their lives. Ma Xiulan confided about the pressures of caring for her mother and worrying about the high school entrance exams, finding valuable emotional solace from this long-time close friend.

events.name: Cleaning up after the party
events.description: After the gathering, Ma Xiulan saw Liu Chunmei out, then returned to the living room to tidy up the tea set and snack plates, and put away the embroidery work and tools.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients for making dumplings for the whole family.
events.description: Considering that her husband had Sunday off, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market in the evening to purchase fresh pork, Chinese cabbage, flour, and other necessary ingredients. While there, she chatted with Aunt Sun, a familiar vendor, about daily life and learned some local news.

events.name: Continue embroidering to add color to the mandarin ducks.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan continued her embroidery, beginning to fill in the colors for the mandarin ducks. Following traditional color schemes, she selected emerald green, sapphire blue, and orange-red silk threads. Using the technique of layered gradient coloring, she embroidered the vibrant and richly textured feathers on the mandarin ducks.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, for a friend's arrival is imminent.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and at ease, with stress alleviated through heartfelt conversations with friends.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for about 20 minutes

2025-04.daily_overview: On Sunday, Family Day, Ma Xiulan successfully tried mobile payment for the first time, made dumplings with her family to enjoy quality time together, and completed the background embroidery of her needlework. Technology integration and family traditions coexisted harmoniously on this day, though she stayed up slightly later due to discussions about her child's academic performance.

events.name: First Successful Use of Mobile Payment
events.description: When visiting the vegetable market in the morning, Ma Xiulan mustered up her courage and returned to Aunt Sun’s stall. Encouraged by her husband over the phone, she attempted to scan Aunt Sun’s payment QR code, completing her first mobile payment for vegetables. Although nervous, she succeeded, feeling as though she had taken a significant step forward.

events.name: Preparing ingredients for making dumplings
events.description: On Sunday morning, Ma Xiulan prepared the dough for dumplings in advance in the kitchen and meticulously mixed the pork and cabbage filling, ensuring the seasoning was perfectly balanced.

events.name: The whole family works together to make dumplings.
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family gathered around the dining table to start making dumplings. Ma Zhiqiang was responsible for rolling out the dumpling wrappers, while Ma Mingxuan and Ma Mingzhe learned how to wrap dumplings under their mother's guidance. Ma Yuxin happily played with a piece of dough nearby. As they worked, everyone chatted and shared their recent experiences and amusing stories.

events.name: Share a Handmade Dinner
events.description: The wrapped dumplings were boiled in the pot, and the family enjoyed a dinner made by their own hands. Everyone savored the dumplings, which varied in shape but were all delicious, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Cleaning Up After Meals and Communication Between Spouses
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan and her husband cleaned up the dishes and tidied the kitchen together. The children played in the living room. While working, the couple continued chatting, discussing the family arrangements for the following week and the children's studies, particularly the senior high school application preferences of their eldest son, who would be going to bed slightly later.

events.name: Complete the Background of the Embroidery Work
events.description: After completing the main part of the mandarin ducks, Ma Xiulan began to embroider the background. Using light blue and light green silk threads, she stitched layers of rippling water. Beside the mandarin ducks, she embroidered pink lotus flowers and emerald green lotus leaves, making the entire scene more vivid and full, rich with traditional auspicious symbolism.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, leisurely because it's Sunday.

结束状态.心情: Happiness and contentment, rejoicing in family reunions and personal breakthroughs.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for about 20 minutes, followed by light housework.

2025-04.daily_overview: While tending to the vegetable garden and engaging in embroidery exchanges, Ma Xiulan advanced her personal affairs and continued to accompany her mother for physical therapy. Signs of physical fatigue were evident, but fortunately, she received care from her husband. At the same time, she occasionally secured part-time opportunities in the community, bringing new possibilities for the family's finances. She stayed up slightly late due to contemplating the future.

events.name: Vegetable Garden Inspection and Watering
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan inspected the vegetable garden and found that the leaves of the lettuce were already thick, tender, and fresh, and the romaine lettuce was also thriving. She watered all the seedlings and began planning to harvest some for household use in the near future.

events.name: Exchanging embroidery techniques with fellow craftspeople
events.description: During the afternoon embroidery break, Ma Xiulan sent several photos of the completed sections to her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via mobile phone and discussed the color transition issues encountered while embroidering water ripples through WeChat voice messages. Zhou Xiuqin shared some of her own experiences.

events.name: Accompanied mother to her third physical therapy session this week and paid the fees.
events.description: This was the third physical therapy session within the week. Just like the previous two times, Ma Xiulan naturally paid around 30 yuan. Her mother’s body aches had eased, and her mood had improved significantly.

events.name: Signs of physical fatigue are evident.
events.description: After finishing a day of caregiving and riding her electric bike home, Ma Xiulan felt obvious stiffness and soreness in her lower back, particularly in the lumbar region. This was the first time she clearly realized that her body was sending a strong signal of excessive fatigue.

events.name: Complain about physical discomfort to one's husband
events.description: In the evening, while washing up, Ma Xiulan mentioned to her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just returned home from work, that she was experiencing soreness in her waist and back, her tone carrying weariness and a hint of concern.

events.name: The husband helps with the massage and gives reminders.
events.description: Upon hearing this, Ma Zhiqiang asked Ma Xiulan to lie on the bed. With a somewhat unprofessional yet attentive technique, he massaged her back and waist, reminding her to pay attention to her posture and not exhaust herself while taking care of her mother.

events.name: Encountered a community grid worker and obtained part-time job information.
events.description: While buying groceries at the Xingwang Vegetable Market in Jinghai District, Ma Xiulan happened to meet Zheng Xiuying, a community grid worker. The two chatted casually by the stalls, and Zheng Xiuying mentioned that the community service center recently had temporary job opportunities for organizing archives and distributing promotional materials.

events.name: Inquire in detail about gig opportunities and leave contact information.
events.description: Ma Xiulan showed keen interest in the part-time job opportunity mentioned by Zheng Xiuying, inquiring in detail about the specific job duties, daily working hours, and compensation standards. Zheng Xiuying answered each question and informed her that the work schedule was flexible. Ma Xiulan left her mobile phone number, and Zheng Xiuying promised to notify her once there was any news.

events.name: Discussing part-time job arrangements with my husband
events.description: After dinner that day, Ma Xiulan told her husband Ma Zhiqiang about her chance encounter with Zheng Xiuying and the part-time job opportunity she had received. Together, they discussed how to arrange the work schedule, coordinate household chores and picking up the children, and both agreed that it was a good opportunity to supplement the family income.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary Mind

结束状态.心情: Tired yet hopeful, slightly uplifted by gig opportunities.
