2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan proactively responded to external pressures by browsing gig information. When facing anxiety over her eldest child's high school entrance exam preferences, she actively collaborated with teachers and sisters to build a support network. Simultaneously, she advanced preparations for a handicraft exhibition and, while caring for her mother in her final days, reflected on her own health. Her day was spent seeking help from multiple sources and making plans, with her state of being entirely consistent with the conclusion of her health condition.

events.name: Morning Exercise of Baduanjin
events.description: Ma Xiulan adheres to a daily morning exercise routine, practicing Baduanjin in the courtyard with fluid movements and coordinated breathing. The habit of her husband and second son joining her on weekends has gradually solidified, and her daughter also enjoys imitating the movements, making it a part of their family activities.

events.name: Browse the information in the community part-time job WeChat groups.
events.description: Ma Xiulan opened the community part-time job WeChat group that Zheng Xiuying had invited her into, browsed the latest information on manual work or seasonal short-term jobs posted in the group, and noted down the contact details for a sewing task suitable for her, considering reaching out later.

events.name: Receiving the draft form of my eldest child's high school entrance exam preferences triggered anxiety.
events.description: Ma Xiulan received the draft form for filling out high school entrance examination preferences from her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan. Faced with the dense list of schools and complex admission score lines on the form, she felt overwhelmed, experiencing significant information pressure and decision-making anxiety.

events.name: Consulting Class Teacher Ms. Han for Advice on Volunteer Applications
events.description: In the evening, after finishing her household chores, Ma Xiulan contacted Han Mei, the homeroom teacher of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan, via WeChat. She inquired in detail about the characteristics of different high schools, their college admission rates, management styles, and recommendations for schools that would suit her child's personality. Teacher Han patiently provided answers and guidance.

events.name: Seeking advice from Sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing
events.description: Considering that her sister in Beijing had broader experience, Ma Xiulan called her to express her own anxieties and seek advice on school selection, future development trends, and how to balance children's interests with academic pressure.

events.name: Learn about the reputation from local sister Ma Xiufen.
events.description: To understand the actual situation and reputation of local schools, Ma Xiulan called her sister Ma Xiufen, who works in the Binhai New Area, to inquire about the information she had on local high schools and the experiences of her friends' children attending these schools, in order to obtain more down-to-earth references.

events.name: Discuss preliminary directions for volunteer work with husband
events.description: After gathering information from various sources, Ma Xiulan communicated with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just returned home from work. She shared the suggestions from the teacher, her elder sister, and younger sister, as well as her preliminary thoughts, with him. Together, they discussed the initial direction and alternative schools for their eldest son’s college application.

events.name: Evening walks help regulate emotions.
events.description: Ma Xiulan insists on taking a walk for about 30 minutes every evening along a route near her community. This is not only a time for relaxation and exercise but also an important opportunity to process the day's emotions and socialize with neighbors. Recently, due to the busy schedule of caring for her mother, she sometimes feels fatigued, but she uses these walks to relieve stress.

events.name: Pay for mother's last physiotherapy session this week and purchase medication.
events.description: Accompanied my mother for her last physical therapy session of the week and paid approximately 30 yuan for the therapy. After the session, Dr. Wang suggested using some external ointments as a complementary treatment. Ma Xiulan proactively covered the cost of about 60 yuan to purchase the ointments. By this point, the total amount advanced within the week amounted to approximately 180 yuan.

events.name: Reflect on Personal Health and Adjust the Pace of Care
events.description: After a night's rest, the soreness in her back and waist had slightly eased. However, while continuing to care for her mother, Ma Xiulan began to seriously consider her husband's words. She realized that as the pillar of the family, her own health was equally important. She started planning to pay more attention to her working methods in the future and possibly adjust the pace of her caregiving.

events.name: Received Notice of Community Temporary Job Assignment
events.description: Ma Xiulan received a phone call from Zheng Xiuying, informing her that the part-time position at the community service center had been confirmed. She was required to work every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday morning starting from next week. The time and location for her first check-in were also arranged. Ma Xiulan gladly accepted the offer.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly stressed and anxious due to concerns about volunteer applications.

结束状态.心情: Though weary, my thoughts are gradually clearing; I feel reassured by the support from various quarters and look forward to new job opportunities.

state.今日运动: Approximately 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, followed by 30 minutes of evening walking.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, light breeze, the weather is turning warmer.

2025-04.daily_overview: Today, while maintaining her healthy habits, Ma Xiulan handled household chores and handicraft work. Morning exercise and walking helped alleviate her back and waist discomfort.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: At 6:10 in the morning, I practiced Baduanjin in the courtyard for 20 minutes. The movements were smooth, but there was still a slight stiffness in the lower back. I maintained deep breathing to relieve stress.

events.name: Complete and inspect the embroidered pillowcase.
events.description: In the afternoon, while the children were all at school, Ma Xiulan completed the final stitches on the second mandarin duck pillowcase by the window in the living room. She carefully examined both pillowcases, comparing the symmetry of the patterns and the consistency of the colors, then turned them over to ensure all loose threads were neatly trimmed. This pair of pillowcases was the first complete order she and Zhou Xiuqin had collaborated on. Looking at the paired mandarin ducks, she felt both satisfaction and a sense of accomplishment. She carefully folded and placed them together.

events.name: Register for the Community Parent Exchange Meeting
events.description: While helping her child with homework in the evening, Ma Xiulan saw a notice posted by her eldest son’s homeroom teacher, Mr. Han, in the parents’ WeChat group: the community would hold a parent exchange meeting on Saturday about academic pressure and family communication for adolescents. Thinking of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan’s recent tense study state, she almost immediately decided to attend. She opened Mr. Han’s WeChat and carefully typed a message using the pinyin input method she had recently learned: "Hello, Mr. Han, I am Ma Mingxuan’s mother. I would like to sign up for Saturday’s exchange meeting. Thank you." She soon received a positive reply from Mr. Han, which made her look forward to the upcoming event.

events.name: An Evening Walk to Regulate Emotions
events.description: After dinner, I took a 30-minute walk alone on Jingwen Road to breathe fresh air, relieve the fatigue of the day, and ease the discomfort in my waist and back. During the walk, I briefly chatted with my neighbor Wang Guilan.

events.name: Daily Financial Communication with Husband
events.description: After tidying up the kitchen after dinner, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang sat on the sofa watching TV. During the commercial break, she brought up casually, "This month's expenses have been a bit high. I covered some of Mom's medication costs and bought the children's seasonal clothes." She didn’t specify how much her mother’s physical therapy had cost, not wanting her husband to worry. Ma Zhiqiang took a sip of water and nodded, "Spend what needs to be spent. You’re the one managing the household—just handle it as you see fit." His understanding put her mind at ease, a testament to the tacit understanding they had developed over the years.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the usual mindset of starting a new day's household chores, and a slight discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and slightly expectant, having completed a craft project and taken a small step forward in the child's education, relaxing after exercise.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, 30 minutes of evening walks, and approximately 2 hours of daily household chores (cleaning, cooking).

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan begins her day with the joy of harvesting in the vegetable garden, but discomfort in her back and waist leads to a midday rest. Nevertheless, she persists in staying busy for family goals and handicraft activities.

events.name: Harvesting the first batch of leaf lettuce in the early morning
events.description: As dawn was just breaking, Ma Xiulan carried a small bamboo basket to the little vegetable garden in the corner of the courtyard. After lying dormant through the winter and receiving care in the spring, the leaf lettuce was thriving, its leaves a lush green. Carefully, she used scissors to cut the outermost, fully grown leaves close to the roots, leaving the heart of the plant to continue growing. The basket was soon lined with a layer of leaves. Looking at this harvest she had grown with her own hands, a satisfied smile spread across her face—this was the most immediate joy brought by the long-term goal of tending her small garden.

events.name: Midday Nap Alleviates Lower Back Discomfort
events.description: In the afternoon, I felt increased soreness in my lower back and waist, so I lay on the sofa to rest for 15 minutes and applied a hot towel to the area. I felt slightly better afterward, but decided to skip the evening walk today to avoid further strain.

events.name: Prepare materials for community exhibition embroidery
events.description: After seeing her child off to school in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan tucked away the spare change she had saved up and took a bus to an old fabric market in Jinghai District. She stopped in front of a familiar stall, carefully feeling the texture of several types of white cotton cloth with her hands, and finally selected the one with the finest touch. Then, following the color scheme she had envisioned for the "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" pattern, she gathered gold, red, and several shades of green threads from the neighboring embroidery thread stall. She haggled with the vendor and even managed to get an extra small spool of gold thread, "just in case it runs out or breaks during the embroidery."

events.name: Transferring patterns for new embroidery pieces
events.description: After buying the materials, Ma Xiulan took advantage of the quiet at home and spread the newly purchased cotton cloth on the large square table in the living room. She took out a piece of carbon paper with the pattern "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity," which she had traced earlier from Zhou Xiuqin, carefully aligned it to the center of the cloth, and slowly transferred the pattern and text onto the fabric using a pencil. Once the tracing was complete, she held it up to the light to examine it, then used a ruler to measure and ensure the text was centered and the lines were clear. Satisfied, she carefully put it away, ready to start working on it that evening.

events.name: Discuss with the husband about renovating the study space.
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan turned down the volume of the TV and said to her husband, who was watching the news, "Zhiqiang, I'd like to discuss something with you. Mingxuan is about to take the high school entrance exam, but he's always getting distracted by his younger siblings in the room. I was thinking we could clean out that small storage room and turn it into a separate study space for him. What do you think?" Ma Zhiqiang thought for a moment. The small storage room was indeed cluttered with a lot of unused items. "That could work, but we'll need to organize it properly. I have some free time this weekend—we can clear it out together." Hearing her husband's support, Ma Xiulan felt reassured and began planning how to arrange the room.

events.name: Preparing Questions for the Parent-Teacher Conference
events.description: After checking her children's homework in the evening, Ma Xiulan sat at the table and took out an old notebook. She thought for a moment and wrote down a few lines: "Mingxuan is under a lot of academic pressure and doesn’t like to talk—what should I do?" and "How can I manage my child’s constant desire to play with their phone?" These were issues she had observed in daily life but didn’t know how to handle. She hoped to hear the perspectives of other parents and teachers at the upcoming Saturday discussion session.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to harvesting the vegetables in the garden, yet feeling slightly concerned about the discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Amidst the busy schedule, discomfort in the lower back brings a sense of fatigue, and the steadiness of advancing plans is mingled with physical unease.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade exercises, followed by approximately 2.5 hours of daily household chores, including vegetable garden harvesting and cleaning.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a gentle spring breeze.

2025-04.daily_overview: The routine shopping day was unexpectedly brightened by a prize win, adding a pleasant surprise. Ma Xiulan shared the joy with her neighbors, though her back discomfort had only slightly eased, and she continued to avoid strenuous activities.

events.name: Routine shopping trip to the neighborhood supermarket.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan, carrying an eco-friendly cloth bag, walked as usual to the small supermarket run by Zhang Shufen diagonally across the street. Familiar with the place, she picked up soy sauce, vinegar, a packet of salt, and selected a few vegetables that her husband and child enjoy eating. Inside the supermarket, she ran into two familiar neighbors, and they exchanged nods in greeting. Zhang Shufen, standing behind the counter, smiled and asked, "Sister Xiulan, you're buying quite a lot today—just enough to qualify for the lucky draw." Only then did Ma Xiulan notice the red paper posted at the entrance that read, "Spend 58 yuan or more for a chance to win a prize."

events.name: Participated in a raffle and unexpectedly won a prize.
events.description: When checking out, the total amount just crossed the threshold for a lottery draw. Encouraged by Zhang Shufen and an elderly woman nearby, Ma Xiulan somewhat shyly drew a lottery ticket from the prize box. She carefully scratched off the coating with her fingernail. [Th... third prize?] She couldn’t quite believe it and handed the ticket to Zhang Shufen. Zhang Shufen took a look and immediately smiled: [Oh my! It really is the third prize! Sister Xiulan, you’re so lucky!] Several nearby customers also gathered to see what was happening, offering their congratulations one after another.

events.name: Claim Your Prize - Branded Kitchen Knives
events.description: Zhang Shufen took a neatly packaged kitchen knife set from the prize area behind the shelf; it looked quite high-end. She handed it to Ma Xiulan: "Here, a genuine set of good knives—they cut vegetables especially fast." Ma Xiulan accepted it with pleasant surprise; it felt heavy in her hands, and she thanked Zhang repeatedly. In her mind, she thought: the old kitchen knife at home had long been dull, and she had been reluctant to replace it all this time—this solved a major problem.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Winning the Lottery with Neighbors
events.description: Carrying her purchases and the newly acquired kitchen knife on her way home, she happened to run into Aunt Wang Guilan from across the street, who was basking in the sun at her doorstep. Seeing Ma Xiulan holding a large box, Aunt Wang curiously inquired. Ma Xiulan happily shared the news about winning the prize. Wang Guilan was delighted as well: "How wonderful, how wonderful! This is truly a good omen! Make something delicious with the new knife tonight!" The two chatted and laughed for a while under the spring sunlight before heading back to their respective homes.

events.name: Try out the new cutting tool and share the joy.
events.description: Upon returning home, Ma Xiulan eagerly unwrapped the package. The new knife gleamed coldly and felt perfectly balanced in her hand. Before dinner, she used it to slice potatoes into fine shreds, and indeed, it was both fast and precise, with an incredibly smooth feel—far superior to the old knife. During the meal, she made a point of showing the new knife to her family, vividly recounting the process of winning it in the lottery. The children found it amusing, and her husband Ma Zhiqiang smiled and said, "It seems you had good luck today." The dinner was exceptionally pleasant.

events.name: A Light Evening Stroll
events.description: After dinner, my back felt slightly better, so I took a 15-minute slow walk on Jingwen Road near my home, avoiding long-distance travel, and had a brief chat with my neighbor Zhang Shufen.

起始状态.心情: With a calm mind, preparing for the weekly routine shopping, the discomfort in the lower back has slightly eased.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and content, small unexpected delights add brightness to life, and the body feels better.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the supermarket and performing daily household chores take approximately 1.5 hours, with an additional 15-minute light evening walk.

2025-04.daily_overview: Weekend family interactions increased, with morning exercise seeing full family participation for the first time. The parent exchange meeting brought new social connections, but late nights were spent pondering issues related to the child.

events.name: Family Morning Exercise: Eight-Section Brocade
events.description: Early in the morning, Ma Xiulan practiced the Eight-Section Brocade in the yard as usual. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, was not in a hurry to leave today. After watching for a while, he began to mimic the movements. Their second son, Mingzhe, found it amusing and joined in, though his gestures were somewhat clumsy. Their youngest daughter, Yuxin, imitated them from the side, making everyone laugh. Ma Xiulan slowed down her pace and patiently taught her husband and son the basic movements of "Lifting the Sky with Both Hands" and "Drawing the Bow to Both Sides." The yard was filled with rare laughter and joy, as the morning exercise became a family activity for the first time.

events.name: Continue harvesting lettuce from the vegetable garden
events.description: After her morning exercise, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable garden again, pulling out several plump, round heads of lettuce and shaking off the soil from their roots. The tender green leaves were fresh and crisp. She planned to make a cold lettuce salad for lunch, letting her family enjoy the freshness once more.

events.name: Attend the Community Parents Exchange Meeting
events.description: At nine o'clock in the morning, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at the community activity room. Many parents were already seated inside, and Teacher Han was also present. After the exchange meeting began, she listened attentively as other parents shared issues such as their children's rebelliousness and addiction to mobile phones, empathizing deeply with their experiences. When it was her turn to speak during the discussion, she mustered her courage and raised the questions she had noted in her notebook. As she spoke about her eldest son's immense pressure and reluctance to communicate, her tone was filled with concern. Her remarks resonated with many of the parents present.

events.name: Meeting New Friend Sister Chen
events.description: During a break at the exchange meeting, Ms. Chen, who lives in the neighboring community and also has a son in the second year of junior high school, took the initiative to chat with Ma Xiulan. They talked about their children's studies and homeroom teachers, discovering that many of their worries were the same, which instantly brought them closer. They exchanged WeChat contacts, and Ms. Chen said, "Let's keep each other updated on things in the future." Ma Xiulan felt she had found a new companion who could understand her.

events.name: Share the Gains from Exchange Meetings with Family
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan shared with her husband and eldest son Mingxuan the parenting tips she had heard from other parents at the exchange session, such as setting limits on phone usage and listening more while criticizing less. Speaking gently to Mingxuan, she said, "After hearing from other parents today, I understand that you’re under a lot of pressure. In the future, if anything’s bothering you, don’t keep it to yourself—talk to me about it." Mingxuan responded with a quiet "Mm," and though he didn’t say much, his attitude seemed to soften a little.

events.name: Evening Walk with Neighbors
events.description: After dinner, I took a 30-minute walk with my neighbor Wang Guilan in the community park, exchanging parenting experiences. The discomfort in my lower back has largely subsided.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, as it is the weekend and looking forward to the morning exchange meeting, feeling physically well.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and inspired, family activities bring warmth, exchange sessions broaden horizons, but contemplating children's issues leads to slightly later bedtimes.

state.今日运动: Approximately 20 minutes of morning exercise with Baduanjin, about 2 hours of daily household chores and walking for community activities, and 30 minutes of evening walk.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, light breeze

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday Harvest Day brought dual satisfaction from garden produce and handmade crafts income. A family gathering led to a slight weight gain, but an early bedtime helped restore energy.

events.name: Make lunch with homegrown vegetables
events.description: At lunchtime, Ma Xiulan stir-fried a dish of leaf lettuce and washed some romaine lettuce to eat directly with dipping sauce. As she set the table, she said, "These were just picked from our yard, at their freshest." Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, nodded while eating, "Homegrown vegetables always taste the best." The children also ate heartily. Looking at the empty plates, Ma Xiulan felt a sense of satisfaction, thinking that her little vegetable garden was truly a treasure.

events.name: Deliver the embroidery and settle the labor fee
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan carefully wrapped the pair of mandarin duck pillowcases in a clean cloth and went to the community park. Zhou Xiuqin was already waiting there. Zhou Xiuqin took the pillowcases and examined the embroidery and finished product closely, praising them profusely: "Sister Xiulan, your craftsmanship is truly impeccable. The client will surely be satisfied." After saying this, she immediately transferred the 300-yuan labor fee to Ma Xiulan via WeChat. Hearing the notification sound of the payment arriving on her phone, Ma Xiulan felt a weight lifted from her heart. Although the income was modest, it was a genuine affirmation of her craftsmanship.

events.name: Family Dinner Celebration
events.description: In the evening, to celebrate her income from handicrafts, Ma Xiulan prepared two extra dishes, including sweet and sour pork tenderloin. The whole family gathered for dinner, with the children particularly delighted and her husband praising her culinary skills.

events.name: Deposit manual income into the family account.
events.description: Upon returning home, Ma Xiulan took out the family's bankbook and recorded the 300 yuan in the household expenses account. During dinner, she casually mentioned to her husband and children, "I handed over the embroidered pillowcases to Sister Zhou today and received 300 yuan for them." Her husband nodded and said, "That's good. Your skills can also help support the family." The children didn't fully understand the significance of money, but seeing their mother happy, they too felt joyful.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and pleasant, no need to rush on Sunday, and looking forward to meeting with fellow craft enthusiasts.

结束状态.心情: Content and at ease, the fruits of labor are transformed into household income, bringing a dual sense of achievement, and feeling slightly full after the meal.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores and walking to the community park for approximately 1.5 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-04.daily_overview: A new week begins, with adjustments made to the morning exercise routine to help family members stay consistent. The learning space renovation plan has been launched, and intense cleaning has led to a slight decrease in weight.

events.name: Adjusting Family Morning Exercise Routines
events.description: In the morning, considering her husband's work fatigue and her child's limited patience, Ma Xiulan simplified the practice of the Eight-Section Brocade exercises. She selected only a few movements she found most stretching and essential, such as "Lifting the Sky with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Swaying the Head and Wagging the Tail to Eliminate Heart Fire," guiding her husband and younger son through them slowly, with a focus on deep breathing and stretching. She also shortened the practice time to about fifteen minutes. With these adjustments, Ma Zhiqiang felt much more at ease, and Mingzhe was able to follow along more attentively, making the morning exercise atmosphere even better.

events.name: Organize the storage room to free up space.
events.description: After seeing their children off during the day, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang began tidying up the small storage room. It was filled with old cardboard boxes, unused farming tools, and toys from their children's early years. They moved the items out one by one, sorting them under Ma Xiulan's direction: usable items were relocated to the attic, completely useless ones were set aside to be sold as scrap, and some were temporarily placed in a corner of the living room. After a morning of hard work, the small room was finally cleared out. Though it appeared empty and covered in dust, space had been created.

events.name: Thoroughly clean the storage room.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan put on a mask and a hat, took a broom and a rag, and entered the emptied small room. She first swept away the cobwebs in the corners and on the ceiling, then repeatedly cleaned the accumulated dust on the floor, and finally wiped the walls with a damp cloth. After the cleaning, although some old stains remained on the walls, the entire room looked much cleaner and brighter, laying a foundation for the subsequent renovation.

events.name: An evening walk alleviates fatigue.
events.description: After dinner, I took a 40-minute walk alone along the riverside trail. Feeling fatigued from cleaning work, the walk helped relax my body.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, the new week begins with plans to handle home renovation matters.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet with a strong sense of accomplishment, having made significant progress toward family goals, feeling relaxed after exercise.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, approximately 3 hours of high-intensity cleaning and organizing labor, and a 40-minute evening walk.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: The financial inventory revealed overspending. I discussed budget adjustments with my husband. Emotions fluctuated due to stress, and weight slightly decreased from excessive worry.

events.name: Monthly Household Financial Review
events.description: After the children went to bed in the evening, Ma Xiulan spread out the household account book and passbook on the table in the living room. Under the lamplight, she carefully reviewed the expenses for April: daily groceries like vegetables, rice, oil, and salt, the therapy fees she had covered for her mother, new seasonal clothes for the three children… Adding it all up, she found that the daily expenses for the month had exceeded the budget. What worried her even more was that the planned monthly deposit into her eldest son’s education fund had become somewhat tight due to these additional expenditures.

events.name: Communicating Budget Issues with Husband
events.description: When her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned from work, Ma Xiulan pushed the account book in front of him and softly explained the situation: "This month, some money was spent on Mom’s medical treatment, and we couldn’t avoid buying clothes for the child, so the expenses were higher. We might need to think of a way for Mingxuan’s education savings." Ma Zhiqiang glanced at the numbers, his brow furrowing slightly, but it soon relaxed: "It’s fine. Money should be spent where it’s needed. Next month, I’ll take on a couple more driving shifts. See where we can cut back a bit, and we’ll make up the savings we need."

events.name: Develop the budget adjustment plan for next month
events.description: After discussing with her husband, Ma Xiulan wrote "May Budget Adjustment" on a new page of the account book. She decided: First, an additional 200 yuan would be allocated from her husband’s salary next month to top up their eldest son’s education savings. Second, a distant cousin’s wedding in May required a gift, and this expense could not be reduced, so savings had to be made elsewhere. She planned to buy groceries more often from Aunt Sun’s familiar stall, where prices might be lower; reduce the frequency of buying snacks and drinks for the children; and wait for promotions before purchasing household supplies. She noted these two points clearly, and only then did she feel she had a solid plan.

events.name: Evening walk canceled due to rain.
events.description: It rained in the evening, making it impossible to go out for a walk. Instead, I did 10 minutes of light stretching at home to alleviate the tension caused by financial pressure.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with some slight concerns in preparation for the month-end inventory.

结束状态.心情: After resolving the issue, a sense of relaxation and determination emerged, leading to greater confidence in managing household finances, though accompanied by slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2 hours of daily household chores, with 10 minutes of light stretching.

2025-04.daily_overview: The execution of budget detailing and the procurement of furniture for learning spaces have progressed smoothly, leading to an improved mood and a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Refine the family budget for May
events.description: After finishing the household chores in the morning, Ma Xiulan took out the account book again to refine the budget adjustment plan agreed upon the previous night. She listed all the expected expenses for May: living expenses, utilities, gift money, education savings... and wrote a limit next to each item. She carefully considered the food purchases and the gift money in particular, ensuring the total amount did not exceed the budget. Finally, she wrote [+200 yuan] firmly in the [education savings] column—a consensus she had reached with her husband and a priority for the family.

events.name: Purchase second-hand desks and lamps for the study space.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan found a neighbor in the community WeChat group who was moving and selling old furniture. She went to see a semi-old wooden desk and a still-functional eye-protecting desk lamp, both in good condition and reasonably priced, costing only a little over a hundred yuan in total. She thought it was a great deal, paid on the spot, and arranged with the neighbor to have her husband come later with their car to pick up the items.

events.name: Set up an independent study corner
events.description: After retrieving the desk and lamp, Ma Xiulan and her husband carried them into the small, freshly cleaned room. She placed the desk against the wall and positioned the lamp in the upper left corner. Then, she found an old bookshelf from home and placed it nearby, arranging some of her eldest son's textbooks and materials on it. Finally, she added a chair. A simple yet fully functional, quiet, and independent study corner was now roughly set up.

events.name: Remind your younger siblings to keep quiet.
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan called her second son Mingzhe and her youngest daughter Yuxin over. She crouched down and said earnestly, "Your older brother is about to take the high school entrance exam, and his studies are particularly intense. From now on, when he is studying in that small room, you two must keep your voices down while playing in the living room, and you must not knock on the door to disturb him. Understand?" Mingzhe nodded, and Yuxin, though not fully comprehending, nodded along in imitation. Ma Xiulan patted their heads and said, "Once your brother finishes his exams, I’ll take you out to have some fun."

events.name: Mounting Embroidery Works for Community Exhibitions
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan brought the embroidered circular piece featuring the phrase "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" to an old framing shop in the community. The shopkeeper recommended several simple wooden frames. Ma Xiulan chose a dark brown one without too many patterns, feeling that it would highlight the red background and golden characters of the embroidery itself. Seeing the framed work protected by a glass cover, looking particularly dignified and festive, she felt quite satisfied, thinking it was now presentable.

events.name: Evening Walk Recovery
events.description: After dinner, I took a 35-minute walk in the community park. My mood was uplifted by the completion of tasks, and I had a brief chat with a new acquaintance, Sister Chen.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, we are ready to implement the budget and execute the plan.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, multiple matters are progressing as planned, especially in creating better conditions for the eldest son.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2.5 hours of physical activities such as purchasing furniture and arranging the room, followed by a 35-minute evening walk.

2025-04.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan felt gratified that her eldest son was using the newly established study space; after completing the inspection of the embroidery exhibits, she proceeded with preparations for the community event.

events.name: Show the new learning space to the eldest son.
events.description: After Ma Mingxuan, the eldest son, returned home from school, Ma Xiulan led him to the door of the small room. With a mix of anticipation and nervousness, she said, "Mingxuan, take a look at this. Your father and I have tidied it up. From now on, you can do your homework and review here. It's quiet, and no one will disturb you." Ma Mingxuan walked in, glanced at the desk, the desk lamp, and the bookshelf, but said nothing. He simply nodded. That evening, he indeed took his schoolbag inside, closed the door, and began studying. Through the crack in the door, Ma Xiulan saw her son's silhouette bent over the desk under the lamplight, and a wave of relief washed over her heart.

events.name: Conduct the final inspection of the exhibition embroidery works.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan took the framed embroidery piece depicting "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" out of its packaging and conducted a final inspection under the bright light. She gently ran her fingers over the glass surface to ensure there was no dust, and carefully examined every corner of the embroidery to confirm there were no missed stitches or loose threads. Only after verifying its flawless condition did she carefully wrap it again in soft cloth, preparing to submit it another day.

events.name: Temporarily helping neighbors look after their children.
events.description: In the afternoon, Wang Guilan, the neighbor, had an urgent matter to attend to and had to go out. She asked Ma Xiulan to help look after her grandson for an hour, to which Ma Xiulan readily agreed. She spent the time playing with the children at home.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with Childhood Friends
events.description: After dinner, I took a 45-minute walk along the riverside path with my childhood friend Liu Chunmei. We exchanged updates on our handicraft projects and daily lives, leaving me feeling relaxed.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to seeing how the eldest child reacts to the new learning space.

结束状态.心情: It is gratifying and reassuring that both the child's acceptance and the completion of the work bring a sense of stability, while social interactions bring joy.

state.今日运动: Approximately 2 hours of daily household chores, with a 45-minute evening walk.

2025-04.daily_overview: Exchanging health insights with neighbors, the crops in the vegetable garden are thriving delightfully, contacting the community to submit exhibition items, and body weight has slightly increased due to a regular diet.

events.name: Exchanging Morning Exercise Experiences with Neighbors
events.description: In the morning, I went to the vegetable market to buy groceries and ran into my neighbor Wang Guilan again. As we picked out vegetables, we chatted. Ma Xiulan mentioned that she had recently started practicing Baduanjin with her family in the mornings: [It felt awkward at first, but now I feel more flexible and energetic throughout the day.] She also briefly demonstrated the [Lifting the Sky with Both Hands] movement. Wang Guilan listened with interest and said: [Really? That sounds good. I’ll give it a try sometime.]

events.name: Apply organic fertilizer to garden crops
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan diluted the liquid fertilizer she had previously made from kitchen waste with water, carried it to the vegetable garden, and carefully watered the roots of the tomato and cucumber seedlings. She noticed that the tomato plants had already begun to produce small yellow flowers, and the cucumber vines had started to climb, which made her very happy. She took a photo of this discovery and shared it on WeChat with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin: [Look, the tomatoes I planted are blooming, and I used my own homemade fertilizer.] The two exchanged some gardening tips on WeChat for a while.

events.name: Contact the community grid officer to submit the exhibits.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan contacted the community grid worker Zheng Xiuying via WeChat to inquire about the specific time and location for submitting works to the community's May Day Handicraft Exhibition. Zheng Xiuying replied promptly and praised, "Sister Xiulan, your craftsmanship is excellent, and you work quickly. Your work is sure to be well-received!" Encouraged by the affirmation, Ma Xiulan felt even more confident about the upcoming exhibition.

events.name: Participate temporarily in the handicraft market
events.description: In the evening, Zheng Xiuying informed Ma Xiulan about a temporary craft market opportunity. Ma Xiulan hurriedly prepared some small embroidery pieces and set up a stall for two hours. She made new friends among the fellow vendors and earned 50 yuan.

events.name: A brief evening stroll
events.description: After returning from the market, I took a 20-minute walk along Jingwen Road near my home, feeling slightly fatigued due to busyness.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, Friday approaches the weekend, and the weather is fine.

结束状态.心情: Feeling content, with smooth communication among neighbors and steady progress in personal hobbies, though temporary activities are somewhat tiring.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, approximately 2 hours of daily household chores and garden work, 20 minutes of evening walk, and 2 hours of standing at the market stall.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, good weather for the weekend.

2025-04.daily_overview: Consolidate the family's morning exercise routine over the weekend, arrange custom framing for the canal embroidery, and note a slight weight gain due to weekend relaxation.

events.name: Consolidate the habit of morning exercise for the family.
events.description: On Saturday morning, without waiting for Ma Xiulan to call them, her husband Ma Zhiqiang and their second son Mingzhe voluntarily came to the yard. With a smile, Ma Xiulan led everyone in reviewing the simplified Baduanjin movements, and this time they performed them more uniformly. Their youngest daughter, Yuxin, continued to mimic the movements on the side, looking adorable. After the morning exercise, Ma Zhiqiang wiped his sweat and said, "It feels quite good to move around a bit." Seeing her family enjoying and persisting in the routine, Ma Xiulan felt that this habit had been initially established.

events.name: Custom Framing for Canal Embroidery
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took another circular embroidery piece she was very satisfied with—depicting a spring scene by the Jinghai Canal—to a well-reputed framing shop on Jingwen Road. She intended to use this embroidery for a community exhibition. She explained to the shop owner in detail that it was a piece for a community event and hoped the frame would be simple and elegant, complementing the tranquil feel of the embroidery. After some consideration, she selected a light wooden circular narrow-edged frame, paid a deposit, and arranged to pick it up in a couple of days.

events.name: Family Outdoor Activities
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family went to the community park to play. Ma Xiulan flew kites with the children while her husband accompanied them, enjoying the spring sunshine.

events.name: The whole family participates in an evening stroll.
events.description: After dinner, the whole family took a 30-minute walk along the riverside pathway, with the eldest son Mingxuan also joining in, creating a harmonious family atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, with family around on the weekend and having personal plans.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, with harmonious family activities and personal affairs properly arranged.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercise, approximately 1.5 hours of walking outdoors to handle framing matters, 1 hour of family outdoor activities, and 30 minutes of evening walk.

2025-04.daily_overview: On a tranquil Sunday, I attended to household chores, spoke with my mother, invited my eldest son to join in morning exercise, and maintained a stable weight.

events.name: Handling daily household chores
events.description: On Sunday, Ma Xiulan did not plan any outdoor activities. She spent the entire morning washing the clothes that had accumulated over the week for the whole family, hanging them to dry until the courtyard was filled. She then tidied up the children's rooms, putting away the seasonal clothing.

events.name: Having a casual phone conversation with my mother.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan called her mother, Li Xiuying. Her mother's chronic leg pain had improved significantly after recent physical therapy, which put Ma Xiulan's mind at ease. Over the phone, they chatted about the recent vegetable prices at the market and caught up on how the children were doing—ordinary yet heartwarming family matters.

events.name: Gently inviting the eldest son to participate in morning exercise
events.description: During breakfast, as his younger siblings and father were discussing morning exercises, Mingxuan, the eldest son who had not been participating, seemed somewhat curious. Ma Xiulan gently said to him, "Mingxuan, it's good to move around when you're tired from studying—it's beneficial for both your body and mind. Would you like to try coming out tomorrow morning? Just a few minutes, it won't be tiring." Mingxuan lowered his head to drink his porridge and mumbled in response, "Hmm... we'll see." Although he didn't agree immediately, his attitude was no longer resistant. Ma Xiulan felt this was a good start.

events.name: An Evening Stroll Alone
events.description: After dinner, I took a 35-minute walk alone on Jingwen Road, contemplating family matters and exhibition arrangements, feeling calm and composed.

起始状态.心情: Leisure, enjoying the slow-paced morning of the weekend

结束状态.心情: Tranquil and heartwarming, interactions with family bring inner peace.

state.今日运动: Daily household cleaning and tidying take approximately 2.5 hours, with an evening walk lasting 35 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sharing the harvest from the vegetable garden, receiving a wedding invitation, being mobilized to participate in a brisk walking event, submitting exhibition works, and reaching the final weight state of 54.8kg.

events.name: Sharing the Harvest from the Vegetable Garden with Neighbors
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan picked some fresh lettuce again. She separated a small bunch, placed it in a plastic bag, and knocked on the door of Aunt Wang Guilan, who lived across the hall. "Aunt Wang, these are freshly picked. Please have a taste." Wang Guilan happily accepted it and said, "Oh, thank you, Xiulan! You've grown these vegetables so well." The two chatted for a while at the door about their experiences with planting and watering vegetables. Ma Xiulan felt that sharing the fruits of her labor with her neighbor brought her even more joy than enjoying them alone.

events.name: Received a wedding invitation from a distant cousin's son.
events.description: In the evening, Li Xiuying, Ma Xiulan's mother, came over and brought a bright red invitation. It was for the wedding of a distant cousin of her mother, to be held in Jinghai during the May Day holiday. Ma Xiulan took the invitation and examined it carefully. The date was in early May, and the venue was a local restaurant. Her mother said, "Although this relative is distant, we used to keep in touch, so we must observe the proper etiquette." Ma Xiulan nodded, already starting to calculate where the unexpected gift money would come from.

events.name: Mobilized to participate in the community walking event.
events.description: In the evening, community grid worker Zheng Xiuying posted a notice in the WeChat group about a community-organized walking event during the May Day holiday. She also sent a private message to Ma Xiulan: "Sister Xiulan, why not bring your family along for a walk? It’s a chance to get some exercise, and there are small gifts too!" Ma Xiulan wasn’t particularly interested in sports activities, but considering how helpful Sister Zheng had always been—often helping her find odd jobs—she didn’t want to turn down the offer. So she replied, "Alright, Sister Zheng, we’ll try our best to join."

events.name: Submit exhibition works to the community
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan brought her framed embroidery piece titled "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" to the community activity center. Many people were already busy preparing for the exhibition inside. She handed her work to the staff member Zheng Xiuying, who opened it, examined it, and praised it profusely. Then, Zheng carefully hung it in a prominent spot and attached a small card below it bearing the words "Ma Xiulan" and "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity." Watching her work officially become part of the exhibition, Ma Xiulan felt both anticipation and a hint of nervousness, wondering how others would evaluate it.

events.name: An evening walk helps relieve exhibition-related stress.
events.description: After dinner, I took a 40-minute walk along the riverside path to ease the tension brought by the approaching exhibition, and encountered Sister Chen, with whom I exchanged parenting experiences.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, welcoming the start of a new week.

结束状态.心情: The information is quite substantial, encompassing both the joy of sharing and reflections on new arrangements, as well as post-exercise relaxation.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores and walking to the community center take about 2 hours, with an evening walk of 40 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: Retrieve the canal embroidery, discuss the wedding gift money, prepare for the brisk walk, and maintain weight at 54.8kg.

events.name: Retrieve the framed canal embroidery.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the framing shop to retrieve the embroidered piece of the canal scenery she had commissioned a few days earlier. The light wooden circular frame indeed accentuated the tranquil riverbank, weeping willows, and small boats in the embroidery, making them appear exceptionally elegant. The shop owner also praised her fine embroidery skills. Ma Xiulan carefully inspected whether the framing was secure and if there were any damages to the corners. After confirming everything was in order, she carefully wrapped it up and took it home. Now, she had two pieces ready for the community exhibition, which gave her more confidence.

events.name: Discussing Wedding Gift Money Matters with Mother
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan called her mother to specifically discuss the amount of monetary gift for her cousin's wedding. Her mother said over the phone, "According to the local custom here, for relatives who are not too close, the usual amount is 200 to 300 yuan. I made some inquiries, and it seems that's about the same in their family's area." Ma Xiulan felt reassured: "Mom, let's go with 300 yuan then. What do you think? Should we give it as a family or should I prepare a separate gift?" In the end, the mother and daughter agreed that the mother, as the elder, would give a gift on behalf of the family, and Ma Xiulan's family would not need to attend the wedding in full. This way, they would fulfill the social etiquette while also saving some trouble.

events.name: Preparing for the Walking Activity
events.description: Thinking of the walking activity she had promised Sister Zheng, Ma Xiulan checked the shoe cabinet in the evening. There were no proper sports shoes at home, so she dug out an old pair of cloth shoes she had bought earlier, which felt a bit tight, and dusted them off. She thought to herself, since it was just walking, these shoes should do the trick. There was no need to spend money on a new pair just for this.

events.name: A brief evening stroll
events.description: After dinner, due to light rain, I took a 20-minute walk on Jingwen Road near my home to maintain my exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepared to handle several predetermined matters.

结束状态.心情: A calm readiness, with several pending matters now settled.

state.今日运动: Walk for about 1.5 hours to handle errands, and take a 20-minute walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the last day of April is bathed in the bright spring sunshine.

2025-04.daily_overview: At the end of the month, consolidate the family morning exercise commitment, formally submit community exhibition works, solidify healthy habits, and maintain weight stability matching the final state.

events.name: Strengthen the Family Morning Exercise Agreement
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan, her husband Ma Zhiqiang, their second son Mingzhe, and their youngest daughter Yuxin completed a simplified version of the Eight-Section Brocade in the yard as usual. Although their eldest son, Mingxuan, still did not join, Ma Xiulan was quite satisfied to see her husband and younger son persist. After finishing the exercise, she said to everyone, "Our morning routine is quite good. Shall we continue next month?" Her husband and children responded with smiles, and this small family health commitment was thus established.

events.name: Formal Submission of Community Exhibition Works
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin, Ma Xiulan brought two framed embroidery pieces—"Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" and "Spring Scenery Along the Canal"—to the community residents' committee once again. She filled out the registration form and handed her works to the staff member in charge of the exhibition. Looking at the two exquisite embroidery pieces, the staff member praised repeatedly, "Aunt Ma, your craftsmanship is truly exceptional! Many people are sure to admire it." Zhou Xiuqin chimed in with support. Encouraged by her friend and affirmed by the staff, Ma Xiulan's feelings about the community exhibition during the May Day holiday shifted from nervousness to greater anticipation.

events.name: An evening walk to celebrate the end of the month.
events.description: After dinner, I took a 45-minute walk along the riverside path with my husband, Ma Zhiqiang. We reviewed our achievements in April and discussed our family health plan, feeling joyful and hopeful.

起始状态.心情: With a slight sense of summary, it marks both the end of the month and the conclusion of a phase in spring.

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and anticipation, family habits have been initially established, personal craftsmanship is about to undergo public scrutiny, and health conditions remain favorable.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning exercise with Baduanjin, approximately 2 hours of daily household chores and going out to submit works, and 45 minutes of evening walk.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, comfortable temperature, light breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.
date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: On May Day, Ma Xiulan participated in a community-organized walking event in the morning. The long-distance walk, her first of its kind, made her keenly aware of her physical limitations. In the afternoon, she rested at home and practiced the introduction for her exhibition piece scheduled for the following day. The evening's family conversation also revolved around this exhausting experience.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: At 6:15 in the morning, Ma Xiulan performed a 20-minute routine of Baduanjin in her courtyard. Her movements were skilled, and she felt physically and mentally refreshed, though she vaguely sensed some stiffness in her lower back.

events.name: Prepare a holiday breakfast
events.description: Because it was a holiday, Ma Xiulan prepared a slightly more sumptuous breakfast than usual for her family, cooking noodles and frying eggs, hoping to add a sense of ritual to the occasion.

events.name: Participate in the community walking event.
events.description: At 7:30 in the morning, Ma Xiulan changed into her cloth shoes for household chores and arrived at the gathering point in Jinghai Park. Led by the grid worker Zheng Xiuying, she set off with dozens of neighbors, including Wang Guilan and Zhang Shufen. After walking less than a kilometer, she felt her shoes were uncomfortable and began to fall behind, barely keeping up with the main group. Along the way, she only briefly chatted with Wang Guilan about their children's homework.

events.name: Reflecting on Physical Fitness Issues
events.description: Dragging her aching legs back home, Ma Xiulan slumped into a chair. She recalled the brisk strides of her neighbors and compared them to her own panting exhaustion. For the first time, a clear thought struck her: "Have I really been inactive for so long that my body can no longer keep up?" This realization weighed heavily on her heart.

events.name: Sharing Experiences with Family
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan, rubbing her waist, described the [ordeal] of her day to her husband and three children. [I walked three kilometers, and my legs almost didn’t feel like my own anymore.] Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, smiled upon hearing this and said, [You’re busy at home every day, and you get plenty of activity too.] The children then playfully urged her to go out for walks more often in the future.

events.name: Recall the sense of fatigue
events.description: Before going to sleep, Ma Xiulan lay in bed, still feeling a distinct ache in her lower back. She recalled the exhaustion she had felt on the morning of May 1st and thought about the daily hardships of caring for the elderly and children. A faint realization dawned on her that her body might not be as resilient as she had once believed.

events.name: A brief evening stroll
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan endured the soreness in her back and took a 15-minute slow walk around Jingwen Road, hoping to alleviate the discomfort, but the effect was limited.

起始状态.心情: I feel a mix of slight anticipation and some unease, worried that I might not articulate the exhibition introduction smoothly this afternoon.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted, a hint of concern and reflection about one's physical condition arises within.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin, a 3-kilometer brisk walk in the community, and a 15-minute evening stroll.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with occasional afternoon sunshine and a light breeze.
date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Ma Xiulan experienced an emotional high. She took her younger daughter to the community to visit her embroidery exhibition, where her works received widespread praise and inquiries about potential market opportunities. This greatly inspired her. In the evening, she shared this joy with both her family and the handicraft circle, and began to seriously consider the possibility of turning her hobby into a stable source of income.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: After getting up at 6:45 a.m., Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin in the courtyard as usual, but the soreness in her waist and back made her movements somewhat sluggish, and she did not complete the routine as smoothly as she normally would.

events.name: Making final preparations for the exhibition
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan carefully inspected the embroidery pieces she was going to bring, wrapping them in a clean cloth. She deliberately chose neat and tidy clothes for herself and her young daughter, as if preparing for an important ceremony.

events.name: Visit the Community Handicraft Exhibition
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan walked into the community activity room holding her daughter Ma Yuxin’s hand. As soon as she entered, she saw her embroidery piece, "Spring Dawn at the Jinghai Canal," hanging prominently on the central wall. Neighbors Wang Guilan and Zhang Shufen immediately gathered around, exclaiming, "Xiulan, your craftsmanship is truly exceptional!" Fellow craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin also gave a thumbs-up. Her little daughter pointed at the embroidery and exclaimed loudly, "Look, my mom made this!" Ma Xiulan’s face instantly flushed with pride, her heart filled with a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Received signals of market recognition
events.description: Just as she was feeling delighted, Zheng Xiuying squeezed over and lowered her voice to tell her, "Several people have come to ask me whether these embroideries are for sale and if they can order the same ones. One of them, who seemed to be a teacher from outside, particularly liked them." Ma Xiulan was stunned. She had never imagined that anyone would want to spend money on her embroidery work. In her heart, she felt both surprised and as if a small lamp had been lit.

events.name: Family Celebration Dinner
events.description: To celebrate the success of the exhibition, Ma Xiulan prepared two extra dishes for dinner, including sweet and sour pork tenderloin and noodles with gravy. The family enjoyed the meal, but she herself ate a bit more than usual due to her excitement.

events.name: Sharing Joy in the Handicraft Community
events.description: In the evening, after the children had gone to bed, Ma Xiulan eagerly opened WeChat and posted the photos she had taken during the exhibition, along with the compliments from her neighbors, in the "Handicraft Sisters" group chat. Shortly after, Zhou Xiuqin sent a series of likes, and Aunt Wu, who was far away in Hebei, even made a video call to carefully examine her work through the screen, repeatedly praising her skilled needlework and the artistic conception of the piece. This recognition, spanning across regions, further boosted Ma Xiulan's confidence.

events.name: Discuss development possibilities with husband
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan told her husband Ma Zhiqiang that someone wanted to buy her embroidery. "Zhiqiang, what do you think? If I really take on some small jobs, even if it's just an extra three or five hundred yuan a month, it could help with the household expenses and save up some tutoring fees for Mingxuan?" After a moment of silence, her husband nodded and said, "Sure, you have the skills anyway, so why not give it a try?" This simple affirmation made Ma Xiulan feel as though the path ahead had widened a little.

events.name: The evening walk was canceled due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to fatigue from daytime activities, Ma Xiulan made a temporary decision to cancel her evening walk and rest early.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation mixed with nervousness, uncertain of how my work will be evaluated at the exhibition.

结束状态.心情: Excited and proud, they are filled with new hope and motivation for increasing their income through craftsmanship in the future.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, walking to and from the community activity center, and daily household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with a noticeable rise in temperature and some sultry heat in the afternoon.

2025-05.daily_overview: Saturday, the first day off after the holiday. Ma Xiulan’s main task was to prepare for the family’s attendance at a distant relative’s wedding the next day, finding appropriate clothes and ironing them neatly. The rest of the time was spent on routine household chores, but the plan changed in the evening when her younger daughter developed a fever.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: After getting up at 6:20 a.m., Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin in the courtyard, which slightly alleviated her back discomfort. However, she found it difficult to concentrate as her mind was preoccupied with the wedding preparations.

events.name: Preparing Wedding Attire for Family Members
events.description: After seeing off her eldest and second sons for school in the morning, Ma Xiulan began rummaging through the cabinets. She took out her husband’s relatively new shirt and ironed it smooth, then found the polo shirts and dress pants her two sons had worn during last year’s holidays, checking if any mending was needed. Her little daughter had a pretty dress that would be just right to wear. Finally, she also selected a simple yet spirited outfit for herself, ironed it all, and hung it up.

events.name: The youngest daughter suddenly developed a low-grade fever.
events.description: In the afternoon, the younger daughter Ma Yuxin felt unwell after playing. Ma Xiulan took her temperature and found it to be 37.8°C. She hurriedly took her to the community clinic to see Dr. Wang Jianguo, who diagnosed a mild cold and prescribed antipyretic medication.

events.name: Adjust Evening Schedule
events.description: Due to caring for her sick younger daughter, Ma Xiulan canceled her planned evening walk and prepared dinner in advance, focusing on light and simple dishes.

events.name: Nighttime Care
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan spent time caring for her youngest daughter, getting up multiple times to check her temperature, which interrupted her sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, thinking about having to deal with a pile of household chores.

结束状态.心情: Worried about the younger daughter's illness, slightly fatigued but feeling a sense of responsibility.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercise, daily household chores, walking to the clinic

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast with possible light rain, muggy weather.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday, family finance day. After her husband received his salary, Ma Xiulan strictly implemented the family budget plan: she went to the bank to deposit money, kept detailed financial records, planned the expenses for May, and finally discussed with her husband to decide on a decent yet affordable wedding gift amount. The entire process reflected her meticulousness and organizational skills as a homemaker.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Ma Xiulan got up. As her younger daughter's condition had improved, she felt relaxed and performed the Eight-Section Brocade exercises in the courtyard, with her movements flowing smoothly once again.

events.name: Implement the Monthly Savings Plan
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan, carrying the wages her husband had just handed over, first went to the Jinghai District Rural Credit Cooperative. She found her way to the counter with familiarity and deposited 200 yuan into the education savings passbook under the name of her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan. Seeing another deposit added to the passbook, she felt a sense of reassurance in her heart.

events.name: Check and record the household accounts from last month.
events.description: In the afternoon, while the children were doing their homework, Ma Xiulan spread out on the table all the utility bills for water, electricity, and gas from April, the school fee receipts for the children, and the grocery shopping receipts from the drawer. She put on her reading glasses and, while sorting them by category, neatly recorded each expense in the thick family ledger. Finally, she calculated the monthly balance, which was over a dozen yuan less than the budget, giving her a small sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Plan this month's fixed expenses
events.description: After finishing the bookkeeping, Ma Xiulan sat down with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just woken up from his nap, holding the account book and calculator. ["This month's utilities are estimated to be 150, Mingxuan's school requires a materials fee of 200, and each side of the elderly's living expenses is 500…"] The two of them went through each item one by one, first "circling" the essential expenses for May.

events.name: Discussing the amount of wedding gift money
events.description: When it comes to tomorrow's wedding, the gift money has become a dilemma. Ma Xiulan said, "This relative is not particularly close, but not distant either. Nowadays, wedding gifts tend to be quite substantial." Ma Zhiqiang frowned, "We still need to save money for Mingxuan." The two discussed back and forth, referring to the gifts given by their neighbors, trying to save face while also acting within their means.

events.name: Finalize and prepare the monetary gift
events.description: After discussing for nearly half an hour, the couple finally made the decision: to give 500 yuan as a gift. [Not too much, not too little—just enough to be acceptable.] Ma Xiulan counted out five brand-new hundred-yuan bills from the iron box where she kept the emergency funds, which she had specifically gone to the bank to exchange.

events.name: Packaging Red Envelopes with Monetary Gifts
events.description: Ma Xiulan took out a red envelope printed with the character [囍], smoothed and aligned the 500 yuan in cash, then solemnly placed it inside. Using a black pen, she neatly wrote on the front of the envelope: [Wishing you a joyful marriage and a lifetime of happiness together—from Ma Zhiqiang and Ma Xiulan].

events.name: Adjust Monthly Budget
events.description: After wrapping the red envelope, Ma Xiulan added another entry in the expenditure column for May in her account book: [Social Interactions: 500 yuan]. Looking at the total expenditure figure, her heart tightened, and she began to calculate how to be more frugal with grocery shopping in the days ahead.

events.name: Prudent Procurement
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market to buy groceries and deliberately walked two extra stalls to compare prices. In the end, she bought some discounted seasonal vegetables from the familiar Aunt Sun, who, as usual, gave her a handful of spring onions.

events.name: The evening walk was canceled due to rain.
events.description: Due to the sultry weather and the forecast of light rain, Ma Xiulan temporarily canceled her evening walk and spent her time doing handicrafts at home.

起始状态.心情: Focusing on family financial matters, with a slightly serious tone.

结束状态.心情: After completing the financial planning, I feel more assured, but the thought of additional gift expenses brings some pressure.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercise, walking to the bank and the vegetable market.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast, cool weather with occasional breezes
date_attribute.holiday: Day off (substituted from 04/27/2025)

2025-05.daily_overview: On her compensatory day off, Ma Xiulan rested at home. Having experienced physical exhaustion and emotional fluctuations in the previous days, she intentionally slowed down her pace today. She mainly handled some light household chores and attempted simple stretching exercises, beginning to respond to the initial health signals her body was sending.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: At 6:40 in the morning, Ma Xiulan practices Baduanjin in the courtyard, focusing on alleviating back and waist pain, and feels a slight improvement.

events.name: Try light home exercises.
events.description: After finishing her housework in the morning, Ma Xiulan recalled the soreness from her brisk walk and the advice from her neighbor, Sister Wang, who had suggested she "move around more." Taking advantage of the pleasant sunshine, she slowly walked a few laps in the yard. She then tried to mimic the movements taught in a health program on television, twisting her waist and raising her arms. Though her movements were somewhat clumsy, she felt her body stretch and relax a bit afterward.

events.name: Spending Leisure Time with Children
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Yuxin, the younger daughter, did not have to go to kindergarten and pestered her mother to teach her embroidery. Ma Xiulan found a piece of scrap cloth and a thick needle, guiding her daughter step by step to embroider the simplest straight line. Watching her daughter's earnest little expression, she felt a warm glow in her heart.

events.name: Organize Craft Materials
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan tidied up her embroidery tools, along with the remaining silk threads and fabrics. Recalling that someone had inquired about custom orders at the exhibition, she began to consider which materials were still in surplus and which might need replenishing. However, the thought of spending money made her hesitate slightly.

events.name: Temporary Friends Gathering
events.description: One evening, Ma Xiulan's childhood friend Liu Chunmei paid an unexpected visit. The two chatted over tea in the courtyard until quite late. While Ma Xiulan enjoyed the social interaction, it disrupted her usual routine.

events.name: Stayed up late due to a gathering.
events.description: After chatting with Liu Chunmei until past ten in the evening, Ma Xiulan went to bed later than usual, feeling slightly tired but in a pleasant mood.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the rare leisure of an adjusted holiday.

结束状态.心情: Calm and slightly joyful, trying new activities brings a slight sense of freshness, with satisfaction after socializing.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade exercises, followed by a walk in the courtyard and simple stretching.

date_attribute.weather: Mostly sunny with relatively high temperatures in the afternoon.

2025-05.daily_overview: On weekdays, Ma Xiulan busies herself with family affairs, craft progress, and maintaining friendships. She prepares gift money for her parents, retrieves the embroidery piece that received high praise at the exhibition along with potential client information, and, more importantly, enjoys a deep and pleasant afternoon tea chat with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, strengthening their decades-long friendship.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: Waking up at 6:30 a.m., Ma Xiulan felt drowsy due to staying up late the previous night. During her Baduanjin practice, she lacked energy and performed the movements more slowly than usual.

events.name: Preparing a monetary gift for mother
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan withdrew the amount of money agreed upon with her mother over the phone from the family savings and specifically went to the credit union to exchange it for new bills. She placed the money in a red envelope, neatly wrote the names of both families on it, and prepared to bring it with her when visiting her parents' home the next day.

events.name: Retrieve the embroidery and obtain customer leads
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan received a call from Zheng Xiuying, saying that the exhibition had ended. She hurried to the community activity center, where Sister Zheng helped her take down the embroidery while slipping her a note. [I’ve written down the phone numbers of two people who asked about custom orders. Xiulan, make the most of this—it could be a real opportunity.] Ma Xiulan took the note, feeling the weight of the seemingly light piece of paper.

events.name: Preparing to welcome childhood friends
events.description: After receiving Liu Chunmei's phone call in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan happily began to prepare. She scooped a small dish of pickled radish from the jar, boiled water, and took out her best tea leaves. Then, she cleaned the small table and chairs in the yard, arranged them neatly, and waited for her old friend's arrival.

events.name: Having Tea with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: Chunmei arrived carrying some fruit, and the two of them broke into smiles as soon as they saw each other. Sitting in the courtyard, sipping tea and enjoying pickles and fruit, their conversation jumped from children’s exams to their parents’ back and leg pains, then to conflicts involving someone’s daughter-in-law in the neighboring alley—they talked about everything. They also reminisced about their childhood, recalling silly moments like catching fish and shrimp together by the Jinghai River and being punished for arriving late to school, laughing so hard they nearly doubled over.

events.name: Farewell and Aftertaste
events.description: After nearly two hours of conversation, Chunmei had to return home to prepare dinner. Ma Xiulan accompanied her to the door, and they agreed to meet again next time. Back in the courtyard, she tidied up the cups and plates while reflecting on the cheerful laughter and lively talk from earlier. It felt as though she had recharged her busy life, leaving her feeling somewhat more relaxed and at ease.

events.name: Morning Homestead Chores
events.description: While waiting for Chunmei to arrive, Ma Xiulan went to the small vegetable garden to water the newly planted rows of bok choy and pull out some weeds. Looking at the lush green seedlings, she thought to herself that soon she would be able to add a fresh vegetable dish to the dining table.

events.name: Evening Walk Recovery
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took a 30-minute walk along the riverside path, chatted briefly with her neighbor Zhang Shufen, and felt physically and mentally relaxed.

起始状态.心情: Preparing for a day full of appointments brings a slight sense of busyness.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and delightful, I am not only pleased with the potential opportunities in craftsmanship but also deeply warmed and satisfied by the profound friendship.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin, walking to and from the community center, daily household chores and gardening, and a 30-minute evening walk.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy and muggy, with a brief shower in the evening.
