2025-05.daily_overview: On a weekday, Ma Xiulan took a substantial step in shifting her life's focus towards a [micro-entrepreneurship] in handicrafts. She finalized a small embroidery order from a community kindergarten through detailed discussions with her fellow craft enthusiast Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat, transitioning from a hobby to a production partnership with clear requirements and compensation.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: At 6:25 a.m., Ma Xiulan practices Baduanjin with focused breathing, attempting to alleviate the tension caused by order pressure.

events.name: Finalize the first handicraft order
events.description: After dropping off her child in the morning, Ma Xiulan received a WeChat message from Zhou Xiuqin, stating that the community kindergarten wanted to order a batch of small embroidered pieces to decorate the activity room—about ten pieces in total, with cute and lively patterns. The two talked via voice message for a long time, confirming the embroidery designs (small animals, flowers, and plants), dimensions, fabric requirements (safe and soft), and most importantly—the price of 30 yuan per piece and a delivery date in half a month. Zhou Xiuqin was responsible for communication and follow-up, while Ma Xiulan handled the main embroidery work, with the income to be split equally. This was Ma Xiulan’s first time formally "negotiating business," and she felt both nervous and excited.

events.name: Plan Order Execution Time
events.description: After hanging up the phone, Ma Xiulan looked at the calendar at home and began to plan her schedule. During the day, she had to manage household chores, pick up and drop off her children, and care for her parents. The only substantial chunks of time she could dedicate to embroidery in peace were after her children fell asleep at night and on weekends. She calculated the progress and felt the timeline was a bit tight. However, thinking that this was her first order, she silently resolved to do it well and deliver it on time.

events.name: Irregular eating habits due to stress
events.description: Busy with order planning at noon, Ma Xiulan had a simple meal of leftovers and prepared dinner hastily, resulting in a relatively low calorie intake.

events.name: The evening walk was interrupted by rain.
events.description: While planning an evening walk, Ma Xiulan encountered a brief light rain, so she only walked for 15 minutes in the community park before returning home, resulting in insufficient exercise.

events.name: Staying up late to prepare order materials
events.description: After the child fell asleep at night, Ma Xiulan began organizing embroidery threads and patterns to prepare for starting work the next day, staying up quite late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat nervous and expectant as we are about to discuss the details of the order.

结束状态.心情: Focused and with a sense of accomplishment, the confirmation of her first order made her feel that her craftsmanship had truly found its place, though she was slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade exercises, daily household chores, picking up and dropping off children, and a 15-minute evening walk.

2025-05.daily_overview: Body Alert Day. The morning dizziness and persistent back pain, compounded by the fatigue from brisk walking in previous days, made Ma Xiulan acutely aware that her health as the primary caregiver of the family had reached a critical point. While caring for her mother, she expressed her concerns and began gathering information during daily shopping for future household needs, such as home appliances.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Practice Interrupted
events.description: At 6:35 a.m., when Ma Xiulan got up, she felt dizzy. She managed to practice Baduanjin for only 10 minutes before stopping, as her physical discomfort was evident.

events.name: List Household To-Do Items
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan noted down the tasks for the week on her phone: [Buy a pair of sandals for Yuxin, Zhiqiang's blood pressure medication is running low and needs to be picked up, bring some pork ribs when visiting Mom this weekend…]. These were trivial yet essential matters at the heart of family life.

events.name: The body sends clear warning signals.
events.description: Just as she was about to ride her bike to her parents' house, Ma Xiulan stood up and suddenly felt dizzy, her vision darkening. She quickly steadied herself by holding onto the table. At the same time, the dull ache in her lower back, which had been lingering since May Day, became more pronounced. A pang of worry struck her. [What's wrong with me? It's not just fatigue—I genuinely feel unwell.] This sensation was different from the exhaustion she used to feel after farm work; it carried a hint of unease that unsettled her.

events.name: Confiding Worries to Mother
events.description: While massaging her mother's shoulders at her parents' home, Ma Xiulan couldn't help but say, "Mom, I woke up dizzy this morning, and my back hurts terribly. Running back and forth like this all the time, I'm really afraid I might collapse one day." Her mother, Li Xiuying, held her hand affectionately and said, "Silly girl, don't just worry about us. Your own health is even more important. Rest whenever you need to!"

events.name: Inquire about home appliance information from neighbors
events.description: After leaving her parents' home, Ma Xiulan went to Zhang Shufen's small supermarket to buy soy sauce. While checking out, she casually asked, "Sister Zhang, where can I buy reliable home appliances around here? The washing machine at home keeps squeaking; I'm afraid it might break down soon." Zhang Shufen enthusiastically recommended two appliance stores to her and also reminded her, "Wait until Labor Day or National Day—the promotions are much better then."

events.name: Try to alleviate on your own.
events.description: Returning from her parents' home at noon, Ma Xiulan felt her lower back aching even more. She applied a hot towel to the area for a while, and although it only provided temporary relief, it made her realize that she must do something to change her current situation.

events.name: Evening walk canceled
events.description: Due to physical discomfort, Ma Xiulan decided to cancel her evening walk and rest early to regain her strength.

events.name: Increase dietary calorie intake
events.description: To replenish energy, Ma Xiulan prepared more meat for dinner, which led to a slight increase in weight due to the higher intake.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat listless and vaguely worried due to physical discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Fatigue and anxiety intensify, with a heightened vigilance towards one's own health condition.

state.今日运动: 10 minutes of morning Baduanjin (interrupted), cycling to and from parents' home, daily household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with rising temperatures and intense afternoon sunlight.

2025-05.daily_overview: Driven by health concerns, Ma Xiulan began to proactively seek changes. She confided in her neighbor Wang Guilan and received the practical suggestion of [taking morning walks]. Meanwhile, while caring for her parents, she identified a safety hazard caused by damaged window screens and promptly contacted the reliable community handyman, Master Liu, demonstrating her ability to take action in solving problems.

events.name: Recovery of Morning Eight-Section Brocade Practice
events.description: At 6:40 in the morning, Ma Xiulan felt her dizziness had slightly subsided. She performed 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the courtyard, moving cautiously to avoid aggravating the discomfort in her lower back.

events.name: Discussing Health Concerns with Neighbors
events.description: While hanging clothes to dry at the door in the morning, Ma Xiulan ran into her neighbor Wang Guilan across the hall and couldn't help but bring up her sore back and dizziness again. "Sister Wang, I'm not that old yet, so why does my body feel like it can't keep up?" Sister Wang patted her hand and said, "It's like that for all of us at this age. Just being busy at home isn't enough. I take a twenty-minute walk in the alley every morning after waking up, and it keeps me energized all day. Why don't you give it a try?" This specific suggestion made Ma Xiulan feel inspired.

events.name: Discovering safety hazards at parents' home
events.description: In the afternoon at her parents' home, while opening the windows for ventilation, Ma Xiulan noticed that several screens in the kitchen and bedroom had large holes, and the rubber seals around the edges had also deteriorated. "Mom, the screens are in such a state. Not only will mosquitoes get in, but it's also unsafe," she said. Her mother sighed, "It's an old house. Let's just make do with it." However, Ma Xiulan felt uneasy about the situation.

events.name: Contact the community plumber
events.description: While her father was taking a nap, Ma Xiulan went into the yard and called Master Liu, who had previously repaired the water pipes. "Master Liu, the window screens at my parents' house are badly damaged. When would it be convenient for you to come over and take measurements to replace them with new ones?" Master Liu readily agreed to come and take a look the next morning.

events.name: Consciously reduce the load
events.description: While working at her parents' house today, Ma Xiulan deliberately reminded herself not to lift overly heavy buckets in one go and to move items in two trips. She has started putting the idea of "not pushing herself too hard" into practice.

events.name: Evening Walk Test
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan tried walking for 20 minutes in the community park at a slower pace, feeling slight relief in her lower back.

events.name: Impromptu Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, husband Ma Zhiqiang brought back pastries given by a colleague, which were shared by the whole family, resulting in Ma Xiulan consuming additional sugar.

起始状态.心情: With concerns about health issues, intentionally seeking external advice.

结束状态.心情: Having received specific suggestions and begun to take action, a sense of determination to solve the problem emerged amidst the worries.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, daily household chores, walking to and from the neighbor's place for conversation, and a 20-minute evening walk.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day filled with both fulfillment and complex emotions. In the morning, I attended the wedding of a distant relative, fulfilling social obligations. In the afternoon and evening, I faced a family crisis as my eldest son performed poorly in his mock exams. Ma Xiulan and her husband worked in seamless coordination, successfully guiding their child through his emotions, while also receiving the heartfelt Mother's Day gestures their children had secretly prepared.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: At 7:00 a.m., Ma Xiulan got up and hurriedly completed a simplified 15-minute Baduanjin exercise due to her need to attend a wedding.

events.name: Attending a distant relative's wedding
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan and her husband took their young daughter to a hotel in Jinghai District to attend a wedding. She presented the prepared red envelope to the newlyweds and offered many words of blessing. At the wedding banquet, she met many relatives she seldom saw, and they exchanged pleasantries, chatting about their children's studies and the health of the elderly. The scene was lively yet somewhat formulaic.

events.name: Sharing Wedding Observations
events.description: Upon returning home, the eldest and second sons gathered around, asking all sorts of questions. While changing out of her formal attire, Ma Xiulan said, "The bride is quite lovely, and the food was good too. You would definitely have enjoyed the braised pork. I also saw your third cousin's uncle, who asked how your studies are going."

events.name: Learning of the eldest son's failure in the first mock examination.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan saw the grade summary sheet in the parent group chat and noticed that her eldest son Ma Mingxuan's math score was over thirty points lower than usual. Her heart tightened, and she immediately called the homeroom teacher, Ms. Han, to confirm the situation. Anxiety instantly surged within her.

events.name: Observe and Restrain Emotions
events.description: Ma Mingxuan returned from school and slipped into his room without a word. Ma Xiulan saw this and grew anxious, but remembering her mother’s advice that "when children grow older, you can’t confront them head-on," she forced herself to stay calm. She continued preparing dinner as if nothing had happened, though her hands were a bit heavy as she chopped the vegetables.

events.name: Discuss countermeasures with the husband
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan pulled her husband to a corner of the living room and whispered about the grades. "The child must be feeling bad himself; we shouldn't scold him anymore. Why don't you talk to him? He's afraid of you, but he respects you too." Ma Zhiqiang nodded, "Alright, I'll go ask him."

events.name: The husband has a heart-to-heart talk with the eldest son.
events.description: Ma Zhiqiang knocked on his son's door. Instead of getting angry, he sat down and asked, "What do you think about not doing well on this exam?" After a long silence, Ma Mingxuan choked up and said, "I wanted to do so well that my hands were shaking during the exam..." The father and son talked for nearly an hour, discussing the sources of the pressure.

events.name: Provide emotional support to children
events.description: Only after her husband came out and gave a nod did Ma Xiulan enter her son’s room, holding a cup of hot milk. She didn’t mention his grades, just placed the milk on the table and patted her son’s head. "Take a break if you’re tired. Don’t push yourself too hard. You can talk to your parents about anything." Ma Mingxuan, his eyes reddened, responded with a soft "Mm."

events.name: Post-event communication between spouses
events.description: The children were all asleep, and Ma Xiulan and her husband breathed a sigh of relief in the living room. "Thank goodness we didn't lose our temper with him," Ma Xiulan remarked with emotion. Ma Zhiqiang added, "The child is growing up and has his own thoughts now. We need to handle him gently." This crisis management made both of them feel that they had cooperated even better.

events.name: Children are preparing gifts for Mother's Day.
events.description: What Ma Xiulan did not know was that today, her eldest son had used his saved pocket money to buy a carnation and hidden it in his schoolbag; her second son had secretly drawn a greeting card during art class; and her youngest daughter, under the guidance of her kindergarten teacher, had practiced saying "Happy Mother's Day, Mom" many times.

events.name: Determine the material for the window screen
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan discussed several types of screen materials recommended by Master Liu with her husband. Considering durability and mosquito-proof effectiveness, they decided to choose stainless steel mesh. Ma Xiulan promptly sent a WeChat message to inform Master Liu of their decision.

events.name: The evening walk was canceled due to emotional reasons.
events.description: Due to emotional fluctuations from dealing with her child's issues, Ma Xiulan canceled her evening walk and rested at home.

events.name: Impact of Wedding Catering
events.description: The wedding banquet featured an abundance of food, and Ma Xiulan consumed a large amount of high-calorie dishes, resulting in weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Dressed up a bit for the wedding, feeling as usual.

结束状态.心情: Experiencing dramatic ups and downs, from the clamor of the wedding banquet to the anxiety of facing a child's issue, and then to the exhaustion and relief after the problem was initially resolved, the emotions are complex but overall tending toward calmness.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, attending a wedding with some walking, and daily household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to clear, with a gentle breeze, comfortable and pleasant.

2025-05.daily_overview: Mother's Day also marked the beginning of Ma Xiulan's systematic adjustment of her daily rhythm. She attempted to slow down her pace, communicate with her husband to share the pressure, and contacted teachers to follow up on her child's progress. The Mother's Day celebration in the evening was simple yet filled with warmth, providing her with immense emotional fulfillment. Meanwhile, the procurement of materials for handicraft orders and the plan to replace the window screens at her parents' home were steadily progressing.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: At 6:50 a.m., Ma Xiulan leisurely performed 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the courtyard, enjoying the relaxed atmosphere of Mother's Day.

events.name: Consciously adjust the pace of life
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan deliberately woke up twenty minutes later than usual. She told herself, "It's Mother's Day today, so I'll allow myself a little laziness." While doing household chores, she postponed less urgent tasks, such as cleaning the windows, to the next day, prioritizing essential duties like preparing three meals and washing up.

events.name: Communicating with Husband about Family Responsibilities
events.description: While her husband was resting, Ma Xiulan again mentioned her physical discomfort and the difficulty of taking care of both sets of elderly parents. "Zhiqiang, sometimes I really feel overwhelmed," she said. Ma Zhiqiang put down his phone and replied, "From now on, leave the heavy work for me when I come back. If you need to buy rice or flour when visiting your parents, call me." Though it was just a simple promise, it made Ma Xiulan feel that she was no longer carrying the burden alone.

events.name: Initiate contact with the eldest child's homeroom teacher.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan sent a long WeChat message to Teacher Han, detailing the communication with her child at home the previous night. She expressed gratitude for the teacher's concern and inquired about any specific areas to focus on during the upcoming review period. She hoped that both the school and the family could work together to help the child navigate this period smoothly.

events.name: Try to prepare a healthy dinner.
events.description: For dinner, Ma Xiulan deliberately used less oil and salt, prepared an extra plate of stir-fried vegetables, and skimmed the fat off the stewed pork rib soup. She explained to her family, "The TV says eating lighter is better for your health, especially for Dad and you." Although the children grumbled that it was bland, they still finished their meal.

events.name: Warm Mother's Day Celebration
events.description: Before dinner, a surprise arrived. The eldest son shyly presented a carnation, the second son bounced over to hand her a hand-drawn card, and the youngest daughter rushed over, hugging her and shouting, "Happy Mother's Day, Mom!" Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, also handed her a box of her favorite lüdagun, saying, "I bought it on the way—eat it while it's hot." At that moment, Ma Xiulan's eyes grew slightly moist, and she felt all the hardships were worth it.

events.name: Procurement of Handicraft Order Materials
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the fabric store in town and bought embroidery threads and small pieces of cotton cloth according to the list provided by Zhou Xiuqin. To meet the kindergarten's requirements, she repeatedly compared colors and selected the brightest and safest ones, then began contemplating the embroidery patterns in her mind.

events.name: Cherish Family Time
events.description: On Mother's Day afternoon, Ma Xiulan did not rush to do her chores as usual. Instead, she moved a stool to sit in the yard, watching her two sons do their homework while her little daughter played house nearby. The warm sunshine shone down, and she felt this was the best holiday gift.

events.name: Evening Walk Recovery
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took a 35-minute walk along the riverside path, chatted with her neighbor Wang Guilan, and felt delighted.

events.name: Mother's Day Dessert Intake
events.description: During the celebration, we ate sweet snacks such as Lüdagunr, which led to weight gain due to the additional sugar intake.

起始状态.心情: I have some expectations for Mother's Day, and at the same time, I plan to put into practice the new idea of "slowing down."

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of happiness and contentment, the love of family has eased the fatigue, and there is greater confidence in adjusting to life in the future.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade, daily household chores, walking for shopping, and 35 minutes of evening walk.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day dedicated to cultivating healthy habits and demonstrating filial piety. Following her neighbor's suggestion, Ma Xiulan embarked on her first morning walk. Meanwhile, she assisted Master Liu in successfully replacing the old window screens at her parents' home, eliminating safety hazards. Through these practical actions, she fulfilled her filial duties and felt a deep sense of fulfillment.

events.name: Accept the neighbor's suggestion and make a plan.
events.description: I ran into Wang Guilan at the door again this morning. Ma Xiulan took the initiative to say, "Sister Wang, I've decided to take your advice and start taking morning walks from tomorrow." Sister Wang was very pleased, "That's right! If you stick with it, it will definitely work." Ma Xiulan set a small goal for herself: "Get up at six and walk for twenty minutes."

events.name: First Morning Walk
events.description: At six in the morning, the alarm clock rang. Ma Xiulan struggled for a moment but eventually got up, changed into her comfortable old cloth shoes, and gently closed the courtyard gate. The alleys around Jingwen Road were still quiet. She walked slowly, admiring the pomegranate blossoms peeking out from the yards along the roadside and breathing in the fresh morning air. She felt her mind clear up a bit. After walking for about twenty minutes, she began to sweat slightly.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: After returning from her walk, Ma Xiulan practiced 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the courtyard, feeling relief from back and waist soreness and an improvement in energy levels.

events.name: Assist in replacing the screen windows at my parents' home.
events.description: In the morning, Master Liu arrived punctually with his materials and tools. Ma Xiulan assisted by holding the old window frame, handing over the screwdriver, and cleaning the removed old screens. Master Liu worked deftly, cutting the measured stainless steel screen precisely to size and fitting the sealing strips snugly into place.

events.name: Accept and complete the filial piety initiative.
events.description: After the screen windows were replaced, Ma Xiulan and her mother inspected them one by one, finding the sliding smooth and the mesh fine. "Now it's perfect—mosquitoes can't get in, and it looks much brighter!" her mother Li Xiuying praised repeatedly. Ma Xiulan paid for the labor and materials. Although it was another expense, seeing her parents' satisfied smiles made her feel the money was particularly well spent.

events.name: The sense of lightness after a walk
events.description: Upon returning from her walk and preparing breakfast, Ma Xiulan unexpectedly felt more energetic than usual, unlike the grogginess she used to experience immediately upon waking. This slight positive feedback gave her a bit of confidence in sticking to her walking routine.

events.name: Evening Walk Maintenance
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took a 30-minute walk in the community park, enjoying the peaceful time alone.

events.name: Staying up late due to work commitments
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan handled manual orders and household accounts, staying up late and delaying her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: With the determination to try new habits and a slight discomfort from waking up early

结束状态.心情: A dual sense of satisfaction arises—both from the gratification of taking the first successful step toward health and from the reassurance and peace of mind that come from having done something practical for one's parents.

state.今日运动: Morning walk for about 20 minutes, 20 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises, light labor assisting with window screen replacement, and an evening walk for 30 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with morning mist dissipating after sunrise.

2025-05.daily_overview: The consolidation of new habits proceeded alongside the commencement of [a new career]. Ma Xiulan persisted with her second morning walk and officially began embroidering the first piece for the kindergarten order. Life moved smoothly along both old and new tracks, now infused with a renewed sense of purpose.

events.name: Adhere to morning walks
events.description: When the alarm sounded again, getting up didn't seem as difficult. Ma Xiulan walked the same route as yesterday, and today she noticed that the old locust tree at the entrance of the alley was blooming, with a faint fragrance. After returning from her walk, she prepared breakfast for the family as usual, feeling that the morning time had been stretched and utilized more fully because of this walk.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: After her walk, Ma Xiulan performed 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the courtyard, with fluid movements that left her feeling physically and mentally refreshed.

events.name: Begin embroidering the first order.
events.description: After sending her child off, Ma Xiulan could finally sit down and start embroidering the order. She spread out the cotton cloth, tightened the embroidery hoop, and carefully made the first stitch while referring to the bunny pattern sent by Zhou Xiuqin. Due to the high standards required, she embroidered even more meticulously than when making things for herself. In the process, she even sent a WeChat message to Zhou Xiuqin to confirm a gradient color stitching technique, just to be sure.

events.name: Share New Habits with Children
events.description: When picking up her younger daughter from school in the afternoon, Ma Yuxin asked her mother why she looked so energetic today. Ma Xiulan smiled and said, "Because I went for a walk this morning and breathed in some fresh air." The daughter nodded somewhat naively and said, "Mom, you're awesome."

events.name: Evening Walk
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took her youngest daughter for a 25-minute walk on Jingwen Road, combining it with parent-child interaction.

events.name: Dietary Control
events.description: To control her weight, Ma Xiulan reduced her intake of staple foods for dinner and ate more vegetables.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the subtle momentum of ingrained persistence.

结束状态.心情: Focus and steadiness bring a fulfilling sense of satisfaction from completing established plans.

state.今日运动: A morning walk of approximately 20 minutes, 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the morning, and an evening walk of 25 minutes.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day of multitasking. While maintaining her morning exercise routine and advancing handicraft orders, Ma Xiulan proactively began to focus on her younger daughter's school admission policies. She also purchased medication in advance for tomorrow's care of her parents, demonstrating her dual sense of responsibility and foresight as both a mother and a daughter.

events.name: The Third Morning Walk
events.description: On the third day of her walk, Ma Xiulan was already able to wake up naturally at this hour. She strolled slowly along Jingwen Road, occasionally encountering elderly people walking their dogs early in the morning, and they would nod to each other in greeting. The walk had become more like a quiet ritual of her own, rather than a task she needed to persist in.

events.name: Morning Eight-Section Brocade Exercise
events.description: After the walk, Ma Xiulan practiced 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the courtyard and felt that the discomfort in her waist and back had largely disappeared.

events.name: Start paying attention to the admission policies
events.description: While listening to the local news on the radio in the morning, the announcement about the new year's primary school enrollment policy caught Ma Xiulan's attention. Her youngest daughter is set to start primary school in September, which is a significant matter. She thought about checking the community bulletin board or asking experienced neighbors for advice.

events.name: Purchasing backup medication for parents
events.description: Thinking about visiting her parents the next day, Ma Xiulan stopped by the community clinic on the way. She found Dr. Wang Jianguo, whom she was familiar with, and explained that her parents' regular medications were running low. Dr. Wang patiently listened to the situation, prescribed antihypertensive medication for her mother, and recommended a topical ointment suitable for her father's joint pain. Ma Xiulan took the prescription to the pharmacy, purchased all the items, and spent around two hundred yuan.

events.name: Continue with the embroidery order
events.description: While her youngest daughter was taking an afternoon nap, Ma Xiulan seized the time to embroider a rabbit. The main part was nearly finished, with the fluffy tail vividly brought to life. She began planning the color scheme for the next piece—a sunflower—thinking of using bright yellow and orange to create a sunny feel.

events.name: Communicating Progress with Fellow Craft Enthusiasts
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan and Zhou Xiuqin had a brief video call, showing each other their unfinished works. Zhou Xiuqin praised Ma Xiulan for the lifelike rabbit embroidery and shared a small tip for making the color transition of petals appear more natural. While chatting, Ma Xiulan continued working on the finishing touches without pause.

events.name: Evening walk shortened due to rain
events.description: Encountering a sudden shower in the evening, Ma Xiulan only took a 15-minute walk in the community park before returning home.

events.name: Temporary dietary changes
events.description: Due to going out to purchase medicine, lunch was hastily resolved outside, resulting in an unbalanced intake.

起始状态.心情: Systematically planning multiple tasks for the day.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled yet slightly fatigued, but having accomplished multiple planned tasks, I feel at ease.

state.今日运动: Morning walk for about 20 minutes, 20 minutes of morning Eight-Section Brocade, walking to the clinic and pharmacy, and an evening walk for 15 minutes.

2025-05.daily_overview: Habits gradually solidify, and responsibility always rests on one's shoulders. Ma Xiulan encountered companions during her morning walk, integrating the habit into her daily life. She went to her parents' home to provide care and delivered the medication prepared in advance, properly arranging for their health needs, which reflects her meticulous filial piety.

events.name: Encountering a Companion During a Morning Walk
events.description: While taking a walk today, I unexpectedly ran into my neighbor Wang Guilan, who was also out for some activity. "Xiulan, you're doing great keeping this up!" Sister Wang smiled and walked alongside her for a while. With a companion, the twenty-minute walk felt especially quick, and the two even agreed to walk together whenever the weather is nice in the future.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise
events.description: After the walk, Ma Xiulan performed 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the yard as part of her morning health routine, feeling energetic.

events.name: Taking care of parents and delivering medicine
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan brought the medicine she had bought the day before to her parents' home. She carefully explained to her mother the new packaging and dosage schedule of the blood pressure medication, and helped her father apply the newly purchased medicated plaster. "Dad, Mom, you mustn't stop taking your medicine. I'll buy more in advance when it's running low, so don't try to save on it." Only after seeing her parents put the medicine away did she feel at ease.

events.name: Record Household Medical Expenditures
events.description: When doing the evening bookkeeping, Ma Xiulan recorded 200 yuan spent on medicine for her parents under the [Medical Health] category. This added pressure to the already tight monthly budget, but she did not hesitate at all. She calculated that perhaps next month, after her handicraft orders were settled, she could make up for this expense.

events.name: A Budget-Conscious Dinner
events.description: Due to an unexpected medical expense, Ma Xiulan made an exceptionally simple dinner for her family: stir-fried rapeseed from their small vegetable garden, steamed egg custard, and steamed buns as the staple. She explained to her family, "It's hot, so something light is more comfortable." But in her heart, she was thinking that every little bit saved helps.

events.name: Maintaining Evening Walks
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took a 30-minute walk along the riverside path, reflecting on the day's affairs alone.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to economic pressure
events.description: When thinking about medical expenses and the family budget, Ma Xiulan felt slightly anxious in the evening, but she alleviated it by taking a walk.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, morning exercise has become part of the daily routine.

结束状态.心情: After fulfilling the responsibility of caring for their parents, they felt at ease, while financial pressures also made their consumption more cautious.

state.今日运动: Morning walk for about 25 minutes (with neighbors), 20 minutes of Baduanjin in the morning, and an evening walk for 30 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, comfortable temperature, with a gentle breeze in the morning.

2025-05.daily_overview: This was a day when Ma Xiulan practiced new healthy habits and began systematically preparing for her younger daughter's school enrollment. She found tranquility during her morning walk and gained clarity amidst the complex policy information in the parent group chat. In the afternoon, she prepared for the next day's family parent-child activity. In the evening, she found inner peace through embroidery, where each stitch and thread reflected both her planning for family matters and her own nourishment.

events.name: Research on the Enrollment Policy for Youngest Daughters
events.description: After breakfast, Ma Xiulan carefully read the "Implementation Opinions on School Enrollment for Compulsory Education in Jinghai District," which had been forwarded in the parent group chat, while tidying up the dishes. She took out paper and pen, noting down key details such as the school district zoning, the online registration timeline, and the required documentation list. Comparing the information on her household registration booklet and property ownership certificate, she preliminarily determined that her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, met the enrollment criteria for a well-regarded primary school within the designated zone. A weight lifted from her mind, though she knew the meticulous work of preparing the necessary materials still lay ahead.

events.name: Adaptive Morning Walk
events.description: This was her third day of insisting on an early morning walk. Unlike the reluctance of the previous two days, her steps felt a bit lighter as she stepped out today. Walking along the tree-lined path beside Jingwen Road, she began to consciously take slow, deep breaths, savoring the cool morning air. She noticed some nameless wildflowers blooming quietly by the roadside, and a few small birds hopping among the branches. This tranquility allowed her to temporarily set aside the trivial matters at home, making her feel that this half-hour was no longer a burden but rather a personal time to relax her mind. When she returned home, there was a subtle sense of ease on her face.

events.name: Preparing for the Parent-Child Vegetable Garden Activity
events.description: Thinking about taking her little daughter to sow seeds tomorrow, Ma Xiulan deliberately set aside time in the afternoon to prepare. She retrieved the tomato, cucumber, and bean seeds saved from last year from a tin box in the storeroom, carefully checking each one for moisture. Then, she cleaned the small shovel, bucket, and other tools, arranging them neatly at the entrance of the courtyard. Looking at the organized tools and seeds, she could almost picture her daughter’s curious little face and the lush greenery of the future vegetable garden, a smile unconsciously spreading across her lips.

events.name: Promote the production of handcrafted embroidery
events.description: In the evening, after the children had finished their homework and gone to bed, Ma Xiulan completed the final stitches of her first custom embroidery piece under the lamplight. She carefully trimmed the loose threads with scissors and gently ironed the fabric smooth. Then, she spread out a new piece of embroidery cloth and sketched the outline of her second work—a traditional auspicious pattern—with a pencil. After making a start and stitching a few basic lines, she felt satisfied with the smoothness of her needlework and decided to call it a day, laying the groundwork for intermittent embroidery sessions the following Saturday.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with anticipation for the new day, with thoughts lingering on the school admission policies for my daughter.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and stable, having completed the initial steps of multiple plans, there is a sense of control within.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a bit of sultriness in the afternoon.

2025-05.daily_overview: Saturday is a family day and also a social day. Ma Xiulan's morning begins with practical information exchanges with her neighbors, while morning exercise brings positive physical feedback. The highlight of the morning is the parent-child time spent with her youngest daughter in the vegetable garden, filled with childlike fun and teaching. In the afternoon, amidst heavy household chores, she prepares for tomorrow's wedding and the daily trivialities of family life, with embroidery serving as a comforting respite in her busy schedule.

events.name: Consult neighbors for practical experience on school enrollment procedures.
events.description: Returning from a morning walk, Ma Xiulan happened to meet her neighbor Wang Guilan hanging laundry at the doorway. Ma Xiulan took the initiative to approach her and inquire about the specific procedures her grandson had followed when enrolling in elementary school. "Sister Wang, when your Xiaobao registered for school back then, which places did you have to visit? After submitting photocopies of the materials, did they require verification of the originals?" Wang Guilan kindly shared her experience, reminding Ma Xiulan to pay attention to the specific time slots when the online registration system opens, as well as the importance of getting the community seal in advance. These insights from someone who had "been through it" gave Ma Xiulan more confidence.

events.name: Morning Exercise Shows Initial Results
events.description: Today, during her walk, Ma Xiulan unknowingly went half a street farther than she had in the previous few days. She felt her legs and feet were stronger, and her breathing was smoother. After returning home, instead of sitting down to catch her breath as usual, she directly tied on her apron and began preparing breakfast. This subtle improvement in her energy delighted her, and she secretly resolved to stick with this habit.

events.name: Parent-Child Vegetable Garden Sowing
events.description: The morning sun was just right as Ma Xiulan brought her young daughter Ma Yuxin to the small courtyard garden. She first demonstrated how to use a small shovel to clear away last year's withered vines and weeds, and Yuxin, following her mother's example, clumsily yet earnestly helped out. After loosening the soil, Ma Xiulan taught her daughter to identify seeds of different shapes: "These round ones are tomatoes, and the flat ones are cucumbers..." Together, the mother and daughter scattered the seeds into the soil. Yuxin let out delighted exclamations from time to time, filling the small courtyard with laughter and joy.

events.name: Teaching Daughters Care and Organization
events.description: After sowing was completed, Ma Xiulan had her daughter use a small watering can to "feed water" to the seeds, explaining that plant babies, like children, require patient care to grow. Finally, she guided Yuxin in tidying up the scattered small shovels and buckets, returning them to their proper places. Looking at the freshly organized little vegetable garden, now brimming with hope, Ma Xiulan felt an immense sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Preparing attire for attending a wedding
events.description: During a break from cleaning in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan remembered that she needed to take her daughter to a relative's wedding the next day. She opened the wardrobe and picked out a clean, bright dress for her daughter, then found a set of clothes for herself that, although somewhat old, were well-preserved and of an appropriate style. Upon inspection, she noticed some wrinkles on her blouse and took out an iron to carefully smooth them out. Next, she placed the red envelopes, tissues, and other small items she needed to bring into a clean cloth bag.

events.name: Engaging in embroidery during breaks from household chores.
events.description: The household chores on Saturday came one after another. In the intervals between preparing three meals and dusting the furniture, Ma Xiulan would seize every spare moment to sit in front of her embroidery frame. She mainly worked on the repetitive, background-creeping vine patterns of her second piece. This type of stitching, which did not require intense concentration, allowed her hands to find a different kind of relaxation and creativity amidst the physical labor of housework. Though the progress was slow, it was steady.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and happy because it's the weekend, allowing for more parent-child activities to be arranged.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet filled with warmth, the daytime parent-child interactions and completed preparations made her feel the weekend was fulfilling.

state.今日运动: 35 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Eight-Section Brocade practice, and approximately 3 hours of household chores (including gardening).

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday's main theme revolves around family and kinship. In the early morning, taking a walk has quietly become a part of Ma Xiulan's daily routine. At noon, she attends a relative's wedding with her daughter, both dressed in their finest attire, fulfilling social courtesies and strengthening family bonds amidst the lively banquet. In the evening, sharing stories with her husband who has returned home completes the picture of a full and traditional day of rest.

events.name: The habit of morning exercise has been initially established.
events.description: For the fifth consecutive day of waking up early for a walk, Ma Xiulan no longer needed much mental preparation. She naturally changed into cloth shoes and pushed open the door. Today, her steps were light, and she even began to consider whether to take a different route tomorrow to explore the nearby small park. She clearly felt that this simple activity was no longer a task but a pleasant ritual to start the day, leaving both her body and mind feeling refreshed.

events.name: Attending a wedding banquet with my daughter
events.description: Approaching noon, Ma Xiulan combed her daughter's hair into braids and dressed her in a pretty dress. After both mother and daughter were ready, they left the house. To save time, she hailed a ride-hailing car and headed to a restaurant located in the Jinghai District. Upon arrival, she took her daughter to the registration desk, handed the prepared red envelope to the relative in charge of collecting gifts, and neatly wrote her name and well-wishes in the gift registry.

events.name: Family Greetings at the Wedding Banquet
events.description: Upon entering the banquet hall, Ma Xiulan found the designated table for relatives. Seated at the same table were her distant cousin Li Xiuying, along with several other relatives she did not often see. They exchanged greetings, and the conversation naturally revolved around their children—who had been admitted to a prestigious university, how their children’s careers were progressing, and the health of their parents. While attending to her daughter’s meal, Ma Xiulan engaged in the conversation, occasionally raising her glass to toast the newlyweds. Though such occasions were somewhat formal, they allowed her to feel the continuity of the family lineage.

events.name: Returning Home After the Wedding Banquet
events.description: After the banquet ended, Ma Xiulan bid farewell to her relatives, taking along her daughter who was full and a bit sleepy. On the bus ride home, the daughter excitedly told her mother about the beautiful wedding dress and cake at the ceremony. Ma Xiulan listened with a smile, occasionally adding a comment or two. The afternoon sunlight streamed through the bus window, making everyone feel drowsy.

events.name: Sharing the day's events with my husband
events.description: In the evening, Ma Zhiqiang, who works in transportation, rarely returned home on time. After the family of five had a simple dinner, Ma Xiulan tidied up the kitchen while telling her husband about the wedding she attended during the day: "I saw Aunt Li. Her second child is taking the college entrance exam this year... The gift money was given according to the old custom—three hundred yuan." Her husband listened, occasionally asking a question or two. The simple conversation was filled with the grounded feeling of everyday life.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a slight anticipation for attending celebratory occasions.

结束状态.心情: Tranquil and content, having fulfilled social etiquette, the family atmosphere is warm and harmonious.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk followed by 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise.

2025-05.daily_overview: Monday marked a return to the usual busyness and planning. Ma Xiulan proactively contacted the teacher to inquire about her child's academic progress and systematically began organizing the core materials for her younger daughter's school enrollment, with clear steps and an orderly approach. Consistent morning exercise brought positive physical and mental feedback. Meanwhile, her handicraft orders entered a critical phase, and an evening television program opened up new ideas for her family's health management.

events.name: Communicating with the Homeroom Teacher of the Second Son
events.description: Taking advantage of her free time in the morning, Ma Xiulan called Mr. Yang, the homeroom teacher of her second son, Ma Mingzhe. She politely inquired about her child's performance in the recent unit test and specifically asked, "Mr. Yang, Mingzhe is a smart kid, but he tends to be too hasty when doing exercises, often skipping questions or misreading numbers. How should we guide him at home to help him overcome this habit?" Mr. Yang offered suggestions such as helping the child develop a habit of reviewing his work and starting by reducing careless mistakes. Ma Xiulan carefully noted them down, feeling she now had a clear direction.

events.name: Organize Key Admission Documents Centrally
events.description: After finishing the phone call, Ma Xiulan began preparing the enrollment materials for her younger daughter. She retrieved the household register and property ownership certificate from the bedroom chest of drawers, then found Ma Yuxin’s birth medical certificate and vaccination record from a box specifically designated for the children’s belongings. She spread all the documents out on the living room table and, as if handling precious treasures, meticulously checked each one to ensure that the names, ID numbers, addresses, and other details were completely consistent, confirming that everything was correct.

events.name: Preparation of Material List and Archiving
events.description: After confirming all documents were complete, Ma Xiulan found a hardcover folder. She neatly listed on a sticky note: "1. Household register (original + copies of the main page, child's page, and parents' pages); 2. Property ownership certificate (original + copy); 3. Birth certificate (original + copy); 4. Vaccination certificate (original + copy, must be fully verified)." After writing, she attached the note to the cover of the folder, then carefully placed all the original documents inside and secured them.

events.name: Check vaccination records
events.description: She meticulously examined her youngest daughter's vaccination certificate, cross-referencing it page by page with the immunization schedule required for school enrollment. She discovered that a booster dose of the DPT vaccine was nearing its expiration. Immediately, she noted on a sticky note, "Take Yuxin to the community clinic for the vaccine booster soon," and planned to call for an appointment the next day.

events.name: Final Review and Proper Storage
events.description: After completing all the work, Ma Xiulan opened the folder once again and checked the documents inside one by one against the cover list, confirming that none were missing. Then, she placed this important folder in the drawer of the TV cabinet in the living room—a location known to the entire family and within her easy reach. With everything done, she let out a long sigh of relief, feeling as though she had accomplished a significant task.

events.name: Experience the positive changes brought by morning exercise.
events.description: After adhering to a morning walk routine for about a week, Ma Xiulan today clearly felt the difference. Not only did she have more energy during the day and found it easier to stay focused without tiring easily, but even the frequent backaches caused by long hours of bending over for household chores had noticeably eased recently. The fresh morning air and the solitary moments seemed to have become stabilizers for her emotions, allowing her to handle family chores with a calmer mindset.

events.name: Focus on overcoming the challenges of handicraft orders
events.description: With the children all at school on Monday, the house was exceptionally quiet. Ma Xiulan utilized the uninterrupted morning hours to focus on embroidering the most intricate core pattern of the second private order—a crane with outstretched wings. This section required frequent changes of silk thread in varying shades of gray and white, along with extremely dense stitching to capture the layered texture of the feathers. She was so absorbed in her work that she almost lost track of time.

events.name: Gaining Inspiration for Healthy Eating from TV Programs
events.description: While watching TV in the evening, the local lifestyle channel was airing a program about "Healthy Eating at the Family Dining Table." Ma Xiulan was captivated by the show, where experts shared insights such as "less oil and salt without compromising flavor," "eating more seasonal vegetables," and "partially replacing refined rice and flour with tubers and coarse grains." She found these ideas both fresh and practical. She grabbed a small notebook and jotted down key points, such as "steamed pumpkin as a partial substitute for rice" and "adding salt after stir-frying," deciding to try them out when grocery shopping the next day.

起始状态.心情: Clear thinking, ready to efficiently handle multiple backlogged tasks

结束状态.心情: A strong sense of accomplishment, well-prepared materials, and fresh ideas about health have filled her with enthusiasm to try new things tomorrow.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise

2025-05.daily_overview: On this day, Ma Xiulan put the health concepts from the previous night into practice. From purchasing ingredients based on the new approach, to meticulously preparing a "revised version" of a healthy dinner, and finally gathering initial feedback from her family, she completed a full attempt at family health management. Although there were minor challenges in the process, it was largely filled with the joy of exploration and a sense of responsibility for her family's well-being.

events.name: Procure ingredients based on health principles
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the bustling Xingwang Market, her usual destination, with a vegetable basket in hand. At Aunt Sun's stall, she deliberately selected a few more varieties of seasonal leafy greens and bought half a pound less fatty meat. Seeing the fresh golden pumpkins, she recalled advice from a television program and purchased one. At the condiment stall, she hesitated for a moment but ultimately bought only the usual items, refraining from picking up a bottle of thick oyster sauce as she normally would. In her shopping basket, the proportion of vegetables had noticeably increased.

events.name: Try cooking a healthy dinner.
events.description: While preparing dinner that afternoon, Ma Xiulan intentionally made some changes. When cooking braised pork, she used one spoonful less oil and half a spoonful less dark soy sauce than usual, and she set aside a portion of the meat to stir-fry with garlic slices. She prepared an extra plate of stir-fried bok choy and a bowl of broccoli with minced garlic. At the same time, she cut the pumpkin into chunks and steamed it together with the rice. Throughout the cooking process, she silently repeated to herself, "less salt, more variety," trying to strike a balance between maintaining her family's accustomed flavors and ensuring their health.

events.name: Sharing the Concept of Healthy Dinners with Family
events.description: The dinner table was laden with a colorful array of dishes. Ma Xiulan explained somewhat nervously to her family, "I heard on TV that eating lighter is better for our health. We should pay more attention to that from now on. Let's try it today—how does it taste?" Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, picked up a piece of stir-fried meat and nodded, saying, "It's good." The eldest son, Ma Mingxuan tasted a bite of braised pork and whispered, "It doesn't seem as flavorful as before," but he didn't refuse it. The younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, however, really enjoyed the sweet steamed pumpkin. The family chatted while eating, discussing which cooking method tasted better, creating a lively atmosphere.

events.name: Reflect and Plan for Continuous Improvement
events.description: After tidying up the kitchen, Ma Xiulan reflected on the dinner scene. Although her eldest son found the food bland, her husband's support and her youngest daughter's enjoyment greatly encouraged her. She realized that changing her family's eating habits could not be achieved overnight and needed to be done gradually. She decided that from now on, she would prepare such "healthy meals" two to three times a week on a regular basis. Next time, she could try using natural ingredients like scallions, ginger, garlic, and shiitake mushrooms to enhance the flavor, aiming to better combine "healthiness" and "deliciousness."

起始状态.心情: Eager to put the newly acquired health knowledge into practice.

结束状态.心情: Feeling both relieved and motivated, she found her family's acceptance better than expected, which gave her greater confidence in continuously improving the family's health.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, and approximately 1 hour of walking for household chores and shopping.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Ma Xiulan primarily focused on confirming and communicating key family matters. She finalized the verification of her daughter's school enrollment information and reached a consensus with her husband, allowing her to set aside her lingering concerns completely. Meanwhile, she shared with her neighbors the positive feelings from maintaining a morning exercise routine and the joy of planting in the vegetable garden. The daily mutual assistance and exchanges made life feel even warmer.

events.name: Final Verification of Admission Information
events.description: To ensure everything was foolproof, Ma Xiulan contacted a parent named Sister Zhang in the WeChat group, whose child was currently attending the target experimental primary school. She inquired in detail about the specific procedures for last year’s enrollment, the strictness of document verification, and the general situation of the school. Sister Zhang’s feedback was completely consistent with the information she had previously gathered, which put her mind at ease and confirmed that there were no policy obstacles for her younger daughter’s enrollment. The next step was simply to follow the procedures step by step.

events.name: Communicate and divide tasks with husband after confirming the information.
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan told her husband Ma Zhiqiang the final confirmed news. "The school district is fine, and I've basically gathered all the required materials. Online registration will likely take place around mid-June. At that time, we might need your original ID card, or there's a chance both parents may need to be present..." She explained the procedures she had learned about and her own plans one by one. Ma Zhiqiang listened, nodded, and said, "Alright, as long as you're clear on it. Just let me know in advance what you need me to do when the time comes." The couple always managed to quickly reach a tacit understanding on crucial matters.

events.name: Sharing the Results of Persistence in Morning Exercise with Neighbors
events.description: When going out to take out the trash in the evening, I ran into Wang Guilan again. Ma Xiulan took the initiative to mention, "Sister Wang, I've been following your advice and have been taking walks for over a week now. I really feel a difference—my body feels much more relaxed." Wang Guilan was delighted to hear this and repeatedly said, "It's good that you've kept it up." The two chatted for a while longer on the topic of health. Ma Xiulan was genuinely grateful to this warm-hearted neighbor for her initial suggestion.

events.name: Exchange gardening tips with neighbors and share seeds
events.description: After discussing health, Ma Xiulan went on to talk about planting vegetables with her daughter over the weekend, her words brimming with joy. Remembering that she had some extra green bean seeds at home, she went back and grabbed a handful to give to Wang Guilan. "Sister Wang, these green bean seeds are excellent—they sprout evenly. You could even plant some in a flowerpot on your balcony." Wang Guilan accepted them with a smile, and the two exchanged more ideas on what vegetables are best to plant in spring.

events.name: Inspect the vegetable garden and perform simple maintenance.
events.description: After seeing Wang Guilan off, Ma Xiulan took a detour to check on her small vegetable garden. It had only been a few days since sowing, and it was not yet time for the seeds to sprout. She touched the soil with her hand and felt it was a bit dry, so she fetched a small half-bucket of water and evenly watered the garden. At the same time, her sharp eyes spotted a few weeds that had just emerged, which she promptly pulled out. This small vegetable garden embodied her love and hope for life.

起始状态.心情: Steady, because the key to-do items have been confirmed, allowing focus on execution.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and happy, having completed the important confirmation work, and the neighborly interactions are also quite pleasant.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, 20 minutes of light gardening activity

date_attribute.weather: It's cloudy and rather sultry; it seems it's going to rain.

2025-05.daily_overview: This day marked a milestone in the progress of handicraft work. Ma Xiulan had completed the embroidery and meticulous finishing of a private order, ready for delivery. To her pleasant surprise, she noticed in the handicraft enthusiasts’ group a collaboration intent from the community kindergarten. This signified a crucial step from personal hobby toward small-scale commercial cooperation, filling her heart with anticipation.

events.name: Complete the main embroidery of the second piece.
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet morning hours, Ma Xiulan worked in one go and completed the final stitch of the main section of her second embroidery piece (Crane Painting). She let out a long sigh of relief, placed the two finished works—one of peonies and one of cranes—side by side on the sofa, and stepped back to examine them carefully. Were the color combinations harmonious? Was the composition well-balanced? After a moment of self-reflection, she nodded with satisfaction.

events.name: Perform final finishing on the embroidery.
events.description: In the afternoon, she began the final preparations before delivery. First, she meticulously trimmed all excess threads from the back of the two embroideries with a small pair of scissors. Then, using a clean, slightly damp white cloth, she gently wiped the embroidered surfaces to remove any fine dust that might have settled. Finally, she preheated the iron, placed a thin cloth over the embroideries, and carefully pressed them until they were perfectly smooth. After this meticulous care, the two pieces appeared even more exquisite.

events.name: Secured the first small-scale cooperative order intention
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan saw a message from her fellow handicraft enthusiast Zhou Xiuqin in the "Jinghai Skilled Sisters" WeChat group, where Zhou had tagged her: "@Xiulan, the community kindergarten wants to decorate for Children's Day and needs about ten small animal-themed embroidered pieces for decoration. They're not very large. I remember your animal embroidery is incredibly lifelike. Would you be interested in taking this on? We could work on it together." Ma Xiulan's heart skipped a beat—this was not only recognition but also a clear opportunity for collaboration! Suppressing her excitement, she replied in the group: "Thank you, Sister Xiuqin, for thinking of me! I'm definitely interested. Shall we discuss the specific requirements and pricing in detail?" The two then arranged to meet the next day to talk.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to order pressure
events.description: In the evening, while organizing her embroidery works, Ma Xiulan suddenly felt a wave of anxiety: If she accepted the kindergarten order, with its tight schedule and heavy workload, would it interfere with her household chores and time with her child? She took a few deep breaths, told herself to take it slow, and decided to discuss detailed planning with Zhou Xiuqin the next day.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan to concentrate on completing the embroidery piece at hand today.

结束状态.心情: Excited and full of anticipation, yet with a hint of anxiety, I have not only completed the work but also seen a clear path for turning craftsmanship into profit and gaining recognition.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise

2025-05.daily_overview: Today marks a "milestone day" for Ma Xiulan's handicraft career. She successfully delivered a private order and received positive feedback. More importantly, after detailed discussions with Zhou Xiuqin, she secured an order for ten embroidery pieces for the community kindergarten, with all details clarified. The transition from a hobby to a formal collaboration has now been realized, bringing her tangible income and broader possibilities.

events.name: Deliver private orders and receive satisfactory feedback
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan handed over two carefully framed embroidery pieces to Zhou Xiuqin, who would pass them on to the previous client. In the afternoon, Zhou Xiuqin sent a WeChat message saying that the client was very satisfied, finding the embroidery exquisite and far exceeding expectations, and had already paid the full remaining balance through Zhou Xiuqin. Zhou Xiuqin also relayed the client's words: "We will turn to Master Ma again if there is any need in the future." The title "Master Ma" made Ma Xiulan feel delighted.

events.name: Discuss the details of the kindergarten order with Zhou Xiuqin.
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhou Xiuqin visited Ma Xiulan's home. The two sat in the living room, sipping tea while discussing matters in detail. Zhou Xiuqin brought the kindergarten teacher's preliminary idea: the theme would be "Forest Friends," requiring 10 embroidered pieces featuring different small animals (such as rabbits, bears, squirrels, etc.), each approximately the size of an A4 sheet of paper, to be used for decorating the hallway. Together, they discussed the materials to be used (cotton-linen fabric), the embroidery thread (pure cotton thread), the estimated working hours, and made a preliminary calculation of the fabric cost and the unit price for the handiwork. They agreed that the total price would be settled before Children's Day. Ma Xiulan carefully took notes in her notebook, occasionally offering her own suggestions, such as which animal patterns children might prefer.

events.name: Deliver the first batch of embroidery works and settle part of the payment
events.description: In the morning, before discussing the new order, Ma Xiulan handed over the five previously completed small embroidery pieces (intended for the community display project) to Zhou Xiuqin. After carefully inspecting them, Zhou Xiuqin was very satisfied and promptly settled the payment for this batch of embroidery works as agreed.

events.name: Family Sharing and Planning After Project Completion
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan told her husband Ma Zhiqiang about the two payments she received that day (the final installment for a private order and the payment for a small batch of embroidery work), and showed him the cash. Her husband was also pleased and praised her, saying, "Your craftsmanship is truly impressive." Ma Xiulan began to plan: with the ten-piece order from the kindergarten, although the timeline was tight, the income was relatively stable. She needed to carefully schedule her daily workload to ensure it did not interfere with household chores and taking care of the children.

events.name: Learn New Handicraft Tutorials
events.description: While scrolling through her phone before bed, Ma Xiulan saw a tutorial link for making "Traditional Mugwort Sachets for the Dragon Boat Festival" shared by Zhou Xiuqin in a handicraft group. She opened the link and carefully reviewed the step-by-step instructions with images, finding it not too difficult and timely for the upcoming festival. She saved the tutorial pictures, thinking she could buy some mugwort and fabric scraps when she had time to make a few for her family to repel mosquitoes and soothe the mind.

起始状态.心情: Feeling both anticipation and slight nervousness while preparing for an important cooperation negotiation.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment and confidence is soaring, negotiations are proceeding smoothly, income is secured, and I feel that I am forging a new and valuable path.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk (undertaken in a light rain, which offered a unique experience), followed by 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

2025-05.daily_overview: Over the weekend, Ma Xiulan entered the phase of creative preparation for new orders, but began experiencing discomfort in her lower back. She immersed herself in the joy of designing small animal patterns while preparing materials for the Dragon Boat Festival. However, prolonged sitting led to slight strain in her waist, which affected her activities today.

events.name: Design embroidery patterns for kindergarten orders
events.description: Taking advantage of the weekend when her husband was home to help look after the child, Ma Xiulan sat at her desk in the morning and began designing patterns for ten small animal embroidery pieces. She found her daughter Ma Yuxin's children's picture books as references and also searched for cute simple animal drawings on her phone. Using a pencil, she carefully sketched outlines of ten animals on paper, including a little rabbit, a small bear, a squirrel, a bird, and a fish, among others. Beside each sketch, she used colored pens to note preliminary color scheme ideas, such as white and pink for the little rabbit, and brown and off-white for the small bear.

events.name: Initial signs of minor lumbar strain.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan suddenly felt a sharp pain and stiffness in her lower back when she stood up after prolonged sitting during her design work. She realized it might be due to consecutive days of rushing to complete handicraft orders, which involved long periods of sitting in a fixed posture. She decided to reduce her sedentary time, increase breaks for movement, and planned to apply a warm compress tonight for relief.

events.name: Prepare materials for making mugwort sachets
events.description: Despite the discomfort in her waist, Ma Xiulan persisted in sorting through fabric scraps and mugwort to prepare materials for making sachets. She gathered the fabric scraps, mugwort, needle and thread, scissors, and other items into a small basket, though her movements were slower than usual to avoid excessive bending.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and full of creative energy, the weekend can be dedicated to focusing on the design work you love.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied yet slightly concerned, she completed the preliminary design, but the discomfort in her waist made her realize the need to adjust her work habits.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning walk (distance shortened due to lower back discomfort), 15-minute practice of Baduanjin, and daily household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny intervals with strong southerly winds.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday marked the first formal income from Ma Xiulan's handicrafts, along with rational financial planning with her family. She efficiently completed pattern confirmation and material procurement for new orders, paving the way for formal production. Meanwhile, family handicraft activities continued, with the making of mugwort sachets together with her daughter adding warm parent-child moments, and her waist discomfort has somewhat alleviated.

events.name: Received the first cooperative order revenue
events.description: In the morning, the notification tone from WeChat sounded—it was 300 yuan transferred by Zhou Xiuqin, with a note reading "kindergarten order deposit." Ma Xiulan tapped to accept it. As she looked at the words "Money Received" and the number on the screen, an indescribable sense of joy and reassurance welled up in her heart. This was not merely 300 yuan; it was proof that her skills and her time had been recognized and valued by the market.

events.name: Record income and plan its use with husband
events.description: After receiving the money, Ma Xiulan took out the hardcover notebook where she recorded daily expenses, opened a new page at the very end, neatly wrote "Handicraft Cooperation Income," and then noted down, "May 25, received deposit for kindergarten order, 300 yuan." When her husband returned home in the evening, she showed him the account book and discussed, "This money is an unexpected gain. I think we should not spend it for now and instead add it to our 'Family Emergency Fund' savings passbook. What do you think?" Ma Zhiqiang agreed wholeheartedly: "Sure, it's good to save it for emergencies."

events.name: Confirm the pattern and procure order materials.
events.description: Ma Xiulan took photos of the ten small animal sketches she had drawn and sent them to Zhou Xiuqin. After Zhou Xiuqin forwarded them to the kindergarten teacher, she quickly replied, "The teacher likes them very much, let's go ahead with these!" With the confirmation, Ma Xiulan set off for the small commodity market in Jinghai District that afternoon. Following the list, she carefully selected ten plain cotton-linen embroidery fabrics of suitable sizes, a set of pure cotton embroidery threads in as many as 36 colors, and a new circular embroidery hoop. She meticulously calculated the prices, striving to control costs while ensuring quality.

events.name: Preparing materials for new orders
events.description: After returning from the market, Ma Xiulan cut the newly purchased embroidery fabric according to the required dimensions. She took out the reference pattern previously provided by Zhou Xiuqin and used a water-soluble pen to trace the outline of a small bear on one piece of the fabric. After stretching it onto the embroidery hoop and preparing the corresponding colored threads, she made all the necessary preparations for the formal start of work the next day. Meanwhile, she made sure to stand up and move around at regular intervals to alleviate the discomfort in her lower back.

events.name: Making the First Mugwort Sachet with My Daughter
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took out the prepared materials and called her youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin. "Sweetie, Mom will teach you how to make a small sachet. Wearing it will keep mosquitoes away and leave a pleasant fragrance." Following an online tutorial on her phone, she cut the fabric and threaded the needle. Yuxin watched curiously nearby. When her mother finished sewing a small cloth bag, she excitedly helped stuff dried mugwort into it bit by bit. Although the first finished product had slightly uneven stitches, it emitted a fresh mugwort fragrance, and both mother and daughter felt a great sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and joyful, looking forward to the start of a new week.

结束状态.心情: Abundant and fulfilling, with the joy of financial gains, the composure of having completed preparations, and the warmth of parent-child interactions, the lower back feels much better.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning walk (pay attention to posture), 15-minute practice of Baduanjin, and approximately 1 hour of walking for shopping.

2025-05.daily_overview: The new week began amidst a flurry of activities. Ma Xiulan, on one hand, planned a cultural outing with her sister, and on the other, officially commenced the embroidery work for the kindergarten order, immersing herself in the meticulous creation of stitch after stitch from morning till night. She also shared her joy with friends in the handicraft circle, feeling the warmth of mutual support within this small community. Healthy habits and household chores continued in an orderly manner despite the intense workload, but staying up late to meet deadlines resulted in insufficient sleep.

events.name: Planning a City Cultural and Leisure Tour with My Sister
events.description: After dropping off her child in the morning, Ma Xiulan made a WeChat call to her younger sister, Ma Xiufen. "Xiufen, didn't you mention last time that you wanted to go downtown together? I'm free after this Wednesday." The two sisters discussed over the phone and finally settled on Thursday, May 28. "I'll drive to pick you up, and we can go to the art museum to see the New Year painting exhibition. I'll treat you to lunch!" the younger sister said cheerfully. Ma Xiulan agreed with a smile and began looking forward to this rare outing.

events.name: Sharing Joy and Expressing Gratitude in the Crafts Group
events.description: During the lunch break, Ma Xiulan posted a message in the "Jinghai Skilled Sisters" group: "Thank you, sisters, and a special thanks to @Sister Xiuqin for the recommendation. The kindergarten order has officially started! This is my first time taking on such a formal job, and I'm really happy about it." As soon as the message was sent, Zhou Xiuqin, Aunt Wu, and others who were online in the group immediately replied with likes and words of encouragement. "Xiulan is skilled, so there's definitely no problem!" "Congratulations! May you receive more and more orders in the future!" Reading everyone's blessings, Ma Xiulan felt that this small online community was exceptionally warm.

events.name: Formally commence the production of the ordered embroidery.
events.description: After the children left for school, the house grew quiet. Ma Xiulan sat down by the window, stretched the embroidery fabric taut, and began her first piece—embroidering that adorable little bear. She first outlined the shape with brown embroidery thread using the flat stitch technique, then switched to silk threads in varying shades of brown, gradually filling in the details with the layered stitch method to create a fluffy texture. Fully immersed in her work, she strove to make every stitch even and delicate. She would sit for two or three hours at a time but would stand up and move around for five minutes every hour to protect her lower back.

events.name: Focus on completing the embroidery order and work through the night to meet the deadline.
events.description: From morning till night, apart from necessary household chores, cooking, and picking up the children, Ma Xiulan spent almost all her free time sitting in front of the embroidery frame. After finishing the housework in the evening, she would turn on the desk lamp and continue embroidering until late at night, completing the designs of a bear and a rabbit. This process of focused creation, though exhausting, made her feel immensely fulfilled, but staying up late reduced her sleep time.

events.name: Continue making mugwort sachets
events.description: While taking a break from embroidery to stretch her body, Ma Xiulan also took the opportunity to make a mugwort sachet. Drawing from her previous two attempts, her stitches were much neater this time, resulting in a beautifully crafted sachet shaped like a zongzi. She plans to make some for her family and neighbors as well.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy and ready to dive into the intense and fulfilling process of order production.

结束状态.所处地点: In the living room at home (beside the embroidery frame)
结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied, after a day of intense work, seeing the initial results of her efforts gave her a sense of accomplishment that offset the physical exhaustion, though staying up late left her feeling somewhat drowsy.

state.今日运动: Morning walk for 25 minutes (shortened due to hot weather), 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, household chores
