2025-05.daily_overview: Tuesday continued the race against time. Ma Xiulan encountered technical difficulties while embroidering ongoing orders but resolved them smoothly by seeking help from her fellow craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin, demonstrating the value of mutual support within the community. She completed the quality self-inspection of the first batch of embroidered works and continued refining the production of mugwort sachets. Through skill exchanges in online communities, she constantly honed her craft, and her lower back discomfort was largely alleviated.

events.name: Embroidery order fulfillment and technical issue resolution
events.description: Today, Ma Xiulan was embroidering a fawn and a small bird. While working on the color transition for the fawn's neck fur, she felt the color blending was not natural enough and appeared somewhat stiff. She paused, took a photo of the embroidery, and sent it to Zhou Xiuqin, leaving a message to seek advice. Zhou Xiuqin quickly replied with a voice message: "For this part, you can try combining 'qiangzhen' (a type of shading stitch) and 'taozhen' (a type of layering stitch). Start with a light color as the base, then use darker threads to sparsely overlay it, building it up layer by layer." Following the guidance, Ma Xiulan gave it a try, and the result was indeed much softer. She promptly noted down this technique.

events.name: Complete the first batch of embroidery works and conduct self-inspection.
events.description: By the afternoon, Ma Xiulan had completed the first five embroidery pieces (bear, rabbit, squirrel, deer, and bird). She arranged the five works in a row on the living room floor, and under the natural light from the window, she leaned over to carefully inspect each one. She checked for any missed stitches, whether the colors were even, if the thread ends were neatly trimmed, and whether there were any stains on the embroidery surface. Only after confirming that these five pieces fully met her own quality standards did she feel reassured and begin to tidy up.

events.name: Seeking advice on sachet-making techniques in a handicraft group
events.description: In the evening, she took photos of the several mugwort sachets she had made and posted them in the crafting group chat. "@Xiuqin @Auntie Wu, I made a few Dragon Boat Festival sachets, but I always feel the closure doesn’t look good—the stitching appears rough and messy. Does anyone have a good method to make the closure both tight and neat?" Soon, the sisters in the group offered various suggestions: some recommended using the hidden stitch method, while others suggested sewing a drawstring channel first. Ma Xiulan read through the ideas while pondering, planning to try them out the next day.

events.name: Lumbar Care and Recovery
events.description: Ma Xiulan paid special attention to her sitting posture and regularly stood up today, which significantly alleviated the soreness in her waist. She applied a warm compress to her waist in the evening, feeling much more comfortable, and decided to continue maintaining these healthy habits.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan to complete a significant portion of today's orders.

结束状态.心情: Substantial and with a sense of progress, technical issues have been resolved, stage achievements have been completed, new knowledge has been gained, and physical condition is good.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk (the air is fresh in the morning after rain), followed by 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with a slight relief from the heat.

2025-05.daily_overview: This was a day when Ma Xiulan temporarily stepped away from her daily routine to enjoy sisterly affection and cultural enrichment. Her younger sister drove her to an art museum in downtown Tianjin, where they admired exquisite Yangliuqing New Year paintings, strolled through a park, dined at a small local restaurant, and visited a handicraft market. This outing not only broadened her horizons and gave her a new appreciation for traditional art but also deepened the emotional bond between the sisters.

events.name: Depart for the city center
events.description: Shortly after nine in the morning, Ma Xiufen arrived punctually at the entrance of 156 Jingwen Road in her red car. Ma Xiulan had already prepared herself, changed into her proper attire, and cheerfully got into her sister's car. The car drove out of Jinghai District and headed toward the center of Tianjin. Along the way, the two sisters chatted and laughed, discussing recent family matters.

events.name: Visit the Yangliuqing New Year Painting Masterpieces Exhibition
events.description: The two sisters arrived at the Tianjin Art Museum. In the exhibition hall of the ongoing "Jinmen Legacy—Exquisite Yangliuqing New Year Paintings Exhibition," Ma Xiulan was dazzled by the vibrant colors, rich compositions, and auspicious meanings of the New Year paintings. Familiar themes such as "Abundance Year After Year" and "Five Sons Achieving Success" appeared particularly vivid under the refined display and lighting. Her younger sister explained the characteristics of New Year paintings from different periods and their folkloric symbolism, which Ma Xiulan listened to with great interest. She had never imagined that the New Year paintings she usually considered "rustic" could be such a profound art form.

events.name: Park Stroll and Lunch
events.description: After visiting the exhibition, the two took a walk in the water park next to the art museum. With lush trees providing shade and the lake rippling gently, Ma Xiulan felt a long-lost sense of relaxation. The sisters found a bench to sit on and delved into conversations about their respective life troubles and amusing anecdotes. At noon, Ma Xiufen kept her promise and treated her sister to lunch at a clean and affordable Suzhou-style noodle restaurant. A bowl of hot noodle soup warmed her from the inside out, leaving her feeling thoroughly comfortable.

events.name: Visiting a Handicraft Market
events.description: After their meal, they strolled to a weekend handicraft market outside the park. As a handicraft enthusiast, Ma Xiulan took great interest in every stall. She saw vendors selling handmade knitwear, pottery, and vintage textiles. She lingered for a long time in front of several embroidery stalls, carefully observing the needlework and designs, occasionally exchanging a few words with the stall owners. She felt she had gained a great deal from the experience.

events.name: Return home and share the experiences.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiufen safely escorted her sister home. As soon as Ma Xiulan entered the house, she was surrounded by the children, who bombarded her with questions. During dinner, she described to her husband and children how exquisite the New Year paintings were, how beautiful the park was, and how interesting the market had been. "The chubby baby on the New Year painting would surely look lovely if embroidered!" she exclaimed excitedly, her eyes sparkling. This outing seemed to have injected a fresh burst of vitality into her.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation and excitement, preparing for a rare day of travel.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant, relaxed, and broadened in perspective, immersed in the dual satisfaction of art and family affection.

state.今日运动: Visiting the art museum and strolling in the park take approximately three hours in total.

date_attribute.weather: Hot and humid, windy in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: Upon returning from her trip, Ma Xiulan quickly resumed her daily life and work routine. In the evening, a natural doorstep chat with her neighbor Wang Guilan was filled with the warmth of everyday life and neighborly support. Meanwhile, she purchased ingredients for the upcoming Dragon Boat Festival, steadily progressed with her tight embroidery orders, and took the time to refine the details of her mugwort sachets.

events.name: An Evening Chat with Neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan sat on a small stool at her doorstep, picking beans for dinner. Wang Guilan from across the street also came out to enjoy the cool breeze with a cattail-leaf fan in hand, and naturally joined her. "Xiulan, you're back from the city? Did you have a good time?" Wang Guilan asked. The two began chatting, starting from the New Year paintings exhibition Ma Xiulan had visited to the increasingly aggressive mosquitoes lately.

events.name: Kind Reminders and Sharing Among Neighbors
events.description: Wang Guilan fanned herself and said, "There's been a lot of rain this year, and the mosquitoes are particularly vicious. Your child is still young, so you should take out the mosquito net and wash it in advance, and also buy some children's mosquito repellent to have on hand." Ma Xiulan nodded repeatedly, "Yes, I'll go buy some tomorrow. By the way, Sister Wang, the tomatoes in my vegetable garden have started to set fruit. I'll bring you the first ripe ones to try." Wang Guilan grinned from ear to ear, "Then I'm in for a treat!"

events.name: Finalize the Neighborhood Mutual Assistance Agreement
events.description: Toward the end of their conversation, Wang Guilan said, "I pickled some cucumbers a few days ago—sweet and sour flavor. I’ll bring you a small bowl to try tomorrow." Ma Xiulan didn’t decline and replied with a smile, "That sounds wonderful, thank you, Sister Wang! I happen to be going to buy some bamboo leaves tomorrow, and if I find good ones, I’ll bring some for you too." A relaxed and pleasant chat thus settled two small acts of mutual assistance between neighbors, full of warmth and human kindness.

events.name: Procurement of ingredients for making zongzi for the Dragon Boat Festival
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to Xingwang Vegetable Market. With the Dragon Boat Festival approaching, she purchased glutinous rice, fresh zongzi leaves, red dates, and red beans according to the recipe taught by her mother. She also specifically bought a small piece of pork belly to prepare meat-filled zongzi. In front of Aunt Sun’s vegetable stall, she took the opportunity to ask for advice on selecting zongzi leaves of moderate width and good toughness. Aunt Sun enthusiastically helped her pick a large bundle.

events.name: Advance order embroidery and communicate with husband
events.description: Today, she was working on the sixth and seventh pieces (a small fish and a kitten). As the color scheme was relatively simple, the progress was smooth. When her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, returned home in the evening, she continued stitching while chatting with him about the parent-teacher meeting that might be held at their eldest son’s school. After finishing the outline of a kitten, she showed it to her husband and asked, “Does this kitten look like the one we used to have?” Ma Zhiqiang leaned in for a closer look, nodded, and said, “Yes, it does. Your embroidery is getting better and better.” Hearing her husband’s affirmation, Ma Xiulan felt a warm sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Refine the details of the mugwort sachet
events.description: Following the suggestions from the group chat last night, Ma Xiulan found some colored silk threads and attempted to embroider simple characters for "peace" or a small flower on the surface of the already-made sachets. Although the characters were embroidered somewhat crookedly and the flowers were quite simple, the embellishments immediately made the sachets appear more refined, adding a touch of handmade warmth.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, returning to the familiar daily rhythm, carrying the pleasant mood from yesterday's outing.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, neighborly bonds and family interactions make an ordinary day shine with light.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning walk, 15-minute Baduanjin exercise, and going out for shopping.

2025-05.daily_overview: Friday was a day of harvesting potential opportunities and preparing for the traditional festival. Ma Xiulan received high praise from the kindergarten principal and new client referrals from Zhou Xiuqin, making the prospects for her handicraft business even brighter. She fulfilled her agreement with her neighbor and began soaking glutinous rice and preparing zongzi leaves, gradually filling the home with the atmosphere of the Dragon Boat Festival. Amidst the busy schedule, the embroidery of orders progressed steadily.

events.name: Receiving pickled vegetables shared by neighbors
events.description: In the morning, Wang Guilan indeed brought over a small bowl of her homemade pickled cucumber. Ma Xiulan happily accepted it, repeatedly expressing her thanks, and shared some of the extra rice leaves she had bought the day before with Wang Guilan. The two exchanged a few brief words about daily life at the doorway before returning to their respective homes to attend to their own tasks.

events.name: Preparing Ingredients for Making Zongzi
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan began preparing for the next day's zongzi-making activity. She soaked the purchased glutinous rice and red beans in separate basins. She then carefully washed the bamboo leaves several times, trimmed off the tough stems, and placed them in a large pot with water to boil until soft. The cooked bamboo leaves released a distinctive fragrance that filled the entire kitchen, instantly evoking the atmosphere of the Dragon Boat Festival.

events.name: Advancing order embroidery amidst busy schedules
events.description: Today, she needed to embroider the eighth and ninth pieces (the little elephant and the little dog). In the morning, she focused intently and embroidered for two hours. In the afternoon, she had to go out to purchase groceries for the weekend and pick up her youngest daughter from school. After returning home, while preparing dinner, she began mentally planning the details for the final two embroidery pieces (the little lamb and the little hedgehog). After the children went to bed in the evening, she turned on the desk lamp and embroidered for over an hour, with the outline of the little dog already clearly visible.

events.name: Secure potential follow-up orders and new customer referrals
events.description: In the evening, Zhou Xiuqin sent a WeChat message in an excited tone: "Xiulan, I have good news for you! I showed the kindergarten principal a few of the small samples we made, and she loved them! She said that after using them for Children's Day, she wants to customize a batch of similar embroidered bookmarks or small pendants as prizes for outstanding children at the end of the semester! This could be a stable small order!" Immediately after, Zhou Xiuqin added: "I also showed photos of your work to a friend of mine who runs a homestay. She is very interested in this kind of locally themed decoration, so I shared your WeChat with her. She might contact you." The consecutive good news filled Ma Xiulan with pleasant surprise, as she never expected her craftsmanship to open up such opportunities.

events.name: Processing Small Order Balance Payments
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan confirmed the final product with a customer who had previously ordered embroidered coasters via WeChat, and the customer was very satisfied. Both parties agreed that when the customer next visits Jinghai, Zhou Xiuqin will deliver the remaining balance of 80 yuan in cash on behalf of Ma Xiulan. Although the amount is small, another successful delivery brought Ma Xiulan a sense of reassurance.

起始状态.心情: Methodically planning to complete pre-holiday preparations and order-related tasks today.

结束状态.心情: Inspiring and full of hope, positive feedback in one's career serves as the strongest motivation, and the preparations for the festive season also bring warmth to the heart.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, going out for shopping and picking up/dropping off children.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, hot, typical Dragon Boat Festival weather.
date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival

2025-05.daily_overview: Today is the Dragon Boat Festival, with family reunions and traditional rituals being the absolute theme. In the early morning, Ma Xiulan made preparations to ward off mosquitoes. In the morning, she led the entire family in the important household activity of making zongzi, creating a joyful and harmonious atmosphere. In the afternoon and evening, the family shared the fruits of their labor and enjoyed a festive dinner together, filling the occasion with warmth and happiness. Meanwhile, the younger daughter’s outstanding performance at kindergarten added another layer of joy to the celebration.

events.name: Morning Health Combination Exercise Consolidation
events.description: At 5:45 in the morning, Ma Xiulan wakes up on time. She first completes the Eight-Section Brocade exercises in the courtyard, followed by a quiet 30-minute walk along Jingwen Road and the riverside path. She savors the physical and mental relaxation brought by her morning routine, which has become an unwavering habit that effectively boosts her energy throughout the day.

events.name: Preparing for mosquito prevention in summer
events.description: After returning from her walk, Ma Xiulan stopped by Zhang Shufen's small supermarket and purchased a new children's mosquito net and a bottle of children's mosquito repellent to prepare for mosquito prevention in the summer.

events.name: The whole family makes zongzi together.
events.description: The highlight of the Dragon Boat Festival morning was making zongzi. Ma Xiulan brought the soaked rice, boiled leaves, red dates, red beans, and marinated meat filling to the large table in the kitchen. She called her three children over, and her husband was also home resting today. She patiently demonstrated how to fold the bamboo leaves into a funnel shape, how to fill them with rice and stuffing, and how to wrap and tie them. The eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, learned the fastest and made them with proper form; the second son, Ma Mingzhe, was clumsy and kept spilling rice, which made everyone laugh; the youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, was responsible for handing over the bamboo leaves and cotton thread. Ma Zhiqiang also pitched in to help, and although his zongzi were oddly shaped, they were tightly wrapped. The kitchen was filled with laughter and joy, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Cooking Zongzi and Preparing the Festival Dinner
events.description: The wrapped zongzi were piled up like a small mountain in the basin. In the afternoon, Ma Zhiqiang, the husband, took on the role of the "kitchen fireman," placing the zongzi in batches into a large iron pot, filling it with water, and slowly boiling them over a wood-fired stove. The aroma of the zongzi filled the entire courtyard along with the steam. Meanwhile, Ma Xiulan began preparing dinner. In addition to the zongzi, she stir-fried a few of her signature dishes: sweet and sour pork tenderloin and garlic-flavored water spinach. She also made a large bowl of noodles with gravy, a family favorite, emphasizing light and healthy flavors.

events.name: Share the Dragon Boat Festival Dinner
events.description: In the evening, a sumptuous dinner was laid out on the table. The family gathered around, eagerly unwrapping the steaming zongzi. The sweet ones were soft and glutinous, while the savory ones were rich and flavorful. "Mom, this one is mine!" the youngest daughter exclaimed, proudly holding up a slightly misshapen but tightly wrapped zongzi. As they ate, they chatted, commenting on whose zongzi looked the best and whose had the most filling. Amidst the delicious food and laughter, they savored the warmth of the traditional festival and the joy of family reunion.

events.name: Delighted that my daughter is playing the lead role in the fairy tale play.
events.description: During dinner, the youngest daughter Ma Yuxin excitedly told the whole family that for the kindergarten's June 1st Children's Day performance, her teacher had chosen her to play the lead role of the "little butterfly" in a fairy tale play! Ma Xiulan was both surprised and delighted to hear this and repeatedly praised her daughter for doing so well. She immediately began to worry: "Will the kindergarten provide the costume? Should Mom make you a pair of wings?" Before bedtime that night, she specifically encouraged her daughter: "Be brave on stage, sweetheart, and speak your lines loudly. Dad, Mom, and your brothers will all come to watch your performance!" This good news added an extra layer of joy to the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Supplemental Holiday Purchases
events.description: After her morning walk, Ma Xiulan stopped by the morning market to buy some fresh mugwort and calamus, which she planned to hang on the door to ward off evil spirits. She also picked up some seasonal fruits to make the holiday table more abundant.

起始状态.心情: The joy brought by festivals and the anticipation of busy preparations

结束状态.心情: Happy, content, and slightly weary, the sense of ritual of traditional festivals and the warmth of family reunions fill the heart, with the daughter's good news adding the finishing touch, and healthy habits remaining steadfast.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, and approximately 4 hours of household activities such as wrapping zongzi and preparing dinner.

date_attribute.weather: The weather is clear with a gentle morning breeze.

2025-06.daily_overview: Today is International Children's Day, and Ma Xiulan devoted herself wholeheartedly to her youngest daughter's holiday performance. In the early morning, she persisted with her morning health routine exercises to energize herself for the day. Throughout the day, she fully participated in her daughter's fairy tale play at the kindergarten, capturing the child's wonderful moments and sharing the joy with family and friends. It was a day filled with love and pride.

events.name: Adhere to the Morning Health Combination Exercises
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan, as usual, took a 30-minute walk near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in her courtyard. Breathing in the fresh air and stretching her limbs, she enjoyed the tranquility and coolness of the early morning, preparing herself with a clear mind and good physical condition for the busy day ahead on Children’s Day.

events.name: Carefully preparing for the daughter's performance
events.description: On the morning of Children's Day, Ma Xiulan got up early to dress up her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin. She carefully helped her daughter put on the "Little Butterfly" costume prepared by the kindergarten, combed her hair, put on the headpiece, and repeatedly checked every detail of the makeup and outfit to ensure her daughter could take the stage in the most adorable look. While getting her ready, she gently encouraged her daughter, using soothing words to ease her nervousness.

events.name: Accompanying my daughter to kindergarten.
events.description: Ma Xiulan led her well-dressed daughter to the kindergarten. After taking her seat in the audience, she waited with a mix of excitement and nervousness. She had secured a spot with an excellent view in advance, repeatedly checked that her phone was fully charged, and was ready to fully record her daughter's performance.

events.name: Watching My Daughter's Wonderful Performance
events.description: The fairy tale play "Forest Ball" began, and Ma Yuxin, playing the role of 'Little Butterfly', gracefully took the stage. Watching her daughter on stage—poised, delivering her lines clearly, and performing each movement with precision—Ma Xiulan felt an indescribable sense of pride and emotion. She held up her phone throughout the performance, recording with bated breath, afraid to miss even a single wonderful moment.

events.name: Backstage Embrace and Celebration
events.description: The performance concluded successfully, and Ma Xiulan immediately rushed backstage to give her daughter a big hug, praising her repeatedly for an excellent show. She took out a beautiful cartoon hair clip prepared in advance as a reward and personally put it on her daughter. The mother and daughter happily took photos together backstage, sharing the immense joy of their success.

events.name: Sharing Joy in the Family WeChat Group
events.description: Upon returning home, Ma Xiulan eagerly shared the recorded video and carefully selected photos in the family WeChat group (which included her husband, other children, parents, and sisters). In the group, she provided a detailed description of her daughter's outstanding performance on stage, receiving a series of likes and praise-filled comments from family members. In the evening, after her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned home from work, she excitedly pulled him aside and recounted the details of the performance from beginning to end.

events.name: Sharing Joy with a Close Friend
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan sent videos and photos of her daughter's performance to her childhood friend Liu Chunmei via WeChat, along with several lengthy voice messages describing the process of watching the performance and her inner pride. The two chatted for a long time on WeChat, reminiscing about amusing moments from their children's growth. This joyful sharing not only deepened their friendship but also allowed Ma Xiulan to feel the warmth and satisfaction brought by life amidst her busy daily routine.

events.name: Preparing gifts for visiting parents
events.description: Thinking about visiting her parents the next day, Ma Xiulan prepared in advance by packaging some of the cooked zongzi and pairing them with fresh cucumbers picked from her own small vegetable garden, planning to deliver them to her parents the next morning.

events.name: Check the child's homework before bedtime.
events.description: In the evening, after putting her youngest daughter to sleep, Ma Xiulan checked the homework completion of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan and second son Ma Mingzhe, urging them to rest early to prepare for school the next day.

起始状态.心情: Expectation and Serenity

结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, joy, and warmth

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk in the morning, followed by 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

date_attribute.weather: The weather is clear, with a slight warmth at midday.
date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival (observed)

2025-06.daily_overview: Today is the Dragon Boat Festival, and Ma Xiulan's day revolves around traditional holiday customs and family reunions. From making zongzi with her mother in the early morning to preparing a lavish lunch, and then spending quality time with her family in the afternoon while delivering zongzi to neighbors, the day is filled with a strong festive atmosphere and family warmth. Despite the holiday, she still tends to her small vegetable garden and maintains her morning exercise routine, though she gains a little weight due to the festive feast.

events.name: Dragon Boat Festival Morning Health Combination Exercises
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. The weather today is sunny with gentle sunshine, and she feels physically relaxed and particularly cheerful due to the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Making zongzi for the Dragon Boat Festival with my mother
events.description: On the morning of the Dragon Boat Festival, Li Xiuying arrived at Ma Xiulan's home as promised. The two women worked in the kitchen, washing rice and bamboo leaves, preparing red dates and meat fillings, while skillfully wrapping traditional red date zongzi and meat zongzi. They chatted about daily life and reminisced about the customs of past Dragon Boat Festivals, with the kitchen filled with the fresh fragrance of bamboo leaves and the warm affection between mother and daughter.

events.name: Record the Growth of a Small Vegetable Garden
events.description: During a break from making zongzi, Ma Xiulan went to her small vegetable garden and thoroughly watered, loosened the soil, and weeded all the seedlings, including cucumbers, tomatoes, and string beans. She carefully examined the growth condition of each seedling, mentally noting the baseline for early June. Looking at the vibrant seedlings, she felt full of anticipation for the future harvest.

events.name: Meticulously prepare the Dragon Boat Festival family feast
events.description: After wrapping the zongzi, Ma Xiulan began preparing the main dish for the lunch banquet—Tianjin-style noodles with gravy, a favorite of the whole family. She carefully simmered the gravy and prepared an assortment of toppings, such as shredded cucumber, bean sprouts, and green peas, along with a few stir-fried seasonal vegetables. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, and the children gradually got up and helped set the table and arrange the bowls and chopsticks, creating a bustling holiday atmosphere in the home.

events.name: Sharing a Bountiful Dragon Boat Festival Luncheon
events.description: The whole family gathered around the table to enjoy a sumptuous Dragon Boat Festival lunch. Everyone savored freshly steamed zongzi, still hot from the pot, along with delicious noodles with gravy and home-cooked dishes. Ma Xiulan told the children the story of Qu Yuan and the origins of the Dragon Boat Festival, while her husband Ma Zhiqiang shared amusing anecdotes from his childhood celebrations. The atmosphere at the table was warm and harmonious, filled with continuous laughter.

events.name: Distributing Sachets to Pray for Blessings and Auspiciousness
events.description: After lunch, Ma Xiulan took out several small sachets she had made a few days earlier and distributed them to her husband and three children, one for each person. The sachets contained mugwort and spices. She explained to her family that wearing sachets is a traditional custom during the Dragon Boat Festival, symbolizing the warding off of evil spirits and epidemics, as well as praying for safety and good health. The family was delighted to receive these handmade gifts filled with heartfelt meaning and immediately put them on.

events.name: Sharing holiday delicacies with neighbors
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan portioned out some of the cooked zongzi and, accompanied by her younger daughter Ma Yuxin, first delivered them to the home of their neighbor across the street, Wang Guilan. Wang Guilan warmly greeted them at the door, and the two exchanged brief pleasantries and holiday wishes. Afterwards, they visited the home of Zhang Shufen, who lived diagonally opposite, and similarly presented her with zongzi. In this way, Ma Xiulan continued the simple tradition of neighbors sharing food and supporting one another.

events.name: Enjoy family reunion time
events.description: After delivering the zongzi, the whole family rested in the living room. The children played with their toys, while Ma Xiulan and her mother Li Xiuying continued chatting. Her husband Ma Zhiqiang watched a program on TV. Everyone enjoyed the leftover zongzi and fruits, savoring the rare holiday reunion in a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere.

events.name: Obtain mint and mugwort from neighbors.
events.description: When delivering zongzi to Wang Guilan, Wang Guilan heard that Ma Xiulan wanted to make something to repel mosquitoes, so she cut a few fresh mint branches from her own flowerpot and gave them to her. After returning home, Ma Xiulan tidied up several bundles of mugwort she had specifically saved for the Dragon Boat Festival, placed the mint and mugwort together, and prepared the raw materials for making mosquito repellent products later.

events.name: Tidying Up and Bidding Farewell to Mother
events.description: As evening fell, the gathering drew to a close. Ma Xiulan began clearing the dishes and cleaning the kitchen and dining area. Her husband and children also helped with the tidying up. Afterwards, Ma Xiulan escorted her mother, Li Xiuying, back home, bringing along some leftover zongzi and dishes. She reminded her mother to take good care of her health.

起始状态.心情: The joy and anticipation brought by festivals

结束状态.心情: Full, warm, and slightly weary satisfaction

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice, and light gardening work.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the first workday after the Dragon Boat Festival, Ma Xiulan’s life returned to its usual rhythm. In the morning, she went for a walk and met a neighbor. During the day, she focused on completing the final inspection and finishing touches of her handicraft orders, and took time to go to the supermarket to purchase safer mosquito repellent products. In the afternoon, she delivered the handmade sachets she had specially prepared for her neighbor, maintaining warm neighborly relations, but began to feel slight discomfort in her wrist.

events.name: Morning Health Combination Exercises Encounter Neighbors and Exchange Greetings
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. On the way, she met her neighbor Wang Guilan, who was also exercising in the morning. The two exchanged brief greetings, chatted about the holiday celebrations from the previous day and the weather that day, before continuing on their respective ways.

events.name: Complete the final finishing of the embroidery.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan concentrated at home, performing the final touches on ten embroidery pieces that were about to be delivered. She meticulously inspected each piece one by one, trimming away fine stray threads and carefully ironing the embroidery fabric to ensure it was smooth, the patterns were clear, and the mounting was neat. With nearly exacting standards, she scrutinized the fruits of her labor, fully prepared for the delivery.

events.name: Purchasing household daily necessities
events.description: Ma Xiulan went to the supermarket run by her neighbor Zhang Shufen to buy laundry detergent and toilet paper, which are commonly used in her household. While selecting an electric mosquito repellent liquid, she recalled that the previous coil mosquito repellent had a pungent smell, and her children had complained about it. Therefore, she specifically chose a fragrance-free electric mosquito repellent liquid, intending to create a better nighttime study environment for her children.

events.name: Delivering handmade sachets to the neighbors
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan brought over an exquisite sachet she had specially made for her neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan, during the Dragon Boat Festival. Wang Guilan was very fond of this thoughtful handmade gift. The two chatted for a while at the doorway about Dragon Boat Festival customs and traditional methods for repelling mosquitoes, further strengthening their friendly relationship.

events.name: Calculate Order Material Cost
events.description: In the evening, while the children were doing their homework, Ma Xiulan took out a small notebook and began calculating the costs of materials used for the completed embroidery pieces, such as embroidery threads, fabrics, and embroidery hoops. She carefully recalled and recorded the details, making a preliminary assessment of the income from this labor and accumulating experience for pricing future orders.

events.name: Communicating with Husband via Phone
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan called her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who was out driving for transport, briefly updating him on the day’s events at home. She mentioned that the children were doing well and reminded him to drive safely. She also told him to have a good meal during the Dragon Boat Festival, even though he was away from home. They chatted for about ten minutes before saying goodnight to each other.

events.name: Pay attention to slight wrist discomfort.
events.description: While organizing the embroidery pieces, Ma Xiulan felt a slight ache and swelling in her right wrist. Realizing it might be due to prolonged handwork, she slowed down her movements and planned to reduce her manual work time the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to get to work.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from completing the work, along with satisfaction from neighborly camaraderie, yet with slight concern over wrist discomfort.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute morning walk and practice Baduanjin for 15 minutes.

2025-06.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone for Ma Xiulan's handicraft "micro-entrepreneurship"—the delivery day of the first batch of orders. From the slight discomfort in her knee during her morning walk, to the tense yet smooth delivery and payment collection during the day, and finally to the solemn deposit of her hard-earned income at the bank in the afternoon, she experienced the entire process from completing her creations to gaining market recognition and financial reward. Her heart was filled with a sense of accomplishment and confidence in the future, and she stayed up late due to excitement.

events.name: Feeling the body's feedback during morning exercise
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. Today, she felt a slight soreness and swelling in her knees. Realizing it might be due to slightly increased activity over the past few days, she consciously slowed her pace, completing her walk at a more gentle speed. She reminded herself to pay attention to the subtle signals from her body.

events.name: Confirm Delivery Arrangements
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan contacted Sister Zheng Xiuying, who often introduces odd jobs in the community, via WeChat to reconfirm the specific time and location for delivering the embroidery to the client in the afternoon (scheduled at the entrance of the community activity center). Sister Zheng replied that the client had already prepared the final payment and was eagerly looking forward to seeing the finished product.

events.name: Deliver the embroidery and gain recognition.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan brought ten carefully packaged embroidery pieces to the community activity center. The client and Zhou Xiuqin were already waiting there. The client carefully examined each piece, praising the exquisite craftsmanship and elegant patterns. She expressed great satisfaction, stating that the work exceeded her expectations.

events.name: Received labor remuneration
events.description: The customer settled the remaining balance of the order on the spot (approximately 320 yuan in cash). Ms. Zheng Xiuying was also present and expressed her delight at the successful collaboration. Ma Xiulan engaged in a brief conversation with the customer and Ms. Zheng, thanking the customer for their trust and support. The customer also indicated that they would seek her services again in the future if needed.

events.name: Tally income and deposit into family fund
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan carefully counted the income she had earned through her own labor, feeling a profound sense of accomplishment. She combined this money with some spare change the family had saved up, totaling 500 yuan, and solemnly placed it into the iron box designated for the family’s emergency fund and education savings.

events.name: Walk to the bank to open a fixed deposit.
events.description: Taking advantage of her free afternoon, Ma Xiulan walked to the Postal Savings Bank near Jingwen Road. At the counter, she deposited the 500 yuan in cash into a one-year fixed deposit certificate. During the process, she briefly inquired with the staff about the interest rates for deposits of different terms and ultimately chose the relatively flexible one-year option. This was the first fixed deposit certificate in her life that belonged to her.

events.name: Share the joy with family
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan shared with her husband Ma Zhiqiang and their children the joy of successfully delivering today's order and receiving the payment, and she showed them the fixed deposit certificate she had processed. Her husband acknowledged her efforts, and the children looked at the deposit certificate with curiosity. Seizing the opportunity, Ma Xiulan explained to the children the importance of saving and planning, receiving encouragement from her family.

events.name: Organize Handcraft Materials and Tools
events.description: After completing the order, Ma Xiulan sorted and organized the remaining embroidery threads and fabrics, wiped the embroidery frame and tools clean, and stored them in the cabinet. Looking at the tidy work corner, she felt a sense of relief and began to consider what new patterns she could create next.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous and expectant

结束状态.心情: A strong sense of accomplishment, steadfastness, and optimism for the future.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice, and walking to the bank.

2025-06.daily_overview: After the excitement of completing her first order, Ma Xiulan's life today returned to routine management and planning. She persisted with her morning exercise and felt an improvement in her physical condition. During the day, she learned new wellness methods, set up trellises for her vegetable garden, and attended a community health lecture, sparking the idea of incorporating Baduanjin into her daily life. Meanwhile, she began earnestly planning the next steps for her handicraft work, showing signs of transitioning from a mere executor to a planner. Due to fatigue, she went to bed early.

events.name: Morning exercise brings a sense of improvement.
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. Today, the discomfort in her knee has significantly decreased, and her breathing is very smooth. She is in a pleasant mood, enjoying the tranquil morning time.

events.name: Learn the Eight-Section Brocade Health-Preserving Exercise
events.description: During breaks from housework in the daytime, Ma Xiulan came across an introduction to Baduanjin in a health and wellness program broadcast on television. The instructor’s slow, flowing movements in the program caught her attention, and she felt that this gentle form of exercise suited her well. She then searched for related instructional videos on her phone, followed along with a few basic movements, and decided to incorporate it into her personal health management routine.

events.name: Set up climbing frames for cucumber seedlings.
events.description: While watering the small vegetable garden in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan noticed that the cucumber vines had begun to sprout tendrils and urgently needed support. She gathered a few old bamboo poles and some cloth strips, then set up a simple climbing frame for the cucumber seedlings in the garden. Carefully, she guided the tender vines onto the frame, hoping they would grow upward smoothly.

events.name: Attend the Community Summer Health Preservation Lecture
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went to the community activity center and attended a summer health preservation lecture delivered by Dr. Wang from the community health service center. Dr. Wang elaborated in detail on the precautions for diet and daily routines during summer, and led the participants on-site to learn the first two movements of the Baduanjin exercise. Ma Xiulan followed along with the practice, finding the movements gentle and soothing. After completing them, she felt a slight warmth in her body and a sense of comfort, which further heightened her interest in learning.

events.name: Planning the Development of Handicrafts
events.description: In the evening, after finishing her household chores, Ma Xiulan began to seriously consider the future development of her handicraft work. The success of her first order had given her great confidence. She planned to take the initiative to contact Sister Zheng Xiuying and Zhou Xiuqin the next day to inquire about any new order information or learn about the local handicraft market situation. She wanted to explore how to sustain this small hobby and even turn it into a more stable source of income.

events.name: Record Savings Progress
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan solemnly recorded the 500 yuan fixed deposit she had placed in the bank that day in a small notebook dedicated to tracking household income and expenses. She also updated the total savings set aside for her children's education fund. Watching the numbers gradually increase, she felt a sense of fulfillment and satisfaction from achieving a small goal.

events.name: Routine Procurement and Price Comparison
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to Zhang Shufen's supermarket to buy laundry detergent and toilet paper. Before making the purchase, she habitually used her phone calculator to compare the supermarket's promotional price with the price she remembered from an online shopping platform. Only after confirming that the discounted price at the supermarket was indeed more cost-effective did she proceed with the purchase. This careful budgeting has become her consumption habit.

起始状态.心情: Calm, filled with curiosity to explore new things

结束状态.心情: Enriching and rewarding, with new insights gained regarding health and life planning.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, and gardening work.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, cool in the morning.

2025-06.daily_overview: Today is a day filled with new opportunities. In the early morning, Ma Xiulan made her first attempt at practicing Baduanjin. Even more delightfully, through the recommendation of her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin, she connected with a new client from the city and proactively initiated contact. From passively receiving orders to actively communicating and providing quotes, her "craft business" has taken the first step toward exploring new markets.

events.name: Try practicing the Eight-Section Brocade in the morning.
events.description: After returning from her morning walk, Ma Xiulan attempted to practice the first two movements of Baduanjin in her quiet courtyard, following the key points taught in yesterday's lecture and Dr. Wang's video. Her movements were still somewhat unfamiliar and uncoordinated, but she could feel her body warming up slightly and her joints stretching. After finishing, she felt exceptionally clear-headed. She decided to persist and give it a try.

events.name: A Healthy Morning Walk
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for about 30 minutes near Jingwen Road, observing various wildflowers and grasses blooming along the roadside in the summer while enjoying the moment of tranquility and vitality.

events.name: Received a new client referral
events.description: In the morning, craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin brought Ma Xiulan good news via WeChat: a friend of hers living in the city had seen photos of Ma Xiulan's embroidery works on social media and was particularly interested in a traditional [Fu] character pattern. The friend wished to commission a custom piece as a birthday gift for an elder. Zhou Xiuqin conveyed the client's preliminary intention and contact information.

events.name: Proactively contact potential clients
events.description: With a mix of excitement and caution, Ma Xiulan added the urban client as a friend on WeChat. The two parties had their first voice call. Ma Xiulan politely greeted the client and presented more detailed images of the embroidered "Fu" character pieces. She gained a preliminary understanding of the client's general requirements regarding size, color scheme (preferably dominated by red and gold tones), and expected delivery time (to be completed within one month).

events.name: Exercise prudence in cost accounting and quotation
events.description: After the call ended, Ma Xiulan carefully calculated the costs of special materials such as gold thread and red silk required to complete such an embroidery piece, based on the client's request, and estimated the working hours needed. She referred to the pricing of the previous batch of orders and privately consulted Zhou Xiuqin for advice. Ultimately, she cautiously drafted a quotation that included both material and labor costs.

events.name: Send the detailed plan and communicate the specifics.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan sent the client a detailed quotation, pictures of optional material samples, and a more precise project timeline estimate via WeChat. Subsequently, the two parties engaged in further text and image communication regarding specific details such as the exact dimensions of the embroidery, the style of the mounting frame, and whether additional inscriptions were needed. Ma Xiulan responded with great care, explaining the craftsmanship details in a way that the client could easily understand.

events.name: Daily watering of the vegetable garden.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went to the small vegetable garden as usual to water the plants, paying special attention to the newly trellised cucumbers and the tomatoes that had begun to bear fruit. Looking at the lush green garden, she felt a sense of fulfillment from her labor.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the freshness of trying new exercises.

结束状态.心情: Excitement, anticipation, with a slight hint of negotiation-related tension.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, followed by approximately 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Saturday, Ma Xiulan's life unfolded in a balanced manner through neighborhood mutual assistance, home organization, and business progress. In the morning, she enthusiastically helped her neighbor Wang Guilan repair a window screen, deepening their neighborly bond, though the process exacerbated the discomfort in her wrist. In the afternoon, she successfully secured a new order from the city center and received a deposit, marking substantial progress in her handicraft business. Simultaneously, she was preparing for the seasonal deep cleaning scheduled for Sunday.

events.name: Consolidate Baduanjin Practice
events.description: After her morning walk, Ma Xiulan continued practicing Baduanjin in the courtyard. She focused on reviewing the two movements from the previous day, trying hard to recall the breathing coordination and posture details emphasized by Doctor Wang. She felt slightly more proficient and fluid than yesterday, with a greater sense of physical relaxation, which strengthened her motivation to persist.

events.name: Adhere to morning walks
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for about 30 minutes near Jingwen Road, feeling that her body had fully adapted to this morning exercise routine, and her steps were light and brisk.

events.name: Learned of neighbor's request for assistance.
events.description: While hanging clothes to dry outside her home in the morning, Ma Xiulan encountered her neighbor Wang Guilan. Wang Guilan casually complained that an old-fashioned screen window in her house was stuck and could not be moved no matter how hard she tried, which was quite troublesome with summer approaching. Ma Xiulan immediately took this matter to heart.

events.name: Offered to help repair the screen window.
events.description: Ma Xiulan recalled that her husband Ma Zhiqiang had repair tools and had mentioned before that fixing window screens wasn't difficult. She proactively said to Wang Guilan, "Aunt Wang, I have tools at home, and Zhiqiang knows a bit about this. Would you like me to take a look for you?" Wang Guilan promptly expressed her gratitude. Ma Xiulan went home to fetch a screwdriver and pliers, then called her husband to briefly inquire about the key steps for repairing the window screen.

events.name: Jointly Repair the Window Screen
events.description: Ma Xiulan arrived at Wang Guilan's home with her tools. Together, they carefully removed the jammed screen from the window frame. They cleared away the dust and lint that had accumulated in the track over the years and found that the screen mesh was intact—the jamming was caused by a deformed track. Following her husband’s instructions over the phone, Ma Xiulan carefully straightened the track with pliers. Then, together with Wang Guilan, she reinstalled the screen. After repeated testing, the screen slid open and closed smoothly again. During the repair, Ma Xiulan felt increasing soreness in her wrist.

events.name: Neighborhood bonds are strengthened through mutual assistance.
events.description: During and after the repair, the two chatted while tidying up the tools. Wang Guilan sighed with emotion that "a near neighbor is better than a distant relative" and insisted on giving Ma Xiulan a small jar of her homemade salted duck eggs as a token of gratitude. Unable to decline, Ma Xiulan eventually accepted the gift, feeling warm inside. This mutual assistance, evolving from "giving items" to "offering labor," deepened and solidified the practical relationship between the two families.

events.name: Prepare Seasonal Home Organization Tools
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan retrieved the screwdriver, cloth, and cleaning agent needed for washing the fan and air conditioner filter from the storage room. She also found the lightweight white gauze curtains she planned to replace, preparing all the necessary tools for the seasonal deep cleaning of the home scheduled for the following Sunday.

events.name: Successfully secured a new order
events.description: In the evening, after a day of communication, the urban client accepted Ma Xiulan's quotation. Both parties confirmed the final design scheme for the [Fu] character, the delivery date, and the total price via WeChat. The client was straightforward and promptly transferred the agreed proportion of the deposit through WeChat. Upon receiving the deposit, Ma Xiulan sent a sincere thank-you message to the client and reaffirmed her commitment to crafting the product with care and delivering it on time.

events.name: Thank you for sharing the joy, referee.
events.description: After the order was finalized, Ma Xiulan immediately sent a WeChat message to Zhou Xiuqin, sincerely thanking her for the recommendation and connection, and informing her that the order had been successfully negotiated. Zhou Xiuqin was also delighted for her, and the two briefly discussed the new client's situation on WeChat, sharing the joy brought by this recognition from outside their circle.

起始状态.心情: Relax (on the weekend) and prepare to handle some accumulated tasks.

结束状态.心情: Multiple satisfactions: the joy of helping others, the sense of accomplishment from completing orders, and the fulfillment of weekends, but with noticeable wrist discomfort.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, approximately 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice, and light physical labor repairing window screens.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Sunday, Ma Xiulan conducted a thorough seasonal home reorganization. From cleaning appliances and changing curtains to sorting out the family's summer clothes and storing away winter and spring garments, she worked busily yet systematically to prepare the home for the arrival of summer. She also brewed refreshing mint tea for her family and reminded the children of summer precautions. Despite the heavy housework, she did not forget to maintain her morning health habits, though she went to bed early due to fatigue.

events.name: Refreshing Morning Exercise
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 20 minutes in the courtyard. The morning breeze in early summer brushed against her face, leaving her feeling refreshed and invigorated.

events.name: Deepen the Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: On the basis of consolidating the previous movements, Ma Xiulan began to attempt practicing the subsequent Baduanjin movements taught by Dr. Wang. The transitions between the entire set of movements were not yet very smooth, and she occasionally needed to pause and think, but she persisted and completed the preliminary full practice, feeling physically relaxed afterward.

events.name: Thoroughly clean the fan and air conditioner.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan began implementing her seasonal transition plan. She first carefully disassembled the blades and protective cover of the desktop fan at home, wiping them inside and out with a damp cloth and cleaner to remove accumulated dust. Next, she took out the filter from the living room air conditioner, rinsed it thoroughly with clean water, and placed it on the balcony to dry, ensuring that the cooling equipment would operate cleanly and efficiently during the summer while maintaining fresh air quality.

events.name: Changing Curtains and Organizing Summer Clothing
events.description: After cleaning, Ma Xiulan removed the heavy velvet curtains from the living room and bedroom, replacing them with lightweight white jacquard sheer curtains. Instantly, the indoor light became soft and bright, and ventilation improved significantly. Then, she retrieved the family’s summer clothes from the depths of the wardrobe, checking each piece for any damage or missing buttons. She ironed them one by one until they were smooth and neatly organized, sorting them by family member before hanging or folding them properly for easy access.

events.name: Organizing seasonal clothing
events.description: Ma Xiulan gathered the spring clothes she had taken off and the winter clothes that had been washed, then placed them into the washing machine for cleaning. After they were dried, she carefully folded them and placed them into large storage boxes. She also added several packs of camphor wood blocks into the boxes to prevent moth damage. Finally, she stored these boxes properly on the top shelf of the wardrobe.

events.name: Brewing Refreshing Mint Tea for Summer
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the small vegetable garden and picked a large handful of fresh mint leaves. After returning home, she carefully washed them clean. She placed a large pot of water on the stove, added the mint leaves and a small amount of rock sugar, and simmered them slowly. Once brewed, she strained out the leaves, allowed the vibrant green and fragrant mint tea to cool, and then poured it into a large pitcher. She placed it in the refrigerator to chill. This was a refreshing summer beverage prepared for her family.

events.name: Remind children of summer precautions
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan gathered her three children and patiently reminded them of the precautions to take as summer approached: avoid playing outdoors for extended periods when the midday sun is scorching, drink plenty of water, take a proper nap at noon, and refrain from keeping the fan on all night while sleeping to avoid catching a chill. The children listened with partial understanding, while she patiently emphasized each point again and again.

起始状态.心情: The plan is clear, and we are prepared to invest physical labor.

结束状态.心情: The fatigue and satisfaction after completing a large amount of housework, and the sense of accomplishment from seeing the home refreshed.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin exercise, and heavy household chores (cleaning, organizing, moving items).

2025-06.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, while maintaining her personal health habits, Ma Xiulan began preparing for important family events in the coming days. She started shopping for ingredients and ordering a cake for her second son’s birthday dinner, while also organizing materials for the parent-teacher meeting of her eldest son. The ordinary Monday took on special meaning through these loving preparations, and her weight increased slightly due to the extra food she prepared.

events.name: The Tacit Greeting During Morning Exercise
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 20 minutes in the courtyard. Along the way, she encountered several familiar faces who were also exercising early in the morning. They exchanged nods, forming a silent, unspoken understanding of the morning exercise routine within the community.

events.name: The practice of Baduanjin is progressing smoothly.
events.description: After several days of practice, Ma Xiulan is now able to perform all the learned Baduanjin movements with relative fluency. During practice, she strives to focus her mind on coordinating her breathing with the movements. She feels physically relaxed after completing the exercises and notices that she seems to have more energy during the day while doing household chores. This has strengthened her determination to continue practicing.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients for the second son's birthday.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan made a special trip to the vegetable market to purchase ingredients for her second son Ma Mingzhe's birthday dinner tomorrow (June 10th). She bought fresh tenderloin to make sweet and sour pork, and selected pork belly and Chinese cabbage to prepare Tianjin-style steamed buns—both dishes her son particularly enjoys. While chatting with the familiar vendor Aunt Sun about her son's upcoming birthday, Aunt Sun kindly gave her two extra spring onions.

events.name: Order a Birthday Cake
events.description: On her way back from the market, Ma Xiulan stopped by a well-regarded private bakery in the community to order a small fresh cream and fruit birthday cake. She specifically requested the baker to write "Happy Birthday, Mingzhe" on the cake and arranged to pick it up the following evening.

events.name: Preparing for the Parent-Teacher Conference of the Eldest Child
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan sorted out her eldest son Ma Mingxuan's recent homework assignments and exam papers, stacking them neatly. She also prepared a new notebook and a pen, planning to take notes on the key points discussed by the teacher during the parent-teacher meeting the next day. She then called her son over and gently inquired about his recent situation at school, asking if there was anything specific he hoped his mother would learn from the teacher.

events.name: Check the results of seasonal organization
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan checked the indoor ventilation after replacing the curtains the day before and felt quite satisfied. She also tested the cleaned fan, which now provided a fresh breeze without any unpleasant odors. She thought to herself that the mint tea was almost finished and she would need to brew some more tomorrow. Thus began the daily maintenance routine for the summer.

起始状态.心情: The tranquility and sense of planning at the start of the week

结束状态.心情: The peace of mind and anticipation after having family affairs properly arranged.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, followed by approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin exercise.

2025-06.daily_overview: Today was a day filled with both information and emotion. Ma Xiulan attended a crucial parent-teacher meeting for her eldest son’s upcoming high school entrance exam in the morning, gathering essential information. In the afternoon, she returned home to have an in-depth conversation with her eldest son and discussed follow-up support plans with her husband. In the evening, the whole family celebrated her younger son’s warm and cozy birthday. She seamlessly balanced family responsibilities and affectionate care, feeling tired yet fulfilled, with her weight slightly increasing after the birthday dinner.

events.name: Morning exercise enhances energy levels.
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. She feels that since she started consistently walking and practicing Baduanjin, her energy during the day seems to be a bit more abundant than before, which has strengthened her confidence in maintaining healthy habits.

events.name: Baduanjin Becomes a Fixed Routine
events.description: After her morning walk, practicing 15 minutes of Baduanjin has become Ma Xiulan's unwavering daily routine. As her movements grow increasingly natural, she has begun to cherish these quiet moments that belong solely to herself—a time for dialogue with her body. She feels it also helps in setting the right mood for the day ahead.

events.name: Discovering the Garden in Full Bloom and Bearing Fruit
events.description: When she went to water the small vegetable garden in the evening, Ma Xiulan was delighted to find that several tomato seedlings had not only produced more small yellow flowers, but some of the earlier blooms had already developed into small green fruits the size of a fingernail. She immediately used homemade kitchen waste compost to provide additional fertilizer for these flowering and fruiting plants, hoping they would grow quickly.

events.name: Attending the Parent Meeting for Eldest Son's High School Entrance Examination
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the middle school where her eldest son Ma Mingxuan studies to attend the final important parent-teacher meeting of the semester, which also served as a key session before the high school entrance examination. The homeroom teacher, Han Mei, provided a detailed overview of the class's overall review progress, the schedule for the high school entrance examination, examination hall discipline, psychological adjustment before the exam, as well as precautions regarding diet and daily routines. Ma Xiulan listened attentively, filling her notebook with key points. After the meeting, she also had a brief private conversation with Teacher Han to learn more about her son's recent review status and psychological well-being.

events.name: Communicating Parent-Teacher Conference Information with the Eldest Son
events.description: After returning home from the parent-teacher meeting, Ma Xiulan conveyed the teacher's feedback and various considerations for the high school entrance examination in detail to her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan. Instead of applying pressure, she focused on encouragement, briefly analyzing with her son the current strengths in his studies and areas that needed improvement. Together, they drafted a plan for the final few days of review and daily arrangements leading up to the exam. Ma Xiulan assured her son that the entire family would support him.

events.name: Discuss family support plans with the husband
events.description: In the evening, after her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned from work, Ma Xiulan detailed the parent-teacher meeting situation and the results of her communication with their son. The couple discussed how to better support their son before the high school entrance examination, adjusting the family's routine (such as maintaining quiet in the evenings), and whether more attention should be paid to diet. They reached a consensus: to create a stable and supportive home environment.

events.name: Host a Warm Birthday Dinner for the Second Son
events.description: Despite her busy schedule during the day, Ma Xiulan did not forget her second son's birthday. In the evening, the whole family gathered around the table to enjoy the sweet and sour pork, Tianjin steamed buns, and several stir-fried dishes she had carefully prepared. After the meal, everyone sang "Happy Birthday" for Ma Mingzhe and shared the birthday cake. Ma Xiulan presented him with new stationery as a gift, and her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, promised to take him fishing over the weekend. Under the candlelight, Ma Mingzhe happily made a wish, filling the home with a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Simple Repair of Kitchen Window Screens
events.description: While cooking in the morning, Ma Xiulan noticed a small, inconspicuous hole in one of the kitchen window screens. Worried that mosquitoes might get in, she immediately fetched some transparent tape and carefully patched it from the inside, temporarily solving the problem. She planned to find a piece of gauze later to sew it up properly.

起始状态.心情: Attention with a hint of nervousness (due to the parent-teacher conference)

结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, mingled with thoughts about the child's future and the warmth of a birthday reunion.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk in the morning, practice the Eight-Section Brocade for about 15 minutes, and tend to the vegetable garden.

2025-06.daily_overview: In the drizzling rain, Ma Xiulan persisted in completing her morning exercise. During the day, as a core member, she hosted the community handicraft corner activity, deepening and gaining recognition for her role through teaching, sharing, and market discussions. The activity sparked new creative inspiration in her and significantly enhanced her sense of belonging and value within the handicraft circle. In the evening, she also shared health insights with her neighbors, though her wrist discomfort was exacerbated by the handicraft activities.

events.name: Persisting in Morning Exercise in the Rain
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. A light drizzle was falling from the sky, but she persisted with her daily walk under an umbrella. The air felt exceptionally fresh in the rain, and the streets appeared quiet.

events.name: Preparing Lesson Plans for the Community Handicraft Corner Activity
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan prepared at home for the afternoon community handicraft corner activity. She not only organized her recently completed embroidery works for display but also revisited the explanation steps and key points for the "basic stitches of gold thread embroidery" she planned to share that day, considering how to make it easier for beginners to get started. She communicated via WeChat with several regular craft enthusiasts, such as Zhou Xiuqin, to understand their key learning interests for the day and prepared some simple practice materials and embroidery pieces.

events.name: Host a handicraft corner for teaching purposes.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan presided over this month's handicraft corner activity at the community center. She first showcased her newly completed embroidery piece featuring the character "Fu" (meaning "fortune" or "blessing") along with several smaller works. She then systematically explained the basic stitches, applicable scenarios, and key considerations of gold thread embroidery. While demonstrating with an embroidery frame, she walked over to several beginners, patiently corrected their hand gestures, and guided them in completing their first simple patterns. The learning atmosphere on-site was focused and harmonious.

events.name: Discuss Advanced Techniques with Senior Colleagues
events.description: After the basic instruction concluded, Ma Xiulan, Zhou Xiuqin, and several other senior craft enthusiasts sat together. They brought out their own intricate pattern works and engaged in an in-depth discussion on how to best combine gold and colored threads on different base fabrics to achieve optimal visual effects and traditional charm. Everyone offered comments on each other's work, sharing the "little tricks" they had discovered through their own explorations. The discussion was very lively, and Ma Xiulan also gained many new inspirations.

events.name: Sharing "Micro-Entrepreneurship" Experience Sparks Discussion
events.description: During the free discussion session, the conversation naturally shifted to how to make handicrafts more visible and recognized by a wider audience. Ma Xiulan proactively shared her recent experience of receiving small orders through WeChat groups and referrals from acquaintances, including details on how to communicate with clients about their needs, set reasonable prices, and ensure delivery quality. Everyone showed great interest in this model and engaged in discussions about the pros and cons, as well as the feasibility, of various channels such as participating in local craft fairs, showcasing works on short-video platforms, and collaborating with community shops for consignment sales.

events.name: Post-Activity Organization and Reflection
events.description: After the event concluded, Ma Xiulan assisted the community staff in tidying up the venue, arranging the tables and chairs, and putting away materials such as needles, threads, and fabrics that everyone had used. When bidding farewell to a few familiar craft friends, they eagerly agreed to meet again at the next activity. Upon returning home in the evening and finishing her household chores, Ma Xiulan took some time to reflect on the day’s event. She recorded the new color scheme ideas and pattern inspirations discussed during the activity in her craft notebook, contemplating how to apply them to her upcoming commissioned works. She felt not only that she had shared knowledge but also that she had learned a great deal herself, leaving her with a sense of fulfillment and inspiration.

events.name: Introducing Baduanjin to Neighbors
events.description: One evening, while chatting with her neighbor Wang Guilan at the door, Ma Xiulan mentioned that she had recently been practicing Baduanjin regularly and found it beneficial for her muscles and bones. Wang Guilan expressed curiosity, so Ma Xiulan demonstrated two movements on the spot: "Lifting the Sky with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing the Bow to Shoot the Hawk." Wang Guilan smiled and said she would like to learn them next time.

events.name: Wrist Discomfort Aggravated by Heat Compress Treatment
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan felt noticeable soreness and swelling in her wrist, realizing it might be caused by repetitive movements during manual activities. She applied a hot towel to her wrist and decided to reduce her manual work time the next day to allow her wrist to rest.

起始状态.心情: Calm, preparing for the afternoon activities

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, experiencing the pleasure of gaining value recognition within the community, yet with concerns about wrist pain.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk (in the rain), followed by approximately 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with fresh air after the rain.

2025-06.daily_overview: In the refreshing atmosphere after the rain, Ma Xiulan completed her first week of regular Baduanjin practice and felt quite well. During the day, she made arrangements for the upcoming weekend family gathering. In the evening, a strong sense of longing prompted her to initiate a lengthy video call with her elder sister, who lives far away in Beijing. They shared the joys of their children’s growth and the trivialities of daily life. The deep affection effectively soothed the longing brought by geographical separation, but the wrist strain was officially documented.

events.name: Enjoy a Refreshing Morning Exercise After the Rain
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for about 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 20 minutes in the courtyard. The air after the rain was exceptionally fresh, carrying the scent of soil and grass. She took deep breaths, and her mood lifted accordingly.

events.name: Summary of the First Week's Eight-Section Brocade Practice
events.description: After her morning exercise, while practicing Baduanjin, Ma Xiulan felt her body was much more flexible than a week before, and the drowsiness upon waking up in the morning had also diminished. She was pleased with her ability to persist and decided to pay more attention to the depth and rhythm of her breathing during next week's practice to achieve better results.

events.name: Contact my sister to confirm the family gathering.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan contacted her sister Ma Xiufen via WeChat to confirm the specific time and arrangements for her sister's visit to Jinghai this Sunday (June 15) and their family gathering at their parents' home. The two sisters briefly chatted on WeChat and agreed to cook together when the time comes.

events.name: Missing Sister initiates a video call.
events.description: While organizing her phone's photo album in the evening, Ma Xiulan was deeply moved when she saw the video of her younger daughter's performance again. It reminded her of her elder sister Li Xiuyun, who had married into a family in Beijing and whom she hadn't seen for over half a year. A strong sense of longing welled up in her heart. Without hesitation, she immediately found her sister's profile picture on WeChat and initiated a video call.

events.name: Sharing life updates through videos
events.description: The video call connected quickly. Ma Xiulan excitedly showed her sister clips of her youngest daughter’s performance, then switched the camera to show the garden’s plumpening cucumbers and tomatoes. She chattered on about the children’s fun activities on Children’s Day and the amusing stories from her second son’s birthday, as if pouring out every detail of her life during this time to her sister.

events.name: Listening to My Sister's Life in Beijing
events.description: Elder sister Li Xiuyun also responded happily. Ma Xiulan listened attentively as her sister recounted life in Beijing: the nervous state of her nephew who was about to take the college entrance examination, the people and events she encountered in her management role at the supermarket, as well as the prices and fresh experiences in Beijing. Although separated by a screen, there was no distance between the sisters.

events.name: Let the children interact with their aunt.
events.description: Midway through the conversation, Ma Xiulan specifically called all three children to the camera, having them take turns greeting their aunt and saying hello. The children were very excited. Ma Mingxuan greeted her somewhat shyly, while Ma Mingzhe chattered away about the birthday cake. Ma Yuxin performed a line from "Forest Ball" in a sweet, childish voice, which made Li Xiuyun on the other side of the screen burst into laughter.

events.name: Deep Night Conversation Between Sisters
events.description: After the children went to bed, the two sisters continued their conversation, shifting topics from their children's education to their parents' health, the trivial worries in their respective lives, and their hopes for the future. They comforted each other and offered advice, as if they had returned to their childhood days when they would whisper secrets under the same blanket. The nearly hour-long video call ended reluctantly. After hanging up, Ma Xiulan remained immersed in the warmth of family affection, feeling that despite the physical distance, their hearts remained closely connected, filling her with comfort and strength.

events.name: Record mild wrist strain
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan decided to formally record her persistent wrist soreness as a minor strain. She reduced manual activities, persisted with hot compresses, and planned to rest for a few days.

起始状态.心情: The freshness and delight of a morning after rain

结束状态.心情: Warmth, solace, and profound fulfillment overflowing with familial affection, yet persistent wrist discomfort persists.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, followed by approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice.
