2025-06.daily_overview: On Friday, the stifling heat of summer set in. Ma Xiulan's daily life revolved around her family. She persisted with her morning exercise routine, busied herself with household chores and childcare during the day. Life was as calm as still water. Amid the trivialities, she made simple preparations for the weekend gathering with relatives and friends, and the discomfort in her wrist had somewhat eased.

events.name: Thoughts During Morning Exercise
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 20 minutes in the courtyard. The weather was somewhat muggy. As she walked, she pondered what breakfast to prepare for the children going to school—whether to cook noodles or make some porridge.

events.name: The practice of Baduanjin is becoming increasingly fluent.
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin in her courtyard. After nearly two weeks of adaptation, her movements have become noticeably smoother than before. She has begun to consciously focus on deep, steady breathing and the gentle opening and closing of her movements, clearly feeling the slight warmth in her body and the comfort of her muscles and joints stretching.

events.name: Routine Household Chores and Purchasing
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan completed daily household chores such as laundry and cleaning. In the afternoon, she went to the vegetable market to buy some fresh vegetables, stocking up on ingredients for her sister's weekend visit and the family gathering. While chatting with the stall owner, Auntie Sun, she learned that egg prices had risen slightly recently, so she only purchased the necessary amount.

events.name: Supervise children's studies
events.description: In the evening, she focused on supervising her eldest son Ma Mingxuan's preparation for the high school entrance examination, reminding him to rest adequately and avoid staying up late. She then checked the homework of her second son Ma Mingzhe and helped her youngest daughter Ma Yuxin learn several new characters. Only after the children had gone to bed did she find a little time for herself, watching a family drama playing on television.

events.name: Wrist recovery requires attention to rest.
events.description: Ma Xiulan continued to apply hot compresses to her wrist and avoided heavy physical labor, feeling that the discomfort had somewhat subsided.

起始状态.心情: The Tranquility of Ordinary Days

结束状态.心情: The tranquility and slight fatigue after completing a day's housework, with the relief of a recovering wrist.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, followed by approximately 20 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

2025-06.daily_overview: The Saturday morning was exceptionally tranquil. Ma Xiulan received her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, who came to confide her troubles. Not only did she listen patiently and offer sincere comfort, but she also helped her friend vent emotions and find solutions through the unique method of doing handicrafts together. This deep conversation brought new radiance to their decades-long friendship and allowed her to appreciate the value of providing emotional support. In the afternoon, she also prepared gifts for the gathering the next day, with her wrist having mostly recovered.

events.name: Weekend Morning Exercise in Serenity
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. On weekend mornings, the streets and community were exceptionally quiet, with only the chirping of early-rising birds and the soft sound of her footsteps.

events.name: Preparing for a friend's visit
events.description: In the morning, before her childhood friend Liu Chunmei arrived, Ma Xiulan cleaned the living room thoroughly in advance. She prepared a clean tea set, a jar of high-quality jasmine tea, and some homemade sesame cakes to create a comfortable and warm environment for their conversation.

events.name: Listening to a childhood friend pour out their troubles.
events.description: Liu Chunmei arrived as scheduled, and the two of them brewed some flower tea. Liu Chunmei was visibly downcast and confided in Ma Xiulan about the recent conflict with her mother-in-law over the supermarket shift schedule. She felt that her mother-in-law did not understand her hardships and that she was unable to balance everything, leaving her feeling aggrieved and frustrated. Ma Xiulan did not interrupt, simply listening quietly and handing her a tissue at the appropriate moment.

events.name: Comforting a Friend and Sharing Experience
events.description: After Liu Chunmei finished pouring out her heart, Ma Xiulan gently comforted her based on her own experience in handling family relationships. She suggested that Chunmei could try having a calm conversation with her mother-in-law, explaining the difficulties of her work while also listening to her mother-in-law’s perspective. She also shared some small methods she had used to ease tensions, such as giving small gifts or doing activities together.

events.name: Proposing to relieve emotional knots through manual therapy
events.description: To help Liu Chunmei distract herself and calm down, Ma Xiulan suggested, "Just talking can be dull. Why don't we embroider a 'peace' sachet together? It would be a heartfelt gift for your mother-in-law if you make it yourself." Liu Chunmei thought it was a good idea, so the two immediately took out needles, thread, and fabric.

events.name: Recalling the past while doing handicrafts
events.description: The two of them threaded needles and embroidered sachets together. The handiwork gradually calmed Liu Chunmei's emotions. As they worked, they reminisced about their childhood—attending school together, sneaking to pick mulberries on their way home and being chased, sharing secrets from the heart. When they spoke of the happy moments, both of them laughed, and the atmosphere became relaxed and cheerful.

events.name: Bidding Farewell to a Friend and Offering Support
events.description: After the gathering, Ma Xiulan saw Liu Chunmei out. Holding her hand, Ma advised her to take it easy, explaining that family conflicts cannot be resolved overnight, and assured her that she would continue to follow up on the progress of her relationship with her mother-in-law. Gratefully, Liu Chunmei said, "I feel much better after talking with you."

events.name: Savoring the profound friendship
events.description: After seeing Liu Chunmei off, Ma Xiulan tidied up the tea set and needlework, then organized the living room. Reflecting on their profound conversation, she felt the warmth of friendship and the strength of support, which lie not only in daily companionship but also in listening and offering a helping hand during difficult times.

events.name: Picking vegetables to prepare gifts
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan picked the freshest batch of cucumbers, green beans, and a few tomatoes that were just beginning to turn red from her small vegetable garden. She carefully washed and sorted them, packed them into bags, and prepared to bring them as a gift to her younger sister, Ma Xiufen, the next day.

events.name: Learned about the community financial planning seminar information.
events.description: While checking her phone in the evening, Ma Xiulan saw a notice in the community WeChat group stating that the community activity center would host a public welfare lecture on basic family financial management next Wednesday (June 18). Having recently deposited a fixed-term savings, she became interested in the topic and decided to attend the lecture.

起始状态.心情: Relaxing on the weekend, looking forward to reuniting with old friends.

结束状态.心情: The sense of comfort and value derived from providing effective support to friends, as well as the warmth of friendship.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice, and light labor picking vegetables in the garden.

2025-06.daily_overview: Sunday is family gathering day. In the early morning, Ma Xiulan shared her homegrown tomatoes with her neighbors, fulfilling a promise. During the day, she reunited with her sister at their parents' home, cooking and chatting together, enjoying sisterly affection and family happiness. In the evening, after seeing her sister off, she returned home with the fabric her sister had given her and a joyful mood, feeling that her half-month of consistent morning exercise had significantly improved her physical condition, with her wrist almost fully recovered.

events.name: Honor Commitments and Share Achievements
events.description: Early in the morning, Ma Xiulan picked the first batch of ripe, plump tomatoes from her vegetable garden. She selected the largest and reddest ones and brought them to her neighbor Wang Guilan's house. "Aunt Wang, the tomatoes are ripe. I brought some for you to enjoy!" she said, fulfilling her earlier promise. Wang Guilan happily accepted them and praised her for growing such excellent vegetables.

events.name: Experience the Effects of Half-Month Morning Exercise
events.description: Around 6 a.m., Ma Xiulan walked for 30 minutes near Jingwen Road and practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes in the courtyard. She felt that after persisting with her morning exercise routine (walking + Baduanjin) for half a month, her physical condition had significantly improved. Her steps became steadier when walking, and she felt less fatigued during the day.

events.name: Tending to the arid vegetable garden with meticulous care
events.description: It has been sunny for several consecutive days, and the soil in the vegetable garden has become somewhat dry. Before leaving home in the early morning and after returning in the evening, Ma Xiulan watered the vegetable garden twice, paying special attention to the Chinese cabbage, which requires more water, and the green beans that have just begun to form pods, ensuring they receive sufficient moisture to thrive.

events.name: Go to parents' home for reunion
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan set out from her own home to her parents' house on Shengli Street, bringing along prepared fresh vegetables and some soft pastries she had bought for them.

events.name: Sisters Reunite to Prepare Lunch
events.description: Ma Xiulan reunited with her younger sister Ma Xiufen at their parents' home. The two sisters, along with their mother Li Xiuying, busied themselves in the kitchen preparing lunch. Ma Xiulan took charge of cooking noodles with gravy, while Ma Xiufen assisted by chopping vegetables and preparing cold dishes. Their mother offered guidance from the side, and the kitchen was filled with continuous laughter and a warm, homely atmosphere.

events.name: Sharing Family Joy and Having Heart-to-Heart Talks with Sisters
events.description: The entire family gathered around the table to enjoy a sumptuous lunch, with the parents beaming with happiness as they looked at their two daughters and the feast spread before them. After the meal, the sisters chatted over tea in their parents' cool living room, sharing updates about their respective families, concerns about their children's education, and the small joys of daily life. Ma Xiufen presented her sister with a simple and elegant piece of linen fabric she had found at a boutique in the city, saying it would be perfect for making summer clothes or as a backing for embroidery. In return, Ma Xiulan gave her sister some vegetables grown in her own garden.

events.name: Seeing Off My Sister and Returning Home
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiufen was about to return to her home in the Binhai New Area. Ma Xiulan and her parents accompanied her to the bus stop, reminding her to be careful on the way and to let them know when she arrived home safely. After seeing her sister off, Ma Xiulan helped her parents tidy up the house briefly, chatted with them for a while, and then returned to her own home with the fabric her sister had given her and a joyful heart.

events.name: Evening Contact and Rest
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan contacted her younger sister again via WeChat to confirm that she had arrived home safely. Afterward, she tidied up the weekend clothes, checked whether the children had completed their homework, and went to bed early to recharge her energy for the upcoming week.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation and Joy of Family Gatherings

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction and warmth of family reunion, along with a touch of reluctance at parting, create an overall feeling of joy and relaxation.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning walk, 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice, watering the vegetable garden twice, and walking to and from parents' home.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, slightly cool in the morning

2025-06.daily_overview: As the new week begins, Ma Xiulan shifts her focus from busy household chores and caring for her three children to creating a supportive family environment for her eldest son, who is about to take the high school entrance examination. She starts incorporating the newly learned Baduanjin exercise into her morning routine and engages in practical discussions about health and family with her neighbors and husband.

events.name: Preliminary Attempt at Modern Morning Exercise
events.description: As usual, around six in the morning, after completing necessary household chores such as preparing breakfast, Ma Xiulan went for a walk near Jingwen Road for about 20 minutes. Breathing in the fresh morning air, her thoughts became clearer. Upon returning home, she took advantage of the brief quiet time before her children left for school. In her own courtyard, she tried hard to recall the Baduanjin movements she had learned at the community lecture the previous week, clumsily practicing a few stretching exercises. She felt a slight warmth in her body, which felt different from simply taking a walk.

events.name: Family Mobilization: Preparing for the Eldest Child's High School Entrance Examination
events.description: After dinner, having cleared the dishes, Ma Xiulan sat in the living room with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just returned home, to discuss in detail the family arrangements for the week leading up to their eldest son Ma Mingxuan’s high school entrance examination. She laid out her plan clearly: "This week, I need to make sure Mingxuan eats well, sleeps well, and doesn’t feel stressed. I’ll take on more household chores, and we’ll keep the TV off more often. Zhiqiang, could you try not to have dinner out this week and come home early? A quiet home in the evenings will be better for his revision and rest." Ma Zhiqiang nodded in agreement, and the two clarified their respective responsibilities: Ma Xiulan would take full charge of logistics and emotional support, while her husband would ensure their son adhered to a regular rest schedule and minimize evening outings.

events.name: Sharing of Health Experiences Among Neighbors
events.description: In the morning, while airing clothes at her doorstep, she encountered her neighbor Wang Guilan, who was also enjoying the sunshine at her own entrance. The two naturally struck up a casual conversation. Ma Xiulan shared her traditional methods of using mugwort incense to repel mosquitoes and promptly clearing stagnant water in the courtyard, while Wang Guilan talked about her family's experience with mosquito nets. The topic shifted from mosquito prevention to summer dietary adjustments, as they exchanged various household health protection tips passed down from their elders.

events.name: A Morning Encounter with the Neighbor
events.description: During a morning walk, I encountered my neighbor Zhang Shufen, who was also out for a stroll, at the corner of Jingwen Road. Zhang Shufen had just opened her small supermarket and was preparing to stretch her limbs. Naturally, the two of us walked together for a while, chatting about recent vegetable prices and our children’s final exams. Ma Xiulan mentioned that her eldest son was about to take the high school entrance examination. Zhang Shufen offered a few words of comfort, saying that since the child usually studied diligently, everything would surely be fine.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with plans for the new week's family affairs.

结束状态.心情: Feeling assured, I am more confident in dealing with my child's high school entrance exam after reaching a consensus with my husband.

state.今日运动: Take a morning walk for about 20 minutes; practice Baduanjin in the courtyard for approximately 10 minutes.

2025-06.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan officially began implementing the family's "silent mode" in preparation for the high school entrance examination, adjusting the entire household's daily routine. She continued to maintain her morning exercise regimen and started sharing the positive effects of physical activity with those around her, gradually integrating healthy habits into her daily life. Meanwhile, due to her younger son's school craft activities, she stayed up late in the evenings to assist him.

events.name: Perseverance on a Sultry Morning
events.description: At six in the morning, the weather was somewhat sultry, yet Ma Xiulan still went out for a walk. Due to the weather, she walked slower than usual but persisted in completing her 30-minute stroll. Sweat slightly dampened her clothes, but she felt refreshed after working up a sweat.

events.name: Sharing the First Experience of Morning Exercise with Neighbors
events.description: When she met Wang Guilan at the doorway in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan took the initiative to mention that she had recently been sticking to morning exercises and trying to incorporate Baduanjin. With a hint of delight, she said, "Sister Wang, after practicing these past few days, I feel more energetic during the day, and my shoulders aren’t as stiff as before." As she spoke, she casually demonstrated a couple of the stretching movements she had learned. Wang Guilan watched and repeatedly praised her efforts, remarking that she herself should also start moving more as she was getting older.

events.name: Implement the "Quiet" Family Plan
events.description: Starting today, Ma Xiulan began adjusting the family's daily routine to accommodate her eldest son's exam preparation. She explicitly instructed her second son, Ma Mingzhe, and daughter, Ma Yuxin, to avoid making loud noises while their brother is studying and to keep the television volume low. She also rescheduled household chores that produce more noise, such as doing laundry and tidying up the house, to times when the children are at school or taking their midday rest. In the evenings, the entire family prepares to turn off the lights and rest half an hour earlier than usual, all to create a quiet and stable home environment for Ma Mingxuan.

events.name: Help the second son complete the school craft activity
events.description: In the evening, Ma Mingzhe needed to complete a school handicraft project. Ma Xiulan spent time guiding him, working together on paper-cutting and pasting until 22:30 before finishing, which resulted in him going to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Be serious and determined to implement the family plan well.

结束状态.心情: Feeling a sense of accomplishment but slightly fatigued, a new family order is beginning to take shape.

2025-06.daily_overview: It was a fulfilling and rewarding day. While maintaining her personal health habits, Ma Xiulan systematically learned about financial management for the first time, which challenged her perspectives. Her small vegetable garden yielded its first harvest. She also quietly cheered on her son, who is preparing for exams, in her own unique way. In the evening, she stayed up late due to excitement from discussions about financial management.

events.name: Solidify the morning exercise routine
events.description: After two days of trial, Ma Xiulan decided to establish a fixed morning exercise routine: first, a 15-minute walk for warm-up, then returning home to practice 10 minutes of Baduanjin. Today, she strictly followed this new routine and felt it went more smoothly than yesterday, with her body fully warmed up and her mind more focused.

events.name: The First Harvest from the Vegetable Garden
events.description: While watering the small vegetable garden in the yard in the morning, Ma Xiulan was pleasantly surprised to find that the green beans had grown plump and tender. She carefully harvested the first batch, estimating that it would be just enough to stir-fry a dish for the whole family in the evening. After picking, she skillfully watered the bean vines and cleared away some of the old leaves at the bottom to allow the plants to grow better with improved ventilation.

events.name: Enlightenment of Financial Literacy
events.description: In the afternoon, after settling the children, Ma Xiulan went to the community activity center to attend a financial management lecture organized by Postal Savings Bank of China. She sat in a front-row seat and listened attentively as the financial manager explained basic concepts such as inflation, time deposits, and government bonds. When she heard that "money kept in a current account quietly depreciates," she was struck with a sudden realization. Thinking of the savings her family had accumulated through frugality, she formed a concrete understanding of "financial management" for the first time.

events.name: Hand-painted Encouragement Banner for the Eldest Son
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Ma Xiulan took out colored paper and paintbrushes. Thinking of her son diligently studying with his head down, she carefully drew several simple slogans and decorative paintings, writing phrases such as "Go, Xuanxuan!" and "Stay calm and composed." Although the artwork was simple, every stroke was filled with a mother's care and encouragement. She quietly posted these paintings beside her son's desk and on his door, hoping he would see this silent support the next day.

events.name: Proactive Consultation and Information Collection
events.description: After the lecture, Ma Xiulan did not leave immediately. Considering her family's limited savings, she inquired with the financial manager about specific details such as the minimum deposit amount and application procedures. She also collected several brochures on fixed-term deposits and savings bonds.

events.name: Discussing Financial Planning with Husband Late at Night
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan excitedly shared financial management knowledge with her husband. They discussed family finances until 23:45, which led to them staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation (for the lecture and the harvest from the vegetable garden)

结束状态.心情: Enriched and mentally stimulated (impacted by new knowledge and having completed the encouragement of the child)

state.今日运动: A 15-minute morning walk, followed by 10 minutes of Baduanjin exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze in the evening.

2025-06.daily_overview: Financial literacy began to translate into practical discussions within the family. Ma Xiulan and her husband took stock of their household assets and started making preparations for action. At the same time, she paid closer attention to the psychological state of her eldest son, who was preparing for the high school entrance exam, and deepened her learning of Baduanjin through online resources. In the evenings, she would video chat with her younger sister, sharing the details of daily life.

events.name: Observations During Morning Exercise
events.description: During her morning walk, Ma Xiulan noticed several elderly people practicing Tai Chi slowly and gently in a small park by the roadside. She couldn't help but slow down to watch for a while, feeling that this slow-paced exercise shared similarities with the Baduanjin she practiced herself. This further strengthened her determination to persist with it.

events.name: First Family Financial Meeting
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan eagerly shared the financial knowledge she had learned the day before with her husband. She took out the 500-yuan personal fixed deposit certificate as an example and, together with her husband, reviewed their household current deposits and the expected salary surplus for the month. Heads together, they calculated their finances and discussed whether they should convert some of their "idle money" into fixed deposits that could "earn a little interest."

events.name: Preparing for Financial Management Actions
events.description: After discussion, the couple decided to start with a small amount of money to test the waters. Ma Xiulan counted out 3,000 yuan from the family's emergency cash, then gathered her husband's and her own identification cards and bank cards, preparing to go to the bank the next day to handle the matter.

events.name: Heartwarming Pre-exam Counseling
events.description: With the high school entrance exam approaching, Ma Xiulan specially prepared a light and delicious dinner. After the meal, she found an opportunity to sit alone with her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, in the living room. Without asking about his revision progress, she simply chatted about amusing stories from his childhood and gently said, "Just do your best in the exam, and don’t put too much pressure on yourself. After the exam, I’ll make sweet and sour pork tenderloin for you." Seeing her son’s tense expression relax slightly, she finally felt reassured.

events.name: Deepen Learning through the Internet
events.description: After finishing her work in the evening, Ma Xiulan used her phone to go online and searched for "complete version of Baduanjin" and "benefits of Baduanjin" on video platforms. She bookmarked several videos with clear explanations and standard movement demonstrations, planning to slowly learn the entire routine by following them.

events.name: Video chatting with my sister
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan had a video call with her sister Ma Xiufen, sharing what she had learned from her financial management studies and recent family updates. The conversation lasted until 23:00 before ending.

起始状态.心情: Thinking (calculating household finances)

结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded (having made joint plans with my husband and having guided my son through his concerns)

state.今日运动: Morning walk for 30 minutes

2025-06.daily_overview: On the first day of the high school entrance examination, the family entered a "wartime state." As the chief logistics commander, Ma Xiulan rose early in the morning to ensure everything was in place. Her morning exercise habit had been initially established and was beginning to be shared and influence a small circle of neighbors. In the evening, she went to bed early due to exhaustion.

events.name: Morning exercise has become second nature.
events.description: During her morning walk, Ma Xiulan no longer needed to consciously persist, as the habit had become an integral part of her life. As she walked, she contemplated the preparations she needed to make for her son that day, her steps steady and assured.

events.name: Comprehensive Support on the First Day of the High School Entrance Examination
events.description: To avoid any delay, Ma Xiulan got up at five in the morning. She carefully prepared a nutritionally balanced breakfast and a convenient packed lunch for Ma Mingxuan. She reminded her younger daughter and second son to be especially quiet today and turned the television to mute. She also hung the previously drawn "Go, Brother!" banner at the entrance of her son's study. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, was responsible for providing transportation throughout the day and waiting outside the examination venue.

events.name: Lead neighbors towards a healthy lifestyle together.
events.description: While resting at the doorway in the evening, she encountered Wang Guilan again. Ma Xiulan once more brought up the topic of Baduanjin and demonstrated the two movements "Lifting the Sky with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing the Bow to Shoot the Eagle" in their entirety, explaining the benefits of stretching involved. Wang Guilan found it interesting and expressed a desire to learn. The two then agreed to practice together once Ma Xiulan became more proficient.

起始状态.心情: Tense and busy

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary but gratified (First-day support went smoothly)

2025-06.daily_overview: On the second day of the high school entrance examination, which coincided with the weekend, the family maintained its "silent mode." However, Ma Xiulan's morning exercise routine was not interrupted by the rain, as she flexibly adjusted her workout location. She placed greater emphasis on providing emotional support for her eldest son after the exam, avoiding any additional pressure. In the afternoon, she experienced a mild headache due to the heat, but it improved after resting.

events.name: The morning of the Summer Solstice
events.description: Today is the Summer Solstice, and the sky brightened particularly early. Although it was drizzling, Ma Xiulan still woke up around six o'clock. Instead of going outside, she paced back and forth in the living room for a while as a substitute for a walk, then followed a mobile video to complete a full set of Baduanjin exercises in the open space of the living room. Practicing indoors allowed her to calm her mind and better focus on coordinating her movements with her breathing.

events.name: Pay attention to post-exam emotions and avoid persistent questioning.
events.description: After Ma Mingxuan returned home from the exam, Ma Xiulan carefully observed his expression. Instead of immediately asking how he performed, she helped him relax by preparing his favorite dinner and engaging in light conversation. She understood that the best support at that moment was not to disturb him.

events.name: Mild heatstroke headache in the afternoon
events.description: Due to the sultry weather, Ma Xiulan experienced mild headache and fatigue during her afternoon nap. She immediately drank some warm water and rested in a shaded area for an hour, after which her symptoms alleviated. This reminded her to pay more attention to heatstroke prevention in summer.

起始状态.心情: Continuous attention (to children's exams)

结束状态.心情: Slightly relaxed but somewhat uncomfortable (midway through the exam, experiencing mild physical discomfort)

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of indoor walking, 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice

2025-06.daily_overview: The final day of the high school entrance examination fell on a weekend. The tension within the family was about to ease. While tending to her vegetable garden, Ma Xiulan discovered new joys and remained mindful of household health details such as summer mosquito prevention. In the evening, the whole family gathered to celebrate the end of the exams, indulging in a hearty meal.

events.name: The Tranquility of a Weekend Morning
events.description: On Sunday morning, with few people on the street, Ma Xiulan enjoyed a solitary walk, letting her thoughts drift freely and gathering energy for the day's family activities.

events.name: New Discoveries in the Vegetable Garden
events.description: While watering the vegetable garden in the morning, Ma Xiulan was delighted to discover that the cucumber vines had bloomed with female flowers, which had already produced small, finger-sized fruits. Recalling her past farming experience, she fetched a clean brush and carefully swept it between the male and female flowers to assist with artificial pollination, hoping for better growth of the cucumbers.

events.name: Summer Mosquito Prevention Measures
events.description: In the evening, the children wanted to go out to play. Ma Xiulan quickly took out the mosquito repellent lotion and carefully applied it to each child's arms and calves. She reminded them not to go into the deep grass and to come back after playing for a while.

events.name: Celebrating the End of the Exams
events.description: After completing all his exams and returning home, Ma Mingxuan brought a sense of relief to the entire family. Ma Xiulan prepared a more lavish dinner than usual, including dishes the children love, such as some fried foods. The atmosphere at the dinner table noticeably lightened up, and everyone began discussing plans to visit the grandparents after the exams. Ma Xiulan smiled and agreed, marking the official end of the special exam preparation period.

起始状态.心情: Anticipating (the conclusion of examinations and family reunions)

结束状态.心情: Joyful and relaxed, yet slightly full.

2025-06.daily_overview: As the new week begins, life gradually returns to normal. Ma Xiulan resumes her regular gatherings with fellow handicraft enthusiasts to share life updates and experiences; the family holds a small meeting to officially conclude the exam preparation period; her health habits have become flexible enough to adapt to weather changes. She stays up slightly later in the evening due to the gathering.

events.name: Flexibly Adapting to Morning Exercise on Rainy Days
events.description: A light drizzle fell again in the morning. Ma Xiulan skillfully completed her morning exercise routine in the living room, maintaining the continuity of her habit. She felt that even indoors, her body became just as relaxed after the workout.

events.name: Monthly Gathering with Craft Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhou Xiuqin, a fellow craft enthusiast, visited as scheduled. Ma Xiulan brought out freshly picked cucumbers and tomatoes from her own vegetable garden to entertain her guest. As they worked on their embroidery, they savored the fresh produce and exchanged insights on recent stitching techniques and amusing anecdotes from the garden. Ma Xiulan mentioned her practice of Baduanjin, and when Zhou Xiuqin expressed discomfort in her neck, Ma Xiulan kindly taught her a few simple neck stretches.

events.name: Family Examination Preparation Summary Meeting
events.description: In the evening, while the whole family was present, Ma Xiulan organized a simple family talk. She acknowledged the collective efforts of the family over the past week, specifically praising the eldest son's perseverance and the younger siblings' sensible cooperation. Afterward, she began removing the motivational posters from the study door, announcing that starting the next day, television could be watched in moderation and the family routine would return to normal. This was a ceremonious transition.

events.name: Had a long phone conversation with childhood friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan called her childhood friend Liu Chunmei to share the relief after finishing the high school entrance examination and discuss healthy habits, chatting until 23:20 before falling asleep.

起始状态.心情: Easy (Life returns to normal)

结束状态.心情: Both social and family affairs are handled appropriately.

2025-06.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan put her financial management ideas into practice by going to the bank alone to handle the family's first large fixed deposit, marking an important step in household financial management. The rapidly changing weather also urged her to speed up the pace of her daily tasks. In the evening, she received a temporary handmade order and worked late into the night to complete it.

events.name: Morning Exercise Before the Rain
events.description: Seeing the dark clouds gathering in the sky, Ma Xiulan quickened her walking pace, finished her morning exercise before the raindrops fell, and hurried back home.

events.name: Handling Family Time Deposits
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan brought 3,500 yuan in cash (which included her anticipated income from handcraft work this month), along with her and her husband’s identification cards and bank cards, to a Postal Savings Bank near her home. At the counter, feeling somewhat nervous but determined, she opened a three-year fixed deposit account under their joint names. Holding the deposit receipt, she felt a sense of reassurance, as if she had laid a solid foundation for her family’s future.

events.name: Confirm family finances with husband.
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan showed the deposit receipt to her husband Ma Zhiqiang, explaining the deposit term and interest rate in detail. Her husband nodded in approval, and together they confirmed the completion of this family savings plan. This was the first time they had jointly completed a formal financial planning task.

events.name: Staying up late to complete handmade orders.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan received a rush order for hand embroidery that needed to be completed as soon as possible. She worked late into the night until 00:30 to finish it, resulting in her going to bed late.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous (need to handle important matters)

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment and peace of mind, yet exhaustion.

2025-06.daily_overview: This was a day filled with unexpected events and twists. The car accident involving her husband plunged Ma Xiulan into immense worry and lingering fear, making her deeply aware of the importance of the family pillar's safety. Amidst the unease, she simultaneously began planning to learn how to drive and continued to promote healthy habits, demonstrating resilience under pressure. In the evening, anxiety kept her awake with insomnia.

events.name: Cautious Morning Exercise After the Rain
events.description: It rained last night, making the roads slippery. Ma Xiulan took extra care during her morning walk but still persisted in completing her exercise routine. Regular workouts provided her with a sense of stability amid the turbulent days.

events.name: Sudden bad news
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan was preparing dinner when she suddenly received a phone call from her husband, Ma Zhiqiang. On the phone, her husband spoke in a hurried tone, saying that he had been involved in a scrape with an electric scooter that ran a red light while he was making a delivery, and the other party had fallen. Ma Xiulan’s heart instantly leaped into her throat, and she felt a wave of panic, nearly dropping the spatula in her hand.

events.name: Initial Reassurance and Persistent Anxiety
events.description: Her husband quickly added on the phone that he had already reported the incident to the police, and it seemed he had only suffered minor scrapes, with insurance covering the expenses, so she shouldn’t worry too much. Hearing this, Ma Xiulan felt slightly relieved. However, after hanging up, she remained restless and unable to focus on anything. The scene of the accident kept replaying in her mind, worrying her that her husband might be hiding the true extent of his injuries and dreading the troubles that would follow.

events.name: Seeking Support by Confiding in Family and Friends
events.description: While anxiously waiting for her husband to return home, Ma Xiulan felt so unsettled that she called her mother, Li Xiuying, and tearfully explained the situation. Her mother comforted her over the phone, urging her to think positively and suggesting they wait until her son-in-law returned home to ask for more details. The reassurance from her mother eased her tense nerves slightly.

events.name: The heart that was hanging in suspense has finally been put at ease.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Zhiqiang finally returned home after handling the accident, appearing completely unharmed. He recounted the entire incident in detail to Ma Xiulan, explaining that the other party had only suffered minor injuries and that the matter had already been resolved through negotiation. Seeing with her own eyes that her husband was safe and sound, Ma Xiulan’s long-held anxiety finally subsided completely, but the lingering sense of fear remained for a long time.

events.name: Determination Triggered by an Accident: Signing Up for Driving Lessons
events.description: This incident made Ma Xiulan keenly aware of the inconvenience and anxiety of not being able to drive. Encouraged by her husband, she began to consider learning to drive, thinking that she could step in if needed in the future and that it would also be more convenient for picking up and dropping off the children. She immediately decided to inquire about driving schools the next day.

events.name: Consolidation of Healthy Habits
events.description: Despite experiencing emotional fluctuations during the day, Ma Xiulan has persisted with her morning exercise routine for nearly twenty days, making it an unwavering habit. She no longer needs to remind herself, as both her body and biological clock have adapted. This enables her to maintain sufficient energy to handle household chores during the day, even when coping with unexpected stress.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Complex (grateful for the husband's safety, yet still shaken, while feeling a hint of excitement about the new decision)

state.今日运动: Morning walk for 30 minutes

2025-06.daily_overview: The day after the accident, life shifted into a practical phase focused on post-accident follow-up and family risk prevention. Ma Xiulan actively assisted her husband in handling insurance claims, began reviewing the family's insurance policies, and provided feedback to the doctor on the effectiveness of health management. She also met an old friend during her morning exercise and took her first step toward learning to drive. She started helping her neighbor tidy up the garden (Day 1).

events.name: Running into a childhood friend during morning exercise
events.description: While taking a morning walk, I unexpectedly ran into my childhood friend Liu Chunmei, who was also out for morning exercise. Both of us were pleasantly surprised, and as we walked, we chatted and agreed to take walks together regularly in the future, encouraging and motivating each other.

events.name: Assist with insurance claims processing
events.description: During the day, Ma Zhiqiang officially contacted the insurance company to report the claim. Ma Xiulan assisted by retrieving all vehicle documents and accident certificates, while closely monitoring each step of the claims process to ensure the family’s financial stability remained unaffected.

events.name: Provide Feedback and Seek Advice from Community Doctors
events.description: Because her younger daughter had a slight runny nose, Ma Xiulan took her to the community clinic to see Dr. Wang. After the consultation, she mentioned to Dr. Wang that she had been consistently practicing Baduanjin for nearly a month. She shared her experience of feeling more energetic and asked for advice on the details of coordinating breathing during the exercises. Dr. Wang affirmed her efforts and provided some professional suggestions.

events.name: Reviewing Family Risk Protection
events.description: The sense of insecurity brought by the accident prompted Ma Xiulan to take action. She rummaged through the drawers at home, pulling out all the insurance policy documents, including the compulsory traffic insurance and commercial insurance for her husband's truck, as well as some simple family policies she had taken out years ago, intending to study them carefully.

events.name: Enrollment in Driving School and Commencement of Theoretical Learning
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the Shunda Driving School in Jinghai District to inquire about driving courses. With guidance from her husband over the phone, she clarified the procedures and costs, completed the registration on the spot, and received the study materials for the first subject. In the evening, with her husband's help, she downloaded a driving test app on her phone and attempted a few practice questions, feeling as if she had returned to her student days.

events.name: Help neighbor Wang Guilan tidy up the garden
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan took some time to visit her neighbor Wang Guilan's home to help tidy up the backyard garden and remove weeds, which lasted for about two hours as part of a community mutual assistance activity.

起始状态.心情: Pragmatic, focused on problem-solving

结束状态.心情: Busy yet organized, with a touch of unfamiliar excitement about learning new things.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning walk; 2 hours of gardening

2025-06.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan thoroughly studied the insurance policy, clarified the scope of family coverage, and rebuilt her sense of security. On this basis, she held a second family financial meeting with her husband, made the important decision to establish a family risk reserve fund, and incorporated it into the July budget. Her safety reminders to her husband before he drove out became meticulous and all-encompassing. She continued to help her neighbor tidy up the garden (the next day).

events.name: The Positive Changes Brought by Persistence
events.description: After nearly a month of morning exercise, Ma Xiulan feels more energetic during the day, and even her sleep seems deeper. This has made her appreciate the value of this persistence even more.

events.name: Redoubled Safety Reminders After the Accident
events.description: Her husband still had to drive out for work today. Before he left, Ma Xiulan repeatedly checked the vehicle's tires, personally confirmed that he had his driver's license and vehicle registration certificate, and placed a bottle of water in his car. As she inspected everything, she kept murmuring, "Drive slowly on the road, watch out for electric bikes, rest at service areas if you feel tired, and never push yourself too hard." Her tone was filled with unresolvable worry.

events.name: Study the policy to dispel worries.
events.description: Taking advantage of the free time during the day, Ma Xiulan took out the truck insurance contract she had found the day before. Wearing her reading glasses, she carefully read through each clause. When she confirmed that the losses from this accident were fully covered by the insurance and that her family would not have to pay any extra money, she breathed a sigh of relief and gained a firsthand understanding of the role of "insurance."

events.name: Establish a Family Emergency Fund
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan and her husband held a brief but important family meeting. She first explained the insurance coverage situation, then shared her idea: "Zhiqiang, I was thinking, could we try to set aside a little money each month from now on, even just 50 yuan, and keep it separately as a 'risk fund' for the family? In the future, whether it's for buying insurance or covering minor repairs for the car or house, we can use this money instead of dipping into our main savings." Her husband thought for a moment and nodded in agreement. The two reached a consensus on the matter.

events.name: Incorporate the new plan into the family budget
events.description: After the meeting, Ma Xiulan took out the household account book and began planning the expenses for July. She carefully calculated the costs for groceries, utilities, and her child's pocket money, saving a little here and cutting back a little there, determined to squeeze out the 50 yuan "emergency fund." She then marked it in the account book.

events.name: Continue helping the neighbor tidy up the garden.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to Wang Guilan's home again to assist in planting some autumn flowers, which lasted for one and a half hours.

起始状态.心情: Serious, with a mindset of researching questions

结束状态.心情: Assured and at ease (risks are managed, and the family has a new plan)

2025-06.daily_overview: On weekends, the family rhythm slows down. Ma Xiulan's morning exercise routine has become fully established. She directs her energy toward planning for the autumn in her small vegetable garden, actively seeks advice from neighbors, and begins preparations, elevating gardening from a casual activity to a planned family tradition. Meanwhile, her concern for her husband's safety has been integrated into her daily caring phone calls. She completes helping a neighbor tidy up the garden (Day 3).

events.name: Enjoy the tranquility of weekend morning exercise.
events.description: On Saturday morning, the streets were exceptionally quiet. Ma Xiulan took a solitary walk, enjoying this rare moment of solitude and tranquility while pondering the day's plans.

events.name: Habit becomes second nature.
events.description: Waking up, doing simple household chores, going out for a walk, and returning home to practice Baduanjin—these actions have now become as natural as brushing teeth and washing the face, forming a fixed routine that Ma Xiulan follows every morning without needing to think.

events.name: Neighborly Exchanges by the Vegetable Garden
events.description: While watering her small vegetable garden in the evening, Ma Xiulan was visited by her neighbor Wang Guilan. The two chatted across the fence about vegetable gardening. Sister Wang shared her traditional method of using plant ash to control cabbage worms, while Ma Xiulan picked several fresh cucumbers for Sister Wang to taste.

events.name: Plan Your Fall Vegetable Garden
events.description: Seeing the summer crops growing well, Ma Xiulan began to plan what to plant in autumn. Considering her family's preferences and cold tolerance, she initially decided to mainly grow spinach and radishes in the fall, and also plant some coriander and spring onions in flowerpots on the balcony. This idea filled her with anticipation for the future vegetable garden.

events.name: Seeking Advice from "Expert" Neighbors
events.description: Having made up her mind, Ma Xiulan went directly to visit Wang Guilan, her neighbor across the way, to seek detailed advice on the techniques for planting spinach and radishes in autumn, such as the optimal sowing time, soil preparation methods, and pest prevention measures. Wang Guilan generously shared her experience and knowledge with great enthusiasm.

events.name: Preparing for Autumn Planting
events.description: Returning from Wang Guilan's home, Ma Xiulan was brimming with enthusiasm. She rummaged through the storage room at home and found the leftover spinach and radish seeds from last year, checking whether they were still usable. She then gathered tools such as the small shovel and watering can, arranging them together. With everything prepared, she only awaited the arrival of the right season.

events.name: Daily Concerns and Reminders
events.description: After her husband set out in the morning, Ma Xiulan called him during her lunch break to ask if the route was going smoothly. She emphasized once again that he must take proper rest at service areas and not rush. The worry in her tone was noticeably more intense than before the accident.

events.name: Complete the neighbor's garden tidying.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan spent an hour helping Wang Guilan complete the final tidying of the garden, including clearing weeds and watering.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and Pleasant (Weekend)

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and Hopeful (Completed Autumn Planting Plan and Community Mutual Assistance)

2025-06.daily_overview: Another weekend arrived, and Ma Xiulan looked back with pride on her month-long commitment to health. The shadow of her husband's accident still lingered. She alleviated her persistent worries by confiding in her neighbors and took practical action—updating the first-aid kit in her husband's car—to gain a bit of tangible peace of mind. That evening, she stayed up slightly later due to her driver's license exam studies.

events.name: Retrospect and Pride
events.description: During her morning walk, Ma Xiulan reflected on her persistence with the morning exercise routine throughout June. From initial attempts to forming a habit, she genuinely felt the changes in both her body and spirit, taking heartfelt pride in her ability to stay committed.

events.name: Confiding Worries to a Neighbor
events.description: At the doorway, she ran into Wang Guilan again. Ma Xiulan couldn't help but bring up the accident her husband had been involved in a few days earlier, her tone filled with lingering fear and ongoing worry: "Sister Wang, every time I think about Zhiqiang being out and about all day, my heart just clenches. When your husband used to drive for a living, were there any particular things he paid special attention to?" She hoped to gain some comfort and practical advice from someone with experience.

events.name: Update the vehicle first aid kit
events.description: To ease her mind, Ma Xiulan took advantage of her husband's day off at home to carefully inspect the first-aid kit in his car. Noticing that some adhesive bandages were nearing their expiration date, she consulted Dr. Wang at the community clinic, purchased new adhesive bandages, antiseptic cotton swabs, and gastrointestinal medicine, and then neatly organized and returned them to the car. This small gesture gave her a sense of having added an extra layer of protection for her husband's safety.

events.name: Theoretical Study for Driver's License Examination
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan continued studying for the driving test subject one, focusing on reviewing traffic regulations, and did not go to bed until 23:10.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a hint of reflection.

结束状态.心情: Slightly relieved (alleviated some anxiety through confiding and taking action)

state.今日运动: Morning walk for 30 minutes, Baduanjin exercise for 10 minutes

2025-06.daily_overview: On the last day of June, Ma Xiulan conducted a comprehensive review of her life over the past half month: the benefits of healthy habits, the phased achievements in her small vegetable garden, and the gains from financial management studies. She resolved to carry these positive changes into the new month and began systematic study of driving theory in the evening. Her health condition has fully met the optimization goals.

events.name: Draw a Conclusion to June's Healthy Habits
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan completed her final morning exercise session for June. She was determined to persist with the routine of "walking first, then practicing the Eight-Section Brocade," which had proven highly beneficial to her, as a long-term investment in her health.

events.name: End-of-Month Small Vegetable Garden Inventory
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan conducted her end-of-month observation in the vegetable garden. The tomato plants bore many fruits, the cucumbers would be ready for picking in a few days, and the green beans were at their peak production. She cleared a small patch of land, thinking to herself that she could soon sow the seeds for autumn spinach. This cycle of cultivation and harvest gave her a sense of steadiness.

events.name: Review and Planning
events.description: Ma Xiulan silently reflected on this extraordinary June in her heart: her son’s high school entrance exam, her husband’s accident, learning financial management, persisting with exercise, planning the vegetable garden… Each event had spurred her growth and transformation. For the upcoming July, she felt both the pragmatism of handling the aftermath of the accident and the anticipation of continuing her studies (driver’s license test) and maintaining good habits.

events.name: Theoretical Study for Driver's License Exam: Mastering Traffic Signs
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan unfailingly opened the driving test app to study. Tonight, she focused on traffic signs, taking screenshots of the red, blue, circular, and triangular signs one by one, repeatedly memorizing them against the textual explanations. When encountering signs with similar shapes or colors, she would specifically mark them for comparison. Though she found the learning somewhat challenging, she approached it with great diligence.

起始状态.心情: Summary and Outlook

结束状态.心情: Substantive and resolute

2025-07.daily_overview: On the first day of July, Ma Xiulan began her day with routine household chores and morning exercise. She continued the longstanding traditions of managing household mosquito prevention and savings, while also taking practical steps toward new family goals. Morning exercise had already become a firmly established habit.

events.name: Mugwort Fumigation in the Garden at Dawn
events.description: Taking advantage of the cool morning temperature, Ma Xiulan bundled some of the previously dried mugwort into small bunches and lit them in a corner of her small courtyard to carry out traditional fumigation to repel mosquitoes. After the fumigation, she carefully stored the remaining mugwort for future use.

events.name: Establish a Family Emergency Fund
events.description: After finishing last month's accounts, Ma Xiulan placed the first 50 yuan saved in July into an old envelope labeled "Reserve Fund" and specifically recorded this family risk reserve in the account book.

events.name: Initial planning for a family trip to Beijing
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan and Ma Zhiqiang discussed taking the children to Beijing during the summer vacation. They compared the work schedule with the summer holiday dates, tentatively selected the travel week, and roughly estimated the expenses, with Ma Xiulan silently calculating the budget in her mind.

events.name: Routine Morning Health Combination Exercises
events.description: At 5:30 in the morning, Ma Xiulan takes a 20-minute brisk walk in the Jingwen Road community, savoring the tranquility of the early hours. Afterward, in an open space near her home, she skillfully performs a 15-minute session of Baduanjin, with fluid movements and coordinated breathing, which has become a daily ritual for her.

events.name: Response to Community Water Supply Suspension Notice
events.description: When she went out to buy groceries in the morning, Ma Xiulan saw a notice on the community bulletin board stating that the water supply would be suspended for two days from July 8 to 9. She immediately returned home to discuss the matter with her husband and called her parents to confirm that she could bring the children over during the water outage. She then began counting the water storage containers.

events.name: Rush processing of temporary manual orders
events.description: In the afternoon, through Zheng Xiuying's introduction, Ma Xiulan received an urgent order for hand embroidery, which needed to be completed within three days. She adjusted her household schedule, found time to begin the embroidery, and dedicated herself to the task with full concentration.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a faint anticipation for the beginning of the new month and the refreshing feeling after morning exercise.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, multiple family plans were completed and handmade orders were initiated, but the rush work brought slight fatigue.

2025-07.daily_overview: Balancing concerns for her husband's driving safety, maintaining her morning exercise routine, and rushing to complete handmade orders, Ma Xiulan felt slightly stressed due to order pressure, but found relief through her morning workouts.

events.name: Weather Alerts and Safety Reminders
events.description: After learning from the evening weather forecast that it would rain the next day, Ma Xiulan immediately called her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who was out driving, and urged him to drive slowly in the rain, maintain a safe distance, and take breaks when necessary, her tone full of concern.

events.name: Begin studying traffic regulations
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan took out her old notebook and studied the basic knowledge of the "Road Traffic Safety Law" on her phone, copying down key provisions such as regulations on motor vehicle passage. Though she found it challenging, she approached the task with diligence.

events.name: Adhere to morning exercise
events.description: At 5:35 in the morning, Ma Xiulan went out for a 20-minute brisk walk. On the way, she briefly greeted her neighbor Wang Guilan. She then practiced Baduanjin for 15 minutes, with smoother movements and an effort to reduce reliance on her phone.

events.name: Organize seasonal clothing
events.description: Taking advantage of the muggy weather, Ma Xiulan found, inspected, washed, and hung out the summer clothes for her family of five, packed away the spring outfits, and enjoyed the sense of fulfillment that comes from managing daily life.

events.name: Continue manual order rush work
events.description: To complete an urgent order, Ma Xiulan stayed up late embroidering, focusing on details, but her wrists felt slightly sore. She took regular breaks to avoid strain.

2025-07.daily_overview: The rainy weather limited outdoor activities, so Ma Xiulan refined the travel plans with her sister via video. Due to her child catching a cold, she adjusted the daily routine, shifting the focus of life toward family matters.

events.name: Consulting my sister about the details of traveling to Beijing
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan contacted her sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing via WeChat video call. She excitedly informed her that the whole family planned to visit Beijing during the summer vacation. Her sister introduced various tourist attractions and offered to provide accommodation. Ma Xiulan carefully took notes and felt even more eager for the trip.

events.name: Indoor Handicrafts and Child Interaction
events.description: On rainy days when the children couldn't go outside, Ma Xiulan took her youngest daughter Ma Yuxin to do embroidery in the living room, teaching her simple patterns while supervising her two sons as they completed their summer homework.

events.name: Adjusting Morning Exercise on Rainy Days
events.description: The rain was heavy in the early morning. Ma Xiulan completed a 15-minute session of Baduanjin in the living room. Despite the cramped space, she persisted in maintaining her exercise routine.

events.name: The second son has a slight cold and went to bed early for care.
events.description: The second son, Ma Mingzhe, developed mild cold symptoms due to catching a chill on a rainy day. Ma Xiulan arranged for him to rest in advance, prepared ginger soup, and went to bed early herself to better care for him.

events.name: Complete manual orders
events.description: Ma Xiulan rushed to complete the embroidery order, checked the quality, packed it, and prepared to deliver it tomorrow, feeling relieved.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Wrapped in the tranquility of a rainy day, my heart is at peace, looking forward to chatting with my sister.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling excited and warmed by the in-depth conversation with my sister and the refinement of travel plans, yet somewhat concerned due to the child's cold.

However, this setback helped her identify key areas for further learning. Simultaneously, she earned additional income through manual delivery work.

events.description: While taking chapter-based practice tests on a driving test app, Ma Xiulan found that she could correctly identify traffic signs, but often confused the corresponding fines and point deduction rules. Her accuracy rate was unsatisfactory, which left her feeling frustrated. However, she recognized the need to strengthen her knowledge in these areas.

events.name: Purchase weekend family groceries
events.description: During a break in the rain, Ma Xiulan went to Aunt Sun's market to buy ingredients for the weekend. Thinking that her husband might be home over the weekend, she bought pork ribs and seasonal vegetables.

events.name: Adhere to morning exercise
events.description: The morning air was fresh after the rain. Ma Xiulan briskly walked for 20 minutes with light steps, then practiced the Eight-Section Brocade for 15 minutes, focusing on reviewing the movements she often struggled with.

events.name: Deliver manual orders and receive income
events.description: Ma Xiulan delivered the completed embroidery order to Zheng Xiuying and received an additional income of 200 yuan. She happily deposited the money into the family's emergency fund.

events.name: A brief celebration with my husband
events.description: In the evening, when her husband returned home, Ma Xiulan shared her joy over the income from her handicrafts. The couple celebrated briefly and discussed setting it aside as savings for a family trip.

2025-07.daily_overview: A day filled with harvest, sharing, and the exchange of information, the eldest son's outstanding performance in the high school entrance examination brought joy, while a family gathering led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Check the eldest child's high school entrance examination results.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan logged onto the website to check her son Ma Mingxuan's high school entrance exam results. Upon discovering that his scores far exceeded expectations, she excitedly called her husband to share the good news, her voice trembling with emotion.

events.name: Video call with my sister on the new phone
events.description: At noon, I had a video call with my sister Li Xiuyun using my new phone, sharing the good news about my son and specifically discussing Beijing's tourist attractions and affordable restaurants. The picture was clear, and the experience was excellent.

events.name: Proficient in Morning Exercise
events.description: I got up a bit later on the weekend but still persisted with 20 minutes of brisk walking and 15 minutes of Baduanjin. I tried to complete the movements without relying on videos, and my breathing coordination improved.

events.name: Tending the Vegetable Garden and Harvesting
events.description: After breakfast, I tended to the vegetable garden, set up trellises for the cucumber vines, and harvested ripe cucumbers and tomatoes, gathering a full basket of fresh vegetables.

events.name: Delivering Vegetables to Neighbors and Seeking Advice
events.description: Ma Xiulan delivered vegetables to her neighbors Wang Guilan and Zhang Shufen. Wang Guilan reciprocated with pickles and offered advice on boarding at school, while Zhang Shufen informed her about a stationery set for boarding students. Ma Xiulan gratefully noted the information.

events.name: Family Celebration Dinner
events.description: To celebrate the eldest son's excellent academic performance, a sumptuous dinner was prepared, featuring dishes such as sweet and sour pork tenderloin and Tianjin steamed buns. The whole family enjoyed a joyful gathering, though the meal schedule was slightly irregular.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The weekend was lazy, and there was nervousness about checking scores, but the vitality of the vegetable garden was infectious.

结束状态.心情: Filled with joy and pride, yet excitement and anxiety intertwine over the boarding school issue.

2025-07.daily_overview: A pivotal day in family life: the eldest son received his boarding school admission letter, prompting a family meeting to address the changes, while continued celebratory dining led to another weight gain.

events.name: Organizing traffic regulation wrong answer questions
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan copied the incorrect questions into her notebook, writing down the correct answers and her understanding of easily confused points, such as the corresponding penalty amounts for different violation scenarios.

events.name: Received the admission notice and confirmed the boarding regulations.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Mingxuan's admission notice arrived, clearly stating that all first-year high school students must live on campus. Ma Xiulan read through the terms word by word, and any sense of wishful thinking vanished.

events.name: A Couple's Late-Night Detailed Conversation
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan and her husband discussed the notification letter. Ma Zhiqiang analyzed that boarding school would be beneficial for studies, while Ma Xiulan expressed reluctance and concern, with her emotions fluctuating.

events.name: Formal Family Meeting
events.description: In the evening, a family meeting was convened to announce the news of the elder brother's boarding at school. Ma Xiulan expressed her concerns candidly, and the family reached a unanimous agreement to offer their support, creating a formal yet warm atmosphere.

events.name: Begin planning for boarding school preparations.
events.description: After the meeting, Ma Xiulan drafted a list of boarding school supplies, planned procurement matters based on neighbors' experiences, and demonstrated strong execution capabilities.

events.name: Family Leisure Dining
events.description: To ease the mood, dinner continued to be sumptuous, featuring noodles with gravy and seasonal vegetables, while the whole family relaxed and chatted.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the day when the information was shared and the travel plans were finalized, Ma Xiulan informed her relatives and friends of the good news, confirmed the travel arrangements, prepared for the upcoming water outage, and returned to a light diet, resulting in a slight weight loss.

events.name: Sharing Good News and Personal Matters with Family and Friends
events.description: Ma Xiulan informed her parents, elder sister, younger sister, and childhood friends of her son's good news and boarding school update via phone and WeChat. She expressed her reluctance to her mother and childhood friends, receiving comfort in return.

events.name: Finalize the family travel itinerary.
events.description: During the evening family meeting, the travel dates for the Beijing trip and the itinerary, including sites such as Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, and the zoo, were finalized. After listening to the children's suggestions, Ma Xiulan felt that a major decision had been settled.

events.description: In the evening, clean buckets and basins, fill them with water, and arrange them in the kitchen and bathroom. Remind children to conserve water in preparation for tomorrow's water outage.

events.name: Morning Exercise and Household Chores
events.description: Morning exercise: 20 minutes of brisk walking and 15 minutes of Eight-Section Brocade, all completed smoothly. During the day, laundry was done and the kitchen was cleaned to reduce household chores during the water outage period.

events.name: Failed to try a new recipe.
events.description: Ma Xiulan attempted to create a new healthy recipe but failed, resulting in a poor taste. Feeling slightly discouraged, she adjusted back to a light diet.

events.description: Ma Xiulan meticulously uses stored water to prepare simple meals and washes dishes with minimal water, creating a cautious atmosphere at home due to water restrictions.

2025-07.daily_overview: With the water outage resolved and life returning to normal, the husband's health checkup is now on the agenda, and an invitation for a gathering with childhood friends has been extended. Ma Xiulan looks forward to an emotional release.

events.name: Received husband's physical examination notice
events.description: Her husband brought home the company's annual physical examination notice. Ma Xiulan carefully reviewed the time, location, and precautions, reminded him to fast, and confirmed the date.

events.name: Inviting a childhood friend to visit my home
events.description: Ma Xiulan contacted her childhood friend Liu Chunmei via WeChat, inviting her over for handicrafts and tea tomorrow afternoon, to which Liu Chunmei readily agreed.

events.name: Preparing for a friend's visit
events.description: After dinner, clean the living room and prepare tea, melon seeds, and fruits. Take out the embroidery tools and the unfinished piece, looking forward to a heart-to-heart conversation.

events.name: Day Two of Water Outage: Prudent Management and Restoration of Water Supply
events.description: The stored water was nearly depleted, so Ma Xiulan opted for fried rice and cold dishes that required less water for cooking. In the evening, the water supply was restored, and she drained the remaining stored water to clean the containers before putting them back in place.

events.name: Encountering More Neighbors During Morning Exercise
events.description: During my morning brisk walk, I encountered several neighbors and briefly exchanged health tips, which enhanced social interaction.

起始状态.心情: On the final day of the water outage, I felt relaxed and planned to resume normal arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin

2025-07.daily_overview: A pivotal day for emotional release and relationship deepening. A profound conversation with a childhood friend alleviated anxiety, while an evening talk with my son laid the groundwork for an upcoming separation. Weight slightly increased due to emotional relief.

events.name: A Heart-to-Heart Conversation with My Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: In the afternoon, Liu Chunmei paid a visit. The two of them brewed tea and did handicrafts together. Ma Xiulan poured out her worries about her eldest son's high school entrance exam, the hardships of accompanying him in his studies, the joy over his excellent results, and the sense of loss after he started boarding at school. Liu Chunmei listened attentively, shared similar experiences, and offered empathy.

events.name: Emotional Release and Gaining Support
events.description: After several hours of conversation, Ma Xiulan felt her psychological burden lightened, came to understand that her emotions were normal, observed positive changes from boarding at school, and experienced a sense of ease and comfort.

events.name: Farewell to a Friend
events.description: In the evening, after seeing Liu Chunmei to the door and agreeing to keep in touch frequently, Ma Xiulan tidied up the tea set, reflecting on their conversation with a warm heart.

events.name: Comprehensive Practice on Traffic Regulations
events.description: In the evening, I calmly engaged in comprehensive practice on the driving test app, and my accuracy rate showed a noticeable improvement compared to when I first started learning, which boosted my confidence in studying.

events.name: Having an In-Depth Heart-to-Heart Talk with the Eldest Son
events.description: Before bedtime, I had a private conversation with Ma Mingxuan, encouraging him to be brave and independent in taking care of himself. Both mother and son showed reluctance to part, but the atmosphere was warm and supportive.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Morning exercise looks forward to the afternoon gathering, lighthearted and ready to confide.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: After a profound exchange, a sense of relief and tranquility emerged, accompanied by the warmth of being understood and supported. The anxiety over my son leaving home was alleviated, leading to a peaceful state of mind.

events.name: Preparing boarding school supplies for my son
events.description: Ma Xiulan listed a detailed procurement list: she went to the community clinic to ask Dr. Wang for cold medicine, gastrointestinal medicine, and adhesive bandages, and inquired about their usage; she then went to Zhang Shufen's supermarket to purchase travel-sized toiletries; finally, she returned home to sort, organize, and label the items.

events.name: Planning a Family Movie Night
events.description: Realizing that the family would have less time together after their eldest son started boarding school, Ma Xiulan suggested watching a movie together tomorrow evening and began planning snacks such as French fries, popcorn chicken, and watermelon.

events.name: Seeking Advice from Husband on Traffic Issues
events.description: After her husband returned home in the evening, Ma Xiulan consulted her notebook about complex road conditions and truck regulations. Ma Zhiqiang, drawing on his driving experience, provided explanations that gave her a sudden and clear understanding.

events.name: Emotional Transformation and Positive Action
events.description: Ma Xiulan approached household chores with a positive mindset, channeling emotional support into motivation for preparing luggage and planning activities.

events.name: Received a small manual order at short notice.
events.description: In the afternoon, Zheng Xiuying introduced a small handicraft order, which Ma Xiulan accepted and plans to complete over the weekend to increase her income.
