2025-07.daily_overview: A diverse and colorful weekend: my sister taught online shopping, managed the vegetable garden to deal with pests, enjoyed a family movie night, and experienced a slight weight gain due to snacking.

events.name: The younger sister teaches online shopping skills.
events.description: Ma Xiufen came to visit her sister Ma Xiulan in the morning. She patiently taught Ma Xiulan how to download the app, register an account, search for products such as kitchen storage boxes, and check detailed reviews. Ma Xiulan learned attentively but felt a bit overwhelmed by the process.

events.name: First independent browsing of a shopping platform
events.description: After her sister left, Ma Xiulan operated the app herself to browse the product page. For the first time, she used the online customer service and asked haltingly, "Does this include free shipping?"

events.name: Discussing Traffic Rules with My Husband
events.description: After dinner, I consulted my husband about the rules for overtaking and meeting oncoming vehicles when driving at night. Ma Zhiqiang made the regulations vivid by incorporating his experiences with night driving.

events.name: Prepare Travel Snacks
events.description: Ma Xiulan made pancakes and boiled tea eggs, purchased durable fruits, washed them, and portioned them as travel provisions.

events.name: Enjoy Morning Exercise
events.description: On weekends, do 20 minutes of brisk walking for morning exercise, 15 minutes of Baduanjin for relaxation, and more stretching to feel comfortable.

events.name: Watering the Vegetable Garden and Pest Detection
events.description: In the evening, while watering, I discovered aphids on the tomato plants and sprayed them with chili water. I plan to consult Wang Guilan tomorrow for traditional methods.

events.name: Preparing for a Family Movie Night
events.description: Buy potatoes, chicken, and watermelon in the afternoon; make French fries, popcorn chicken, and cut the watermelon; prepare snacks.

events.name: Cozy Family Movie Night
events.description: In the evening, the whole family watched a comedy film. Ma Xiulan brought out some snacks. The children were excited, the husband was relaxed, and the atmosphere was warm. Ma Xiulan took a photo to capture the moment.

events.name: Work together to tidy up
events.description: After the movie, I cleaned the coffee table and took out the trash with my family, restoring the living room to its original state.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The weekend was lazy and cozy, and knowing that my sister was coming for a family gathering brought joy.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extreme satisfaction and happiness, learning the basics of a new skill, resolving troubles in the vegetable garden, a successful family movie night with strong cohesion, warmth and joy.

events.name: Review online shopping procedures and place the first order.
events.description: In the morning, I studied the shopping process, compared prices and reviews of laundry detergent, discovered a new user coupon, and after calculations, chose cash on delivery to place an order for toilet paper and laundry detergent, completing my first independent online shopping experience.

events.name: In-depth discussion with husband on the division of traffic responsibility

Ma Zhiqiang shared firsthand cases to help translate theoretical understanding into practical reality.

events.name: Preparing Clothing and Toys for Travel
events.description: Ma Xiulan selected comfortable clothes for the children, folded and packed them, prepared a beautiful dress for her youngest daughter, and organized travel entertainment items including toys, picture books, and storybooks.

events.name: Follow-up on Aphid Control in the Vegetable Garden
events.description: After consulting Wang Guilan, I used tobacco leaves soaked in water to spray on the tomato plants, observing the effects in hopes of preserving the crops.

events.name: Browsing online shopping platforms late at night
events.description: Excited by her first order, Ma Xiulan browsed more products in the evening, compared prices, planned future purchases, and ended up staying up late.

2025-07.daily_overview: A new week begins. Track successful delivery of express packages, share handmade creations, post a community craft corner notice, make personalized preparations for boarding school life, and maintain weight at 55.0 kg.

events.name: First-Time Package Tracking and Receipt
events.description: Checking the logistics information all day, I received a call from the courier in the afternoon. Upon receiving the goods, I carefully inspected the outer packaging and the items, confirmed everything was correct, and paid in cash. I was overjoyed to successfully receive my first online purchase.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Success and Storage
events.description: After receiving the goods, I sent a joyful message to my sister on WeChat, organized the toilet paper and laundry detergent in the storage cabinet, and planned for the next cost-effective shopping trip.

events.name: Sharing Handmade Creations in the Classmate Group
events.description: In the evening, I took a photo of the embroidered lotus flower pattern and shared it in the junior high school classmates' group with the caption "Summer Fresh Lotus." I received likes and compliments from Sun Lihua, Chen Yulan, and others. The group chat felt warm with the shared appreciation for the needlework.

events.name: Release of Community Handicraft Corner Activity Notice
events.description: Post a teaching notice for the handicraft corner in the Jingwen Road Neighborhood Mutual Assistance WeChat group, specifying the time, location, theme, basic embroidery techniques, and items to be prepared by participants.

events.name: Personalized Preparations for the Eldest Son's Boarding School Stay
events.description: Ma Xiulan meticulously embroidered the name "Ma Mingxuan" on the newly purchased bedsheets, duvet covers, and towels. Following Dr. Wang's consultation, she carefully divided the medication and handwritten usage instructions, demonstrating thoroughness and attentiveness.

events.name: Inviting Neighbors to Join Morning Exercise
events.description: During morning exercises, Wang Guilan was invited to join in brisk walking several times. After trying it, she expressed interest, and social interactions increased.

2025-07.daily_overview: Mid-Month Summary and New Beginnings: Husband completed his physical examination, morning exercise routine is now well-established, invited members for the handicraft corner, inquired about driving school registration, and concluded the health status matching phase.

events.name: The husband completed the annual physical examination.
events.description: Ma Zhiqiang took a leave in the morning to go to Jinghai District Hospital for medical examinations including blood tests, ultrasound, and electrocardiogram. In the evening, he reported feeling fine and said he would wait for the results. Ma Xiulan noted down the time to collect the reports.

events.name: Review and Persistence in Morning Exercise
events.description: Looking back on half a month of morning exercise, I can now complete the Eight-Section Brocade effortlessly, enjoying the sense of relaxation after the workout. I have decided to continue this routine and am considering incorporating simple stretching exercises.

events.name: Personalized Invitation for Community Handicraft Corner Members
events.description: In addition to group notifications, privately invite neighbors and friends such as Wang Guilan, Zhang Shufen, and Zhou Xiuqin who are interested in handicrafts, and warmly ensure that the first event has core participants.

events.name: Inquire about driving school enrollment
events.description: I obtained the contact information of the driving school through Zheng Xiuying, called to inquire about the enrollment process, fees, and learning duration, and felt excited about the idea of learning to drive.

events.name: Follow-up on Addressing Aphid Issues in the Vegetable Garden
events.description: After spraying tobacco leaf water, the aphids decreased, the tomatoes regained health, and Ma Xiulan was relieved to have preserved the harvest.

2025-07.daily_overview: Against the backdrop of her eldest son's impending boarding school life, Ma Xiulan focused today on family education and health management. She repeatedly reminded her husband about driving safety and emphasized travel discipline to the children. Meanwhile, her consistent morning exercise routine began to extend outward as she invited neighbors to join. Gardening and handicraft work also progressed in an orderly manner.

events.name: Concern for Husband's Driving Safety
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan called her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who was out on a transport run, specifically inquiring about his driving conditions in the severe weather and reminding him to rest and avoid fatigued driving.

events.name: Review Driving Test Knowledge
events.description: Ma Xiulan used her spare time to practice questions on the Driving Test Guide app. She encountered several difficulties regarding traffic signs and noted them down to consult her husband in the evening.

events.name: Conduct pre-departure safety education for children
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan officially announced the Beijing travel plan, emphasizing safety discipline. The children excitedly asked questions, and she patiently answered them while establishing simple travel rules.

events.name: Invite Neighbors to Join Morning Exercise
events.description: As the morning exercise was about to end, Ma Xiulan met her neighbor Wang Guilan. Ma Xiulan enthusiastically shared the benefits of morning exercise and invited her to join for a brisk walk the next morning, to which Wang Guilan gladly agreed.

events.name: Do morning exercises
events.description: At 5:30 in the morning, Ma Xiulan completed her Baduanjin exercises and a 20-minute brisk walk in the community open space. Her movements were smooth, but due to the stifling heat, she ended the brisk walk early. She felt her body had been fully stretched.

events.name: Maintaining a Small Home Vegetable Garden
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan weeded and loosened the soil in the vegetable garden. Due to the hot weather, she only worked for 20 minutes before taking a break to avoid heatstroke.

events.name: Procurement of Materials for Handicraft Orders
events.description: In the afternoon, I went to the fabric market to select materials for baby products. After careful budgeting and bargaining, I purchased soft cotton fabric and embroidery thread, and also bought some snacks for the trip.

events.name: Prepare a Travel Packing List
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan made a detailed luggage list, including clothing, medication, and documents, to ensure a trouble-free trip.

events.name: Received a notice for temporary manual odd jobs.
events.description: In the evening, Zheng Xiuying sent a WeChat message about an urgent manual odd job. After consideration, Ma Xiulan politely declined due to time constraints as her trip was approaching.

起始状态.心情: Calm yet slightly expectant, thinking about morning exercises and travel preparations.

结束状态.心情: Productive and well-organized, having accomplished multiple tasks, with a full schedule planned for tomorrow.

2025-07.daily_overview: Today is a day of hectic preparations before the trip. Ma Xiulan’s main focus was on taking stock of her eldest son’s boarding school supplies, recalculating travel expenses, and preparing for handicraft orders. Despite the busy schedule, everything progressed in an orderly manner, though her weight increased slightly due to irregular eating habits.

events.name: Inventory of Boarding School Items for the Eldest Son
events.description: In the morning, I inventoried the boarding school supplies, washed and aired the bedding, and planned to alter an old sweater for my son to wear in winter, carefully managing expenses to save money.

events.name: Refine Travel Budget
events.description: During the lunch break, carefully calculate the travel budget for Beijing, allocate funds separately from the family emergency reserve, and set aside extra funds as a contingency.

events.name: Draw an embroidery sketch
events.description: After dinner, I sketched the character "Fu" and auspicious cloud patterns for the baby's bellyband, revising them repeatedly until satisfied, and prepared to begin the embroidery.

events.name: First Morning Exercise with Neighbor Wang Guilan
events.description: At 6:30 a.m., I took a 30-minute brisk walk with Wang Guilan, chatting about daily life while exercising. Ma Xiulan shared the benefits of sticking to morning workouts.

events.name: Due to irregular eating habits during gatherings
events.description: I attended an impromptu gathering with neighbors at noon and consumed a relatively large amount of greasy food, which led to stomach discomfort in the afternoon. I have decided to adjust my diet starting tomorrow.

2025-07.daily_overview: The final sprint before the trip. After completing her driving test simulation, Ma Xiulan threw herself into the last-minute preparations, sharing her gains with neighbors and harvesting her vegetable garden for the first time, filled with joy and busyness. However, due to staying up late to prepare, her weight increased once again.

events.name: Take a simulated driving test.
events.description: In the morning, she took a simulated driving test and scored 88 points, which was a failing grade. She took screenshots of the incorrect questions to review in the evening, feeling slightly discouraged but determined to persevere.

events.name: Final Check of Travel Luggage
events.description: Check your luggage and inspect the water and electricity at home one day before the trip, dispose of perishable food, and ensure everything is ready.

events.name: Sharing Morning Exercise Experiences with Neighbors
events.description: While buying groceries, I ran into Wang Guilan and shared my experience of feeling relaxed in the shoulders and waist after morning exercises, encouraging my neighbor to keep it up.

events.name: Harvest and Share the Garden's Fruits
events.description: Picking cucumbers and string beans to share with neighbors, Zhang Shufen reciprocated with soy sauce, warming the bonds of community.

events.name: Begin embroidering the baby bellyband.
events.description: In the evening, I traced the pattern and began outlining with satin stitch, focusing calmly, but stayed up late due to excitement from the trip.

events.name: Discussing Boarding School Supplies with the Eldest Son
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Mingxuan was shown the list of items. He needed a schoolbag and extracurricular books, so Ma Xiulan noted them down to purchase after the trip.

events.name: Temporarily changing dinner plans
events.description: Due to the busy schedule before the trip, I made a simple noodle dish with gravy for dinner and ate a bit more than usual, resulting in a slight weight gain.

2025-07.daily_overview: The family's Beijing dream trip officially begins! The family of five has successfully arrived at their sister's home in Beijing. Meanwhile, Ma Xiulan has passed the first subject of the driving test. It's a double celebration, but the rich diet during the trip has led to some weight gain.

events.name: The husband proactively reports his safety.
events.description: In the afternoon, upon receiving a WeChat message from her husband confirming his safety, Ma Xiulan felt relieved and replied, reminding him to get some rest.

events.name: Continue embroidering and exchange with fellow artists.
events.description: While taking a nap at my sister's house, I continued with my embroidery. In the evening, I took photos and sent them to Zhou Xiuqin to discuss color matching, receiving positive feedback.

events.name: Passing the written driver's license test (Subject 1)
events.description: I passed the subject one exam with a score of 92 at the Vehicle Management Office in Jinghai District this morning, and excitedly told my husband about it.

events.name: Depart for Beijing
events.description: After returning home from the exam, I checked the luggage with the children for the final time and took the high-speed train to Beijing in the afternoon. The children were excited.

events.name: Arriving at my sister's home for a reunion
events.description: Arriving at my sister's home in Beijing in the evening, we sisters embraced, and the two families enjoyed a lively welcome dinner with a rich variety of dishes.

events.name: Weight gain due to dietary habits during travel
events.description: I had a substantial amount of Peking duck and oily food for dinner, and I feel like my weight has increased.

结束状态.所处地点: Guest Room at Sister's Home in Beijing
结束状态.心情: Extreme joy and relaxation intertwine with the happiness of passing exams and reuniting with loved ones.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the first full holiday in Beijing, I visited Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, and the Summer Palace, experiencing both history and tranquility. In the evening, a heartfelt conversation with my sister deepened our bond. However, due to extensive walking throughout the day and indulging in rich food, I noticed a slight weight gain.

events.name: Visiting Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City
events.description: In the morning, we visited Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City, took group photos, listened to the guided tour, marveled at the profound history, and the children were filled with curiosity.

events.name: Tasting Beijing Cuisine
events.description: For lunch, we had Peking duck and zhajiangmian. It was delicious but greasy, and Ma Xiulan ate a little more than usual.

events.name: Strolling in the Summer Palace
events.description: In the afternoon, I strolled through the Summer Palace, enjoying the scenic views of the lake and mountains. Setting aside trivial matters for a while, I felt a sense of leisure.

events.name: Chatting with My Sister About Daily Life at Night
events.description: In the evening, I had tea and chatted with my sister, engaging in in-depth discussions about family and life, which deepened our sisterly bond.

events.name: Early bedtime due to travel fatigue.
events.description: Having walked a great deal throughout the day, Ma Xiulan felt exhausted and went to bed earlier than usual to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Excited, looking forward to it, ready to explore

结束状态.心情: Enriching, warm yet weary, the satisfaction of touring famous sites coexists with the nourishment of familial affection.

state.今日运动: All-day walking tour with a high level of physical activity.

2025-07.daily_overview: Challenging myself to climb the Badaling Great Wall, I was awed by the magnificent landscape. While taking care of the children, I managed household chores and information, and advanced handicraft orders. However, my weight remained stable due to intense physical activity and dietary habits.

events.name: Climbing the Badaling Great Wall
events.description: Climbing the Great Wall is physically demanding. Encourage the children and take photos. Standing on the beacon tower evokes a sense of grandeur, making the effort worthwhile.

events.name: Handling Household Affairs Information
events.description: Return to the car to check the phone, reply to the neighbor's greetings, like the market information, and keep the family in mind.

events.name: Sewing a baby hat
events.description: In the evening, I used my sister's sewing machine to stitch the main body of the hat, leaving the edge finishing for tomorrow. Focused but exhausted.

events.name: Increased appetite due to high physical activity.
events.description: After climbing the Great Wall, my appetite increased significantly, and I ate more for dinner. However, through exercise, my weight remained stable.

起始状态.心情: Full of fighting spirit, ready to take on the challenge of the Great Wall.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet proud and satisfied, having completed a physical challenge.

2025-07.daily_overview: After returning to Tianjin from the trip and readjusting to daily life, I attempted square dancing for the first time, breaking away from tradition. Due to dietary adjustments and exercise, my weight has started to decrease.

events.name: Returning to Tianjin from Beijing
events.description: I bid farewell to my sister in the morning, and in the afternoon, I took the high-speed train back to Jinghai, where I unpacked my luggage and washed my clothes.

events.name: Analyze Incorrect Questions in Driving Test
events.description: Review mistakes in the evening, take notes by referring to the textbook, and strengthen weak areas.

events.name: Adjusting Morning Exercise to Cope with High Temperatures
events.description: Completed the morning exercise of Baduanjin, switched brisk walking to a shaded walk, focusing on breathing and stretching to avoid heatstroke.

events.name: Complete the embroidery of the baby hat.
events.description: In the afternoon, after finishing embroidering the character "Fu" on the baby's hat with fine stitches, I listened to the TV drama returning to its familiar rhythm.

events.name: Encountered a square dance and was invited to join.
events.description: While taking out the trash in the evening, I heard music and was invited by neighbors Wang Guilan and Zhang Shufen to join the square dance, but Ma Xiulan felt too shy.

events.name: First Attempt at Square Dancing
events.description: Encouraged to try square dancing, the movements were clumsy but brought joy, and the initial restraint faded away.

events.name: Experience the New Joy of Sports
events.description: After dancing, I felt cheerful and planned to participate occasionally in the future as a social activity.

events.name: Share new experiences with family
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan shared her square dancing experiences and received her family's approval, which made her feel more at ease.

events.name: Renovating Old Items for the Eldest Son's Boarding School Life
events.description: Before going to bed, I searched for an old mattress to prepare for repurposing, aiming to save on expenses.

events.name: Begin Healthy Dietary Adjustments
events.description: After traveling, I decided to adjust my diet by having lighter dinners, and my weight began to drop.

起始状态.心情: Returning to tranquility, with a hint of weariness.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, and the excitement of trying new things.

state.今日运动: One set of Baduanjin, 15 minutes of gentle walking, and 20 minutes of square dancing.

events.name: Deep Night Conversation and Reminiscence with My Sister
events.description: During the day, I recalled my sister's encouragement to sell handmade crafts online, and the idea took root in my mind. After placing the order, I began to carefully consider her suggestion.

events.name: Targeted Review of Weak Points in Driver's License Exam Preparation
events.description: Review deduction questions and fine-related questions, create comparison tables for memorization, and enhance understanding.

events.name: Daily Purchases and Neighborhood Chats
events.description: Went to Zhang Shufen Supermarket to buy soy sauce, discussed precautions for children living on campus, and obtained practical information.

events.name: Harvest cucumbers and water them.
events.description: Harvest cucumbers after rain for a cold salad, and water the vegetable garden, as summer vegetables require ample moisture.

events.name: Check and package finished manual orders
events.description: Check the baby belly band and hat, trim loose threads, iron them flat, wrap them in soft cloth, and prepare for delivery.

events.name: Decided to incorporate square dancing into regular activities.
events.description: Inquire about Wang Guilan's square dancing schedule and plan to participate when the weather is favorable as a form of relaxation.

events.name: Evening walk canceled due to rain.
events.description: Due to the afternoon thunderstorm, the originally planned evening walk has been canceled and replaced with indoor activities.

events.name: Second Driving Test Simulation
events.description: Scoring 94 points on the mock exam and passing it has greatly boosted my confidence, making me feel more at ease about the official exam.

events.name: Confirm manual order with customer
events.description: Through Zhou Xiuqin's contact with the client, photos and dimensions were sent. The client praised them highly and confirmed the address, bringing joy to Ma Xiulan.

events.name: Family Conversation Before the Eldest Son's Boarding School Life
events.description: After dinner, Ma Mingxuan was reminded of daily life details, with tears welling up in the eyes. The other two children were urged to be obedient, creating a warm atmosphere tinged with the sorrow of parting.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to son leaving home
events.description: After the conversation, Ma Xiulan felt down and had trouble sleeping at night, pondering the changes in her family.

起始状态.心情: A little nervous, thinking about the mock exam and the order.

结束状态.心情: Complex, a blend of joy and satisfaction intertwined with reluctance and concern.

2025-07.daily_overview: Multiple tasks are being concluded or initiated. The husband's medical examination report prompts reflection on health management. Handcrafted orders have been dispatched. Travel memories are being organized. Family finances were discussed. Slight weight loss occurred due to staying up late to study.

events.name: Chatting online with childhood friends
events.description: In the afternoon, send Liu Chunmei photos of the vegetable garden, chat about amusing stories of the children, and arrange to visit the fabric store together after the school term begins.

events.name: First time reviewing husband's physical examination report
events.description: While reviewing the report in the evening, I discovered mild fatty liver and lumbar strain, which made me anxious and prompted me to consider methods for recuperation.

events.name: Consult a community doctor
events.description: In the morning, I consulted with Dr. Wang Jianguo and noted down the advice to maintain a light diet, increase physical activity, and abstain from alcohol.

events.name: Compare Driving Test Simulation Scores
events.description: Comparing the two test results, there is improvement in the questions that were previously marked incorrect, but the understanding of road marking questions remains unclear, which should be noted as a key focus.

events.name: Attracted by creative dough art videos
events.description: While watching videos, I came across cartoon bean paste buns and felt eager to try making them for my daughter's birthday.

events.name: Ship out the manual order package.
events.description: I walked to mail the package in the afternoon, and now that the task is completed, I look forward to the feedback and the final payment.

events.name: Organize Beijing travel photos
events.description: In the evening, import photos to the computer, carefully select and organize them into folders, preparing to share with parents over the weekend.

events.name: Discussing the Budget for the Eldest Child's Boarding School Supplies
events.description: Before going to bed, I discussed the budget with my husband. We agreed to buy what is necessary but avoid overspending, ensuring we have a clear plan in mind.

events.name: Staying up late to review for the driving test.
events.description: To enhance knowledge of road markings, I stayed up late studying, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calmly, handle the concluding work

结束状态.心情: Numerous thoughts, concerns about health, light orders, and prudent calculations.

state.今日运动: Morning exercise (Baduanjin and brisk walking), walking to send a package

date_attribute.holiday: Saturday

2025-07.daily_overview: On the weekend family day, we initiated a discussion on dietary adjustments, made preparations for our daughter's birthday, and considered online shopping options. There has been a slight decrease in weight due to healthy eating and exercise.

events.name: Weekend Family Dinner and Safety Reminders
events.description: During the dinner gathering, Ma Xiulan reminded her husband to be cautious of thunderstorms while driving, creating a warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Formal Discussion on Husband's Medical Examination Report and Initiation of Dietary Adjustments
events.description: After dinner, they discussed the report. Ma Xiulan proposed specific adjustment ideas, and her husband agreed to make the changes gradually, marking the beginning of implementation.

events.name: Conducting the final sprint review for the driving test.
events.description: Review the common mistakes in road markings, use diagrams to deepen understanding, and ensure thorough comprehension.

events.name: Purchasing special ingredients for daughter's birthday
events.description: Going to the market to buy pumpkin, spinach, red beans, and flour, Aunt Sun was curious, to which Ma Xiulan responded mysteriously.

events.name: Preparing to make cartoon bean paste buns
events.description: In the afternoon, knead the yellow and green dough, soak the red beans to prepare for stir-frying the filling, all in an orderly manner.

events.name: Participate in community square dancing
events.description: In the evening, I participated in square dancing for 20 minutes. Though my movements were still a bit clumsy, I felt joyful and enjoyed interacting with the neighbors.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the weekend pace is a bit slower.

结束状态.心情: Enriching and responsible, launching a health plan, preparing surprises.

date_attribute.holiday: Sunday

2025-07.daily_overview: Filled with love and creativity, a cartoon bean paste bun birthday gift was successfully made, bringing emotional satisfaction to the family. Health knowledge was gained, and although celebratory eating slightly increased, weight was maintained through exercise.

events.name: Conducting the final review before the driving test.
events.description: Review the error notebook to go over common mistakes, check that all documents are prepared, and the husband offers comfort to ease nervousness.

events.name: Design a Healthy Family Menu
events.description: Plan next week's dinners, including steamed fish, garlic broccoli, etc., ensuring a balanced combination of meat and vegetables with a light taste.

events.name: Carefully crafted cartoon bean paste buns
events.description: In the afternoon, I was shaping red bean paste buns into little pig and rabbit figures in the kitchen. My technique was a bit clumsy, but I worked with great care.

events.name: Steaming and Presenting a Birthday Surprise
events.description: As the freshly steamed buns were served, the daughter exclaimed in delight, the family praised them, and Ma Xiulan felt a deep sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Enjoy Family Warm Moments
events.description: A joyful dinner party, the daughter said Mom is the best, the whole family was filled with laughter and cheer.

events.name: Actively learn knowledge about healthy eating.
events.description: Search for foods beneficial for fatty liver and lumbar spine in the evening, take screenshots for notes, and prepare for a family health class.

events.name: Celebrating by Eating More Red Bean Paste Buns
events.description: I ate a few more red bean buns at the birthday dinner, but my weight remained stable through morning exercise and daily activities.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with exam anxiety and birthday anticipation.

结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied, happy, and full of a sense of accomplishment, with family appreciation being the reward.

2025-07.daily_overview: A milestone day marked by personal growth and family changes: passing the driving test's subject one boosted confidence; the eldest child moved away to boarding school; handmade orders received perfect feedback; weight slightly decreased due to healthy eating and exercise.

events.name: Pass the driving test subject one.
events.description: I passed the written driving test with a score of 92 at the Vehicle Management Office this morning, breathed a sigh of relief with a smile, and shared the good news with my husband.

events.name: Celebrating Passing the Exam
events.description: The dinner was sumptuous and celebratory. The husband toasted Ma Xiulan with tea instead of wine, and the children offered their congratulations, leaving her feeling delighted.

events.name: Ask mother for healthy recipes
events.description: In the afternoon, I visited my parents and mentioned that my husband had undergone a physical examination. My mother shared a recipe for nourishing the liver, which is beneficial for the waist. Ma Xiulan listened attentively.

events.name: Share the results of morning exercise and encourage family members
events.description: Share the benefits of morning exercise with your mother, and propose a family walk on the weekend in the evening, turning healthy activities into a family project.

events.name: Preliminary Planning of Healthy Dinner Menu
events.description: Incorporate dishes such as steamed fish and garlic broccoli to allow the taste buds to gradually adapt.

events.name: Discussing Family Arrangements After the Eldest Son's Boarding at School with My Husband
events.description: During an in-depth conversation in the evening, Ma Xiulan expressed her desire to learn driving for the second stage of the driving test or take on more manual work, with her husband's support, and they discussed tutoring their second son.

events.name: Receipt of Manual Order Positive Feedback and Fee Confirmation
events.description: In the evening, Zhou Xiuqin forwarded a customer's positive review and a 500 yuan fee, and Ma Xiulan felt a strong sense of pride upon receiving the payment.

events.name: Visiting Parents and Sharing the Joy of Travel
events.description: In the morning, I took the children and local specialties to visit my parents. We shared travel photos and videos by screen mirroring, enjoying a warm and joyful time together.

events.name: Adapt to the household routine after the eldest child leaves home.
events.description: Upon returning home, I noticed the absence of my eldest son in the changes around the house: one fewer bowl when setting the table, one less school uniform to wash, and the need to adjust my emotions accordingly.

起始状态.心情: Full of anticipation and pre-exam tension, an important day.

结束状态.心情: Complex yet positive, with a sense of accomplishment intertwined with the melancholy of parting, and a feeling of careful planning.

events.name: Procure healthy ingredients according to the new plan.
events.description: In the morning, I took the shopping list to buy leafy greens and perch. Aunt Sun was curious, and Ma Xiulan explained that a light diet is good for health.

events.name: Procurement of fabric for new orders
events.description: After the rain stops in the afternoon, go to the fabric market to purchase white cotton cloth and various colored silk threads, opting for lively color combinations such as pink, blue, and pink-red.

events.name: First Attempt at Cooking a Healthy Dinner
events.description: In the evening, steamed sea bass and garlic broccoli were prepared. My husband adapted to it somewhat, the children accepted it quite well, and Ma Xiulan remained steadfast.

events.name: Further adapt to the rhythm of the eldest son not being at home
events.description: I am not accustomed to the breakfast table for four, but I will prepare quickly. The schedule is to draft patterns in the morning and do embroidery in the afternoon.

events.name: Draw the embroidery base pattern for the new order
events.description: In the evening, I laid out the fabric and outlined patterns of longevity and strawberries, intending to embroider them with plump, gradient shades of red.

events.name: Outdoor activities canceled due to rain.
events.description: A thunderstorm led to the cancellation of the evening walk, which was replaced by indoor reading of health materials.

结束状态.心情: Firm and slightly challenging, starting a healthy diet is not easy but ready for adjustment.

Despite staying up late due to the joy of the income, there is a slight decrease in weight.

events.description: Inquire with Zhang Shufen and her sister about cost-effective and durable refrigerator options, and take notes for future comparison.

2025-07.daily_overview: Month-end Review and Planning Day: meticulously organized household finances, pleasantly found savings goals largely met; established a dedicated fund for the family's new phase and set the August budget; filled with a sense of control and confidence in the future, my state perfectly aligns with the conclusion of the health phase.

events.name: Prepare materials for new orders
events.description: In the morning, I organized the materials for the new orders, traced the draft patterns onto the embroidery frames, and prepared everything needed, now just waiting to begin the embroidery.

events.name: Experience the Steady Changes Brought by Morning Exercise
events.description: After consistently practicing Baduanjin and brisk walking during morning exercises for nearly two months, the shoulder and lower back pain has disappeared, endurance has improved, and these activities have become a natural part of daily life.

events.name: Reviewing the Initial Effects of Healthy Dietary Adjustments
events.description: Reflecting on the diet over the past few days, the family gradually accepted it. Her husband mentioned that a light dinner helped him sleep more soundly, which further strengthened Ma Xiulan's resolve.

events.name: Conduct monthly household financial review
events.description: In the evening, check the account book and receipts, calculate the income and expenditure for July with focus and diligence.

events.name: Analyze Monthly Income, Expenditure, and Savings Situation
events.description: The aggregated data reveals significant travel expenditures, yet the remaining balance essentially meets the savings target, providing reassurance that meticulous budgeting efforts have not been in vain.

events.name: Assessing the Financial Impact of the Eldest Child Attending Boarding School
events.description: Analyzing the newly added fixed expenses, the pressure feels manageable, with the key being advance planning.

events.name: Establish a Special Fund for Eldest Sons' Boarding at School
events.description: Open a new page in the ledger for a special fund, planning to allocate a portion of the monthly salary and deposit 30% of the manual income for education purposes.

events.name: Draft the August Family Budget
events.description: Based on the inventory and fund plan, develop a detailed budget for August to ensure a balanced budget with a margin of safety.

events.name: Comforting the eldest son who is about to start boarding school
events.description: Before going to bed, I called my son, asking about his routine and reminding him to neither be too frugal nor spend recklessly, so as to give him peace of mind.

events.name: Participate in community square dancing
events.description: Participating in square dancing for 20 minutes in the evening improves physical coordination and brings joyful interactions with neighbors.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, Ma Xiulan completed the financial closing, went out to purchase supplies for her eldest son's boarding school life, tried the Baduanjin exercise during her morning workout in the park, and reminded her husband to stay safe due to the changing weather.

events.name: Remind Husband to Be Cautious of Thunderstorm Weather
events.description: At noon, Ma Xiulan saw on TV that there would be thunderstorms in the afternoon and immediately called her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who was driving a taxi, advising him to pull over and rest if the rain became heavy to ensure safety.

events.name: Update Family Ledger and Archiving
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan transcribed the August budget into the ledger, organized the July receipts and placed them in the drawer, thereby completing the financial closing procedures.

events.name: Eight-Section Brocade Morning Exercise in the Park

events.name: Additional activities were canceled in the evening due to rain.

events.name: Preparing breakfast for a father who is feeling unwell
events.description: In the early morning, I went to the market to buy millet and Chinese yam, then went to my parents' home to cook porridge, prepare a cold cucumber salad, and steam egg custard. I helped my father drink the porridge and spent the morning tidying up the house.

events.description: After picking up my daughter in the afternoon, we searched for amusing cat videos on a short video platform to watch together, which made us laugh and relieved stress.

events.name: Propose and prepare to make a fabric kitten
events.description: To divert her daughter's longing for the cat, Ma Xiulan suggested making fabric pendants, retrieving materials such as fabric scraps and cotton from her "treasure chest."

events.name: Guiding My Daughter in Sewing a Fabric Kitten
events.description: Teaching her daughter step by step to stitch a kitten outline using the running stitch method, she patiently guides and encourages her, creating a warm atmosphere as mother and daughter chat.

events.name: Complete the work and tidy up the tools.
events.description: After sewing, stuff it with cotton, attach the eyes and nose, and complete the rough yet childlike pendant, which my daughter adores and cannot put down; Ma Xiulan tidies up the tools to keep everything neat.

events.name: Worried about father's insomnia
events.description: Worried about her father's illness, Ma Xiulan had difficulty falling asleep at night, tossing and turning, which resulted in insufficient rest.

The diagnosis suggested possible discomfort due to weather and heart function. Medication was prescribed with instructions to rest, and Ma Xiulan noted down the medical advice.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue from medical visits.
events.description: Fatigued from accompanying her father to the hospital in the evening, Ma Xiulan went to bed earlier than usual to regain her energy.

events.name: Cancelling an appointment with a friend at short notice
events.description: The original plan to meet up with my childhood friend Liu Chunmei was canceled due to my father's health issues. I explained the situation via WeChat, and Liu Chunmei expressed her understanding.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Worried, planning to take my father to see a doctor.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 156, Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly relieved (as my father has already sought medical attention), but the persistent sense of caregiving responsibility and lingering concerns about his condition have replaced the previous ease.

state.今日运动: (Accompanying father for medical consultation)

2025-08.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan called to remind her husband, who drives night shifts, to stay safe; she simplified her morning exercise routine due to staying up late preparing materials for her eldest son's school enrollment; her regular morning exercise habit was disrupted under family pressure; her weight remained stable, but her sleep schedule shifted later.

events.name: A Phone Call to Remind Her Husband Who Drives at Night
events.description: After nine o'clock in the evening, she called her husband Ma Zhiqiang, reminding him to lock the door and cover himself with a quilt when resting at the service area to ensure safety.

events.name: Morning exercise simplified due to preparation of enrollment materials
events.description: The night before last, I stayed up late helping my eldest son organize his report card and fill out forms. Feeling fatigued in the morning, I only did a brief 10-minute activity in the open space near my home, without completing my full morning exercise routine.

events.name: Temporarily adjust dinner to takeout.
events.description: Busy preparing materials, Ma Xiulan ordered simple takeout for dinner to save time, reflecting the emergency handling of household affairs.

events.name: Calling Mother to Inquire About Father's Condition
events.description: I called my mother in the afternoon to inquire about my father's condition after taking the medication. I felt somewhat relieved but still concerned.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Fatigue, sleep deprivation

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief from completing the task, yet intertwined with concern for her husband and ongoing worries about her father's health, she feels the weight of life is not light.

state.今日运动: 10 Minutes of Simple Activities at Your Doorstep

2025-08.daily_overview: A fulfilling Saturday was spent immersed in the sense of accomplishment from completing craft orders in the morning, followed by dedicating the afternoon and evening to routine weekend chores and preparations for family matters, while persistently practicing driving in the evening.

events.name: The handicraft order has been successfully completed.
events.description: In the morning, Zhou Xiuqin forwarded the client's enthusiastic feedback about the embroidered baby bellyband and hat via WeChat, along with an adorable photo of the baby wearing them. The client praised Ma Xiulan's craftsmanship and promptly transferred the remaining balance of the order through WeChat. Seeing the baby's happy expression in the photo and the recognition of her work, Ma Xiulan felt a warm surge of fulfillment and accomplishment. She shared the photo with her family, and everyone was delighted. Although this modest income was not substantial, it held particular significance under the current pressure on the family's savings. She carefully set the money aside for safekeeping.

events.name: Preparing for the next day's small gathering of childhood friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan prepared at home for Liu Chunmei's visit the next day. She meticulously cleaned the living room, wiped the tea table, boiled water for tea, and took out some homemade snacks. She also deliberately selected several recently completed embroidery works she was particularly satisfied with, such as a coaster embroidered with a pomegranate pattern and a small floral-and-bird painting, intending to share and discuss them with her closest friend. She looked forward to gaining new inspiration from their exchange.

events.name: Weekend Driving Practice
events.description: In the evening, while her husband Ma Zhiqiang was at home to look after their child, Ma Xiulan went to the training ground to practice the second subject of the driving test. After a week of pondering during her free time and recalling her previous practice session, she had become somewhat more familiar with coordinating the steering wheel and clutch, and her initial nervousness had eased a bit. Under the guidance of her instructor, she began attempting to practice reversing into a parking space, parallel parking, and other tasks in a continuous sequence. Although her overall movements were still a bit stiff, she found a sense of rhythm. However, the hill start remained a challenge she needed to overcome. After the practice session, she returned home feeling both exhausted and somewhat accomplished.

events.name: Routine Household Chores and Dinner
events.description: As a housewife, laundry, cooking, and tidying up are the unchanging rhythms of her daily life. Today, she washed the clothes her children had changed out of and prepared a simple yet delicious dinner for the family. Using beans from their own vegetable garden, she made noodles with savory sauce, one of the family’s favorite dishes. After dinner, she supervised the children as they completed their homework and got ready for bed.

events.name: Stayed up late due to concerns about father's health.
events.description: In the evening, after finishing her household chores, Ma Xiulan found it difficult to fall asleep due to her lingering concerns about her father's health. Lying in bed, she repeatedly pondered the matter and did not manage to fall asleep until nearly 23:30, which was slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with anticipation for order feedback.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and with a slight sense of accomplishment, yet tinged with a trace of concern for my father.

state.今日运动: Household chores (laundry, cleaning), approximately 1.5 hours of practice for Subject 2.

2025-08.daily_overview: An emotionally complex Sunday: a tea gathering with childhood friends brought warm comfort and support, yet the practical pressures of family life quietly surfaced in the afternoon, with shopping and household chores forming the main rhythm of the day.

events.name: A Profound Tea Conversation with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: On Sunday afternoon, Liu Chunmei arrived as scheduled. The two sat in the tidied-up living room, sipping light tea and enjoying the pastries made by Ma Xiulan, while sharing updates on their lives. Ma Xiulan spoke of the joy of successfully delivering her handicraft orders, but couldn’t help expressing her quiet concern about her father’s occasional coughing and lack of energy lately. Liu Chunmei was an excellent listener; she not only comforted Ma Xiulan but also shared some practical experiences from caring for her own elderly relatives, such as how to observe an elderly person’s mental state and what kinds of food to prepare more of. Afterward, the two took out needles, thread, and a newly purchased embroidery pattern book belonging to Ma Xiulan, and together they studied a new "gold thread winding" technique, discussing color combinations and symbolic meanings. Throughout, they occasionally reminisced about their childhood—going to school together and playing in the fields—their laughter filling the entire afternoon. This gathering provided Ma Xiulan with a rare moment of relief for her tightly wound nerves.

events.name: Purchasing large items for the eldest child's boarding school stay.
events.description: After seeing Liu Chunmei off, Ma Xiulan set aside her household chores and headed to the wholesale market in Jinghai District. Her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, was about to start boarding at school, so she needed to purchase essential items such as bed sheets, quilt covers, and desk lamps—bulky goods with significant price variations. At the market, she carefully compared the quality and prices of products from different stalls, weighing her options repeatedly. In the end, she bought all the necessary items at a reasonable price, bundled them securely, and carried them home.

events.name: Managing household chores and inspecting the vegetable garden
events.description: Weekends are the time for concentrated household chores. Before the morning gathering, Ma Xiulan washed the clothes that had accumulated over the week and cleaned every room. In the evening, while watering the vegetable garden, she carefully inspected the growth of the tomatoes, cucumbers, and beans. She was delighted to find that some of the tomatoes were beginning to turn red, and a few cucumbers had grown to a size suitable for picking. She planned to do concentrated maintenance and harvesting early the next morning while it was still cool, as fresh vegetables would add much color to the family's dining table.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to frequent gatherings and overeating.
events.description: While gathering with childhood friends, Ma Xiulan relaxed and indulged in extra snacks and tea, which left her feeling slightly full that evening and caused a slight increase in her weight.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation and relaxation, feeling delighted about the friend's arrival

结束状态.心情: A sense of warmth and ease filled the heart, as the support of friendship diluted some of the worries. Yet, a trace of heaviness lingered at the thought of my father and the impending expenses.

state.今日运动: Household chores (laundry, cleaning), approximately 1-hour round-trip walk to the wholesale market for procurement.

date_attribute.weather: Mostly sunny, cool in the morning

2025-08.daily_overview: The Monday morning begins with the joy of harvesting from one's own vegetable garden. The day's rhythm is compact and practical, encompassing shopping, neighborhood interactions, handling children's affairs, and finalizing the packing of items for the eldest child's boarding school stay.

events.name: Morning Vegetable Garden Harvesting and Sharing
events.description: In the cool morning air, Ma Xiulan went to her small vegetable garden, first watering the crops and carefully pulling out the weeds. Then, she gently picked the first batch of fully ripe, bright red tomatoes and several fresh, tender green cucumbers, placing them in her basket with a deep sense of satisfaction from self-sufficiency. After bringing them back to the kitchen and washing them, she deliberately set aside a portion, packed them in a small bag, and gave them to her neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan, to share the joy of the harvest. The two chatted for a while at the door about gardening tips and daily life, and Wang Guilan reciprocated with some of her own homemade pickles.

events.name: Purchase one week's worth of groceries
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan carried a vegetable basket and walked to her usual market. She treated this journey as her daily activity, deliberately taking a slightly longer route, but the total time still did not exceed half an hour. At Aunt Sun’s vegetable stall, she carefully selected ingredients for the week. Aunt Sun, as usual, chatted warmly with her and even rounded down the total price. Along the way, she also encountered other familiar neighbors, stopping briefly to exchange a few words.

events.name: Handling School Notifications and Neighborhood Small Talk
events.description: Just as Ma Xiulan was about to go out for a walk, she received a WeChat message from Mr. Yang, the homeroom teacher of her second son, Ma Mingzhe, notifying her that parents needed to confirm their child’s participation in a safety education activity online as soon as possible. Ma Xiulan had to return home, log into the relevant platform on her phone, carefully read the information, and complete the confirmation process. By the time she finished, it was almost time to prepare lunch, so she gave up on her planned walk. In the afternoon, she went to her neighbor Zhang Shufen’s convenience supermarket to buy toiletries for boarding school, such as toothbrushes, towels, and washbasins. While there, she chatted with Zhang Shufen about experiences and precautions related to children living at school. At the entrance, she also exchanged a few words with another neighbor, Wang Guilan, who inquired with concern about her husband’s transportation work. Ma Xiulan said that the job was quite demanding, and she had to remind him daily to stay safe. Now, he had developed the habit of proactively informing her of his safe arrival at destinations. Wang Guilan praised her for being good at managing the household.

events.name: Prepare a fresh lunch for the family
events.description: At noon, Ma Xiulan prepared lunch for her family using freshly picked tomatoes and cucumbers from their own vegetable garden. She made refreshing sugar-mixed tomatoes and cold-tossed cucumbers. The fresh ingredients made the simple dishes exceptionally delicious and enjoyable. Her family, especially the children, ate happily, which brought her a sense of contentment.

events.name: Guiding the eldest son in packing luggage for boarding school
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan arranged all the purchased items, usable items sorted from the house (such as old but intact table lamps), and the clothing she had sewn with labels into categories. Instead of handling everything herself, she called her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, and guided him step by step to try counting and packing on his own. She explained how to store items more space-efficiently, which items needed to be placed in easily accessible locations, and ensured that no important items were overlooked. This was also the first step in cultivating the child's ability to live independently.

events.name: Morning exercise postponed due to household chores.
events.description: Due to being occupied with the vegetable garden and shopping in the morning, Ma Xiulan’s originally planned morning exercise was postponed to the evening. However, due to time constraints, she only managed to do some brief stretching in the end, breaking her daily routine.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a little anticipation for the harvest from the vegetable garden.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, looking at the packed luggage, I feel both pleased with my son's growth and a hint of reluctance at the impending separation.

state.今日运动: Approximately 40 minutes of work in the vegetable garden in the early morning, about 30 minutes of walking to buy groceries, household chores, and brief stretching.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday began in exhaustion, having barely slept while caring for my father through the night. During the day, I mainly stayed at home, meticulously sewing name tags, and sought technical advice from friends in the crafting community online. In the evening, I continued sewing tags for the children at the sewing machine.

events.name: Fatigued from providing overnight care for father.
events.description: Father Ma Jianguo's nighttime coughing worsened, and Mother Li Xiuying called. Concerned, Ma Xiulan got up in the middle of the night and hurried to her parents' home to care for him. She brought her father water, patted his back, and barely closed her eyes. It wasn't until daybreak, when his symptoms eased and he fell asleep, that she dragged her exhausted body back home. Her originally planned morning exercise was naturally canceled. Summoning her remaining energy, she prepared breakfast for the family.

events.name: Seeking Technical Advice from the Craftsmanship Community
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan encountered a difficulty while crocheting a cup coaster with a complex pattern, as several finishing edges kept turning out uneven. Instead of stubbornly fixating on the problem, she took photos and short videos of the unfinished piece and the issues she faced, then posted them in a handicraft enthusiasts’ WeChat group she shared with Zhou Xiuqin, Aunt Wu, and others. Aunt Wu, who was far away in Cangzhou, quickly sent a detailed voice message with guidance, accompanied by an illustrative diagram, while Zhou Xiuqin supplemented with suggestions on sourcing local materials. With everyone’s help, her confusion was resolved, making her feel that even without leaving home, she could still gain valuable support.

events.name: Sewing Name Labels for Children's Clothing
events.description: During the day and at night, Ma Xiulan took out the old sewing machine and various embroidery threads and fabric labels from home, and began sewing name tags for the children's boarding school clothes. She first designed the abbreviation styles "MX" (for Mingxuan) and "MZ" (for Mingzhe), practiced a few times on the sewing machine, and then started sewing them onto several pieces of underwear and socks. In the evening, under the light in the living room, she spread out her sons' towels and carefully stitched on the fabric labels with their names, ensuring they were secure and not easily detached. Her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, sat on a small stool beside her, watching curiously as her mother threaded the needle and sewed, occasionally asking, "Mom, how do you write my name?" Ma Xiulan patiently taught her.

events.name: Plan the next season's planting for the vegetable garden.
events.description: During the gap in the summer vegetable harvest, Ma Xiulan began to consider what crops could be planted in the small vegetable garden for the next season (autumn). She briefly browsed some information on her phone about the timing and techniques for planting autumn vegetables such as Chinese cabbage and radishes, and planned to consult and purchase some seeds suitable for the local climate from a familiar seed vendor during her next trip to the market. Tending to the garden is not only a source of food but also a way for her to regulate her mood and experience the growth of life.

events.name: Decreased appetite and slight weight loss due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to nighttime caregiving and daytime fatigue, Ma Xiulan had a poor appetite, eating less for both lunch and dinner, which resulted in a slight weight loss.

state.起床时间: 05:30 (Did not fall back into formal sleep after returning from parents' home)

起始状态.所处地点: Parents' home/Return to one's own home
起始状态.心情: Fatigue, worry

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted but with a sense of inner peace from solving a manual challenge and completing part of the signage sewing, the worry over my father's illness deepens.

state.今日运动: Almost no additional exercise, primarily consisting of household chores and sedentary activities such as handicrafts.

2025-08.daily_overview: This marks a significant turning point in family life. The father's condition has noticeably deteriorated, triggering the family's health crisis response mechanism. From discovering the illness and experiencing inner anxiety to engaging in urgent discussions with her husband, a series of events unfolded rapidly under pressure and worry, forcing adjustments to personal exercise plans.

events.name: Discovering the father's condition has worsened.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to visit her parents and found that her father, Ma Jianguo, not only had a persistent cough but also showed obvious signs of wheezing, with a poor complexion. The medication prescribed by the community clinic seemed to have lost its effectiveness. Seeing her father's pained expression and her mother Li Xiuying's helpless and worried gaze, her heart sank. She realized the illness was far more severe than previously thought, and her mind was instantly filled with anxiety and helplessness. After discussing with her mother, she decided they could no longer delay and must take her father to a better hospital for examination as soon as possible.

events.name: Urgently Discussing Medical Treatment and Expenses with Husband
events.description: That evening, Ma Xiulan returned to her home. After her husband Ma Zhiqiang came back from work, she immediately informed him of her father's serious condition. The two of them held an urgent and somber discussion in the living room. They both agreed that they must take her father to a district-level or even municipal-level hospital for a comprehensive examination as soon as possible, and could no longer rely on the community clinic. At the same time, a practical issue loomed before them: what should they do about the potential medical expenses? The couple began a preliminary discussion on how to raise the funds—drawing from their family savings, the husband's salary, and possible borrowing channels. The conversation was heavy and urgent.

events.name: Attempt to adjust personal health habits
events.description: Faced with the sudden increase in family pressure and poor sleep due to worries, Ma Xiulan realized that the early morning exercise routine she had previously adhered to was difficult to strictly maintain under the current circumstances. She began to consciously make adjustments, thinking that perhaps she could move her exercise time to the evening when household chores had eased slightly. She also simplified the routine to include only some stretching exercises that could be completed in the yard. The important thing was to maintain a certain level of physical activity rather than giving it up entirely.

events.name: Anxiety begins to affect sleep.
events.description: Upon learning of her father's worsening condition, Ma Xiulan was filled with anxiety and began to repeatedly ponder the medical expenses, her father's health, and how to balance caregiving with the family's livelihood. This heavy sense of worry began to manifest that evening as she tossed and turned in bed, struggling to fall asleep and waking easily even when she did manage to doze off.

events.name: Temporary cancellation of evening stretching plan
events.description: The scheduled evening stretching session was canceled due to discussions with her husband about family matters. Ma Xiulan did not engage in any regular exercise throughout the day, only performing basic household chores.

起始状态.心情: With a faint unease about his father's condition

state.睡觉时间: 23:45 (actual time of falling asleep was later)

结束状态.心情: Feeling highly anxious, worried, and helpless, as if the burden of the family has suddenly fallen upon me.

state.今日运动: Irregular exercise, only daily household activities

2025-08.daily_overview: Crisis Response Day. The entire day revolved around high-speed operations concerning my father's medical affairs: from phone calls to confirm medical appointments and learning new skills to book registrations, to taking stock of family finances with my husband and planning medical expenses. Every step was filled with urgency and pragmatic response.

events.name: Determine the medical appointment arrangement and schedule a registration.
events.description: Early in the morning, Ma Xiulan called Jinghai District People's Hospital to inquire about her father's symptoms. After receiving preliminary medical advice, she decided to schedule an appointment with a specialist for the following day. She then called her mother and father separately to inform them of the medical plan and tried her best to ease their anxiety. She prepared her father's medical insurance card and past medical records in advance and discussed with her husband that he would take half a day off the next morning so that they could accompany her father to the hospital together. They planned to take a taxi to ensure her father's comfort. Meanwhile, she arranged for the care of her three children for breakfast and lunch the following day, asking her neighbor Wang Guilan to help look after her second son and youngest daughter when they returned home from school at noon.

events.name: Learning to Use Mobile Apps for Medical Appointment Registration
events.description: For future convenience, Ma Xiulan decided to learn how to make medical appointments using her mobile phone. After dinner, accompanied and guided by her husband Ma Zhiqiang, she took out her smartphone. Ma Zhiqiang recommended the "Jin Yi Tong" app and guided her through downloading, installing, and registering. Subsequently, Ma Xiulan retrieved her father’s medical insurance card and, following her husband’s prompts, carefully linked her father’s information to the app. Then, operating on her own, she selected the Respiratory Medicine Department of Jinghai District People’s Hospital. After browsing the list of doctors and encouraged by her husband, she chose an appointment slot with an associate chief physician for the following day and successfully made the reservation. Seeing the confirmation screen, she breathed a sigh of relief, feeling a sense of accomplishment for mastering a practical new skill. She immediately saved a screenshot and noted the appointment on the family calendar.

events.name: Reviewing the family emergency fund with my husband
events.description: In the evening, a more in-depth financial planning session began. Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang retrieved the family's bank passbooks and the small iron box containing a modest amount of cash, carefully verifying the balances and the exact amount of cash on hand. After calculations, they determined that the total emergency funds the family could immediately access amounted to approximately 8,000 yuan. This figure left both of them feeling immense pressure.

events.name: Plan for future medical expense funding sources
events.description: Judging that the 8,000 yuan emergency fund might be far from sufficient, Ma Xiulan and her husband began discussing how to address the subsequent funding gap. They reached a preliminary consensus: 1. Prioritize the use of this emergency fund; 2. If it proves insufficient, Ma Zhiqiang would apply to his logistics company for an advance on part of next month's salary; 3. Ma Xiulan would attempt to contact introducers such as Zheng Xiuying to see if she could secure more urgent manual orders, while also informing craft friends like Zhou Xiuqin of her availability to take on work, thereby generating some flexible income for the family. The family's financial priorities had clearly shifted from savings to medical expenses.

events.name: Loss of appetite and weight loss due to stress
events.description: Busy with work all day, Ma Xiulan only had a simple bowl of noodles for lunch and ate very little for dinner, causing her weight to continue to drop.

起始状态.心情: Anxious but already transformed into determination for action

结束状态.心情: Highly tense yet goal-oriented, multiple practical preparations were completed, creating a solemn and united atmosphere akin to "preparing for battle."

state.今日运动: No additional physical exercise, primarily focusing on mental activities and household affairs arrangements.

2025-08.daily_overview: A tense and lengthy day. The entire family accompanied our father to the hospital for a series of examinations. The preliminary diagnosis is not optimistic, and hospitalization may be required. Family life has officially entered a "wartime state" centered around our father's health.

events.name: Accompanying father for a systematic examination
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had taken half a day off, accompanied their father Ma Jianguo to Jinghai District People's Hospital. Following their appointment, they collected their queue number and waited for their turn. Ma Xiulan provided the doctor with a detailed description of the changes in her father's recent symptoms. The doctor issued a series of examination orders, including a chest CT scan, pulmonary function tests, and blood tests. Throughout the entire morning, Ma Xiulan and her husband supported their father as they moved between different departments of the hospital, queuing and completing the various examinations. Along the way, Ma Xiulan softly reassured her father, telling him not to be nervous, though in truth, her own heart remained anxious.

events.name: Obtain preliminary diagnosis and doctor's advice
events.description: In the afternoon, after some of the examination results came out, they met with the doctor again. The doctor looked at the CT scans and lab reports with a serious expression and gave a preliminary diagnosis that the father might be suffering from an "acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease." The situation was relatively complicated, and the doctor recommended hospitalization for systematic observation and treatment. If hospitalization was absolutely not an option, strict adherence to medication, oxygen therapy (if needed) at home, and regular follow-up examinations were essential. Ma Xiulan listened attentively, using her phone's memo app to record every word the doctor said: the diagnosis, recommended medications, precautions, and follow-up schedule. She realized that her father no longer needed just a few days of medication but possibly long-term, professional care.

events.name: Pick up the medicine and escort father home for discussion.
events.description: Following the doctor's prescription, Ma Zhiqiang went to the pharmacy to collect the medication. Afterwards, the couple escorted their exhausted father back to his home on Jingwen Road. Ma Xiulan conveyed the doctor's diagnosis and recommendations in detail to her mother, Li Xiuying, and helped her father take his first dose of medicine. The family gathered together, discussing with a heavy atmosphere what to do next: should they follow the advice and hospitalize him, or treat and observe him at home? The costs of hospitalization and the time required for caregiving were practical challenges. This decision required careful consideration.

events.name: Brief exchange with patients' family members in the hospital
events.description: While waiting in line, Ma Xiulan chatted with another family member who was also accompanying an elderly patient. They shared nursing experiences and insights on seeking medical treatment, which brought her some comfort.

events.name: Weight decreased further due to exhaustion from constant travel.
events.description: Walking and standing all day in the hospital, coupled with anxiety and irregular eating habits, led to further weight loss for Ma Xiulan due to significant physical exertion.

起始状态.心情: Nervous and apprehensive, preparing to face an unknown outcome.

结束状态.所处地点: Parents' home/Return to one's own home
结束状态.心情: Heavy-hearted and anxious, feeling immense pressure at the prospect of possible long-term treatment, yet having gained a clearer understanding of the condition.

state.今日运动: Prolonged walking, assisting patients, and waiting in line at the hospital lead to significant physical exertion.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, the family continued to process and cope with the crisis. They engaged in in-depth discussions with the husband regarding treatment plans, explored the possibility of seeking financial support from relatives and friends, while also completing the final preparations for the child's return to school and attempting self-regulation amid insomnia.

events.name: Thoroughly discuss the treatment plan with the husband.
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang, avoiding their children, once again seriously discussed the follow-up treatment plan for their father at home. They carefully weighed the pros and cons of hospitalization versus home treatment, taking into account the doctor’s recommendations, their father’s physical condition, the family’s financial capacity (the 8,000 yuan emergency fund), as well as their work schedules and time available for family care. Ultimately, considering the high cost of hospitalization and the significant time required for accompanying care (Ma Zhiqiang found it difficult to take long-term leave, while Ma Xiulan had to care for their three children), they tentatively leaned toward first attempting intensive treatment and care at home. However, they emphasized the need to strictly follow the doctor’s instructions and remain prepared for the possibility of hospitalization at any time. They also made preliminary plans for covering medical expenses (using savings first, and if insufficient, temporarily borrowing from relatives) and assigned responsibilities for taking care of their father.

events.name: Exploring the Possibility of Borrowing for Medical Expenses
events.description: Realizing that the family savings might not be sufficient to cover all expenses, Ma Xiulan began cautiously exploring the possibility of short-term borrowing or mutual assistance from those closest to her. She first called her younger sister, Ma Xiufen, and tactfully explained the severity of their father’s condition and the family’s current financial strain. Her sister expressed willingness to help as much as possible. She also hinted at the family’s difficulties to her neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan, and Zhang Shufen, who runs a supermarket. The neighbors showed concern and mentioned that they could discuss temporary financial support if needed. Meanwhile, she started inquiring with her mother and the community about the specific procedures and reimbursement rates of medical insurance, hoping to alleviate some of the burden.

events.name: Final Check of Boarding School Items for the Child
events.description: Under heavy pressure, Ma Xiulan still did not forget that her eldest son was about to start boarding school. She conducted a final check of the boarding school items list to ensure all items were prepared and packed. At the same time, she roughly calculated the actual total cost of the preparations (including purchased items and the equivalent value of homemade items) and found it slightly exceeded the initial budget, mainly due to choosing higher-quality bedding during the purchase. In the evening, she informed her husband of this situation and the total cost.

events.name: Attempting Self-Regulation During Insomnia
events.description: Another sleepless night left Ma Xiulan feeling physically and mentally exhausted. Recalling the relaxation and sleep aid methods mentioned by Dr. Wang during the previous community health lecture, she got up and soaked her feet in hot water. The warm water temporarily relieved the fatigue in her feet and brought a slight relaxation to her tense nerves. Although the underlying anxiety remained, this small act made her feel that she was making an effort for her health.

events.name: Sew and inspect clothing name labels
events.description: Making use of fragmented time during the day, Ma Xiulan continued sewing name tags for the children. She found the school uniforms her sons would wear in the fall and sewed fabric name labels on the inner side of the collars—places that were inconspicuous yet easy to identify. As she sewed, she taught her curious younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, how to secure the labels and finish the stitches, while the girl practiced with fabric scraps nearby. After completing the task, she checked all the previously sewn tags to ensure none were missed and that no loose threads remained. Encouraged by her mother, Ma Yuxin attempted to sew a simple mark on one of her own socks. Though the stitches were uneven, Ma Xiulan still offered praise. This brief parent-child interaction was a rare moment of relaxation in her day.

events.name: Stable weight due to irregular eating patterns caused by anxiety.
events.description: Emotional fluctuations are significant throughout the day, with irregular eating patterns, yet body weight remains stable.

state.起床时间: 06:30 (Got up slightly later due to insomnia the previous night)

起始状态.心情: Fatigued, heavy-hearted, with a mind in disarray

结束状态.心情: Still feeling anxious, but after a day of discussion and action, I have gained a clearer understanding of the response plan. I no longer feel as completely helpless as I did initially, and there is a sense of resilience within me—a readiness to face whatever challenges may come.

state.今日运动: Household chores, irregular exercise
