2025-08.daily_overview: A Sunday of decision-making and communication. A family meeting was held in the morning to determine the division of caregiving responsibilities for the father, officially shifting the family's daily rhythm into emergency mode. In the afternoon, I communicated with my sisters who live far away about the illness, seeking both emotional and practical support. Meanwhile, I continued to handle the trivial matters before my child's school starts and worked on consolidating my personal skills.

events.name: Hold a family meeting to determine caregiving responsibilities.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan, her husband Ma Zhiqiang, and her mother Li Xiuying held a brief and pragmatic family meeting at her parents' home to formally discuss and determine the division of responsibilities during her father's home treatment. It was decided that during the day, her mother Li Xiuying would primarily take care of her father at home, responsible for administering medication on time, providing basic care, and preparing meals. Ma Xiulan would visit at least once each in the morning and afternoon to assist her mother, monitor her father's condition, and handle tasks requiring outings (such as purchasing medication or seeking consultations). Ma Zhiqiang would mainly focus on work and ensuring the family's income, while also being responsible for picking up and dropping off their second son and youngest daughter to and from school. Additionally, they asked their neighbor Wang Guilan to occasionally help look after the children when they returned from school if Ma Xiulan was unavailable. The family's daily rhythm was thus disrupted, officially entering an "emergency state."

events.name: Communicating with Sisters about Medical Condition to Seek Support
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan made lengthy phone calls to her older sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing and her younger sister Ma Xiufen in the Binhai New Area, respectively. She provided them with detailed information about their father’s condition, the doctor’s diagnosis, and the family’s preliminary plan (starting with home-based treatment). On one hand, this was to keep her sisters informed; on the other hand, it was also to seek emotional support and to preliminarily discuss the possibility of sharing the financial burden if significant expenses were required. Both her older and younger sisters expressed deep concern, promised to help as much as possible, and advised Ma Xiulan not to overexert herself. This support from her family of origin made her feel that she was not fighting alone.

events.name: Confiding in Mother About Insomnia Troubles
events.description: During the day at her mother's home, while her father was resting, Ma Xiulan confided in her mother Li Xiuying about her severe insomnia and anxiety caused by her father's illness and family pressures. Her mother, heartbroken, held her hand and comforted her, saying "the cart will find its way round the hill when it gets there." She also shared some traditional folk remedies passed down from older generations to calm the nerves, such as boiling sour jujube seeds to make a drink. This heartfelt conversation between mother and daughter allowed Ma Xiulan to release her pent-up emotions.

events.name: Consolidate newly acquired skills and share them with neighbors
events.description: To reinforce her memory, Ma Xiulan opened the "Jin Yi Tong" app again and reviewed the entire appointment-making process to ensure she could operate it independently next time. In the afternoon, when her neighbor Wang Guilan came to visit, Ma Xiulan, during a break in their conversation, shared with Aunt Wang with a touch of pride that she had learned how to make medical appointments using her phone, adding, "If you ever need help in the future, I can teach you." This small sharing allowed her to feel a sense of value as an independent individual beyond her demanding family roles.

events.name: Final Check and Supplement of Boarding School Supplies
events.description: Ma Xiulan once again checked all the items prepared for her eldest son and found that a pair of thick indoor slippers and a few clothes hangers were still missing. She took some time to buy them from a nearby small store, then sorted and organized all the items one last time to ensure a smooth departure early the next morning.

events.name: The workload pressure has slightly eased and body weight has decreased marginally after task delegation.
events.description: After the division of household labor was clarified, Ma Xiulan's psychological stress decreased, but her physical exertion increased. With normal eating habits, her weight saw a slight decline.

起始状态.心情: Heavy but ready to face it.

结束状态.心情: Through communication and division of labor, the pressure has been somewhat dispersed, and I feel a bit more settled inside, but a sense of long-term fatigue is beginning to accumulate.

state.今日运动: Made multiple trips on foot between my own home and my parents' home to handle various errands.

2025-08.daily_overview: Monday brought dual changes to family life: sending the eldest son to boarding school, marking a new phase in the family structure; simultaneously, the father's treatment entered its formal implementation phase, involving obtaining a detailed diagnosis and beginning to learn nursing skills. Personal health habits continued to adjust under pressure.

events.name: Sending the Eldest Son to Boarding School with Words of Advice
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan handed the packed luggage to her eldest son Ma Mingxuan and had a serious conversation with him. She reminded her son to take good care of himself after moving into the dormitory, to eat and sleep on time, to get along well with his roommates, and to call home promptly if he encountered any difficulties. She also expressed her concern and expectations for her son's studies, but more than that, she conveyed a mother's reluctance and worry. Ma Mingxuan seemed to sense the recent pressures on the family and nodded more understandingly than usual.

events.name: Obtain Detailed Diagnosis of Father and Learn Nursing Care
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to her parents' home and obtained a more detailed diagnostic report from her mother (clearly indicating acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). She consulted the doctor (or Dr. Wang from the community clinic) again by phone to gain a deeper understanding of the severity of the condition, the specific treatment plan (including the precise usage of medications, whether it is necessary to purchase home oxygen therapy equipment, etc.), and the prognosis. She took out a brand-new notebook and began carefully recording this information, while also learning how to observe simple yet crucial care indicators such as her father's breathing rate and lip color. She felt herself transitioning from an ordinary caregiver to a "primary family caregiver."

events.name: Continuously adjust personal health habits
events.description: The consecutive days of pressure and high-intensity tasks have caused Ma Xiulan's sleep and mood to fluctuate between good and bad. She feels that soaking her feet and drinking the sour jujube seed water, as suggested by her mother, have been somewhat helpful for relaxation, but the underlying anxiety and sense of fatigue have not been completely alleviated. She realizes that this state may require a longer time to adjust, and she has started to consider whether, if it persists, she should visit the community clinic to consult Dr. Wang and get some sleep aids or traditional Chinese medicine for regulation. She no longer forces herself to exercise in a specific way but instead accepts the reality that "during special times, maintaining basic functions is a victory."

events.name: Neck and shoulder muscle strain begins to appear.
events.description: Due to prolonged periods of looking down while sewing and experiencing anxiety and tension, Ma Xiulan began to feel soreness in the shoulder and neck area, which are early symptoms of muscle strain in the shoulders and neck.

events.name: Weight loss due to low mood from sending off a child.
events.description: After seeing off her eldest son, Ma Xiulan became emotionally low, experienced a loss of appetite, and suffered a weight decrease.

起始状态.心情: It is complex, encompassing both the sorrow of seeing off a son and the concern for a father's illness.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued and empty (due to the eldest son leaving home), yet simultaneously gaining a sense of confidence in dealing with the illness from having learned nursing knowledge, the mood is contradictory and complex.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from parents' home, handling household chores, without dedicated exercise.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Tuesday, while dealing with a family crisis, Ma Xiulan began actively seeking ways to increase her income by reaching out to the handicraft community and part-time job recruiters. At the same time, she informed her close circle of friends and relatives about her father's situation to build a broader support network. In the evening, she conducted her final driving practice session before the exam.

events.name: Actively seek more handicraft orders.
events.description: Considering the pressure of medical expenses, Ma Xiulan decided to take a more proactive approach to expand her handicraft "micro-business." She contacted her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin and part-time job introducer Zheng Xiuying separately via WeChat, candidly informing them that due to recent family circumstances (her father's illness), her schedule had become relatively more flexible (with the children at school during the day and her father being cared for by her mother). She expressed her hope to take on more part-time work in hand embroidery or knitting, whether it be small orders or processing material kits, in order to contribute a bit more to the family income. Both Zhou Xiuqin and Sister Zheng expressed understanding and promised to keep an eye out for opportunities for her.

events.name: Informing Friends and Family About Father's Health Condition
events.description: Ma Xiulan informed important relatives and friends, including her elder sister Li Xiuyun, younger sister Ma Xiufen, and childhood friend Liu Chunmei, about her father’s hospitalization (later changed to home treatment) and specific condition via phone calls and WeChat. On one hand, this was to keep everyone informed and avoid speculation; on the other hand, it served as a way to vent emotions and seek support. Relatives and friends sent their condolences one after another. Her elder sister and younger sister expressed that they would return to visit as soon as possible, while Liu Chunmei said, "Call me anytime if you need anything." These warm responses made Ma Xiulan feel that she had a support network behind her.

events.name: The final practice before the driving test for Subject 2
events.description: In the evening, encouraged by her husband, Ma Xiulan went to the training ground for her final intensive practice before the Subject Two driving test. At this moment, practicing driving felt more like a way to distract herself and release stress. She found that she could now perform reversing into a parking space and parallel parking relatively smoothly, gaining noticeable confidence in controlling the vehicle. The coach arranged a mock test and pointed out some minor issues, such as adjusting the rearview mirrors and pulling the handbrake tightly after parking. Despite being preoccupied with family matters, making progress in another area provided her with some positive psychological motivation, making her feel that she had overcome her initial fears.

events.name: Returning late and sleeping late due to practice.
events.description: The driving practice ended late, and Ma Xiulan handled household chores after returning home, which caused her bedtime to be delayed.

起始状态.心情: Under pressure, but prepared to respond proactively.

结束状态.心情: Amidst the busyness and pressure, there is a hint of positive emotion stemming from progress in driving and support from family and friends, making the mindset a bit more resilient than in the past few days.

state.今日运动: Subject Two practice for about 2 hours, household chores

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, amid ongoing caregiving pressures, a glimmer of encouragement emerged in the handicraft business—new order inquiries were received through community word-of-mouth. Though fatigued, Ma Xiulan responded with professionalism and caution in her preliminary reply.

events.name: New order inquiry received
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan received a new friend request and message on WeChat. The sender was a neighbor who had previously seen Ma Xiulan's work at a community handicraft corner event and had found her through Zhou Xiuqin's introduction. The neighbor inquired about the possibility of customizing a pair of embroidered coasters with a specific style (modern minimalist), attaching several reference images of patterns and color schemes they liked. This unexpected inquiry brought a touch of pleasant surprise and encouragement to Ma Xiulan, who was busy caring for her father and handling household chores, proving that her craftsmanship had indeed gained recognition in the community.

events.name: Handling daily care and household chores

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, life intertwined planning for the future (arrangements for the eldest son's boarding school, personal skill enhancement) with meticulous handling of the present (preparations for the father's follow-up medical appointment, crafting ideas). While managing immediate tasks, Ma Xiulan also began exploring new possibilities for improving family life.

events.name: Discussing specific arrangements for the eldest son's boarding at school with the husband.
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang discussed the final arrangements for sending their eldest son Ma Mingxuan to boarding school. They covered details such as the departure time on Saturday morning, who would drive (Ma Zhiqiang), a final confirmation of the items to be packed, the procedures to follow upon arrival at the school, and how to soothe any nervousness the child might experience. Ma Xiulan began conducting a final check of the luggage she had previously prepared, deliberately placing the clothes and bedsheets embroidered with the initials "MX" on top—a unique expression of her maternal care.

events.name: Discover and decide to learn traditional Tianjin cuisine courses
events.description: While browsing her phone in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan stumbled upon a short video series posted by a local lifestyle blogger, which teaches the preparation of traditional Tianjin cuisine. The course content included exactly what she had long wanted to learn but had struggled with—Zengbeng Carp and an even more authentic method for making Dalun noodles. After carefully reviewing the course introduction and syllabus, she found the tuition fee affordable (just a few dozen yuan) and believed it would genuinely improve her cooking skills, enriching her family’s meals, especially at a time when her father needed nutritional care. Without much hesitation, she signed up for the online course via the provided link, planning to follow along in her spare time.

events.name: Prepare for father's follow-up appointment the next day.
events.description: Ma Xiulan called her father a day in advance to confirm the specific time for the next day's follow-up appointment and all the materials needed, including the medical insurance card, medical record booklet, and recent CT scans. She reviewed her "Father's Health Condition Observation Notes" to see if there were any new developments to inform the doctor about. At the same time, she arranged for her husband to take their eldest son to school on Saturday morning, while their neighbor, Aunt Wang Guilan, would come to help look after their younger son and daughter for a while, ensuring she could accompany her father to the hospital without worry.

events.name: Research on the pattern conception of new orders
events.description: In the evening, after finishing her household chores, Ma Xiulan took out her phone and carefully studied the reference images and requirements for coaster styles sent by her neighbor once again. Drawing on her mastery of traditional Tianjin embroidery techniques, such as seed stitch and gold-wrapped embroidery, she sketched and wrote on paper, contemplating how to skillfully blend the modern minimalist lines favored by her neighbor with traditional auspicious patterns, such as cloud patterns and fretwork. Her goal was not only to meet the neighbor's aesthetic preferences but also to showcase the distinctive characteristics of her craftsmanship. This kind of creative thinking was something she enjoyed and excelled at, allowing her a brief respite from the pressures of caregiving.

events.name: Establishing Mobile Phone Usage Rules with My Son
events.description: An outdated but fully functional smartphone was found at home, intended for the eldest son, who lives on campus, to use for contacting the family. Ma Xiulan and her husband had a serious conversation with Ma Mingxuan, clearly stipulating that the phone could only be used for weekly calls and video chats with the family or for looking up study materials when genuinely needed. Under no circumstances should he become addicted to gaming, mindlessly scroll through short videos, or let it affect his studies or rest. The sensible son agreed and, under his parents' supervision, installed only essential communication and study-related apps on the phone.

events.name: Staying up late due to coursework
events.description: After signing up for the course in the evening, Ma Xiulan previewed several video lessons, which caused her bedtime to be delayed.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepare for multiple plans

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, although there are many tasks, they are all progressing steadily. The decision to learn new courses and the conception of handicrafts have brought about positive emotions.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday was a day of learning and gains. Accompanying my father for his follow-up appointment, I systematically studied home care knowledge and felt I had taken another step toward becoming a "home caregiver." Meanwhile, the planning for the handicraft order progressed to the sketching stage, and I completed a final simulation before the driving test.

events.name: Accompanying father for a follow-up appointment and learning home care
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan accompanied her father to take the bus to Jinghai District Hospital for a follow-up appointment. The doctor reviewed her father’s condition, adjusted his medication plan, and emphasized the importance of home care. The doctor explained in detail how to observe at home whether her father was experiencing difficulty breathing (by counting his breaths), how to record the frequency of his daily coughing and the condition of his sputum, and—most importantly—how to perform back patting correctly to help expel phlegm. Ma Xiulan listened attentively, taking notes in her phone’s memo app. She repeatedly confirmed with the doctor about the patting technique, the appropriate force and frequency, and the optimal timing until she fully understood. She felt that this follow-up visit was highly rewarding, as she had gained practical caregiving skills.

events.name: Pick up the medication and convey the nursing points to the mother.
events.description: After the follow-up appointment, Ma Xiulan collected the newly adjusted medication for her father at the hospital pharmacy, carefully checking the drug names, usage, and dosage. She then accompanied her father home by car. Upon arriving home, she relayed the doctor’s diagnosis and the new medication plan in detail to her mother, Li Xiuying, and demonstrated the back-patting technique she had just learned. Together, the mother and daughter practiced the technique gently on the father and agreed that Ma Xiulan would be primarily responsible for this care task during her daily visits, as well as for recording and observing his condition.

events.name: Draw a sketch of the new order pattern
events.description: In the afternoon, taking advantage of the quiet time while her child was at school and her father was taking a nap, Ma Xiulan took out paper and pen and began to put her ideas from the previous days into practice. She sketched preliminary drafts of several coaster designs in pencil, conceptualizing different themes centered on minimalist floral patterns and geometric auspicious motifs, and experimented with various compositions and border designs. This was a crucial step in transforming abstract ideas into tangible creations, and she immersed herself deeply in the process.

events.name: Provide feedback and seek advice from the referrer
events.description: During breaks from sketching, Ma Xiulan sent a brief update via WeChat to Zhou Xiuqin, who had introduced the client, informing her of the progress with the neighbor's inquiry and expressing gratitude for her referral. She also shared her preliminary design ideas. Additionally, Ma sought advice from this more experienced craftswoman on considerations for pricing custom handmade items, such as how to calculate material costs, labor hours, and a reasonable profit margin. Zhou Xiuqin provided her with several practical suggestions.

events.name: Final Simulation Before Driving Subject Two Examination
events.description: In the evening, before the official driving test, Ma Xiulan returned to the training ground for a final simulation practice, focusing on strengthening the weak point of starting on a slope and reviewing the entire test procedure. The instructor once again emphasized the precautions and details to be observed in the examination area. After returning home, she placed the required documents for the test, such as her ID card and appointment confirmation, in a separate folder and repeatedly reviewed the operational steps in her mind to prepare for the following day's examination.

events.name: Early bedtime due to fatigue from follow-up medical consultation.
events.description: Accompanying her father for a full-day follow-up medical appointment was physically demanding, and Ma Xiulan felt fatigued, so she went to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Be serious and well-prepared

结束状态.心情: It was fulfilling and rewarding, as I not only gained useful nursing knowledge but also made progress in handicrafts and driving skills. I feel somewhat nervous about tomorrow's exam but even more confident.

state.今日运动: Accompanying father for walking and waiting for medical consultation, driving simulation practice for approximately one hour.

2025-08.daily_overview: A Saturday filled with milestones. Successfully passed the driving test in the morning, and in the afternoon, the whole family sent the eldest son to boarding school, marking a new phase in family life. Meanwhile, began systematically implementing the learned nursing knowledge and preparing materials for new craft orders.

events.name: Successfully passed the driving test subject two.
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by her husband, Ma Xiulan arrived at the designated examination site of the vehicle management office. She felt a bit nervous while waiting, but once seated in the exam vehicle, she made an effort to recall every step from her practice sessions, taking deep breaths to calm herself down. Reversing into the parking space, parallel parking, stopping on the slope—she carefully performed each maneuver according to her usual practice routine. When she heard the voice prompt in the car announcing "Exam passed," she could hardly believe it. It was only after seeing the score report that she finally relaxed, revealing a long-awaited, heartfelt smile. This was not only about mastering a new skill but also proof of overcoming a personal challenge under family pressure, which greatly boosted her confidence.

events.name: The whole family sends their eldest son to boarding school.
events.description: In the afternoon, after the family finished their early meal, they loaded the luggage into the car, and Ma Zhiqiang drove them to the middle school of their eldest son, Ma Mingxuan. On the way, Ma Xiulan sat in the back seat, holding her son close, and softly reminded him once more about some details of daily life. Their younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, was excited and full of curiosity about her brother’s school. Upon arriving at the school, Ma Zhiqiang went to handle the registration procedures, while Ma Xiulan took her son to the dormitory. There, she helped him lay out the bed sheet she had embroidered with his name, organized the wardrobe, put away all the items they had brought, and exchanged a few polite words with the parents of his roommate who had arrived earlier.

events.name: Farewell to My Eldest Son
events.description: After everything was settled, downstairs at the dormitory, Ma Xiulan looked at her son, who was now a little taller than her, and condensed a thousand words into a few simple concerns: "Eat on time, keep yourself covered at night, and get along well with your classmates." Ma Zhiqiang also, for once, patted his son on the shoulder and said, "Study hard." Their younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, held her brother's hand, reluctant to let go. In the end, Ma Xiulan held back her tears and waved goodbye to her son. Watching him turn and walk toward the dormitory building, she felt a sudden emptiness in her heart.

events.name: Emotional Support on the Journey Home
events.description: On the way home, the atmosphere in the car was somewhat quiet and somber. Ma Xiulan gazed at the scenery rushing past outside the window, feeling a profound sense of emptiness welling up inside her. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, sensing her mood, gently took her hand while waiting at a red light, offering silent comfort. Their younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, also seemed to sense her mother’s emotions and leaned forward from the back seat to nestle close to her. In moments like these, the family’s unspoken understanding and support felt especially warm.

events.name: Organize nursing notes and prepare supplies.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan neatly transcribed the nursing key points recorded in her phone's memo into a dedicated notebook, creating a "Father's Home Care Log" for easy reference and daily documentation. Following the doctor's advice, she also purchased a simple pulse oximeter (choosing the most basic model due to family budget considerations) and a new temperature logbook from a nearby pharmacy, preparing to begin systematic home care.

events.name: Estimate Materials and Man-Hours for New Orders
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan referred to the sketch plan determined during the day, took out embroidery threads and fabric samples from home for color matching comparison, and recorded the types and estimated quantities of additional materials needed in a notebook. Based on Zhou Xiuqin's suggestions and her own speed, she estimated the approximate number of pure embroidery hours required to complete a set of four custom embroidered coasters. She also preliminarily considered a price range that she deemed reasonable and acceptable to her neighbors.

events.name: Stayed up late due to high spirits from passing the exam.
events.description: After passing the exam, Ma Xiulan felt both excited and sentimental about seeing her son off, which led her to stay up late handling affairs.

起始状态.心情: Feeling nervous about the exam and sad about seeing my son off.

结束状态.心情: Complex and profound. There is the joy and sense of achievement from passing the exam, the emptiness and reluctance of seeing the son leave home, as well as the mindset of preparing for the upcoming week of nursing life. Multiple emotions intertwine, yet the family's cohesion is strengthened in the moment of farewell.

state.今日运动: Walking in the examination hall and on campus, emotional fluctuations are significant, while physical exertion is moderate.

2025-08.daily_overview: The last day of August is a day for reflection, adaptation, and planning. It involves reviewing the changes and growth of the family and individuals amidst the turbulence, adjusting to the rhythm of life after the eldest child leaves home, and finalizing the new order plan. The month concludes on a high note with the successful completion of an important skills examination, marking the end of an extraordinary period.

events.name: Adapting to Family Life After the Eldest Child Begins Boarding at School
events.description: On the first morning after her eldest son started boarding school, Ma Xiulan habitually took out five bowls while preparing breakfast, then paused for a moment, realizing her son was not at home. Silently, she returned the extra bowl to the cupboard, feeling a pang of sadness. However, she quickly composed herself and shifted more attention and conversation toward her second son, Ma Mingzhe, and her youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin. During the meal, she discussed with her husband the plan to call their son every Wednesday evening and to try to bring him home or visit him at school on weekends. They aimed to maintain a close parent-child bond in new ways.

events.name: Finalize the new order design plan
events.description: In the morning, after several days of contemplation, Ma Xiulan selected a final design from multiple sketches: a simple lotus outline as the outer shape, with traditional "panjin" needlework used inside to outline abstract wave and cloud patterns, symbolizing "purity" and "auspiciousness." The color scheme chosen was a combination of light gray-blue and champagne gold, favored by her neighbor. She clearly organized the finalized pattern, detailed color scheme, material list, and estimated labor hours on a single sheet of paper, took a photo of it, and prepared to formally communicate and confirm with her neighbor in early September.

events.name: Review and Reflection on the Changes in Family Risk Awareness
events.description: Approaching the end of August, Ma Xiulan couldn’t help but reflect on the changes in her household over the past two months while tidying up. From initially worrying about her husband’s safety in transportation work to her father’s sudden illness, she deeply realized the importance of family risk management. Now, her husband’s driving habits had improved significantly due to her daily reminders, and her own excessive anxiety had largely subsided, transforming into more practical concern. She decided that in the future, she would maintain this awareness of her family’s health and financial planning at a rational, everyday level—neither overly anxious nor careless.

events.name: End a tiring day with a foot soak.
events.description: In the evening, after finishing the day's household chores and caring for her father, Ma Xiulan felt physically and mentally exhausted. She once again boiled water to soak her feet. The warm water enveloped her feet, dispelling some of the fatigue and allowing her chaotic thoughts to settle for a moment. Gazing at the night outside the window, she knew that the challenging month of September was approaching, but at this moment, she only wanted to savor this brief moment of tranquility and relaxation.

events.name: Persistent neck and shoulder strain, attempting to alleviate with heat therapy.
events.description: Due to prolonged periods of bending over for sewing and the associated stress, the pain in Ma Xiulan's shoulders and neck intensified. In the evening, she applied a hot towel to the shoulder and neck area in an attempt to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Fatigue, adapting to new changes, while preparing for the new day.

结束状态.心情: Calm yet anxious, determined to move forward. Looking back on August, though filled with turbulence, both family and individuals have grown more resilient in coping with challenges.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores and walking to and from parents' home to provide care, attempting to relieve shoulder and neck strain with hot compresses.

2025-09.daily_overview: The first day of September marked the start of the school year, but Ma Xiulan was busy worrying about her father's illness. After sending the children to school in the morning, she visited her father in the hospital. In the evening, she worked on communicating about handmade orders, striving to maintain her daily rhythm amid the pressure.

events.name: Document the start of the new academic year
events.description: After dropping the children off at school in the morning, Ma Xiulan took a group photo with her phone and sent it to her sister. In the WeChat message, she also mentioned her father's illness, and her sister comforted her. Her emotions were complex, filled with both hope for her children and concern for her father.

events.name: Visited my father in the hospital in the morning.
events.description: After dropping off her child, Ma Xiulan hurried to Jinghai District Hospital to visit her father. With his condition being unstable, she assisted her mother in handling some procedures and provided brief companionship in the ward, feeling anxious throughout.

events.name: Worrying about the eldest son who lives on campus
events.description: In the evening, she called her eldest son to inquire about his boarding school life. During the conversation, she mentioned his grandfather's illness and reminded her son to take care of his health. Her eldest son spoke in a calm tone, which brought her some relief.

events.name: Advance the communication of handicraft orders
events.description: During the day, I took some time to communicate with my neighbor via WeChat about custom embroidery, presenting design sketches and providing a quote. However, my mind was elsewhere as I repeatedly checked for messages from the hospital.

events.description: She planned to attend a cooking class during the day, but her tablet ran out of battery, which delayed her schedule. She mentioned her plan to her husband and received his support, though her thoughts were mostly preoccupied with her father.

events.name: Dinner Suitable for a Family of Four
events.description: For dinner, dishes that the second son enjoys were prepared. During the meal, discussions about the eldest son’s situation and the father’s health condition made the atmosphere somewhat heavy. Ma Xiulan ate very little.

events.name: Worried about father's insomnia and staying up late
events.description: At night, Ma Xiulan was unable to sleep due to anxiety over her father's condition, tossing and turning in bed until the early hours of the morning before finally falling asleep, which left her feeling unwell the next day.

events.name: Couple Discusses New Family Arrangements
events.description: She discussed household division of labor with her husband and decided that he would take on more responsibility for the children's homework, while she would focus on caring for her father. However, both of them are feeling significant pressure.

events.name: Daily Shopping and Neighborly Greetings
events.description: While buying groceries, she talked with Aunt Sun about her father's illness. Aunt Sun comforted her and gave her a handful of spring onions, which made her feel warm.

2025-09.daily_overview: Ma Xiulan's life was completely upended when her father was suddenly hospitalized due to illness. She spent her days rushing around the hospital, providing overnight care, losing weight, suffering from sleep deprivation, and having her personal plans disrupted.

events.description: In the evening, my father experienced difficulty breathing and was rushed to the emergency room. Ma Xiulan hurried to the hospital, her heart gripped with anxiety.

events.name: The Rush and Diagnosis in the Emergency Room
events.description: Her father was diagnosed with an acute exacerbation of COPD and required hospitalization. She handled the admission procedures and listened to the treatment plan, feeling immense pressure.

events.name: Initial Care and Arrangements
events.description: Provided overnight care, monitored father's condition, assisted with nursing tasks, and remained largely awake throughout.

events.name: Interrupted Personal Learning
events.description: I attempted to take a cooking class, but due to lack of energy, I had no choice but to give up.

events.name: Daytime Care
events.description: I accompanied my father for a follow-up examination this morning, but unexpectedly, his condition has worsened.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary yet filled with concern

A sense of health awareness began to emerge, as she started paying attention to her own breathing.

events.name: The Emergence of Health Awareness
events.description: Seeing the hospital poster about COPD and relating it to my own symptoms of shortness of breath, I felt uneasy.

events.name: Try to focus on your own breathing.
events.description: In the evening, practice pursed-lip breathing while focusing on bodily sensations, marking the first serious attention to health.

events.description: Before going to bed, review the day's progress of father's recovery, record vital signs using the APP, and discuss the division of tasks with the husband.

结束状态.心情: Achieve a sense of fulfillment

state.今日运动: Morning rehabilitation care includes walking, and an evening walk of 30 minutes.

date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: Today marks the first day of the National Day holiday and also the twentieth wedding anniversary for Ma Xiulan, who has placed her focus entirely on family. She meticulously prepared a sumptuous reunion lunch, watched the military parade celebration with her family, and decorated the home with traditional handicrafts to create a strong festive atmosphere. Amid the busyness and warmth, a casual browsing sparked a budding interest in Baduanjin.

events.name: Browse Shopping Information
events.description: On National Day, Ma Xiulan remembered a few daily necessities she had previously added to her shopping cart and opened her phone to check their prices. She noticed that some items had slightly reduced prices due to the holiday. However, considering her family’s tight budget and having heard that discounts during the Double Eleven shopping festival would be greater, she decided to wait a bit longer and not rush to place an order.

events.name: Summary of Father's Care Experience
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet morning hours, Ma Xiulan reflected on her practice of caring for her father's recovery over the past two weeks. She realized she had become proficient in measuring her father's blood pressure, supervising him to take medication on time, and had learned effective back percussion techniques to help expel phlegm. Silently, she summarized these newly acquired skills in her mind, while also reminding herself to pay closer attention to her father's emotional changes in the future. This systematic review gave her more confidence and assurance in the long-term care of her father.

events.name: Preparing a Holiday Lunch
events.description: As noon approached, Ma Xiulan busied herself in the kitchen, preparing lunch to celebrate both National Day and her wedding anniversary. She showcased her culinary expertise by preparing the family’s favorite dishes, including Tianjin-style steamed buns, noodles with savory gravy, and sweet and sour pork tenderloin. She also stir-fried several seasonal vegetables. Gradually, a family feast far more sumptuous than usual took shape.

events.name: Family Holiday Dinner
events.description: At lunchtime, Ma Xiulan, her husband Ma Zhiqiang, and their three children gathered around the dining table, enjoying a hearty meal. The atmosphere at the table was warm and harmonious, with everyone chatting as they ate. Although Ma Xiulan and her husband did not specifically mention their wedding anniversary, the sight of their children’s smiling faces and the table full of food filled their hearts with a simple yet profound sense of happiness.

events.name: Watch the live broadcast of the National Day celebration
events.description: After lunch, the whole family cleared the dishes and gathered around the television to watch the live broadcast of the National Day celebration and military parade on China Central Television. Ma Xiulan watched with particular attentiveness, feeling the nation's development achievements through the television images. She frequently exchanged thoughts with her husband and children while watching, expressing admiration for the country's strength and the hard-won nature of a peaceful life.

events.name: Family Handicraft Decoration Activities
events.description: After watching the military parade, Ma Xiulan suggested doing some handicrafts together to enhance the festive atmosphere. She took out colored paper, scissors, and glue, patiently teaching her younger daughter Ma Yuxin how to cut five-pointed stars and the characters for "National Day." Her husband Ma Zhiqiang and their two sons were also drawn in, joining in to try their hand. Although the father and sons’ cuttings were somewhat crooked, the process was filled with laughter, allowing them to enjoy a rare moment of family handicraft time.

events.name: Home Decoration
events.description: The cut-out five-pointed stars and characters were carefully pasted by Ma Xiulan onto the most prominent windowpane in the living room. The golden-red paper cuttings shimmered brilliantly in the sunlight, instantly filling the home with a festive holiday atmosphere. As the whole family admired the fruits of their labor, Ma Xiulan felt a deep sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Prepare and Enjoy a Simple Dinner
events.description: Using the leftovers from the hearty lunch at noon, Ma Xiulan simply reheated them and cooked a pot of millet porridge as the staple food. The whole family enjoyed a relaxed, waste-free dinner together, continuing the leisurely atmosphere of the holiday.

events.name: Evening Family Chat and Rest
events.description: After dinner, the family did not disperse immediately but continued chatting in the living room. The children played and frolicked, while Ma Xiulan and her husband exchanged stories from the day and discussed upcoming family arrangements, such as the father's recovery and the children's studies. As the night grew late, everyone washed up and retired, bringing a fulfilling day to a close.

events.name: Stumbled Upon Baduanjin
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Ma Xiulan, as usual, browsed life information and her relatives and friends' WeChat Moments on her phone. She happened to see a reposted article introducing the benefits of Baduanjin for middle-aged and elderly people in clearing meridians and regulating the body and mind. This piqued her interest, and thinking of her occasional backaches from doing household chores all day, she searched for related short videos. She quickly skimmed through several introductory videos, initially memorizing the names of a few movements such as "lifting the sky with both hands" and "drawing the bow left and right." She found the movements slow and gentle, seemingly not difficult, and silently planted a seed of intention to try them in her mind.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the holiday and concern for father's recovery.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, warm, slightly weary yet content, with a touch of curiosity toward the newly encountered Baduanjin.

state.今日运动: Household chores (cooking, cleaning), no specific physical exercise

date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the second day of the National Day holiday, Ma Xiulan's life returned to its daily routine centered around caring for her family. In the morning, she skillfully completed her father's morning care routine and exchanged insights with her mother. In the afternoon, during her brief personal leisure time, she resumed her embroidery hobby, which had been put aside due to her father's illness. She began conceptualizing and purchasing materials in preparation for an embroidery order featuring the phrase "Family harmony brings prosperity." Due to holiday gatherings, her weight increased slightly.

events.name: Providing morning care for the father
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to her parents' home. After two weeks of practice, she had become very skilled and smooth in performing morning care for her father, which included measuring his blood pressure and temperature and assisting him with washing up. Her father also felt much more comfortable than at the beginning and cooperated well with his daughter. Seeing her father's improved complexion, Ma Xiulan felt much more at ease.

events.name: Exchanging Nursing Experience with Mother
events.description: During a break in caregiving, Ma Xiulan and her mother Li Xiuying sat chatting in the courtyard. She shared with her mother the modern caregiving knowledge she had learned from community doctors and online sources, such as the importance of regularly recording vital signs. Her mother, in turn, passed on some traditional recuperation tips, like which ingredients are good for making restorative soups. The mother and daughter learned from each other, discussing together how to better care for their father, their conversation both focused and warm.

events.name: Conceptualize embroidery sketches
events.description: After returning from her parents' home in the afternoon, the children were each in their own rooms. Ma Xiulan finally had a rare moment of peace. She spread out paper on the dining table in the living room and carefully sketched an embroidery draft with the theme "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" using a pencil. She meticulously planned the layout of the core text and the surrounding traditional floral and bird motifs, such as peonies and magpies, striving for a composition that was both rich in detail and auspicious in meaning.

events.name: Procurement of Embroidery Materials
events.description: After roughly sketching the design, Ma Xiulan referred to her envisioned color scheme and rummaged through her sewing kit to check the available embroidery threads. Discovering that she was still missing a few colors and a suitable off-white base fabric, she walked to the familiar fabric store and general store in town to make her purchases. She carefully compared the sheen and thickness of different embroidery threads, selecting several options with the best value for money, all while mentally planning how to achieve the best possible effect with the limited materials.

events.name: Preparing Dinner and Supervising Studies
events.description: After returning from the grocery shopping, Ma Xiulan began preparing dinner for the family. Following the meal, as usual, she supervised her three children in completing their homework, checked the assignments of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan and second son Ma Mingzhe, and helped her youngest daughter Ma Yuxin practice reading pinyin.

events.name: Falling asleep early due to exhaustion.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan felt somewhat fatigued, likely due to the cumulative effects of consecutive festive activities. She completed her household chores early and went to bed at 22:00, hoping to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Calmly planning the day's household chores and a visit to my father

结束状态.心情: Calm yet focused, I began to immerse myself in the beloved embroidery work, though my body felt slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Walking to purchase daily necessities, performing routine household chores

date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the third day of the National Day holiday, the autumn rain fell continuously. Ma Xiulan spent most of her time at home, listening to lifestyle programs on TV while focusing on her embroidery. When encountering technical difficulties during the process, she sought real-time assistance from her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat and successfully resolved the issues. In the evening, she began actively searching for instructional videos on Baduanjin to make more specific preparations for attempting the practice. Due to the rainy weather, her usual walk was canceled, and her weight increased slightly as a result of prolonged sitting.

events.name: Seeking advice on techniques from fellow craftsmen
events.description: While embroidering peony petals, Ma Xiulan encountered difficulty in achieving a natural color transition from deep pink to light pink. She paused her needlework and connected with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat video call. Holding the embroidery hoop up to the camera, Ma showed Zhou the work. After carefully examining it on the screen, Zhou suggested she try the "long and short stitch" overlapping embroidery technique and explained the key points of needle manipulation in detail. The two discussed for over ten minutes through the screen, and Ma suddenly grasped the method, repeatedly expressing her gratitude.

events.name: Embroidering Branches, Leaves, and Background
events.description: After resolving the challenge of the petals, Ma Xiulan began embroidering the branches and leaves that complement the flowers, along with simple cloud-patterned backgrounds. This part of the work is highly repetitive and requires patience. As her hands swiftly moved the needle and thread, she listened to a life-service program on the television, learning tips for autumn wellness and clothing storage. Time flowed quietly between focus and relaxation.

events.name: Embroidering Thematic Text
events.description: In the evening, after settling the children to sleep, Ma Xiulan began to embroider the most central characters, "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity," under the warm light in the living room. She selected vibrant crimson embroidery thread and employed the most solid satin stitch technique, ensuring each stitch was even and full. As she embroidered these words carrying the family's hopes, her heart felt exceptionally calm and fulfilled.

events.name: Search for and bookmark Baduanjin instructional videos.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ma Xiulan recalled the article about Baduanjin she had read the day before yesterday. This time, instead of merely skimming through it, she proactively searched for "Baduanjin beginner tutorial" on a video platform. She compared several videos with high view counts and instructors who appeared amiable, eventually bookmarking a tutorial series divided into eight sections, each with exceptionally clear breakdowns of the movements. She quickly browsed the first section, "Lifting the Sky with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner," gaining a more concrete impression of the slow-paced movements, and planned to find time to try it out another day.

events.name: Evening walk cancelled due to rainy weather.
events.description: Due to the rain, Ma Xiulan canceled her planned evening walk and opted for indoor activities instead. This left her feeling somewhat disappointed, but she took the opportunity to do more embroidery.

起始状态.心情: Anding plans to focus on indoor activities due to the rainy weather.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, progress has been made in embroidery and assistance from friends has been obtained, making the idea of trying Baduanjin more concrete.

state.今日运动: None, mainly indoor seated embroidery.

2025-10.daily_overview: The rest day during the National Day holiday was also the day before the Mid-Autumn Festival. Ma Xiulan's main task today was to go out shopping to prepare for tomorrow's family reunion. She carefully planned her purchases, moving between the wet market and the supermarket, ensuring both the freshness and abundance of ingredients while strictly controlling the budget, laying a material foundation for the upcoming reunion dinner. Her weight remained relatively stable due to the walking involved in the shopping.

events.name: Procurement of Mid-Autumn Festival Reunion Supplies
events.description: Ma Xiulan left home early in the morning with a shopping bag. She first went to her regular vegetable market and bought the freshest pork, live fish, and seasonal vegetables from Auntie Sun’s stall, a familiar vendor. As usual, Auntie Sun rounded down the total for her. Next, she went to the town supermarket, compared the prices and flavors of several types of mooncakes, and finally selected a box of traditional five-nut mooncakes and a box of red bean paste mooncakes. She also bought some fruits and snacks for the children. Considering her father’s teeth and digestion were not as good as before, she deliberately weighed out some soft and glutinous osmanthus cakes. Throughout the entire shopping process, she kept a mental tally of the expenses to ensure she did not exceed her budget.

events.name: Visit Father and Inform Him of the Procurement Status
events.description: After finishing her shopping, Ma Xiulan made a detour to her parents' house. She left the pastries she had bought for her father and told her mother which dishes she would bring the next day, advising her not to prepare too much. Seeing that her father was in good spirits, she returned home reassured.

events.name: Tidying up items and preparing clothes for the next day
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan sorted and stored the purchased supplies, placing those requiring refrigeration into the refrigerator. She then found clean clothes for the children to wear tomorrow when visiting their maternal grandparents and checked whether her husband Ma Zhiqiang would be off work the next day. Upon learning that he would be able to return home in the afternoon, she felt more assured about the arrangements for the following day.

events.name: Daily Household Chores and Dinner
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Ma Xiulan carried out her daily household chores as usual, such as doing laundry, cleaning, and preparing a simple dinner, maintaining a steady pace of life.

events.name: Temporary Adjustment of Dietary Plan
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan noticed some leftovers in the refrigerator that needed to be dealt with. She made a last-minute decision to change the originally planned dinner to reheating the leftovers, in order to avoid waste, which aligns with her frugal habits.

起始状态.心情: Slightly busy, thinking about the procurement list.

结束状态.心情: The reassurance of being fully prepared, looking forward to tomorrow's family reunion.

state.今日运动: Walking to purchase, carrying goods home, and doing household chores

2025-10.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Ma Xiulan experienced a fulfilling and multitasking day. In the morning, with the help of her eldest son, she unlocked a new skill in using mobile phone maps; at her parents' home, she skillfully applied nursing techniques to help alleviate her father's discomfort. In the afternoon and evening, she was kept busy by her husband's return home and her younger daughter's activities, temporarily setting aside her embroidery work. Nevertheless, she still found time to seek remote advice from a craft friend to resolve a tricky problem. Her weight continued to increase due to consecutive family gatherings.

events.name: Learning to Use Mobile Maps from the Eldest Son
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan saw her eldest son Ma Mingxuan playing with his phone, which reminded her of her long-standing desire to learn how to use a mobile phone to check routes. Under her son's patient guidance, she opened a map application for the first time. Her son taught her how to search for locations, view bus routes, and specifically demonstrated how to plan a route from Jinghai District to Beijing's Tiananmen Square, saying, "Mom, isn't this the place you want to take us to in the future?" As Ma Xiulan clumsily zoomed in and out of the map with her fingers, she felt both amazed and found it very practical. Her vision of a future family trip seemed to have drawn a step closer.

events.name: Sputum Removal Care for Fathers
events.description: After learning the new skill, Ma Xiulan went to her parents' home. Her father, Ma Jianguo, felt some chest tightness after his afternoon nap and had difficulty coughing up phlegm. Ma Xiulan immediately recalled the guidance from Dr. Wang in the community. She had her father sit up and skillfully performed back percussion for him. A few minutes later, her father successfully coughed up the phlegm, and his breathing became noticeably smoother. Her father took a comfortable breath and repeatedly praised his daughter, saying, "Your technique is professional, much steadier than a few days ago." Hearing this, Ma Xiulan felt both relieved and proud.

events.name: Suspend embroidery work to attend to household affairs.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Zhiqiang, who usually drives long-distance routes, unexpectedly returned home early, necessitating the preparation of a welcoming meal. At the same time, the kindergarten of their younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, issued a last-minute notice about a parent-child craft activity requiring parental attendance. Ma Xiulan had to temporarily set aside her half-finished embroidery and spent the entire day busy with household tasks, including preparing the meal, accompanying her daughter to the activity, and handling the luggage her husband brought back.

events.name: Seeking advice on embroidery color matching remotely
events.description: In the evening, during a break from her busy day, Ma Xiulan picked up her embroidery hoop and realized she was still not satisfied with the green gradient of one of the leaves. She showed the unfinished piece to Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat video, seeking advice on a more natural color scheme. Zhou Xiuqin suggested adding a very faint yellow thread between the two shades of green as a transition. The two discussed the idea over the screen for a while, and Ma Xiulan thought it was an excellent suggestion, deciding to try it the next day.

events.name: Stayed up late due to a family gathering.
events.description: Due to her husband's return home and family activities, Ma Xiulan handled affairs until late at night, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Usually, planning for study and care.

结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet fulfilled with multiple gains (acquiring new skills, assisting my father, resolving embroidery challenges), busy yet enriched.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from parents' home, accompanying children in activities, household chores

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with a bright moon in the night sky.
date_attribute.holiday: Mid-Autumn Festival

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, a time for family reunion. Ma Xiulan and her husband took their children back to her parents' home, where they were busy from afternoon until night. She helped her mother prepare a sumptuous family feast, and the whole family enjoyed dinner together, admired the moon, and chatted about daily life. The sense of ritual of this traditional festival made the family bond even stronger. After returning home, in the quiet early morning, she finally mustered the courage to try imitating the first two movements of Baduanjin for the first time. Her weight reached a peak due to the Mid-Autumn Festival feast.

events.name: Depart for parents' home.
events.description: On the afternoon of the Mid-Autumn Festival, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang set out from their home on Jingwen Road with their three children, carrying mooncakes, fruits, and gifts purchased the day before. They walked to their parents’ home, which was not far away. The children excitedly ran ahead, discussing what signature dishes their grandmother would prepare for dinner that evening. The festive atmosphere began to spread along the way.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing a family banquet
events.description: Upon arriving at her parents' home, Ma Xiulan set down her things and headed straight into the kitchen to assist her mother, Li Xiuying. She took charge of washing vegetables, chopping ingredients, and peeling garlic, while her mother handled the cooking. The kitchen was filled with steam and the air was rich with the sweet and sour aroma of sweet and sour pork tenderloin and the hearty scent of braised meat. As they worked busily, mother and daughter chatted about the children's recent amusing stories and the prices at the local market, moving in perfect harmony.

events.name: Mid-Autumn Festival Reunion Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the table was laden with a sumptuous spread of home-cooked dishes: sweet and sour pork tenderloin, noodles with gravy, steamed fish, stir-fried seasonal vegetables... Ma Xiulan took out the mooncakes she had brought and cut them into pieces. The family gathered around the table, serving each other dishes and chatting about everyday life. Ma Xiulan asked her father with concern about how he was feeling. Her father smiled and said, "Having you all come back to visit often is better than any medicine." Throughout the meal, laughter and cheerful conversation filled the air, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Enjoying the Moonlight in the Courtyard While Sharing Family Stories
events.description: After dinner, the sky had turned completely dark, and a bright, full moon rose into the sky. The family moved to the small courtyard to admire the moon. The children pointed at the moon, asking all sorts of questions and pestering the adults to tell the story of Chang’e. Ma Xiulan and her parents sat in rattan chairs. She shared the embroidery samples she had recently completed and her experiences at the community market, while her parents talked about the recent happenings of their old neighbors. The moonlight, like water, quietly bathed everyone, and familial affection flowed gently through the casual conversation.

events.name: Tidying Up and Returning Home
events.description: As night deepened, Ma Xiulan helped her mother clear the dishes and tidy the kitchen. Her mother insisted on packing some leftover dishes and pastries for them to take home. After bidding farewell to her parents and repeatedly urging them to take care of their health, the family set off on their journey back. The children fell asleep in the car, and though Ma Xiulan felt exhausted, her heart was filled with the warmth and contentment of the family reunion.

events.name: First attempt at the Eight-Section Brocade movements
events.description: Early the next morning, while her family was still asleep, Ma Xiulan remembered the instructional videos she had saved. She took her phone and went to the quiet courtyard of her home. She played the video and attempted to follow the first two movements: "Raising Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing a Bow on Both Sides Like Shooting a Vulture." Her movements were very stiff and awkward—her arms couldn’t lift high, her horse stance was unsteady, and she couldn’t keep up with the rhythm of the instructor in the video. She merely imitated the general form, with the main goal of understanding what the movements were like. After completing the two movements, she stopped, feeling slightly warm and finding the experience quite novel.

起始状态.心情: The anticipation of holiday reunions and the slight busyness of preparatory work.

结束状态.心情: Warm, comforting, with a faint weariness after the holiday and a slight excitement from trying something new.

state.今日运动: Walking round trip, household assistance, first attempt at Baduanjin (approximately 5 minutes)

date_attribute.holiday: Make-up Workday

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first workday after the National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival holiday, life returned to its usual rhythm. In the morning, Ma Xiulan focused on completing the finishing touches of her embroidery work, carefully inspecting and mending it. In the afternoon, she proactively contacted her childhood friend Liu Chunmei to arrange a gathering for the following day, making plans for socializing with old friends outside of her busy family life. Her weight decreased slightly due to post-holiday adjustments.

events.name: Complete embroidery and inspect for repairs.
events.description: In the morning, after seeing off family members who had left for work and school, the household chores came to a temporary pause. Ma Xiulan returned to her embroidery work and completed stitching all the patterns. She removed the piece from the embroidery hoop and examined every stitch carefully against the light from the window. Noticing a few slightly uneven stitches along the edges of some petals, she sat down again and patiently made meticulous adjustments until she was completely satisfied.

events.name: Contact childhood friends to arrange a gathering
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan realized it had been a while since she had a good chat with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei. She sent a message to Liu Chunmei via WeChat, asking if she would be free to come over for a visit tomorrow afternoon after the children had gone to school. Liu Chunmei quickly replied that she was available. The two briefly caught up on recent happenings, with Ma Xiulan mentioning that she had just finished an embroidery piece, while Liu Chunmei offered to bring some newly purchased jasmine tea to share. A relaxed gathering between old friends was thus arranged.

events.name: Daily Household Chores and Care
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Ma Xiulan carried out her daily household chores as usual, including doing laundry, preparing dinner, and supervising the children's homework. She also took the time to call her parents to confirm that her father's condition remained stable that night.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to financial pressure
events.description: While reviewing the family expenses in the evening, Ma Xiulan felt somewhat anxious, worrying that her father's medical costs might impact the household budget, which left her feeling slightly downhearted before falling asleep.

起始状态.心情: The tranquility after the holiday ends, preparing to return to the daily routine.

结束状态.心情: Steadfastness, the sense of accomplishment from completing a task, and the anticipation of reuniting with old friends, yet tinged with financial concerns.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores

date_attribute.holiday: Make-up workday

2025-10.daily_overview: This afternoon was dedicated to Ma Xiulan's leisure and social time. She carefully prepared tea and snacks to receive her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, who came to visit. The two enjoyed tea in the sunlit courtyard, shared their thoughts, exchanged ideas about handicrafts, and gained valuable emotional support. Additionally, she began systematically organizing her father's health records and practiced the Eight-Section Brocade again, feeling smoother than the first time. Her weight remained stable.

events.name: Organize Father's Nursing Records
events.description: After returning from her parents' home in the morning where she had been caring for her father, Ma Xiulan neatly transcribed the data she had recorded over the past week—including her father's blood pressure, body temperature, and medication times—into a dedicated notebook. She carefully reviewed the dates and values to ensure nothing was omitted. This notebook would serve as an important reference for her communication with the community doctor.

events.name: Preparing to Receive Guests
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan cleaned her small courtyard in advance, setting out a small table and two chairs. She boiled water, prepared the tea set and the jasmine tea that Liu Chunmei loved to drink, and also washed a plate of apples. After a moment's thought, she brought out her recently completed embroidery piece and the sketches of new patterns she was currently designing, ready to share them with her old friend.

events.name: Having tea and heart-to-heart talk with childhood friends
events.description: Liu Chunmei arrived as promised. Bathed in the warm autumn sunlight, the two sipped fragrant flower tea and began to chat. Ma Xiulan confided in her closest old friend about the pressure she had been carrying since her father fell ill, her worries about the family, and the occasional feelings of exhaustion. Liu Chunmei, in turn, shared trivial yet amusing anecdotes from her work at the supermarket and her concerns over her own child’s school advancement. Through sharing and listening, the burdens were lifted, and their moods brightened.

events.name: Exchanging Handicraft and Care Experience
events.description: After chatting about daily life, the two naturally turned the conversation to handicrafts. They took out their respective embroidery works-in-progress and commented on each other's stitching techniques. Liu Chunmei praised Ma Xiulan's newly completed piece, "Harmony Brings Prosperity," with great admiration. Ma Xiulan also shared with Liu Chunmei the nursing knowledge she had learned to care for her father, such as measuring blood pressure and assisting with phlegm expulsion. Liu Chunmei found this both novel and impressive, remarking, "Xiulan, you're practically a half-expert in home nursing now."

events.name: Farewell to a Good Friend
events.description: The pleasant afternoon hours slipped by swiftly amidst the fragrance of tea and cheerful laughter. Liu Chunmei had to return home to prepare dinner, and Ma Xiulan saw her off at the door. The two agreed to meet next time at Liu Chunmei's home. This carefree reunion with an old friend left Ma Xiulan feeling a long-lost sense of relaxation and warmth.

events.name: Second Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: During a break from her evening chores, Ma Xiulan once again took out her phone and practiced Baduanjin in the yard. This time, she did not attempt to follow the entire routine but instead focused on the first half of the video, repeatedly watching, pausing, and imitating the two movements: "Regulating the Spleen and Stomach by Raising One Arm" and "Looking Back to Relieve Five Strains and Seven Injuries." She slowed down her pace, striving to grasp the key points of the movements. Although her posture was still not perfect, she felt it was smoother than her first attempt, and at least she had memorized the general sequence of the movements.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a touch of anticipation for the afternoon gathering with old friends.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, with emotions being nurtured, I have gained a bit more confidence in persisting with the practice of Baduanjin.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores, Baduanjin practice (approximately 10 minutes, with a focus on learning)

2025-10.daily_overview: Today, Ma Xiulan completed the final step of the embroidery order—ironing and cleaning—making the piece ready for delivery. Meanwhile, the pressure of household finances prompted her to systematically organize the accounts, marking overspending items in preparation for the upcoming formal financial discussion with her husband. In her spare time, she did not forget to continue yesterday's warmth by expressing gratitude to her childhood friend. Her weight decreased slightly due to the busy schedule.

events.name: Complete the post-processing of the embroidery work.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan spread a clean towel on the smooth tabletop, placed the embroidery face down, and used a steam iron to press it at a low temperature, carefully smoothing out every wrinkle. After the embroidery had cooled, she trimmed away all the excess threads on the back with a sharp pair of small scissors, and finally gently brushed away any loose dust with a soft-bristled brush. After this treatment, the "Harmony in the Family Brings Prosperity" embroidery appeared exceptionally crisp, clean, and renewed.

events.name: Reviewing the household ledger revealed an overspend.
events.description: In the afternoon, taking advantage of the quiet at home, Ma Xiulan took out the notebook where she recorded household income and expenses (she preferred to keep handwritten records in a notebook). She carefully organized the expenditures from the past three months, categorizing them into items such as daily necessities, utilities, gas, her children’s school fees, and her father’s medical expenses. As she looked at the numbers, her brow furrowed slightly—the recent costs for her father’s nutritional supplements and follow-up medical check-ups, as well as the expenses for her three children’s new semester study materials, had clearly exceeded the usual budget. She used a red pen to mark these two items as priorities, pondering how to discuss this practical issue with her husband that evening.

events.name: Expressing Gratitude to Childhood Friends to Sustain Friendship
events.description: While tidying up the tea set, Ma Xiulan recalled the pleasant afternoon she had spent with Liu Chunmei the day before, feeling a warm glow in her heart. She sent a message to Liu Chunmei via WeChat: "Chunmei, thank you for coming over to chat with me yesterday. I feel much more at ease now. The tea you brought was really delicious." She then sent Liu Chunmei a clear picture of the new embroidery pattern they had discussed the day before. The two exchanged a few more brief messages on WeChat, keeping their friendship warm through everyday sharing.

events.name: Daily Care and Household Chores
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went to her parents' home as usual to visit and assist her father with dinner. After returning home, she prepared dinner for her own family, supervised the children's studies, and completed the day's routine household care tasks.

events.name: Going to bed early due to neck and shoulder discomfort.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan felt some soreness in her shoulders and neck, likely caused by long hours of embroidery and household chores. She decided to rest early to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Calmly, plan to complete the embroidery finishing and organize household chores.

结束状态.心情: A mix of slight satisfaction from completing orders and a faint worry about family financial pressures, with thoughts focused on the evening's family meeting.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores, walking to visit parents

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is a day of harvest and recognition. Ma Xiulan's meticulously completed embroidery piece received high praise from the client along with the final payment, which greatly boosted her confidence. While accompanying her father for a follow-up medical appointment, her detailed nursing records also earned praise from the community doctor. In the evening, her husband was preparing for a family financial meeting, as the couple began to face economic pressures together. Her weight decreased slightly due to the busy schedule.

events.name: Accompanied my father for a follow-up visit and received positive feedback from the doctor.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan accompanied her father to the community health service center for a follow-up consultation with Dr. Wang. She took out the small notebook with detailed records, and after flipping through it, Dr. Wang nodded repeatedly and praised, "Xiulan, your records are even more meticulous than those of some of our nurses! They are very helpful in managing your father's condition." Receiving affirmation from a professional doctor, Ma Xiulan showed a shy yet happy smile on her face, feeling that her efforts were truly valuable.

events.name: Photographing finished embroidery works
events.description: After returning home from the clinic, Ma Xiulan placed the neatly ironed embroidery in the brightest spot of the living room. Using her phone, she carefully took clear photos from multiple angles, including the front and side views, ensuring every delicate detail could be seen.

events.name: Deliver the embroidery and receive positive feedback from the customer.
events.description: After taking the photo, Ma Xiulan sent the finished image via WeChat to the client who had ordered the embroidered piece with the phrase "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" (an old neighbor introduced by Zheng Xiuying), along with a brief explanation. The client quickly replied with a series of admiring emojis, saying, "Sister Ma, your craftsmanship is truly impeccable! It looks even better than I imagined, and the characters are embroidered with such vitality!" The client was extremely satisfied and immediately transferred the remaining balance via WeChat. The moment she received the payment notification, Ma Xiulan felt a surge of strong accomplishment and the joy of being recognized.

events.name: Package and ship the embroidery.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan carefully wrapped the embroidery with clean soft paper and bubble wrap, then placed it into a suitably sized cardboard box to prevent damage during transportation. She walked to the courier collection point at Zhang Shufen Supermarket near her community, filled out the delivery form, and personally handed the package to the courier. After sending off this result of her hard work, she felt a sense of relief.

events.name: The husband prepares the household financial data.
events.description: In the evening, while Ma Xiulan was washing dishes in the kitchen, her husband Ma Zhiqiang sat on the living room sofa, checking his recent sports car shift schedule and electronic pay stub on his phone. He frowned as he calculated, realizing that due to the recent rise in fuel prices, even though his workload hadn’t decreased, his net income might be slightly lower than expected. He quietly noted these details in his mind, preparing to share them as his side of the information during the evening family financial meeting.

起始状态.心情: Usually, with the tasks of follow-up consultations and delivering works

结束状态.心情: The daytime is filled with a sense of accomplishment and joy (with works receiving praise and records being affirmed by doctors), while the evening shifts to seriousness and concern regarding family financial matters.

state.今日运动: Accompanying my father on foot for his follow-up medical appointment, sending express mail, and performing daily household chores.
