2025-10.daily_overview: Several decisions and invitations that will significantly impact Ma Xiulan's future life occurred today. In the evening, she and her husband held a formal family financial planning meeting, establishing specific measures to reduce expenses and enforce savings. During the day, she scheduled her first comprehensive health check-up and accepted an invitation to volunteer for the community's Double Ninth Festival event. Additionally, a conversation with a craft friend and a discussion with her husband about revisiting their time as a couple added new dimensions and possibilities to her life. Her weight remains stable.

events.name: Exchanging online shopping experiences with fellow craft enthusiasts
events.description: In the morning, Zhou Xiuqin, a friend who shares a passion for handicrafts, came over for a visit, and they worked on crafts together. Ma Xiulan mentioned how she had previously wanted to buy toilet paper and managed to save a few yuan by comparing prices online. Zhou Xiuqin also shared her experience of finding affordable yet high-quality embroidery thread and fabric online. The two exchanged practical tips, such as how to assess product quality by looking at buyer reviews and how to avoid shops with fake reviews. Ma Xiulan felt that with her friend's "guidance," she would feel more confident trying to purchase other items online in the future.

events.name: Family Financial Planning Meeting
events.description: After the children fell asleep at night, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang held a formal "family meeting" at the dining table in the living room. Ma Xiulan presented a ledger marked with red highlights, pointing out the overspending on their father's medical expenses and their children's education fees. Ma Zhiqiang also candidly explained the impact of rising oil prices on their income. Together, they carefully calculated with a calculator and jointly decided: In the coming months, the entire family would cut back on unnecessary shopping and snack expenses. At the same time, no matter how difficult it might be, they would set aside 800 yuan from their monthly income and deposit it into a newly opened "Family Emergency and Education Fund" account, preparing for their father's health and their children's future. This decision made Ma Xiulan feel that although the pressure remained, the direction was clear, and she felt somewhat more at ease.

events.name: Discussing breakfast with husband
events.description: After the somewhat heavy atmosphere of the financial meeting, Ma Zhiqiang looked at his wife's tired face and proactively suggested, "Tomorrow morning, how about we get up a bit early, arrange the children's breakfast, and go to Old Liu's place for some guoba cai? Just the two of us, like when we first got married." Ma Xiulan was taken aback for a moment, then smiled and nodded in agreement. This sudden little proposal was like a gentle breeze that dispelled the dullness of the meeting.

events.name: Schedule a comprehensive physical examination
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan reflected on the wake-up call her father’s recent illness had given her. She also thought about how her husband worked tirelessly as a long-distance truck driver year-round and how she, too, was one of the pillars of the family—her health must not fail. Encouraged by her husband, she mustered the courage to call the physical examination center of Jinghai District Hospital for the first time. She inquired in detail about the basic health checkup packages suitable for middle-aged women and their prices. After some comparison and hesitation, she finally scheduled an appointment for the morning of October 15th (next Wednesday). Hanging up the phone, she felt a faint unease about the unknown tests ahead, but also a sense of determination to take responsibility for her own health.

events.name: Accept the Invitation to Be a Community Volunteer
events.description: In the evening, Zheng Xiuying, a dedicated community grid worker, called Ma Xiulan to inform her that the community planned to hold a tea party for the elderly on the Double Ninth Festival (October 21). Knowing that Ma Xiulan was skilled with her hands, Zheng invited her to participate in the preparations and serve as a volunteer on the day of the event. She would be responsible for a handicraft corner, teaching the elderly to make simple and interesting small crafts. Ma Xiulan thought of her own parents, who were also elderly, and felt that doing something for the seniors in the community was meaningful. Moreover, it would allow more people to see her craftsmanship. She gladly agreed and discussed initial ideas for the event with Sister Zheng over the phone.

events.name: Start continuous preparation for community activities (Day 1)
events.description: Starting today, Ma Xiulan began preparing for the community's Double Ninth Festival activities, planning to spend several consecutive days designing handmade crafts and purchasing materials.

起始状态.心情: On ordinary days, planning the household chores and possible social engagements for the day.

结束状态.心情: A complex yet overall positive sentiment: a sense of groundedness from making significant financial decisions, a touch of nervousness about embracing new challenges (such as a medical check-up and volunteer work), and a small anticipation for tomorrow's breakfast for two.

state.今日运动: Daily Household Chores

2025-10.daily_overview: A Sunday filled with heartwarming little joys. In the early morning, Ma Xiulan and her husband honored their agreement by going out for a rare breakfast together, naturally establishing a "breakfast date" once or twice a month. During the day, she successfully applied her newly learned mobile map skills to independently locate a new farmers' market. In the evening, she adjusted the family budget and, for the first time, completed a full session of Baduanjin exercises. Positive reviews on her embroidery orders also prompted her to consider more possibilities for monetizing her craftsmanship. Her weight remained stable.

events.name: Successfully using mobile map navigation
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan wanted to try out the new skills she had learned. Hearing that a new vegetable market had opened near her home with more affordable prices, she opened her phone's map app alone and searched for the name of the market. The map quickly displayed the location and walking route. Feeling a mix of nervousness and excitement, she followed the navigation prompts and successfully found the place. Although the journey was not long, this successful independent experience made her genuinely feel the convenience brought by technology and greatly boosted her confidence in learning new things.

events.name: Supervise father's afternoon medication.
events.description: When visiting her parents' home in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan reminded her father on time to take his afternoon medication and watched him swallow it with water. Silently reflecting, she realized that since taking charge of her father's medication, thanks to her careful notes in a small notebook and her attentiveness, she had never once forgotten or missed the correct timing. This sense of being able to care for her family well brought her peace of mind.

events.name: Received the final positive review for the embroidery and reflected on it.
events.description: In the evening, the client who had previously ordered the embroidery sent another WeChat message, saying that the package had been received, the actual product was even more beautiful than the photos, and everyone in the family praised it highly. They thanked Ma Xiulan once again. The continuous affirmation lifted Ma Xiulan's spirits. Looking at the final payment received via WeChat, she began to seriously consider: perhaps she could take on more such scattered orders through Sister Zheng Xiuying, or, as Zhou Xiuqin suggested, try showcasing her work on local lifestyle platforms? This might become a more stable part-time avenue for increasing her income.

events.name: Adjust the Monthly Household Budget
events.description: In accordance with the decision made during last night's family meeting, Ma Xiulan solemnly added a new category titled "Family Emergency and Education Fund" to the household ledger. She then reorganized the monthly budget for the next three months, clearly specifying the spending limits for various expenses such as groceries, daily necessities, and children's pocket money. The budget for non-essential purchases was significantly reduced. Looking at this "tightened" yet goal-oriented budget plan, she felt that the family's financial management had entered a new, more structured phase.

events.name: The Formation of the "Breakfast Pact" with My Husband
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan prepared porridge in advance. After setting breakfast for the children, she went out with her husband Ma Zhiqiang and walked to the open-air breakfast stall from their memory. The initial conversation felt somewhat unfamiliar, but as they ate the steaming hot guobacai, the atmosphere gradually warmed up. Ma Zhiqiang shared the scenery he had seen while driving his sports car, and Ma Xiulan talked about the positive reviews for her embroidery orders. They reminisced about the simple joys of coming here often when they were first married, despite their financial struggles at the time. On the way home, Ma Zhiqiang said, "If I still have Sundays off next month, shall we come again?" Ma Xiulan nodded with a smile. Without strict planning, an unspoken agreement for "one or two breakfast dates a month" naturally took shape.

events.name: First Complete Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: In the evening, after her family had retired for the night, Ma Xiulan played the Baduanjin instructional video once again in the courtyard. This time, she was determined to follow through the entire routine. She slowed down her pace, pausing the video multiple times for each movement to imitate and adjust her posture. Completing the full set of Baduanjin took nearly twenty minutes. Her movements remained stiff, and her breathing was uncoordinated, but she persevered until the end. After concluding the routine, she felt a slight warmth in her body and some soreness in her arms, yet her mood was remarkably relaxed and calm. This marked an important step for her from "understanding" to "practice."

events.name: Continue preparing for the community event (Day 2)
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan took some time to design several simple craft samples for the community activity and prepared a list of required materials.

起始状态.心情: With a small flutter of excitement and anticipation for the breakfast for two

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, heartwarming, and rewarding. New skills were validated, family financial planning was implemented, a new ritual was established in the marital relationship, and breakthroughs were made in personal health endeavors. Multiple positive changes occurred on the same day.

state.今日运动: Walking (breakfast, shopping), complete one full session of Baduanjin practice (approximately 20 minutes)

2025-10.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Ma Xiulan gradually communicated the family financial plan to her parents and gained their understanding. She also shared the joy of her breakfast agreement with her husband with her mother, receiving her support. Amid family affairs, she seized every moment to advance her new embroidery work, applying newly learned techniques to make the imagery more vivid. Her weight remained stable.

events.name: Explaining Family Financial Planning to Parents
events.description: When visiting her parents in the morning, Ma Xiulan found an appropriate moment to tactfully explain the family's newly established financial plan to her father, Ma Jianguo, and mother, Li Xiuying. She emphasized that priority would be given to covering her father's nutrition and follow-up medical expenses, but other household expenditures would be reduced over the next few months, asking for her parents' understanding. Her mother took her hand and said, "Silly child, there's no need to say such things to us. What matters most now is your father's health and the children's education—everything else can be saved." Her parents' understanding and support warmed Ma Xiulan's heart and eased her psychological burden.

events.name: Sharing marital anecdotes with mother
events.description: When alone with her mother in the kitchen, Ma Xiulan mentioned somewhat shyly that she had breakfast with her husband the day before, saying it felt like being young again. Upon hearing this, her mother Li Xiuying was very pleased and said with a smile, "That's right! No matter how busy a couple is, they must have time to talk alone. Your father and I were like that when we were young." The mother also shared some of her own insights on managing a marital relationship, making this conversation between mother and daughter filled with warm resonance.

events.name: Focus on embroidering new works
events.description: In the afternoon, taking advantage of the quiet at home, Ma Xiulan spent several consecutive hours focusing on a new embroidery piece. The theme this time was "Wealth and Prosperity Peonies." She employed the layered needlework technique she had previously learned from Zhou Xiuqin, carefully blending the colors of the silk threads. Stitch by stitch, she embroidered the petals, creating a natural gradient of shades and achieving a richer, more lifelike depth than ever before. Immersed in the act of craftsmanship, time seemed to fly by.

events.name: Daily Household Chores and Communication with Children
events.description: While preparing dinner in the evening, Ma Xiulan gently explained the family's "new rules" to the three children gathered around her: to save money for their grandfather's medical treatment and the education fund, everyone's pocket money would need to be used more sparingly, but they could earn small rewards or snacks by helping with household chores, such as sweeping the floor or clearing the dishes. The children seemed to understand only partially, but they all nodded in agreement.

events.name: Continue preparing for the community event (Day 3)
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan communicated with Zheng Xiuying via WeChat regarding the details of the event and confirmed the procurement of manual materials.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with the mindset of implementing financial plans and advancing manual tasks.

结束状态.心情: Stable and grounded. Communication with parents is smooth, receiving emotional support from mother, and embroidery is progressing well. Life feels tight yet orderly, filled with warmth and human connection.

state.今日运动: Visiting parents on foot, daily household chores

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a noticeable drop in temperature.

2025-10.daily_overview: As the chill of late autumn deepened, Ma Xiulan began preparing her household for the winter, purchasing and storing autumn vegetables and planning to make pickles. She communicated the family's financial plans to her relatives and arranged preparations for her upcoming medical checkup, along with a rare private movie outing. While caring for her father and engaging in casual chats with neighbors, her efforts were acknowledged, and her personal endeavor (practicing Baduanjin) received encouragement from those around her. Her weight increased slightly due to the preparations for the medical examination.

events.name: Procurement of Autumn and Winter Vegetable Stock
events.description: The weather had noticeably turned cooler. When Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market, she saw that cold-storage vegetables for autumn and winter, such as Chinese cabbage, radishes, and potatoes, were in abundant supply and priced affordably. At Aunt Sun’s stall, she followed the vendor’s advice and bought a bag of good-quality potatoes and several large green radishes. Aunt Sun even gave her a handful of spring onions as a gift. Ma Xiulan calculated in her mind that these vegetables would last her for a while, fitting well into her plan to "spend the winter frugally."

events.name: Exchanging Nursing Experience with Mother
events.description: While helping with cooking at her parents' home, Ma Xiulan chatted with her mother about taking care of her father as she sorted vegetables. She mentioned that the caregiving notebook she kept had received praise from Dr. Wang. Upon hearing this, her mother felt relieved and praised her for being capable and meticulous, saying, "Your father is fortunate to have a daughter who is even more dependable than a son." The affirmation from her closest loved one made Ma Xiulan feel that all her hard work was worthwhile.

events.name: Explaining Family Financial Planning to Children
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan reiterated the family financial plan to the children in a more concrete manner. For example, she explained that the frequency of buying snacks would need to be reduced in the future, but if everyone behaved well on weekends, they could make candied haws or dumplings together at home as a reward. By combining "saving" with "family fun," she made it easier for the children to accept the plan.

events.name: Plan to pickle winter vegetables
events.description: Upon seeing the radishes and cabbages she had just bought, Ma Xiulan recalled that every winter, her family's dining table would always feature the pickled vegetables she made herself—refreshing and perfect with rice. She decided to start pickling in a couple of days and began mentally calculating how much more salt, sugar, and Sichuan peppercorns she needed to buy, as well as whether the old earthenware jar at home needed to be scrubbed clean.

events.name: Preparing for a Medical Examination
events.description: Thinking about her medical checkup the next day, Ma Xiulan strictly followed the hospital's instructions and refrained from eating or drinking after 8 p.m. She placed her ID card and medical insurance card in the bag she would carry the following day in advance. She also arranged with her husband that he would take the children to school the next morning, as she needed to go to the hospital on an empty stomach.

events.name: Enjoy Private Movie Time
events.description: Late at night, after confirming that her family was sound asleep, Ma Xiulan turned off the main lights, leaving only a small desk lamp on. Wrapped in a blanket, she sat on the sofa and found the movie *Postmen in the Mountains* on television, watching it quietly. The simple father-son relationship and the rural scenery in the film deeply moved her, allowing her to temporarily forget the trivialities and pressures of daily life. As the plot unfolded, she smiled at times and was moved to tears at others, enjoying a long-lost, pure emotional comfort and mental relaxation.

events.name: Communicating with Neighbors about Baduanjin
events.description: When going out to take out the trash in the afternoon, I ran into my neighbor Wang Guilan at the door. During our casual chat, Ma Xiulan mentioned in passing that she had recently been learning Baduanjin to exercise. Sister Wang said she had heard of it but had never tried it, encouraging Ma Xiulan by saying, "Moving is always better than not moving at all. If you keep practicing, it will definitely be good for your health." The recognition from her neighbor made Ma Xiulan feel that this was no longer just a solitary attempt but had also gained support from her immediate environment.

起始状态.心情: Calmly perceiving the seasonal changes, planning household reserves.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and fulfilled. Winter preparations are complete, emotions have been vented and nourished through movies, and although there is some apprehension about tomorrow's medical check-up, I am ready for it.

state.今日运动: Walking for purchases, daily household chores

2025-10.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone in Ma Xiulan's life. She independently completed her first systematic health check-up, taking a crucial step toward proactively managing her own well-being. Meanwhile, she actively engaged in community event preparations by proposing a handicraft plan during the tea party planning meeting. In terms of family traditions, she consulted her mother in detail about pickling techniques and made necessary purchase preparations. As for embroidery skills, she also sought advanced techniques from Aunt Wu, her remote "technical advisor," through online communication.

events.name: Calling Mother to Ask for Pickle Recipe
events.description: Before her morning medical checkup, Ma Xiulan specifically called her mother, Li Xiuying. She inquired in detail about this year's specific recipe for pickling radishes and cabbage, asking whether there were any new adjustments to the proportions of salt, sugar, and Sichuan peppercorns. She also made a point to ask whether her father's taste preferences had recently leaned toward saltier or milder flavors. Over the phone, her mother patiently dictated the "secret recipe" that had been used for many years and reminded her of several key steps to prevent mold from forming on the pickled vegetables. As she listened, Ma Xiulan carefully took notes on paper. The passing down of this craft gave her a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Record the formula and list the procurement items.
events.description: After hanging up the phone, Ma Xiulan carefully calculated the required amounts of vegetables and seasonings based on her mother's recipe and the number of people in her household. She made a clear shopping list in her notebook: 10 jin of Chinese cabbage, 5 jin of green radish, coarse salt, Sichuan peppercorns, rock sugar, and a reminder to check the seal of the pickling jar at home. She planned to go to the market for the purchases the next day.

events.name: Complete the first systematic health examination
events.description: Throughout the entire morning, Ma Xiulan was alone at the Jinghai District Hospital's physical examination center, completing a series of checks including blood drawing, abdominal ultrasound, electrocardiogram, gynecological examination, and measurements of blood pressure, height, and weight. Faced with unfamiliar equipment and procedures, she felt somewhat nervous, but with the guidance of the nurses, she managed to complete everything smoothly. During the blood draw, she turned her head away, afraid to look, and after the ultrasound, she worried about the results... a mix of complex emotions swirled within her. When she walked out of the hospital, though her body felt weak from fasting, she experienced a sense of relief, as if she had "accomplished a major task." The initiative to take responsibility for her own health had never felt stronger.

events.name: Attend the Community Tea Party Planning Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at the community activity center to attend a preparatory meeting for the Double Ninth Festival tea party organized by Zheng Xiuying. The meeting was attended by five or six enthusiastic neighbors and community staff. Everyone engaged in lively discussions about the event's procedures, materials, and division of tasks. Ma Xiulan was primarily responsible for the "Handicraft Corner." She proposed teaching the elderly to make simple paper-cut window decorations and embroidered coasters, believing these activities were both festive and easy to learn. Her suggestions received unanimous approval. She diligently noted down the materials she needed to prepare and the schedule for the day.

events.name: Consult online craft advisors for advanced techniques.
events.description: In the evening, while embroidering the feather section of a new piece, Ma Xiulan encountered difficulties in depicting the glossiness and velvety texture of the feathers. She tagged Aunt Wu, who lives far away in Cangzhou, in the "Craft Sisters Group" and sent close-up photos of the feather section. Soon, Aunt Wu replied with several long voice messages, providing a detailed explanation of the needlework techniques for "silk-thread embroidery." She emphasized the importance of stitching along the direction of feather growth and shared tips on using extremely fine silk threads to create layers. Ma Xiulan listened to the messages several times and found them highly enlightening. This cross-regional exchange of craftsmanship made her feel that her world of hobbies was expanding.

events.name: An Evening Stroll in Serenity
events.description: In the evening, after completing household chores, Ma Xiulan took an approximately 30-minute walk around the quiet roads of the neighborhood. Breathing fresh air and organizing her thoughts, she used this time as a way to unwind after a busy day.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous and uncomfortable from an empty stomach, yet determined to complete the physical examination.

结束状态.心情: Complex yet predominantly positive. The completion of the medical check-up brought a sense of relief, participation in community activities instilled a feeling of value, and the improvement in craftsmanship skills was gratifying. There is now a readiness to tackle upcoming household tasks such as pickling vegetables. It feels as though not only is one caring for the family, but also more proactively managing one's health, social engagements, and personal hobbies.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the hospital and community center, with a 30-minute quiet walk in the evening.

2025-10.daily_overview: The morning was spent caring for my parents, attentively addressing minor changes in my father's health. In the afternoon, I went to the hospital to retrieve my own medical examination report and began to seriously address my health issues as advised by the doctor. It was a transitional day, shifting focus from caring for others to starting to pay attention to myself.

events.name: Adjusting Lunch for Father
events.description: While preparing lunch for her father, Ma Xiulan noticed he had a poor appetite and proactively inquired about it. Upon learning that he wanted something light, she immediately changed the original plan of stewed meat to steamed fish and vegetable porridge. She patiently removed every fishbone from the dish. Her mother, Li Xiuying, watched from the side, feeling both comforted and heartbroken by her daughter’s meticulous care. She stepped in to help with washing and preparing the vegetables, and the mother and daughter worked together seamlessly in the kitchen.

events.name: Receive and Interpret the Medical Examination Report
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan went to the community health service center to collect her annual physical examination report and asked Dr. Wang Jianguo, whom she was familiar with, to help interpret it. The report indicated that most of her indicators were within the normal range, but she showed a slight tendency toward anemia and cervical strain. Dr. Wang provided detailed suggestions on increasing nutritional intake, paying attention to daily posture, and maintaining regular routines, giving her a clear understanding of her long-term health for the first time.

events.name: Communicate Health Plans with Husband
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan informed her husband Ma Zhiqiang of the medical examination results and the doctor's advice to put his mind at ease. During dinner, she consciously increased the proportion of vegetables and lean meat in the meal and explained to her family that this was for the sake of everyone's health. She silently resolved to reduce the time spent bending over for long periods while doing handicrafts and began planning a more regular daily routine.

events.name: Evening routine family call
events.description: After finishing her evening tasks, Ma Xiulan called her mother as usual to check on her father's condition in the afternoon. Learning that he had rested well after lunch, she felt relieved. During the call, her mother also reminded her not to overwork herself, which warmed Ma Xiulan's heart.

events.name: Emotional Fluctuations Due to Medical Examination Results
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Ma Xiulan recalled the physical examination report, feeling a hint of worry and pressure, which caused her to stay up later than usual. She repeatedly pondered how to balance family care with personal health.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in the home at No. 156, Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, yet with a vague concern about one's own health.

结束状态.心情: With a slight concern for one's own health, but more importantly, a determination to initiate change.

state.今日运动: Daily care includes a walk of approximately 30 minutes, while the evening walk is canceled due to emotional factors.

2025-10.daily_overview: During the day, thorough preparations and purchases were made for the family's weekend pickling activity. In the evening, I attended the parent-teacher meeting for my second child, gaining a detailed understanding of their school performance. Through in-depth discussions with the teacher and other parents, I felt a strong sense of responsibility but also a clear sense of direction.

events.name: Procurement of Pickling Ingredients
events.description: After dropping off her child in the morning, Ma Xiulan headed to the vegetable market and grocery store with a shopping list. At the familiar stall run by Aunt Sun Guifang, she purchased fresh, plump cabbage and radishes, and Aunt Sun even gave her an extra handful of scallions. She then went to the spice shop to buy sufficient amounts of Sichuan peppercorns and coarse salt, mentally calculating the quantities she would need for the year.

events.name: Drying Vegetables and Cleaning Tools
events.description: After returning home, Ma Xiulan carefully washed the radishes and cabbages she had bought, then drained the water and spread them out in a well-ventilated area of the yard to dry. This step is crucial for ensuring the pickled vegetables retain their crisp texture. At the same time, she brought out several unused large jars and pots, scrubbed them clean inside and out, and placed them in the sun to dry.

events.name: Preparing to attend the parent-teacher conference
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arranged the household chores and dinner in advance, instructing her eldest son Ma Mingxuan to look after his younger sister after school. She changed into a neat and appropriate outfit, gathered her son's recent homework assignments and test papers, and jotted down a few questions she wanted to ask the teacher in a notebook. Then, she walked to the primary school where her second son, Ma Mingzhe, was studying.

events.name: Attend the parent-teacher conference and communicate with the teacher.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan arrived at the classroom on time for the parent-teacher meeting. After the homeroom teacher, Mr. Yang Jianguo, introduced the overall situation of the class, she proactively stayed behind to have a detailed conversation with him. Mr. Yang pointed out that Mingzhe was intelligent but easily distracted in class and careless with homework, hoping that parents would provide more supervision. Ma Xiulan took careful notes and humbly sought specific guidance methods.

events.name: Sharing Experiences in Communicating with Parents
events.description: After the meeting, Ma Xiulan chatted with several familiar parents outside the classroom for a while. They shared their children's situations and the difficulties encountered while tutoring at home, encouraged each other, and agreed to communicate more frequently in the future.

events.name: Returning Home to Convey Information and Formulate Plans
events.description: After the parent-teacher meeting, Ma Xiulan walked home. She conveyed the teacher's requests and suggestions to her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, who had returned late. After dinner, she had a gentle yet serious conversation with her second son, Ma Mingzhe, and together they established a new rule: he must complete his homework first after school each day, and his mother would check it.

events.name: Staying up late due to pressure from the parent-teacher meeting.
events.description: Thinking about her child's education at night, Ma Xiulan felt stressed, went to bed later than planned, and ate some snacks to relieve her emotions.

起始状态.心情: Methodical, yet somewhat anxious about children's education.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet fulfilled, with many thoughts on the child's education.

state.今日运动: Walk for about 40 minutes, engage in light household chores.

2025-10.daily_overview: A weekend centered on family heritage and the bonds of kinship. In the morning, I discussed the details of my father's care with my mother. In the afternoon, I brought her to my home to officially commence the annual autumn pickling activity, experiencing the transmission of skills and the warmth of family through shared labor.

events.name: Refining Father's Care Arrangements with Mother
events.description: During her morning visit to her parents, Ma Xiulan took out the small notebook where she recorded her father's daily health conditions and sat down with her mother, Li Xiuying, to discuss carefully. She suggested slightly postponing her father's afternoon walk until the sunlight became warmer. Upon hearing this, her mother nodded repeatedly, feeling that her daughter's consideration was thoughtful, and her own tense nerves relaxed a little.

events.name: Picking up mother to start pickling vegetables
events.description: After lunch, Ma Xiulan brought her mother to her own home. The mother and daughter began washing the vegetables that had been sun-dried the day before in the yard. As she worked, the mother shared the details to pay attention to when pickling vegetables this year, as well as the old family recipe passed down through generations—such as stir-frying Sichuan peppercorns until fragrant and adjusting the salt ratio based on the moisture content of the vegetables. Ma Xiulan listened attentively, asking questions from time to time.

events.name: Procuring ingredients for blood-nourishing recipes
events.description: During a break from preparing the pickled vegetables, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market. She specifically visited Aunt Sun Guifang's stall to buy fresh spinach, then went to the meat stall to purchase a small piece of pork liver, and also weighed some red dates. She was preparing to try the blood-nourishing recipe suggested by the doctor.

events.name: Ask Mother for the Secret of Pickling Vegetables
events.description: During the process of washing and initially preparing the vegetables, Ma Xiulan continuously sought advice from her mother, such as how to cut radishes into chunks to better absorb flavors and how to pickle cabbage to achieve a crispier texture. Her mother patiently demonstrated and explained, while the mother and daughter chatted about daily life as they worked, filling the courtyard with a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Going to bed early due to family activities.
events.description: Feeling fatigued in the evening, Ma Xiulan went to bed early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to a relaxing and enjoyable weekend with my mother.

结束状态.心情: Content and tranquil, immersed in the happiness of family traditions.

state.今日运动: Household chores, with prolonged standing and walking for approximately 2 hours.

2025-10.daily_overview: The pickling project has entered its core phase, with the whole family pitching in and enjoying the process together. Meanwhile, we tried out some new healthy recipes and prepared to volunteer for tomorrow's community Double Ninth Festival event. It was a fulfilling and meaningful Sunday.

events.name: The whole family works together to pickle vegetables.
events.description: In the morning, the pickling process entered its core stage. Ma Xiulan and her mother placed the prepared vegetables in batches into the thoroughly cleaned large vats, strictly adhering to the required proportions by adding stir-fried Sichuan peppercorns and coarse salt. Their eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, helped move the heavy vats, while the youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, watched curiously nearby, asking questions about everything. The three generations chatted about family matters as they worked, with laughter and cheerful conversation filling the air.

events.name: Try making blood-nourishing meals
events.description: During lunch, Ma Xiulan prepared spinach and pork liver soup and red date millet porridge using the newly purchased ingredients. She explained to her family that this meal was adjusted based on the physical examination results and would be beneficial for everyone's health. After tasting the dishes, her husband and child both found them delicious, which gave her confidence in sticking to a healthy diet.

events.name: Preparing for Community Activities
events.description: In the afternoon, after settling her mother down for a rest, Ma Xiulan found a clean community volunteer vest and checked the paper-cutting tools and colored paper needed for the Chongyang Festival tea party the next day. She practiced several auspicious paper-cutting patterns in advance to ensure a smooth performance the following day.

events.name: Finishing the Embroidery Work
events.description: In the evening, after her child had fallen asleep, Ma Xiulan took out the piece she had been embroidering for nearly twenty days and completed the final stitches and thread trimming. She carefully inspected it to ensure there were no flaws, preparing to have it framed the next day.

events.name: Staying up late due to preparation activities
events.description: To perfect the paper-cutting artwork, Ma Xiulan stayed up later than usual, feeling nervous yet excited.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, looking forward to completing the pickling and preparing for the community event.

结束状态.心情: Feeling a great sense of accomplishment, I look forward to tomorrow with both anticipation and a touch of nervousness.

state.今日运动: Household chores, primarily involving standing and arm movements for approximately 1.5 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with light rain in the evening.

2025-10.daily_overview: A new week begins with a multitude of tasks. During the day, I successfully handled my father's sudden health issue, demonstrating composure and caregiving skills. Simultaneously, I actively prepared for the family's winter needs by arranging the purchase of honeycomb briquettes. In the evening, my husband and I discussed household finances together, feeling the weight of responsibility on our shoulders, yet united as a couple.

events.name: Learn to use mobile payment
events.description: In the morning, with the help of her eldest son Ma Mingxuan, Ma Xiulan linked the family savings card to her WeChat account. Her son used her phone to top up a small amount for his learning software, demonstrating the QR code payment process step by step. Ma Xiulan learned attentively and firmly remembered the importance of protecting her payment password.

events.name: Stay Calm When Dealing with Father's Dizziness
events.description: At noon, Ma Xiulan received a call from her mother saying that her father felt dizzy after his nap. She immediately rushed over, first helped her father lie down, and skillfully measured his blood pressure, finding it to be on the high side. Instead of panicking, she promptly called Dr. Wang Jianguo from the community clinic for advice. Following Dr. Wang's remote guidance, she had her father rest quietly and monitored his condition. After an hour, the symptoms eased. Throughout the process, her mother watched, feeling completely reassured by her daughter's composed handling of the situation.

events.name: Inquire about and contact to purchase honeycomb briquettes.
events.description: On the way back from her parents' home, Ma Xiulan ran into her neighbor Wang Guilan and took the opportunity to ask where she could buy affordable and reliable honeycomb coal this year. Wang Guilan recommended a coal delivery worker she had been using for several years. Ma Xiulan noted down the phone number, and upon returning home, she contacted the person to inquire about the price, quality, and delivery arrangements.

events.name: Confirm participation in community activities
events.description: Ma Xiulan checked her phone and replied to the message from Zheng Xiuying, the community grid worker, confirming that she would attend the Double Ninth Festival tea party on time tomorrow and serve as a volunteer.

events.name: Discuss winter expenses with husband
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan discussed with her husband Ma Zhiqiang the purchase of honeycomb briquettes and the increased medical expenses for her father's recent treatment. Considering the tight family budget, the couple decided to reduce the amount of coal purchased this year compared to last year. Ma Zhiqiang entrusted Ma Xiulan with full responsibility for contacting suppliers and making the purchase. She felt trusted and was well aware of the need to manage the expenses carefully.

events.name: Neglecting evening walks due to busyness
events.description: After a full day of running around, Ma Xiulan felt fatigued and canceled her planned evening walk, opting to go to bed early to recover.

起始状态.心情: The week begins with a slight sense of busyness and pressure.

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat tired, but having dealt with a few important matters, I feel more at ease now.

state.今日运动: Multiple round trips on foot to parents' home, approximately one hour, light household chores.

date_attribute.holiday: Double Ninth Festival

2025-10.daily_overview: On the day of the Double Ninth Festival, Ma Xiulan, as a volunteer, was busy yet fulfilled at the community tea party. Her thoughtful service and paper-cutting skills won the affection of the elderly and praise from the community. More importantly, her efforts were witnessed and sincerely appreciated by her parents, which gave her an unprecedented sense of dual value recognition from both her family and the community.

events.name: Volunteer Service for Chongyang Festival Tea Party (Morning)
events.description: Ma Xiulan arrived at the community activity room early in the morning, put on her volunteer vest, and began her busy work. She warmly greeted the elderly as they arrived one after another, assisting those with mobility issues, serving tea and water, and distributing pastries. She was also in charge of the handicraft corner, patiently teaching several interested seniors how to make simple embroidered coasters, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Performing paper-cutting artistry
events.description: During the talent show segment, Ma Xiulan performed paper-cutting at the audience's request. She skillfully cut out auspicious patterns such as [Fu], [Shou], and [Pine and Crane], and presented her works to the elderly present, earning rounds of applause and admiration. Her parents sat in the audience, their faces beaming with proud smiles.

events.name: Conclusion of Activities and Recognition of Achievements
events.description: After the tea party concluded, Ma Xiulan and the other volunteers cleaned up the venue together. The community director and Zheng Xiuying came over specifically to express their gratitude and praise for her enthusiastic service and outstanding performance. Her parents also approached her, with her mother holding her hand and praising her capability, while her father, though speaking little, showed full approval in his eyes.

events.name: Accompanying Parents Home and Communicating with Them
events.description: Ma Xiulan accompanied her parents on the walk home. Along the way, her mother kept praising her for being able to hold her own in the community, and her father, for once, said, "You've worked hard today." This recognition from her closest family filled Ma Xiulan's heart with warmth and strength.

events.name: Share Joy with Neighbors
events.description: In the evening, I ran into my neighbor Wang Guilan at the doorstep, and we naturally started chatting about the day's activities. Wang Guilan praised her for her excellent paper-cutting skills, and Ma Xiulan also shared some interesting stories from the event and expressed her joy at receiving compliments.

events.name: Evening Review and Reflections
events.description: After finishing the household chores in the evening, Ma Xiulan recalled her experiences during the day. She felt that her efforts not only served the neighbors but also proved her worth in front of her parents. This sense of being needed and affirmed both in her family and the community filled her heart with a feeling of accomplishment and happiness.

events.name: First Encounter with Baduanjin
events.description: At the tea party, a group of elderly people were practicing Baduanjin together. Ma Xiulan watched from the side and thought the movements were gentle and well-suited for middle-aged and elderly individuals. A familiar elderly person enthusiastically taught her the first two simple moves. She followed along and mimicked the gestures a few times, feeling her body stretch comfortably.

起始状态.心情: Full of anticipation and a bit of nervousness, ready to embrace a busy and meaningful day.

结束状态.心情: Exceptionally satisfied, proud, and warm, with a significant enhancement in self-worth.

state.今日运动: Standing and moving around to provide services for approximately 4 hours throughout the day, and learning 2 forms of Baduanjin for about 10 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: Continuing the good mood from yesterday, I shared this positive energy with friends. Meanwhile, I carefully observed my parents' needs and proactively organized their seasonal clothing and bedding for them. Through these practical actions, I practiced filial piety, feeling grounded and at peace within.

events.name: Sharing Joy with Fellow Craft Enthusiasts
events.description: In the morning, while doing embroidery with her craftswoman friend Zhou Xiuqin, Ma Xiulan couldn't help but bring up what happened at yesterday's tea party, sharing how she had been praised and how her parents were delighted about it. Zhou Xiuqin was also happy for her, and the two chatted leisurely as they worked, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Assisting Neighbors in Caring for Family Members
events.description: Wang Guilan's husband was suffering from a cold with uncomfortable phlegm, so Aunt Wang went to Ma Xiulan's home to ask for guidance on the correct back-patting technique to help expel phlegm. In her own home, Ma Xiulan patiently demonstrated and explained the posture, strength, and precautions for back-patting, drawing on her experience of caring for her father. Wang Guilan repeatedly expressed her gratitude.

events.name: Organize winter clothing and bedding for parents
events.description: When visiting her parents in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan noticed that the weather had turned cooler, but her parents still had thin quilts on their beds. After asking, she learned that the thick bedding had been stored deep in the wardrobe and not yet taken out. Considering her father's sensitivity to cold and limited mobility, she immediately worked with her mother to retrieve heavy cotton quilts, down jackets, and other winter items, moving them to the yard to air out and beat clean.

events.name: Mending, Reinforcement, and Storage Organization
events.description: After retrieving the sun-dried, fluffy, and warm clothes, Ma Xiulan carefully inspected them, found needle and thread, and mended and reinforced any areas with slight fraying or loose buttons one by one. Then, she hung the thick clothes her parents often wore in the most accessible positions in the wardrobe, replacing the thin summer garments, and laid out the thickest cotton quilt for her father.

events.name: The father felt satisfied.
events.description: After tidying up, Ma Xiulan helped her father to the bedside and had him feel the newly laid soft and warm quilt. Her father smiled contentedly and said twice, "Good, good." Ma Xiulan reminded her parents to keep warm before leaving with peace of mind.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue.
events.description: Tidying up clothes consumed a great deal of physical energy, leaving Ma Xiulan feeling exhausted and causing her to go to bed earlier than usual.

起始状态.心情: Feeling cheerful, continuing the sense of satisfaction from yesterday.

结束状态.心情: Steady and peaceful, feeling at ease for having genuinely helped family and neighbors.

state.今日运动: Household chores, including hanging out and beating heavy clothing for approximately 2 hours, and light walking.

2025-10.daily_overview: Driven by health awareness, Ma Xiulan began to put wellness into practice. In the early morning, she started incorporating simple stretching exercises, actively planned blood-nourishing diets during the day, and sought guidance to learn the Eight-Section Brocade exercises, taking the first step toward systematically managing her own health.

events.name: Add neck stretches to your morning walk
events.description: After dropping her child off at school, Ma Xiulan deliberately slowed her pace on the familiar morning walking path she hadn’t visited in a while. Following Dr. Wang’s advice, she paused several times during her walk to slowly perform neck rotations and shoulder stretches. Though her movements were still somewhat unpracticed, she did feel some relief in her shoulders and neck afterward.

events.name: Plan and implement a blood-nourishing diet.
events.description: Following the doctor's advice, Ma Xiulan began consciously incorporating iron-rich foods into her daily diet. She consulted her mother and neighbor Wang Guilan, receiving many suggestions for home-style blood-nourishing recipes. For today's lunch, she prepared stir-fried spinach with pork liver and red date rice.

events.name: Actively Learn Baduanjin
events.description: Recalling the two forms of Baduanjin she learned at the tea party yesterday, Ma Xiulan tried practicing the movements again during breaks from her household chores. In the evening, she recommended this health exercise to her mother, suggesting that they could learn it together by following a video on their phones the next time they visited her father, as a shared activity to accompany him during his recovery. Her mother happily agreed.

events.name: Search for instructional videos in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan used her mobile phone to search online for [Complete Tutorial of Baduanjin] and bookmarked several detailed, slow-paced instructional videos suitable for beginners, planning to learn it together with her mother.

events.name: Staying up late due to learning new things
events.description: Fascinated by the study of Baduanjin videos, Ma Xiulan went to bed later than planned but felt fulfilled.

起始状态.心情: Pinghe decided to start paying attention to his health today.

结束状态.心情: There is a sense of freshness, and I feel satisfied with starting to actively manage my health.

state.今日运动: A 15-minute morning walk + approximately 5 minutes of neck stretching, and an attempt at 2 movements of Baduanjin for about 10 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a significant drop in temperature.

2025-10.daily_overview: As the weather turns colder and the pace of life quickens, days are spent busily securing winter supplies, preparing materials for community events, and crafting gifts for weekend gatherings. In the evenings, one transforms into a harmonizer of the family atmosphere, suggesting that everyone watch television together to enjoy quality family time, thus creating warmth amidst the busyness.

events.name: Schedule regular neck movements.
events.description: While doing hand embroidery, Ma Xiulan began consciously setting an "alarm clock," stopping every half hour to perform simple neck exercises taught by her doctor, alleviating the stiffness caused by prolonged periods of looking down.

events.name: Confirm the Purchase of Honeycomb Briquettes
events.description: Based on the information she had gathered the previous day, Ma Xiulan contacted the coal delivery worker again and ultimately confirmed the purchase of one ton of honeycomb briquettes, including the unit price and total cost (approximately 1,000 yuan). It was agreed that the delivery would be made on the morning of next Monday (October 28).

events.name: Prepare Community Event Materials
events.description: Ma Xiulan found some unused fabric and colored paper at home, then went to the supermarket of her neighbor Zhang Shufen to purchase glue and colored markers. She divided the materials into several sets to prepare for potential craft activities in future community events.

events.name: Preparing gifts for a class reunion
events.description: Ma Xiulan prepared gifts in advance for tomorrow's elementary school classmates' gathering. In her spare time, she meticulously embroidered a pair of cup coasters with a chrysanthemum pattern, featuring fine stitches and elegant color coordination. She hoped that this handmade gift would convey her heartfelt sentiments.

events.name: Family Evening Entertainment Time
events.description: To lift her father's spirits and ease her mother's long-term tension, Ma Xiulan suggested that the whole family watch her father's favorite opera program after dinner. She prepared melon seeds and tea, and the family gathered around the television. Her father watched with great enjoyment, occasionally humming along, while her mother also showed a long-missing, relaxed smile.

events.name: Initial Learning of Baduanjin with Mother
events.description: During the afternoon visit to her parents, Ma Xiulan played a teaching video of Baduanjin she had saved on her phone and tried to learn the first two movements together with her mother. They corrected each other's postures, and although their movements were not standard, both felt their bodies stretch and relaxed, agreeing to continue next time.

events.name: Eat more warm foods due to the cold weather.
events.description: As the temperature dropped, Ma Xiulan had some extra hot soup during dinner, leading to a slight increase in her weight.

起始状态.心情: Feeling the chill in the air, I realized it was time to hurry and take care of winter preparations.

结束状态.心情: Busy but orderly, seeing the family happy brings joy to oneself.

state.今日运动: Household chores, neck health exercises several times for about 5 minutes, learning the Eight-Section Brocade for about 10 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of trying new things and rekindling old friendships. During the day, I successfully experienced the convenience of mobile payment and finalized the delivery details for honeycomb briquettes. In the evening, at a gathering of elementary school classmates, the exquisite handmade gift I brought earned unanimous admiration and a renewed sense of identity, significantly boosting my social confidence.

events.name: First successful use of mobile payment.
events.description: In the morning, when Ma Xiulan went to Zhang Shufen's supermarket to buy soy sauce, she mustered the courage to try using mobile payment. With Zhang Shufen's encouragement and simple guidance, she successfully completed the QR code payment. Although the amount was small, this successful experience excited her greatly, allowing her to genuinely appreciate the convenience of cashless payment.

events.name: Final Confirmation with the Coal Delivery Worker
events.description: Ma Xiulan called the coal delivery worker again, finally confirming the exact delivery time for next Monday morning and inquiring about details such as whether cash needed to be prepared.

events.name: Elementary school classmates gather for a meal and receive recognition.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan went to the affordable restaurant in town to attend a primary school classmates' gathering. She presented the embroidered autumn chrysanthemum cup coaster she had made to the organizer, Zhao Xiaohong. During the meal, the coaster was passed around among the group, and the old classmates praised her exquisite craftsmanship and thoughtful attention to detail. [Skilled with her hands] and [good at managing a household] became the new labels they gave her. Some even joked that they would ask her to embroider wedding quilts for their children's future marriages. This allowed Ma Xiulan to gain an unprecedented sense of professional identity and accomplishment within her familiar social circle.

events.name: Schedule regular gatherings
events.description: As the gathering drew to a close, everyone was engaged in lively conversation and agreed to meet at least once every quarter to maintain this precious bond among old classmates. Ma Xiulan felt both delighted and excited about this arrangement.

events.name: Practicing Baduanjin Alone
events.description: After finishing part of the housework in the afternoon, she felt some stiffness in her shoulders and neck. She then went to the yard and followed a mobile video to practice the first four movements of Baduanjin in a relatively complete manner, which took about 20 minutes. She focused on the movements for regulating the spleen and stomach and relieving fatigue. After the practice, she felt both physically and mentally relaxed.

events.name: Due to slightly excessive eating and drinking at the gathering.
events.description: At the class reunion, Ma Xiulan enjoyed the food and ate more than usual.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling of the weekend brings some anticipation for the evening gathering.

结束状态.心情: Excitement, pride, and a significant boost in social confidence, immersed in the joy of being recognized by old friends.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for about 20 minutes, followed by light walking.

2025-10.daily_overview: She bravely took a bigger step and participated in a district-level handicraft competition. Although she only received a participation award, it broadened her horizons and gave her a new understanding of the value of craftsmanship. The support from her family made her feel even more warmth, planting a seed in her heart for further development.

events.name: Participate in the District Handicraft Competition
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan brought her framed embroidery work to the Jinghai District Cultural Center to participate in the [Folk Skilled Hands] competition. Following the procedure, she submitted her work and then, with a mix of nervousness and curiosity, visited the exquisite exhibits of other participants. The wide variety of works showcasing exquisite craftsmanship broadened her horizons. She also met her fellow craft enthusiast Zhou Xiuqin, and the two exchanged their feelings about participating in the competition.

events.name: Receiving Awards and Reflections
events.description: At the afternoon award ceremony, Ma Xiulan received the certificate for the [Outstanding Participation Award]. Although she missed out on higher honors, she did not feel much disappointment. Instead, she felt that she had seen a broader world, gained a more objective understanding of her craftsmanship, and was inspired to further improve her skills.

events.name: Family Celebrations and Sharing Joy
events.description: After returning home from the competition, Ma Xiulan showed her waiting family the award certificate and shared her experiences from the event. Her husband and children were all proud of her, and her youngest daughter even clamored to learn embroidery. In the evening, Ma Xiulan specially prepared two extra dishes, and the family celebrated this brave step she had taken in a simple yet heartwarming manner.

events.name: Weight loss due to high activity levels during the competition.
events.description: Standing and walking for extended periods throughout the day left Ma Xiulan feeling fatigued, though her weight decreased slightly due to the physical activity.

起始状态.心情: Feeling both nervous and expectant, ready to embrace the challenge.

结束状态.心情: Calmness mingled with joy and contemplation, horizons expanded, and new ideas for the future emerged.

state.今日运动: Approximately 3 hours of walking and standing for viewing, with light activity.

2025-10.daily_overview: After the excitement of the competition subsides, life returns to its daily rhythm. Sharing the experience with family and friends brings further encouragement, while also prompting serious consideration of turning craftsmanship into a source of income. The inspiration from the competition is thus transformed into concrete plans for action.

events.name: Sharing Competition Experiences with Childhood Friends
events.description: In the morning, while on the phone with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei, Ma Xiulan couldn't help but share her experiences and observations from yesterday's competition, her tone still filled with excitement and satisfaction. Liu Chunmei was also delighted for her and encouraged her to keep going.

events.name: Showcasing Works and Contemplating the Future
events.description: Ma Xiulan hung her award-winning embroidery piece in a prominent spot in her living room. She shared photos and reflections from the competition with her sisters and friends in the handicraft circle via WeChat. This experience boosted her confidence in her craft. While doing household chores in the evening, she began to ponder: Could she leverage this skill in the future to take on more complex custom orders and supplement the family income?

events.name: Due to catching a chill while taking an evening walk.
events.description: During her evening walk, Ma Xiulan was lightly dressed and caught a chill, resulting in mild nasal congestion. She was reminded to keep warm.

events.name: Health adjustments show effect.
events.description: By adhering to a blood-nourishing diet and practicing Baduanjin exercises, Ma Xiulan has experienced improved energy levels and stable weight.

起始状态.心情: Returning to the usual tranquility, yet a ripple from the competition still lingers in the heart.

结束状态.心情: Calmness carries with it a subtle plan and anticipation for the future.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores, a 20-minute evening walk but caught a chill, and 10 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with light rain in the afternoon.

2025-10.daily_overview: An important household winter supply—honeycomb briquettes—was delivered on schedule and properly stored, addressing the urgent need for heating during the winter and showcasing Ma Xiulan's practicality and competence as a homemaker. Meanwhile, healthy habits are being fine-tuned through consistent adherence.

events.name: Receive and stack honeycomb briquettes
events.description: In the morning, the coal delivery worker arrived punctually and delivered one ton of honeycomb briquettes to the doorstep. Ma Xiulan directed the process in the courtyard, watching as the delivery worker neatly and securely stacked the jet-black, gleaming coal blocks in a pre-cleared, sheltered corner of the yard to protect them from rain. She carefully counted the quantity, confirmed it was correct, and then paid the prepared sum of approximately 1,000 yuan in cash to the worker.

events.name: Covering coal piles for rain protection
events.description: After the coal deliveryman left, noticing the sky was turning overcast, Ma Xiulan immediately fetched a large piece of old plastic sheeting from the house. She carefully covered the entire coal pile tightly and secured the edges of the plastic with several bricks to prevent the impending rain or snow from dampening the coal. Seeing the coal pile properly arranged, she felt much more at ease.

events.name: Adhere to the practice of indoor Baduanjin
events.description: In the afternoon, as it began to rain outside, Ma Xiulan spread out a mat in the living room and followed a video on her phone to complete a full set of Baduanjin exercises. Although the space was a bit cramped, making it difficult to fully extend some movements, she persisted and finished the routine, maintaining the continuity of her practice. After working up a sweat, she felt thoroughly refreshed and invigorated.

events.name: Relief of nasal congestion symptoms
events.description: The nasal congestion caused by catching a cold has largely recovered after rest and keeping warm.

起始状态.心情: Keeping in mind the coal delivery scheduled for today, ready to get busy.

结束状态.心情: The sense of steadiness and ease after accomplishing a major task.

state.今日运动: Light tidying and organizing for approximately 30 minutes, followed by about 15 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

2025-10.daily_overview: A day filled with twists and opportunities. In the evening, a serious family meeting focused on the eldest son's future, reflecting the family's sense of responsibility and planning. On the same day, a sudden business collaboration opportunity emerged, opening up entirely new possibilities for her craftsmanship and potentially altering the course of her life.

events.name: Family meeting discussing the eldest son's further education.
events.description: In the evening, after their second son and youngest daughter had fallen asleep, Ma Xiulan, her husband Ma Zhiqiang, and their eldest son Ma Mingxuan held a formal family meeting in the living room. Ma Xiulan shared the information she had gathered about different high schools, while Ma Zhiqiang analyzed the family's financial situation and the possible level of support they could provide. They encouraged Ma Mingxuan to express his thoughts and concerns. The atmosphere of the meeting was serious yet candid, marking the first time the entire family had come together so concretely to face and plan for their child's future.

events.name: A Warm Moment After the Meeting
events.description: After the serious discussion, Ma Xiulan warmed a glass of milk for her husband and son. The family sat together, relaxing and chatting about some fun topics unrelated to studies, and the atmosphere returned to warmth. Ma Xiulan patted her son’s head, encouraging him not to feel too much pressure and assuring him that the whole family would support him together.

events.name: Business Opportunity Discovered in Chance Encounter with Community Grid Worker
events.description: In the afternoon near Jingwen Road, Ma Xiulan happened to meet Zheng Xiuying, a community grid worker. Sister Zheng warmly took her aside and mentioned that a newly opened homestay nearby was looking for local handicrafts for decoration. She thought Ma Xiulan's embroidery skills would be a perfect fit and offered to help make the connection.

events.name: Obtain contact information and deliberate
events.description: Zheng Xiuying immediately forwarded the homestay owner's business card to Ma Xiulan via WeChat and encouraged her to take the initiative to reach out and seize this opportunity. After adding the contact, Ma Xiulan felt her heart racing slightly. Upon returning home, she began to ponder seriously: if she were to collaborate with commercial clients, what adjustments should she make to her works in terms of theme, size, packaging, and pricing? This was entirely different from the gifts she had previously made for friends and family.

events.name: Evening walk canceled due to strong winds.
events.description: Due to the windy and cold weather, Ma Xiulan canceled her outdoor walk and instead performed neck stretches at home.

起始状态.心情: A regular Wednesday, preparing for the evening family meeting

结束状态.心情: Complex, it encompasses both profound contemplation about the son's future and the excitement and apprehension brought by the sudden business opportunity, making life feel full of new possibilities.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores, neck stretching for about 5 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: Actively seek external opinions and support for the two major new topics obtained yesterday (son's education advancement and business opportunities). Consult sisters for educational experience, discuss collaboration models with craft friends, and gradually clarify directions through communication and reflection.

events.name: Seeking Advice from Sisters on Further Education
events.description: Ma Xiulan contacted her elder sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing and her younger sister Ma Xiufen locally via phone and WeChat, respectively, to describe the situation of last night's family meeting and seek their opinions and suggestions regarding the children's further education. With her broad experience, the elder sister provided considerable information about the characteristics of different schools and future prospects, which significantly broadened Ma Xiulan's perspective.

events.name: Discussing Business Collaboration with Fellow Craftspeople
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan contacted her fellow craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat, informing her that she had secured a business opportunity to collaborate with a homestay. The two had a lengthy voice conversation, discussing which embroidery themes (such as local scenery of Jinghai or traditional folk patterns) would be more suitable for homestay decoration, what technical considerations to keep in mind, and how to roughly price their work. Zhou Xiuqin's support and advice gave Ma Xiulan great confidence.

events.name: Morning Walk and Neck Health Exercises
events.description: After dropping off her child in the morning, Ma Xiulan insists on taking a 15-minute morning walk and incorporates neck stretches along the way, feeling that her cervical strain has been alleviated.

events.name: Stayed up late due to consultation matters.
events.description: Ma Xiulan stayed up later than usual after conversing with relatives and friends into the night.

起始状态.心情: Waking with yesterday's thoughts, ready to seek counsel.

结束状态.心情: My thinking has become somewhat clearer than yesterday. With the support of family and friends, I feel more confident in facing new challenges.

state.今日运动: A 15-minute morning walk + 5 minutes of neck stretching, and daily household chores.

2025-10.daily_overview: The last day of October carries a sense of conclusion and the beginning of a new phase. It is a time to review and consolidate the progress made in health adjustments over the past half-month, while also taking the first concrete step toward potential business collaborations—organizing and preparing a portfolio. Life is quietly brewing new changes amidst its steady pace.

events.name: Exchanging Health Insights with Friends
events.description: While doing handicrafts with Zhou Xiuqin in the morning, Ma Xiulan talked about how she adjusted her diet and practiced Baduanjin based on her medical examination results. Zhou Xiuqin also shared her experience in dealing with back and waist pain. The two encouraged each other, feeling that at their age, it was time to take good care of their health.

events.name: Summarize the Effectiveness of Health Adjustments
events.description: Looking back over the past half month, Ma Xiulan felt that her occasional symptoms of dizziness and fatigue had lessened, and her neck was not as stiff as before. She decided to truly integrate these minor health adjustments—paying attention to iron-rich foods in her diet, regularly moving her neck, and consistently practicing the Eight-Section Brocade exercises—into her daily life, making them a habit.

events.name: Organize works for commercial negotiations
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan carefully organized her existing embroidery works at home, selecting several pieces that represented the finest craftsmanship and most suitable themes (such as "Autumn Scenery of the Calm Sea" and "Twin Lotus Flowers on One Stalk"). She used her phone to take clear and aesthetically pleasing photos of them under different lighting conditions, preparing these images for initial discussions with the homestay operators. Looking at these embroidery pieces, which embodied her dedication and effort, she felt an added sense of anticipation for the future.

events.name: Morning Walk and Baduanjin Practice
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took a 15-minute morning walk accompanied by neck stretches, followed by practicing the first four movements of Baduanjin for about 10 minutes at home, feeling physically and mentally refreshed.

起始状态.心情: The tranquility at the end of the month, carrying a review of recent changes

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and steadfast. Healthy habits are beginning to show results, and despite lingering uncertainties about new future possibilities (such as my son's school advancement and the commercialization of my craftsmanship), I am prepared to embrace and face them.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning walk + 5 minutes of neck stretching, 10 minutes of Baduanjin practice.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, Ma Xiulan did not have the habit of sleeping in. After sending off her eldest son to tutoring classes and her second son out to play, she began organizing the household finances, a routine task she performed at the beginning of each month. In the afternoon, she was busy responding to inquiries about her homestay and learning new skills from her cousin in Beijing, with her youngest daughter's company adding a touch of joy to the otherwise somewhat monotonous afternoon. After dinner, she discussed savings plans with her husband, carefully planning for the family's future.

events.name: Calculate October Household Savings
events.description: In the morning, in the living room of her home at 156 Jingwen Road, Ma Xiulan took out the family account book she had used for many years. Putting on her reading glasses, she carefully reviewed the household income and expenses for October, checking each entry one by one. When she saw that the actual savings amount was largely consistent with the plan set at the beginning of the month, and even slightly exceeded it due to her husband making a couple of extra trips with his vehicle, she contentedly drew a small checkmark at the end of the account book, feeling that the family's finances were gradually moving toward the track she had envisioned.

events.name: Communication on Homestay Handicraft Cooperation
events.description: During her lunch break, Ma Xiulan reconnected via WeChat with the manager of a homestay in Tianjin city she had previously contacted. Instead of directly sending pictures of her works, she first inquired in detail about the overall style of the homestay, its target clientele, and specific requirements for the material and size of decorations. After learning that the other party preferred elegant and culturally rich embroidery pieces, she carefully selected several photos of traditional patterned embroidery pieces from her phone album that met the requirements and sent them over, accompanied by brief descriptions, which made her appear more professional and attentive.

events.name: Learn to make an electronic photo album from my cousin.
events.description: In the afternoon, my niece (the daughter of my elder sister Li Xiuyun) who is studying at a university in Beijing came to visit. During casual conversation, she saw the photos from Ma Xiulan's phone taken during her trip to Beijing last year. The niece enthusiastically suggested creating a digital photo album with music as a keepsake and offered to teach her how to do it. Although Ma Xiulan felt somewhat intimidated by operating mobile software, the thought of better preserving family memories sparked her interest, and she eagerly followed along. Starting with downloading the software, the niece patiently guided her step by step on how to import photos and arrange them in a simple order. Ma Xiulan learned attentively, occasionally jotting down the steps with a pen on paper.

events.name: Accompanying my younger daughter and practicing Baduanjin.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan practiced the Baduanjin movements she had learned a few days earlier in her courtyard. Her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, curiously followed alongside, imitating her mother's movements with an adorable clumsiness. Ma Xiulan slowed down her motions as she practiced, explaining in terms her daughter could understand: "Look, doesn't this look like a little deer stretching?" Her daughter giggled and nodded. Under the setting sun, mother and daughter shared a joyful moment, and Ma Xiulan felt the soreness in her back and waist ease considerably.

events.name: Discussing the eldest son's education savings with the husband.
events.description: After dinner, the children returned to their respective rooms, and Ma Xiulan took out the account book, sitting down with her husband Ma Zhiqiang, who had just returned home. She pointed to the [Education Reserve Fund] column in the book, which was separately listed for their eldest son Ma Mingxuan, and carefully calculated with her husband the potential tuition and living expenses for the coming years. The two reached a consensus that the most urgent task at present was to strictly adhere to the monthly savings plan while also starting to gather information on several well-regarded high schools in the district to prepare for next year's school enrollment.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight pressure from planning tasks at the beginning of the month.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and somewhat accomplished, with a clear sense of direction in family financial and educational planning.

state.今日运动: Take a 15-minute morning walk and practice Baduanjin for 20 minutes in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to sunny, with comfortable temperatures.
