2025-11.daily_overview: After the emotional fluctuations and outings of the previous days, Ma Xiulan’s focus today shifted back indoors and to the tasks at hand. She continued to efficiently advance her handicraft orders while actively processing and reflecting on recent issues encountered in parent-child communication and self-awareness. She has also begun proactively seeking solutions and acquiring new knowledge.

events.name: Batch Stitching and Filling
events.description: Ma Xiulan matched the pre-embroidered cloth tiger components and quickly stitched them together using a sewing machine, forming individual [casings]. In the afternoon, she focused on carefully stuffing fluffy cotton into these [casings], shaping them as she filled, making the cloth tigers appear plump and adorable. Thanks to assembly line production, her efficiency today was remarkable—she completed the main bodies of four cloth tigers, and a row of [little tigers] suddenly filled her workbench.

events.name: The Traditional Comfort of a Mother
events.description: As usual, when Ma Xiulan called her mother, she brought up the topic of her white hair again. Her mother, Li Xiuying, comforted her with the wisdom of someone who has been through it all: "Silly girl, having white hair means you’re mature and care about the family. Don’t dwell on it too much. Just eat more black sesame seeds and walnuts, and go to bed earlier at night—that’s better than anything. Don’t follow those young people who stay up late all the time." Her mother’s simple health advice put Ma Xiulan’s mind at ease.

events.name: Learning parenting knowledge online
events.description: After the children had fallen asleep in the evening, Ma Xiulan took out her phone, searched for and followed several parenting public accounts on WeChat, and browsed anonymously in a local mothers' forum. She carefully read several articles on topics such as "How to Communicate with Teenagers" and "Nonviolent Communication." Some of the viewpoints greatly inspired her, such as "Criticize the behavior, not the person" and "Listen first, then advise." She also kept the phrase "Listen more, criticize less, and find common topics" in mind.

events.name: Summarize and Reflect in the Process of Labor
events.description: In the afternoon, she took some time to tend to the small vegetable garden on her balcony, watering the few remaining spinach plants that had survived the winter. Squatting by the garden, she reflected on the experiences of the past few days: the conflict with her son, her own introspection, the advice she sought from her mother and childhood friend, and the online learning she had undertaken. Gradually, she sorted out her thoughts and decided that in the future, she should not focus solely on her son's homework and mistakes but should try to understand his world better. She planned to find at least one opportunity each week, such as on weekend evenings, to have a dedicated conversation with her son, starting by asking him if he had conducted any interesting science experiments recently or watched any fun basketball videos.

events.name: Complete and finalize the last order.
events.description: She made the most of her time and completed the last scattered order on hand—a small sachet embroidered with the characters "平安" (peace). She then took stock of all the recently finished embroidery pieces, including the sachets and several cloth tigers, carefully inspected and organized them, wrapped each in clean, soft cloth, and prepared to contact Sister Zheng Xiuying for delivery the next day.

events.name: Plan daily moments of relaxation
events.description: Reflecting on the success of yesterday's outing with her mother, Ma Xiulan realized that creating a relaxed atmosphere is important for family members. She began to think about what else she could do in daily life to make her parents happy, aside from occasional outings. For example, on sunny afternoons, she could help her father downstairs to bask in the sun for half an hour; when spending time with her mother at home, she could play excerpts from her favorite Pingju opera; or, the next time she makes noodles with gravy, she could invite her parents over to share the meal. She pondered how to flexibly incorporate these small activities into her already packed schedule.

events.name: New Event: Staying Up Late Due to Studying
events.description: While studying parenting articles in the evening, Ma Xiulan became so engrossed that she inadvertently stayed up late, delaying her bedtime. Realizing how late it was, she quickly put down her phone, but her thoughts lingered on the content of the articles, which affected her ability to fall asleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on work tasks

结束状态.心情: Substantial and with a sense of direction. The craft work is progressing smoothly, and active learning and planning have begun in parent-child communication and self-regulation, with a more positive mindset.

state.今日运动: Tending to the small vegetable garden (light labor), household chores for 1 hour

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with winds subsiding and a slight daytime warming.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today, Ma Xiulan continued to switch between handling [historically unresolved] orders and exploring solutions to new issues (white hair). She began to put the communication skills she had learned into practice, and although these were only minor changes, they marked her proactive adjustments in parent-child relationships. At the same time, her thoughts on self-image management gradually shifted from mere ideas to concrete action plans.

events.name: Communicating with Childhood Friends about [Midlife Troubles]
events.description: During a break from her morning chores, Ma Xiulan chatted with Liu Chunmei on WeChat, bringing up the topic of gray hair again. Liu Chunmei immediately sent a series of voice messages: ["Oh, don’t even mention it! I started dyeing mine last year! When I was stocking shelves at the supermarket and bending down to look for items, customers could see a whole patch of white hair on the top of my head. So embarrassing!"] The two commiserated over the annoyances of aging and exchanged tips on "dietary therapy," such as black sesame paste and walnut porridge. This shared understanding among peers made Ma Xiulan feel that "everyone is in the same boat," easing her psychological burden considerably.

events.name: Contemplating the idea of dyeing hair and weighing the pros and cons.
events.description: After days of hesitation and discussions with family and friends, Ma Xiulan looked at the increasingly noticeable gray hair in the mirror and finally made up her mind: it was time to dye it. Her main goal was to appear more energetic when facing her family and neighbors. However, considering her financial situation, she immediately began calculating in her mind: going to a hair salon for a dye job would cost at least over a hundred yuan, while buying hair dye and doing it at home might only cost twenty or thirty yuan. She leaned toward the latter option but was unsure about which product would be best and whether it might damage her hair.

events.name: Try new communication methods
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan consciously practiced the [active listening] she had learned. Instead of immediately asking, "Have you finished your homework?" she first served her son a piece of meat and then casually inquired, "Mingxuan, how was your day at school? Anything interesting happen?" Ma Mingxuan glanced at her, seemingly a bit surprised, and replied briefly, "It was okay, nothing special." Ma Xiulan felt a little disappointed but refrained from pressing further. She simply nodded and said, "Oh, that's fine then. Eat more." She reminded herself that change takes time and patience.

events.name: Deliver part of the handcrafted products
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan packed the sorted embroidery works (scented sachets and several cloth tigers) into a clean cloth bag. She contacted the community grid worker Zheng Xiuying via WeChat and arranged to deliver the items to the community service center the next morning. Having settled this matter, she felt somewhat relieved.

events.name: Received a new community order.
events.description: Just as she was about to start making dinner, Sister Zheng Xiuying called, sounding very happy: "Xiulan, the community leaders saw the embroidery piece you submitted last time and said it was excellent! It just so happens that our community's New Year activities need a batch of prizes, and we'd like to order 30 embroidered pendants—simple ones with characters like '福' (fortune) or small animal patterns will do. I'll send you the dimensions via WeChat. Can you take on the order? We can discuss the price." Upon hearing this, Ma Xiulan felt both excited and nervous. Thirty pieces! This was a big order. She inquired in detail about the specific requirements, patterns, and delivery time, quickly calculating in her mind whether she could manage with her schedule and materials. Feeling that she could complete it if she worked diligently, she accepted the order. As soon as she hung up the phone, she felt a surge of new motivation.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle daily affairs

结束状态.心情: Excitement and pressure coexist. Having received the largest handicraft order to date, I am thrilled by the professional recognition, yet I also feel the pressure of the tight deadline. At the same time, I have developed more concrete ideas and made attempts in both self-image management and parent-child communication.

state.今日运动: Irregular physical exercise, 2 hours of daily household chores

2025-11.daily_overview: Today is a busy Friday. Ma Xiulan needs to prepare for the upcoming weekend family gathering while also making preliminary arrangements for a newly received major order. As she handles specific tasks, she begins gathering information to address a personal matter (hair dyeing), reflecting the practical and mundane routine of daily life.

events.name: Complete the finalization of last week's orders
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan conducted a final quality inspection of all the cloth tigers produced through this week's systematic manufacturing process. Like a quality inspector, she examined each one to ensure the stitches were secure, the stuffing was evenly distributed, and the embroidery was free of flaws, gently wiping the surfaces with a damp cloth. Finally, she tallied the quantity, arranged them neatly, and marked a check in today's box on the desk calendar, signifying the successful completion of this phase of the handicraft work. She was very satisfied with the results of this batch production.

events.name: Preparing for My Sister's Visit
events.description: Upon learning that her younger sister Ma Xiufen would be visiting on Saturday, Ma Xiulan made a special trip to the market in the afternoon to buy spare ribs and fresh vegetables that her sister enjoys. After returning home, she thoroughly cleaned the living room again, packed the children's toys into boxes, and laid a clean cover over the sofa. Her sister has a broad perspective and values cleanliness, so she hoped her sister would feel comfortable upon arrival.

events.name: Inquiring about hair dyeing information from neighbors
events.description: While buying soy sauce at the Shufen Convenience Store across the street, Ma Xiulan casually asked the shop owner, Zhang Shufen, "Sister Shufen, do you know which hair salon in our area offers affordable hair dyeing? Or if I buy hair dye myself, which brand is better and less damaging to the hair?" Zhang Shufen replied warmly, "Hair salons are all expensive! I dye my own hair and just buy the XX brand from the supermarket. It's on sale for around twenty yuan, the color looks natural, and I don’t feel it damages my hair much. If you want to buy it, I have it here." This information was very useful to Ma Xiulan, and she decided to consider it.

events.name: Seeking Cooking Advice from Mother
events.description: When calling her mother in the evening, besides discussing her father's condition, Ma Xiulan specifically asked, "Mom, the sauce in the noodles you make is especially fragrant, and the noodles are chewy. Are there any tricks?" Her mother carefully taught her over the phone, "Add a bit of salt and egg white when kneading the dough, and let it rest longer. The meat in the sauce should be stir-fried until the oil comes out, and the daylily flowers and wood ear mushrooms need to be soaked thoroughly in advance..." Ma Xiulan listened attentively, feeling that these traditional skills were filled with the wisdom of life.

events.name: Procurement of materials and design of patterns for new orders
events.description: Having received a large order, Ma Xiulan dared not delay. That evening, based on the simple requirements sent by the community (the character "[福]" and small animals), she combined traditional patterns and began sketching design drafts on the back of an old calendar at home. After drawing several styles, she started taking stock of her embroidery thread and fabric inventory at home, only to find that the red embroidery thread and cotton fabric for the backing were insufficient. She planned to go to the fabric store in town the next day to make the purchase and, while at it, also buy the hair dye recommended by Zhang Shufen.

起始状态.心情: Start the day in an organized manner, preparing to handle multiple wrap-up and preparatory tasks.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly. Completed the old tasks, prepared for the new work and family gatherings, and made a clearer decision on the hair dyeing issue.

state.今日运动: Household chores for 2 hours, light craftwork.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, the weather is nice over the weekend.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday is a day for family and affection. My sister's visit brought a relaxed time for sisterly bonding and practical advice on [how to become more beautiful], effectively alleviating Ma Xiulan's anxiety caused by her white hair. At the same time, she also began trying simple exercise methods she learned to relieve the physical discomfort brought on by prolonged sitting and manual work, reflecting her initial attention to her own health.

events.name: Sisters' Tea Party
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiufen came over from the Binhai New Area. The two sisters sat in the tidy living room, brewed a pot of jasmine tea, and chatted while drinking. The conversation ranged from the children's academic performance and their parents' health to recent events in the community, such as whose child had gotten married and which shopping mall was offering discounts. The atmosphere was relaxed and lively.

events.name: Expressing the Troubles of Gray Hair
events.description: As the conversation reached a lively point, Ma Xiulan lifted the hair by her ear to show her sister: "Look, there are more and more white hairs. I'm really getting old." Her tone carried a hint of self-mockery and helplessness.

events.name: The Sister's Frank Suggestion
events.description: Upon seeing this, Ma Xiufen immediately said, "Sis, it's no big deal! I have gray hair too, and I just dye it! Going to a salon is expensive, but buying hair dye and doing it at home is convenient and saves money. I'll go online and help you check out which colors look natural and don't damage your hair, then send you the link!" Speaking quickly and with a positive attitude, her younger sister's words quickly lightened Ma Xiulan's despondent mood, making her feel that it wasn't such a big issue after all.

events.name: Homemade Lunch and Continued Communication
events.description: At noon, Ma Xiulan cooked a meal, preparing braised pork ribs with the ribs bought yesterday and stir-frying two vegetable dishes. The two sisters continued their conversation while eating. Ma Xiufen also shared some of her personal tips on skincare and clothing coordination. Although Ma Xiulan felt some of them were too [trendy] for her own use, she still found them interesting to listen to.

events.name: Try Baduanjin to relieve soreness
events.description: While her younger sister was taking an afternoon nap, Ma Xiulan felt some stiffness in her shoulders from days of embroidery work. She recalled seeing an introduction to Baduanjin at a community health lecture, which was said to help relax muscles and improve circulation. She opened her phone, found a simple instructional video, and followed along on the balcony, mimicking a few movements such as "Lifting the Sky to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Drawing the Bow to Shoot the Hawk," which are stretches for the shoulders and neck. Although her movements were not precise, after slowly completing a set, she felt her shoulders indeed become more relaxed.

events.name: Sisters' Farewell
events.description: In the evening, the younger sister was about to leave. As she was about to step out, Ma Xiufen reminded her once more: "Leave the hair dye matter to me, and wait for my news!" Ma Xiulan accompanied her sister to the bus stop and watched the bus drive away, feeling a warm glow in her heart. It truly is wonderful to have a sister.

events.name: Organize the workspace for new orders.
events.description: In the evening, after the children had returned to their rooms, Ma Xiulan carefully cleared the coffee table in the living room and spread a clean old bedsheet over it as a work mat. She placed the completed design sketches and the list of materials needed for replenishment beside her, creating a dedicated [workstation]. She was ready to focus all her efforts starting the next day on completing the 30 pendant orders.

events.name: New event: Slight increase in food intake due to social gatherings
events.description: During a gathering with her sisters, Ma Xiulan consumed more snacks and dishes than usual, resulting in a slightly higher caloric intake that affected her weight.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, awaiting my sister's visit.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and steady. The gathering with my sisters alleviated anxiety and provided concrete assistance; physical discomfort has been preliminarily relieved; preparations have been made for next week's work.

state.今日运动: Try learning Baduanjin (about 15 minutes), focusing on stretching movements, and engage in light household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, gentle breeze, warm winter sun.

2025-11.daily_overview: Another Sunday, with a relatively relaxed pace of life. The couple practiced their [Breakfast Agreement] to strengthen their bond; a gathering with crafty friends brought relaxation and inspiration; meanwhile, after a week of trial, the first formal review and fine-tuning of the family phone rules were conducted, marking a more rational phase in household management. The production of a new large order also quietly began.

events.name: Couple's Sunday Breakfast Date
events.description: Ma Zhiqiang was not driving today. The couple left their children at home for breakfast and went together to a breakfast stall on another street that was said to serve authentic tofu pudding. They sat opposite each other at a small table, with Ma Xiulan ordering tofu pudding and fried dough sticks, while Ma Zhiqiang opted for wonton soup. They chatted about the highway traffic jam Ma Zhiqiang encountered during his driving trip last week, while Ma Xiulan shared updates about new community orders and amusing anecdotes from her sister's visit. With no children around and no household chores to interrupt, this brief moment of solitude left both feeling quite relaxed. Ma Zhiqiang even suggested that next time, they could try a more distant but reputedly excellent old restaurant known for its sweet and sour pork.

events.name: A Small Gathering with Craftsmanship Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan invited her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin to her home. Having worked intensively for several consecutive days, she felt somewhat fatigued, and chatting with a friend while working was the best way to unwind. Zhou Xiuqin brought some new embroidery pattern books, and the two exchanged techniques on stitching methods. Ma Xiulan also [vented] about the pressure of taking on a large order. As someone with experience, Zhou Xiuqin encouraged her and shared some tips for improving efficiency.

events.name: Received a hair dye recommendation from my younger sister.
events.description: In the middle of the gathering, Ma Xiulan's phone chimed with a notification. It was a message from her younger sister, containing links to several home hair dye products along with detailed user reviews. The message also included a note: [Sis, I think this chestnut brown shade would suit you—it brightens your complexion and looks natural. Take a look.] A warm feeling spread through Ma Xiulan's heart, and she replied with a word of thanks.

events.name: Weekly Review of Family Rules
events.description: During dinner, Ma Zhiqiang took the initiative to preside over a [family meeting] to summarize the trial implementation of the mobile phone rules over the past week. Ma Mingxuan expressed that the rules were acceptable, as concentrating phone usage on weekends actually helped him focus better on homework. Ma Xiulan also noted that family arguments over this issue had decreased significantly, though she remained somewhat concerned that her son might still use the phone secretly. Ma Zhiqiang acknowledged his son’s compliance and understood his wife’s worries. Finally, the three negotiated a slight adjustment to the original rule of [two consecutive hours], changing it to [two separate one-hour sessions, but only after completing all homework and household chores], which offered greater flexibility. This small adjustment made Ma Mingxuan feel that his opinion was respected, and he became more willing to abide by the rules.

events.name: Gaining inspiration for parent-child communication from friends
events.description: When chatting with Zhou Xiuqin in the afternoon, the conversation naturally turned to children. Zhou Xiuqin’s son is already in college, and she recalled that during his teenage years, he also didn’t like to talk much. [Later, I realized that forcing him to chat was useless, so I found things to do with him. He liked assembling models, so I sat beside him and handed him tools, occasionally asking, "What does this part do?" Gradually, he became willing to talk. Isn’t your Mingxuan interested in science? You could try doing a small experiment with him, even something as simple as growing bean sprouts.] This suggestion made Ma Xiulan’s eyes light up, and she felt it was worth a try.

events.name: Begin production of the first batch of order pendants.
events.description: In the evening, after her family members had each retired for the night, Ma Xiulan sat down at her [workbench] and officially began working on the community orders. She first selected the fabric for five "[Fu]" character pendants, carefully traced the outlines onto the fabric using an erasable pen while referring to the patterns, and then started embroidering. Her goal for the day was to complete the basic embroidery for these five pieces. Under the lamplight, she worked stitch by stitch with focused concentration.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and comfortable, enjoy your Sunday morning.

结束状态.心情: Content and at peace. The marital relationship is being maintained, parent-child dynamics have been optimized, inspiration has been drawn from friends, and a new job has also started smoothly.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the breakfast stall (approximately 20 minutes), performing light household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast with light rain, damp and chilly weather.

2025-11.daily_overview: The rainy weather kept us indoors for most of the day. Ma Xiulan focused her main energy on completing handmade craft orders, while her plan to dye her hair was also put on the agenda, entering the specific stage of family coordination. She also made a special effort to secure her mother's support for the couple's [breakfast ritual], ensuring that this small romantic gesture received the family's recognition and support.

events.name: Plan weekend hair dyeing arrangements
events.description: Gazing at the drizzling rain outside the window, Ma Xiulan decided to schedule her hair dyeing for the upcoming weekend. She informed her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, in advance: "I might dye my hair this Sunday afternoon. The smell will be strong then, so you and the kids should just watch TV in the living room and avoid coming into the bathroom." Ma Zhiqiang nodded in agreement.

events.name: Cozy Family Craft Time
events.description: In the evening, taking advantage of the whole family being together, Ma Xiulan wanted to create a relaxed atmosphere. She took out some simple cross-stitch materials and taught her youngest daughter, Ma Yuxin, to stitch the simplest sunflower, while her two sons drew pictures nearby. Although Ma Mingxuan drew absentmindedly and Ma Mingzhe spilled paint on the table, the family sat together, each engaged in their own activities, occasionally chatting and laughing, creating a very warm atmosphere.

events.name: Seeking Mother's Support for the [Breakfast Appointment]
events.description: To ensure their Sunday breakfast date next month (December) could proceed as planned, Ma Xiulan made time to visit her mother today. Feeling a little embarrassed but very earnest, she said to her mother: "Mom, Zhiqiang and I have discussed it. We've decided that from now on, we'll find one Sunday morning each month to go out for breakfast, just the two of us—to get some fresh air and have a proper chat. It'll probably be about an hour. Next month... would it be too much trouble to ask you to come over in the morning to look after the kids? We'll be back as soon as possible." Upon hearing this, her mother, Li Xiuying, was not at all bothered; in fact, she was delighted: "That's wonderful! A couple should have some time for themselves. No problem at all—just let me know in advance, and I'll come over early!" With her mother's support, the last bit of hesitation in Ma Xiulan's heart vanished. She felt this small ritual had been imbued with a more formal significance.

events.name: Continue producing the second batch of pendants.
events.description: Today's main task remained focused on orders. Drawing from the experience of the first batch, Ma Xiulan's efficiency improved. Not only did she complete the embroidery for the second batch of five pendants, but she also found time to cut out the outlines of several pieces and performed preliminary stitching, preparing them for tomorrow's filling work. The sound of rain outside the window served as the background music for her focused efforts.

events.name: New event: Went to bed early due to physical discomfort caused by damp and cold weather.
events.description: Due to the damp and chilly weather, Ma Xiulan felt some joint pain and decided to rest early to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Calm, planning to focus on indoor work on rainy days.

结束状态.心情: Steady and well-organized. Work progresses according to plan, and family matters (hair dyeing, breakfast arrangements) are properly managed with the support of family members.

state.今日运动: Three hours of indoor household chores and handicraft work, with no outdoor activities.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a fruitful day, marked by both pressure and challenges. Ma Xiulan successfully delivered a major community order, earning significant professional recognition and financial rewards. However, on the path of practicing parent-child communication, she encountered a new test—her son staying up late playing with his phone—which prompted deeper collaborative communication with her husband. She has also begun sharing the benefits of practicing Baduanjin with others.

events.name: Attempt to initiate a new topic
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan took Ma Mingxuan to school, with a biting cold wind blowing along the way. Unlike before, she did not remind him to "listen attentively in class." Instead, rubbing her hands together, she said, "It's really cold today. Do you still go out to play basketball during breaks?" Ma Mingxuan, hunching his shoulders, replied, "It's too cold; we don't play much." The conversation remained brief, but Ma Xiulan felt that at least the topic had shifted from "studying" to "his life."

events.name: Complete and check all order pendants
events.description: After several consecutive days of intensive work, all 30 handmade ornaments were completed! Standing before the workstation in the living room, Ma Xiulan arranged the 30 ornaments in a row as if performing a solemn ceremony, conducting a final inspection on each one. She checked whether the embroidery threads were secure, the patterns were clear and full, the stuffing was evenly distributed, and the edges were neat. After confirming that each piece was flawless, she carefully placed them into clean plastic bags one by one and neatly arranged them in an old cardboard box. Looking at these creations that embodied her hard work and dedication, she let out a long sigh of relief, filled with a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Successfully delivered the order and received praise
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan personally delivered the cardboard box to the community service center. Both the grid worker Zheng Xiuying and the community director were there. They opened the box to inspect the contents and immediately praised her effusively: "Xiulan, your craftsmanship is truly impeccable! So fast and so well done!" "Look at this embroidered character 'Fu'—how festive! The prizes for this event are now of a higher standard!" Hearing such praise in person, Ma Xiulan felt a bit embarrassed, but her heart was as sweet as if she had drunk honey. The community director promptly settled the 500-yuan order payment with her on the spot. This was the largest "formal" income she had ever earned through her craftsmanship, and it held extraordinary significance.

events.name: Discovering Son's Violation and Self-Restraint
events.description: At half past ten in the evening, Ma Xiulan got up during the night and noticed a sliver of light seeping from under the door of her eldest son’s room. She gently pushed the door open a crack and saw that Ma Mingxuan was indeed still playing with his phone under the covers. A surge of anger immediately rose within her, and she nearly rushed in to confiscate the phone. But just as she raised her hand, she remembered the phrase "address emotions first" and forced herself to stop. She closed the door, returned to her own room, feeling both furious and disappointed, but decided not to say anything that night and to find an opportunity to talk about it the next day.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with your husband to seek collaboration
events.description: Lying in bed, Ma Xiulan told her husband Ma Zhiqiang about what she had seen that evening and the distress in her heart. [I held back my anger, but if things continue like this, won’t the rules we set become meaningless? Shouldn’t we be on the same page? You can’t always play the good cop while I’m the bad cop.] Hearing this, Ma Zhiqiang also realized the problem. After thinking for a moment, he said, [I’ll talk to him tomorrow. Once rules are set, they must be enforced. From now on, whichever of us notices such matters should handle them, but we should both maintain a calm attitude, focusing on reasoning rather than just scolding. I’ll be more mindful.] This conversation made Ma Xiulan feel as though she had found an ally, and her mind was put at ease.

events.name: Sharing Insights on Healthy Exercise
events.description: In the afternoon, I ran into my neighbor Wang Guilan in the residential area, and we stood downstairs chatting for a while. Ma Xiulan mentioned that she had recently started following online videos to practice Baduanjin. [After a few days of practice, she felt her shoulders and neck were less stiff and quite comfortable. "Sister Wang, if you have time, you could also give it a try. The movements are slow and not tiring."] Wang Guilan showed great interest upon hearing this and said she would ask her daughter to help find some videos later. Ma Xiulan felt good about sharing something beneficial with others.

events.name: New event: Staying up late due to excitement over order delivery
events.description: After delivering the order, Ma Xiulan felt excited. She celebrated with her family in the evening and made plans for the future, which led to a later bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Focused and driven, ready to complete and deliver important orders.

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement intertwines with a sense of challenge. The successful delivery of orders brought significant professional success, greatly boosting career confidence. However, new challenges emerged in parenting education. Through forming an alliance with her husband, she found effective solutions, shifting her mindset from solitary anxiety to collaborative problem-solving.

state.今日运动: Walk to the community service center to deliver goods (approximately 20 minutes), and practice Baduanjin for about 15 minutes in the evening.

2025-11.daily_overview: After completing the order, Ma Xiulan had a brief [window of free time] today. She handled some daily chores while continuing to advance her [image management plan] and [parent-child communication improvement plan]. Faced with newly emerging gray hairs, she decided to adopt periodic maintenance; in response to her son’s rule-breaking behavior, she attempted a more rational communication approach.

events.name: Decided to proceed with periodic hair dye maintenance.
events.description: While combing her hair in the morning, Ma Xiulan noticed a short section of white hair growing at the roots, which contrasted sharply with the dyed black hair and looked somewhat conspicuous. She realized that dyeing her hair was not a one-time solution and that she would need to touch it up regularly in the future. Considering both cost-effectiveness and convenience, she decided to make using home hair dye a part of her periodic self-care routine. She planned to ask her younger sister if she had any other recommendations or try the one available at Zhang Shufen’s supermarket.

events.name: Engage in Rational Communication with Your Son
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Mingxuan returned home from school, looking quite cheerful. Seizing the opportunity, Ma Xiulan spoke to him calmly in the living room: "Mingxuan, last night when I got up, I saw the light in your room was still on at half past ten. Were you playing with your phone?" Ma Mingxuan stiffened and remained silent. Ma Xiulan continued, "I didn’t say anything at the time because I wanted us both to calm down. The rules we set are for your own good. Getting enough sleep ensures you have energy for classes during the day, and that’s also about taking responsibility for yourself. You’re already a big kid, and Mom believes you can manage yourself. Next time, when it’s time, put it down on your own, okay?" Instead of yelling, she reasoned with him and expressed her trust. Ma Mingxuan lowered his head and, after a moment, mumbled, "Mm-hmm." Though unsure of the outcome, Ma Xiulan felt this conversation was a significant improvement over their previous arguments.

events.name: New event: Temporary participation in community health lecture
events.description: In the afternoon, the community announced a free health lecture. Ma Xiulan decided to attend to learn more about winter health care, exchange ideas with neighbors, and expand her social connections.

起始状态.心情: Much more relaxed, with pressure released after the completion of a major order.

结束状态.心情: Calm and with a slight sense of progress. More rational and long-term strategies have been adopted in both self-management (hair dyeing) and parent-child communication, and there is a growing feeling of increased control over one's own life.

state.今日运动: Daily household chores, attending a community health lecture with round-trip walking (approximately 30 minutes)

2025-11.daily_overview: Today's life revolves around concrete matters. Ma Xiulan turned her idea of dyeing her hair into action by purchasing the necessary materials. At the same time, she is also making potential preparations for the possible arrival of a new job (or a new round of orders). Life is woven together by these specific, small tasks.

events.name: Consult with my younger sister and purchase hair dye.
events.description: Ma Xiulan contacted her younger sister Ma Xiufen via WeChat video to reconfirm the brand and color of the hair dye. Her sister strongly recommended chestnut brown and provided video guidance on how to section the hair for easier and more even application. After ending the video call, Ma Xiulan went to the Shufen Convenience Store diagonally across the street that afternoon. She found the brand recommended by Zhang Shufen, which happened to have chestnut brown available for less than twenty-five yuan. She decisively bought a box.

events.name: Address the backlog of household chores and take a brief rest.
events.description: Having just completed a major order, Ma Xiulan gave herself a short break. Today, she mainly dealt with accumulated household chores, such as thoroughly cleaning the kitchen and organizing seasonal clothing. She also took advantage of her free time to revisit that embroidery pattern book, where she spotted several designs suitable for making coasters. She thought she might make a few to give to relatives and friends or to prepare some new styles for potential future orders.

events.name: New event: Went to bed early due to fatigue from household chores
events.description: After handling a large amount of household chores, Ma Xiulan felt fatigued and decided to rest early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Relax and handle daily affairs.

结束状态.心情: Steady. Hair dye preparations are complete, household chores are temporarily concluded, and both body and mind have found rest.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today, Ma Xiulan completed a significant [self-transformation]. Although her first experience dyeing her hair at home was a bit hectic, the result left her satisfied. The new look not only enhanced her overall demeanor but also became a fresh topic of conversation with family and friends. Meanwhile, she continues to make small, ongoing efforts to improve parent-child communication.

events.name: First Time Dyeing My Own Hair
events.description: While her husband was home in the afternoon and could look after the child, Ma Xiulan began her hair dyeing project. She laid old newspapers in the bathroom, put on an old coat she seldom wore, and clumsily put on plastic gloves while following the instructions, mixing the hair dye and developer. Then, facing the mirror, she carefully applied the mixture to her hair layer by layer with a comb, afraid of missing a single gray strand. The process was tense and focused, and she accidentally smudged a bit on her forehead. After applying it evenly, she wrapped her hair in an old towel and started the timer to wait. During the wait, she cleaned the sink, feeling both anticipation and a bit of worry about the result.

events.name: Hair dyeing succeeded, receiving family feedback.
events.description: When the time was up, she carefully rinsed her hair with warm water until the water ran clear, then applied the included conditioner. After blow-drying her hair, she eagerly looked in the mirror: most of the gray hairs were covered, and the chestnut brown color appeared natural and soft under the light, making her look noticeably more vibrant. She walked out of the bathroom, and her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, glanced at her and said, "Hmm, you dyed it? Looks good." The children also gathered around, with the youngest daughter clapping her hands and saying, "Mom’s hair looks pretty!" The second son added, "Mom, you look younger!" Though they were just a few simple words, they made Ma Xiulan feel delighted inside, thinking that the trouble was worth it.

events.name: Share and exchange with friends
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan sent a selfie of her newly dyed hair to her younger sister Ma Xiufen via WeChat, thanking her for the recommendation. She also arranged to meet with her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin the next day, so she could show her the results. She imagined what her friends might say and felt quite pleased.

events.name: Continue practicing [Effortless Communication]
events.description: After dinner, while washing dishes, Ma Xiulan chatted with Ma Mingxuan, who was drinking water: "When I went to the market today, I heard from Auntie Sun, the vegetable seller, that the young couple next door to her got into a fight over the TV remote control and ended up breaking it. Isn't that funny?" Hearing this, Ma Mingxuan seemed to curl the corner of his mouth slightly. Seizing the opportunity, Ma Xiulan asked, "Do your classmates have any similar bizarre stories?" Ma Mingxuan thought for a moment and said, "Not in our class, but I heard that someone in Class XX..." Although he still spoke briefly, he finally started to open up. Ma Xiulan felt secretly pleased, thinking that this method of "sharing interesting news and then asking questions" seemed somewhat effective.

events.name: Visiting parents and showing off a new hairstyle
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan took the children to her parents' home. As soon as her mother, Li Xiuying, saw her, she said, "Did you dye your hair? This color looks good, it brightens your complexion!" Her father also squinted and looked, then nodded in approval. Ma Xiulan prepared noodles with gravy using a newly learned technique, and the whole family enjoyed the meal happily. She also took the opportunity to fix the slightly loose arm of her father's reading glasses. Watching her parents' smiles and the children's playful noise, she felt that this was the happiest moment.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous and expectant, ready to dye the hair.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and confident. Successfully completed a positive management of self-image, receiving positive feedback from family; minor yet positive progress was made in parent-child communication; the family reunion was warm and harmonious.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from parents' home (approximately 25 minutes), performing light household chores.

2025-11.daily_overview: The weekend pace slowed down once again. After nearly half a month of trial and fine-tuning, the family phone rules were officially established as long-term household regulations, marking a stable step forward for the family in addressing adolescent education issues. Ma Xiulan also continued to make use of fragmented time to prepare for possible scattered orders.

events.name: Family Rules Officially Established
events.description: During Saturday dinner, Ma Zhiqiang once again presided over the family meeting to finalize the summary of the mobile phone usage rules. Ma Mingxuan acknowledged that since the implementation of the rules, his efficiency in completing homework on weekends had improved, and conflicts had decreased. Ma Xiulan also noted that although there had been occasional setbacks, the overall trend was positive. The entire family unanimously agreed to formalize the currently adjusted rules—allowing split free time on weekends after completing homework and household chores—as a long-term family norm. They also agreed to make minor adjustments each semester based on actual circumstances. The consensus reached brought a sense of stability to every family member, as they now had clear guidelines to follow.

events.name: Create new small embroidery pieces
events.description: In the afternoon, the children were playing in the yard. Ma Xiulan sat by the window, took out the previously drawn coaster pattern, and began to embroider it. She chose bright colors and worked on a simple floral design. There was no pressure to rush this task—it was purely for interest and relaxation, while also serving as practice and a way to build up a collection of works.

events.name: New Event: Offline Exchange with Fellow Craft Enthusiasts
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhou Xiuqin paid a visit. The two engaged in handicrafts together, during which Ma Xiulan demonstrated the results of hair dyeing, exchanged tips on winter maintenance, and planned to collaborate on a new project.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the weekend morning.

结束状态.心情: Stable and content. Important family rules have been established, ushering in a new phase of household governance; individuals have leisure to engage in purely interest-driven handicrafts, feeling relaxed.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, daily household chores and childcare, light manual work in handicrafts.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the last day of November, Ma Xiulan spent her time reflecting on the past and looking ahead to the future. She was delighted to see that she had developed new healthy habits over the course of the month, and the recognition she received for her craftsmanship further strengthened her confidence in balancing family and her [micro-enterprise]. Though life may be ordinary, every solid step of change fills her with a sense of fulfillment and strength.

events.name: Consolidate Baduanjin as a Health Habit
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan stood on the balcony facing the morning light and completed a full set of Baduanjin exercises. Although her movements were not yet particularly smooth or precise, she had already memorized most of the key points. After finishing the practice, her body felt slightly warm, and she experienced a sense of overall comfort. Reflecting on her persistence over the past month, she deeply felt that this small change had shifted her mindset from merely resting when she [felt tired] to proactively maintaining her health. She decided to make this simple and practical exercise a long-term habit, as natural as eating and sleeping.

events.name: Reflect on and affirm one's own approach to balance
events.description: The community activity coordinator later made a special call to thank Ma Xiulan once again for her embroidery work, saying that the residents who participated in the event all loved it. After hanging up the phone, Ma Xiulan felt genuine relief and satisfaction. She reflected on the past month: completing an important community order, properly resolving family conflicts, taking care of her parents, and starting her own health management. She felt that her decision to politely decline the fixed volunteer position and instead focus on her family and existing orders was the right one. This allowed her to find a balance, at least for now, that best suited her between the roles of [homemaker] and [craftsperson]. She felt confident about the future, believing she could both take good care of her family and gain a sense of accomplishment and some income through her craft.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to embrace the new day and end-of-month reflections.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Full, confident, and hopeful. Looking back on November, visible progress and balance have been achieved in health, family relationships, and personal career, with positive expectations for the future.

state.今日运动: Practice Baduanjin for approximately 20 minutes, with intermittent manual activities.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new month began amidst the crisp chill of winter. Ma Xiulan's daily rhythm shifted between household responsibilities and personal pursuits. In the morning, she focused on the final push to complete her handmade orders, though the prolonged periods of looking down left her feeling uncomfortable. In the afternoon, she tried the gentle practice of Baduanjin for the first time in her small courtyard, planting the seed for a new habit. In the evening, she concluded her day by continuing with her handiwork. Despite the soreness in her shoulders and neck, the sense of fulfillment from completing her tasks left her in good spirits.

events.name: Complete the embroidery pendant order.
events.description: After nearly a month of stitching and cutting, Ma Xiulan finally completed the last five pendants for the order, bringing the total to thirty. As meticulous as she always was with her needlework, she placed the final pieces together with the earlier ones, trimming loose threads and inspecting the stitches one by one, ensuring each was neat and tidy and met her personal standard of being "presentable." Only then did she breathe a sigh of relief. The prolonged period of bending her head left her feeling some tightness in her shoulders and neck.

events.name: First Attempt at Baduanjin
events.description: Taking advantage of the pleasant afternoon sunlight and gentle breeze in the small courtyard, Ma Xiulan took out her mobile phone and found the Baduanjin instructional video recommended by her neighbor Wang Guilan. Following the slow, deliberate movements in the video, she felt her hands and feet were somewhat uncooperative, and she couldn’t quite remember all the motions, making her performance rather clumsy. However, after completing a round of imitation, she broke into a light sweat, and her shoulders and neck seemed to feel a bit more relaxed. This made the experience somewhat interesting to her.

events.name: Handle daily household affairs
events.description: As on any typical Monday morning, Ma Xiulan rose early to prepare a hot breakfast (usually millet porridge and leftover steamed buns from the previous night) for her eldest son Ma Mingxuan and second son Ma Mingzhe, who were heading to school, and urged her sleepy youngest daughter Ma Yuxin to get up and get dressed. After seeing the children off, she briskly cleared the dishes and tidied the living room. In the afternoon, she also found time to visit a nearby vegetable market, where she bought some cabbage and potatoes from the familiar vendor Sun Guifang to prepare for the home-cooked meals over the coming days.

events.name: Evening Handicraft Assignment
events.description: In the evening, after helping the children with their homework, Ma Xiulan sat under the warm light in the living room, putting the final stitches and finishing touches on the last few pendants she had completed during the day. The television played her favorite family drama in the background, and as she worked with her hands, she occasionally glanced up to follow the plot. This was one of the most relaxing moments of her day.

events.name: Slight Night Shift Adjustment Order
events.description: Concerned about the order details, Ma Xiulan spent an extra half hour checking the pendants in the evening, which led to her going to bed later than usual, but it did not affect her overall daily routine.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a touch of anticipation for the new month and a lingering concern over unfinished orders.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Full yet slightly weary, a sense of ease from completing tasks intertwines with the subtle freshness brought by trying new things.

state.今日运动: Practiced Baduanjin for about 20 minutes, with movements still unfamiliar; engaged in household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Ma Xiulan focused her main efforts on wrapping up the handmade orders. In the morning, she meticulously inspected all finished products like a quality inspector, while in the afternoon, she concentrated on stuffing and preliminary stitching. During breaks from picking up and dropping off her children, she attempted to communicate with her eldest son in a gentler manner. Although she encountered the typical "impatience" of an adolescent, she chose to exercise restraint and patience, making careful attempts to improve the parent-child relationship.

events.name: Inspection and Finishing of Finished Products
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan spread a clean old bedsheet on the bed in her bedroom and laid out thirty embroidered ornaments one by one. Leaning over, she inspected each piece as if checking her child's homework, examining whether the patterns were aligned, the color combinations were harmonious, and if there were any loose threads or stains. After the inspection, she carefully sorted them into categories based on different patterns such as the character "Fu," flowers, and small animals. Then, she began to tidy up the scattered colored embroidery threads, fabric scraps, and pin cushions on the desk, gathering the frequently used tools into her sewing basket to make space for the next step of packaging.

events.name: Attempt to communicate with the eldest son.
events.description: On the way home from picking up Ma Mingxuan from school in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan recalled how her son had been spending his weekends lately, always cooped up in his room reading. Instead of asking directly as she used to, "What are you reading?", she changed her tone, asking with a hint of curiosity, "I’ve noticed you’ve been holding onto that thick book lately. What story is so captivating? Could you tell me about it?" She slowed her pace, trying to step into her son’s somewhat closed-off world of interests.

events.name: Dealing with Children's Impatience
events.description: After dinner, Ma Xiulan noticed Ma Mingxuan was once again engrossed in his phone and reminded him that it was time to do his homework. Ma Mingxuan, right in the middle of a critical moment in his game, mumbled without looking up, "I know, I'll be done soon." Hearing this familiar, dismissive response, Ma Xiulan felt a surge of irritation. However, remembering her earlier decision to change her communication approach, she took a deep breath, turned around, and went to the kitchen to wash the dishes, intending to give him a few minutes to adjust on his own.

events.name: Filling and Preliminary Stitching of Pendants
events.description: The focus of today's handicraft work is to make the ornaments 'plump.' Ma Xiulan first placed the two previously embroidered fabric pieces with their right sides facing each other, roughly stitching three sides together with needle and thread. Then, she carefully filled the opening left with fluffy cotton, using her fingers to adjust it meticulously to ensure even and full stuffing. Finally, she performed preliminary stitching, allowing each ornament to take on a lovely three-dimensional shape. This task requires patience, and she spent the entire afternoon working on it.

events.name: Caring for Parents and Daily Purchases
events.description: Before noon, Ma Xiulan went to visit her parents. She helped her mother, Li Xiuying, pick some vegetables and chatted with her father, Ma Jianguo. On her way home, she stopped by Zhang Shufen's small supermarket to buy soy sauce and a bottle of fermented bean curd that her husband likes.

events.name: Due to slightly excessive eating and drinking at the gathering.
events.description: In the evening, neighbor Wang Guilan brought over some homemade pastries. Ma Xiulan shared them with her family, resulting in a slight increase in calorie intake.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focus, planning the final steps for today's order completion.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued but making steady progress, there is a touch of helplessness in the attempts at parent-child communication, yet the decision to persist remains firm.

state.今日运动: Household chores, walking children to and from school, and shopping; no dedicated exercise.

2025-12.daily_overview: Wednesday morning turned damp and chilly with scattered drizzles. Ma Xiulan persisted with her third day of Baduanjin practice, her movements flowing more smoothly than the previous two days. She spent nearly the entire day putting the finishing touches on her handmade orders, using her most skilled hidden-stitch method for hemming, striving for perfection in every detail. Life seemed to revolve around these pendants awaiting delivery.

events.name: Continue practicing the Eight-Section Brocade in the morning.
events.description: Despite the gloomy weather, Ma Xiulan completed her morning exercises in her small courtyard. Today, she deliberately slowed down her pace, focusing on repeatedly practicing the first four movements of the Eight-Section Brocade: lifting the hands to the heavens, drawing the bow to shoot the hawk, regulating the spleen and stomach, and relieving the five strains and seven injuries. As she followed along with the video on her phone, she silently recited the key points of each movement in her mind. She felt much smoother than on the first day and was even able to coordinate her breathing with the movements.

events.name: Fine-tuned Pendant
events.description: Ma Xiulan proceeded with the 'fine processing' of the 30 initially formed pendants. She inspected each one to ensure the filling was even, carefully adding a bit more cotton to any areas that felt flat when pinched. Then, she picked up a needle and thread, using her skilled hidden-stitch technique for the final edge finishing, ensuring the seams were secure, concealed, and the overall appearance was neat and aesthetically pleasing. This task demanded immense patience and keen eyesight, and she carried it out with complete focus.

events.name: Handling Household Chores and Caring for Parents
events.description: In the morning, she took some time to wash the accumulated laundry and called her mother to ask how her father had slept the night before. She felt relieved only after learning that everything was fine. In the afternoon, after her younger daughter returned home from kindergarten, she spent some time playing puzzles with her on the living room floor.

events.name: Went to bed early due to physical discomfort.
events.description: Due to the chilly weather and prolonged periods of working with her head lowered, Ma Xiulan experienced a mild headache and decided to rest early to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a subtle sense of accomplishment from adhering to new habits.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, the manual finishing work is progressing smoothly, and seeing rows of neatly arranged accessories brings a great sense of accomplishment.

state.今日运动: Practiced the Eight-Section Brocade for about 25 minutes during morning exercise, with movements gradually becoming more proficient; performed household chores.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Thursday, several important family matters converged. Ma Xiulan first received a reminder about insurance renewal, which touched upon her sensitivity toward the family's financial security. After discussing it with her husband in the evening, the couple not only decided to renew the policy but also took the rare opportunity to sit down and discuss in detail a plan for establishing an education reserve fund. At the same time, the handmade orders entered the final packaging preparation stage. Throughout the day, she seamlessly switched between her roles as a household manager, a wife, and a craftsperson.

events.name: Received a reminder for insurance renewal.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan received a text message from the insurance company on her phone, reminding her that the family comprehensive accident insurance she had purchased for her husband was about to expire and required renewal. She immediately set aside what she was doing and carefully checked the policy number, expiration date, and amount in the message. Considering that her husband was often on the road driving for long periods, she knew this insurance could not lapse. After a moment of thought, she turned and went to the bedroom to retrieve the hidden account book and passbook, checking the balance of the family savings account to confirm that the expense was within the budget.

events.name: Communicating with Husband about Family Protection
events.description: In the evening, when her husband Ma Zhiqiang returned home from work and finished dinner, Ma Xiulan brought up the matter of his insurance nearing expiration while washing dishes in the kitchen. Her tone was ordinary yet earnest: "Zhiqiang, your insurance is due for renewal. I checked, and we have enough money. You often travel around, so this protection shouldn’t be neglected." Ma Zhiqiang was watching the news in the living room and nodded upon hearing this: "You can handle it. Just pay it when it’s due." Though their exchange was brief, it reflected their shared understanding of managing basic family risks.

events.name: Discuss the Education Reserve Fund Plan
events.description: After washing the dishes, Ma Xiulan dried her hands and walked to the living room, sitting on the sofa next to her husband. She took out the account book and discussed the matter that had been weighing on her mind: "I was thinking, should we officially start saving for the children’s education? It doesn’t have to be a large amount, but we need to make regular, unwavering contributions." She suggested combining the cash they had recently saved with the money she earned from her handicraft work to open a fixed-term deposit at the bank. Ma Zhiqiang expressed support for his wife’s forward-thinking idea, and the two quickly agreed on the amount and the deposit term.

events.name: Final Order Inspection and Packaging Preparation
events.description: During a break in the discussion of household matters, Ma Xiulan took the time to conduct a final quality check on the 30 completed embroidery pendants. Under bright lighting, she carefully examined each piece one by one, trimming any potential stray threads and confirming there were no stains or flaws. Then, she sorted them by style, wrapped each group in clean, soft cloth, and neatly arranged them in a pre-prepared empty cardboard box, making thorough preparations for the next day's delivery.

events.name: Preparing Warm Winter Meals for Family
events.description: As the weather turned colder, Ma Xiulan prepared a warm bowl of Tianjin-style noodles with thick gravy for tonight's dinner. She hand-rolled the noodles and made a rich gravy using minced meat, daylily flowers, and wood ear mushrooms. The steaming hot noodles immediately dispelled the chill in the room, and the children enjoyed them immensely.

events.name: Commencement of Community Craft Market Preparations (Day 1)
events.description: Ma Xiulan received a community notice about a handicraft market next week. She decided to participate and began brainstorming new creations and preparing materials.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Awake, planning the day's household chores and finalizing orders.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Steady yet slightly pressured, a sense of responsibility after handling important family financial decisions, and a faint anticipation for tomorrow's order delivery.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday was a day interwoven with both harvest and busyness. Ma Xiulan successfully delivered the meticulously crafted embroidered pendants to the community and received unexpected praise and payment, which filled her with pride. In the afternoon, she skillfully renewed the family insurance using mobile banking, demonstrating her progress in managing household affairs. During dinner, she shared this joy with her family and allocated part of the income to the education savings plan, moving the family’s short-term goal one step forward. At the same time, she achieved a breakthrough in her morning Baduanjin exercise, completing the full set of movements for the first time.

events.name: Successfully delivered community order
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan walked to the Jingwen Road Community Service Center, carrying a cardboard box filled with 30 embroidered ornaments. She handed the finished products to Sister Zheng Xiuying, who was in charge of the matter. Sister Zheng carefully examined several samples, counted the quantity, and showed a satisfied smile on her face: "Xiulan, your craftsmanship is truly impeccable. The stitches are tight, and the designs are festive. These will definitely add a special touch to the community events!" After saying this, she transferred the agreed-upon payment of 500 yuan to Ma Xiulan via WeChat as previously arranged. Receiving the money, Ma Xiulan felt a warmth in her heart, thinking that all the hard work over the past month had been worthwhile.

events.name: Complete insurance renewal online
events.description: In the afternoon, during a break from household chores, Ma Xiulan took out her phone and opened the mobile banking app that her son had helped her set up. She navigated to the life expenses or insurance services section, entered the policy information, and after verifying the amount was correct, completed the payment with a gentle tap of her finger. The entire process took only about ten minutes, much more convenient than the previous trips to the service center and waiting in line. After the payment was successfully processed, she received a confirmation text message for the electronic policy. She promptly took a screenshot and forwarded it via WeChat to her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, along with a message informing him that the policy renewal had been completed.

events.name: Record Household Expenses
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Ma Xiulan, as usual, took out her account book. Under today's date, she neatly recorded: 'Insurance renewal, XXX yuan.' Then, on a new line, she wrote: 'Handicraft income, 500 yuan (community order).' After finishing the entries, she habitually flipped through the previous expenses for the month, silently checking them against her budget in her mind.

events.name: Share the joy with family
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan couldn't hide her joy and said to her husband and children, "I finished the community work today, and Sister Zheng even praised me for doing a good job." She paused for a moment, glanced at her husband, and continued, "I was thinking, part of this money can be used for daily expenses, and the rest... as we discussed yesterday, we can save it for the children's future education." Ma Zhiqiang nodded in agreement, and the children were also proud of their mother. The atmosphere at the dinner table was exceptionally warm.

events.name: First Complete Practice of Baduanjin
events.description: In the early morning, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin once again in the small courtyard. Today, she attempted to complete all eight movements in sequence from memory without relying on the instructional video on her phone. Although she paused a few times to recall the steps and the rhythm was not entirely even, this was her first time independently finishing the entire set. After completing it, she felt a thorough stretch from her arms to her legs, and her mood brightened as a result.

events.name: Daily Family Interactions
events.description: As usual, Ma Xiulan prepared dinner for the whole family (simple stir-fried dishes and rice). The family gathered around the table to eat and chat about school matters. After the meal, she cleared the dishes, while her husband checked on their eldest son's homework.

events.name: Community Handicraft Market Preparation (Day Two)
events.description: Ma Xiulan began creating new works for the market, designing a small embroidered decorative painting.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With a touch of nervousness in my anticipation, I think about the orders to be delivered and the payments to be processed.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling proud, gratified, and full of a sense of accomplishment, she derived immense satisfaction from having the value of her handiwork recognized, while the smooth handling of family affairs also brought her peace of mind.

state.今日运动: Practiced Baduanjin for about 30 minutes during morning exercise, completing the full set for the first time; walked to and from the community center; performed household chores.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with bright sunshine over the weekend, but the temperature remains low.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Saturday, the family atmosphere was relatively relaxed. Ma Xiulan used her rest time to begin conceptualizing new embroidery creations, transitioning from being an executor of orders to an active explorer. During dinner, she gently reiterated the household rules through casual conversation, aiming to reinforce the improved communication atmosphere recently established with the children, especially with her eldest son. The sense of accomplishment from completing an income-generating task still lingered in her heart, sparking more ideas for her future handmade "micro-enterprise."

events.name: Designing new embroidery patterns
events.description: During a rare moment of leisure in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan sat by the window, scrolling through photos she had taken at the local temple fair last winter. She was particularly drawn to a set of decorations that blended modern geometric lines with traditional paper-cut window patterns. She found a scrap of paper and a pencil, attempting to sketch this fusion of inspiration—incorporating clean straight lines or wave patterns into the outlines of traditional peonies or lotuses. After finishing the draft, she rummaged through her sewing kit and fabric stash at home, only to realize she lacked several bright-colored threads that could highlight the modern aesthetic. She decided to make time to visit the materials store the next day.

events.name: Strengthen the family communication atmosphere
events.description: During the weekend family dinner, the atmosphere was more relaxed than usual. While serving food to the children, Ma Xiulan said casually, as if chatting about everyday matters, "I’ve been reading the news lately, and it keeps saying that children your age stay up late playing with their phones, which is bad for their eyes and leaves them tired in class the next day. The rules we’ve set at home are really just to keep everyone healthy and full of energy in our daily lives." Her words were mainly directed at her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, but her tone was gentle, as if it were a shared understanding for the whole family. Ma Mingxuan listened without showing the immediate resistance he used to, quietly continuing to eat his meal.

events.name: Managing Weekend Housework and Quality Family Time
events.description: As it was the weekend, Ma Xiulan conducted a more thorough cleaning than usual, washing the bed sheets and duvet covers. In the afternoon, she took her younger daughter, Ma Yuxin, to bask in the sun in their small courtyard, watching her play jump rope and joining in for a few moves herself. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, was off work today and stayed at home, fixing a slightly loose leg on one of their chairs.

events.name: Stayed up late due to a gathering with friends.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan's childhood friend Liu Chunmei paid an unexpected visit. The two chatted until quite late, causing Ma Xiulan to stay up later than usual, but she thoroughly enjoyed the pleasant social interaction.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax and savor the comfort of not having to rush on the weekend, as well as the lingering satisfaction after completing a major task.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Enriched and brimming with creative drive, they have gained confidence from the success of community orders and have begun proactively planning the next steps in their interest development.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Sunday, plans couldn't keep up with changes. Her husband had to work overtime unexpectedly, canceling their scheduled breakfast date, and Ma Xiulan thoughtfully adjusted her arrangements. She insisted on her morning exercise and genuinely felt the effectiveness of Baduanjin in alleviating the shoulder and neck soreness caused by household chores, which strengthened her resolve to continue. In the afternoon, she went to purchase materials for her newly conceived design, and her exchange with the material shop owner also provided her with some market insights. The day was spent adapting to changes and enriching herself.

events.name: Adjust the Weekend Breakfast Plan
events.description: Early in the morning, Ma Zhiqiang received a phone call requiring him to go to the company to handle an urgent matter. Ma Xiulan’s anticipated breakfast date for two was thus canceled. Instead of complaining, she deliberately fried a few extra sunny-side-up eggs that her husband loved and stir-fried a plate of his favorite diced pork with pickled cucumber while preparing breakfast for the whole family. When Ma Zhiqiang hurried back at noon, hot dishes and rice were already ready. As she served him rice, she said, "It’s fine. Work comes first. We can find time to go out for a meal next week."

events.name: Experience the benefits of exercise.
events.description: During her morning exercise, Ma Xiulan clearly felt her movements were much smoother than a week before, no longer needing to constantly watch the video. More importantly, she particularly noticed that the previously faintly aching shoulder and neck area, which would typically start hurting in the afternoon, experienced a significant relief from the stiff soreness after practicing Baduanjin. Her entire upper body felt much more relaxed and at ease. This personal experience made her truly believe in the benefits of this slow-paced exercise, strengthening her motivation to persist.

events.name: Procurement of Manual Materials and Communication
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan walked to a handicraft supply store in Jinghai District that she often visited. Based on her newly conceived design, she carefully selected several types of embroidery threads with bright colors (such as royal blue and bright yellow) and a smooth texture. She also purchased a piece of high-quality plain cotton fabric to serve as the base cloth. While checking out, she took the opportunity to chat briefly with the familiar shop owner, inquiring about recent popular patterns. The owner mentioned that minimalist Chinese-style lines were quite trendy. She also asked the owner to help replace the elastic band on her old embroidery hoop, which she had been using for many years.

events.name: Sunday Family Day and Preparing for the Next Week
events.description: In the evening, the whole family enjoyed a more sumptuous dinner than usual. After the meal, Ma Xiulan urged the children to check their schoolbags and prepare their clothes and study supplies for the upcoming school week. She herself made a simple plan for the main household chores and the schedule for visiting her parents in the following week.

events.name: Continuous weight gain due to frequent social gatherings and dining
events.description: Both lunch and dinner were quite substantial, with a relatively high caloric intake, leading to a slight increase in body weight.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to a breakfast date with my husband, feeling joyful.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calm and content, although plans changed, she handled it well. The effectiveness of her workout and the acquisition of new materials filled her with anticipation for the coming week.

2025-12.daily_overview: In the new week, Ma Xiulan shifted her focus to long-term family financial planning. She carefully counted and calculated the funds available for savings, making specific preparations to open a fixed deposit certificate. Meanwhile, her interest in handicrafts also shifted from modern creativity back to tradition. She borrowed an old embroidery pattern book from her mother and began studying more complex traditional techniques. In her hands, life encompasses both pragmatic planning for the future and the warm-hearted preservation of tradition.

events.name: Tallying Savings Funds
events.description: In the morning, taking advantage of the quiet at home, Ma Xiulan closed the bedroom door and retrieved a handkerchief bundle and her account book from a locked drawer. She emptied the cash wrapped in the handkerchief—primarily savings from the household allowance her husband gave her, along with earnings from occasional odd jobs this time and previously—onto the bed, carefully counting it. She then cross-checked the amounts with the records of odd-job income in her account book, verifying each entry one by one, and finally confirmed that she could set aside a total of 5,000 yuan to open the planned education emergency fund fixed deposit certificate. After neatly arranging the money and securing it with a rubber band, she felt a deep sense of certainty and reassurance.

events.name: Study traditional embroidery patterns
events.description: In the afternoon, when visiting her parents' home, Ma Xiulan borrowed a traditional Tianjin embroidery pattern book with yellowed pages from her mother, Li Xiuying. In the evening, under the warm light of the living room, she put on her reading glasses (she had been having some difficulty with detailed work lately) and carefully studied a complex floral and bird pattern in the book called "Magpie on a Plum Branch." From her treasured sewing box, she meticulously selected black, white, red, green, and other colored silk threads, matching them to the colors in the pattern. Then, she stretched a piece of plain cotton fabric onto an embroidery hoop and, using a washable pen, carefully traced the outline of the "Magpie on a Plum Branch" pattern onto the fabric, laying the foundation for the embroidery to follow.

events.name: Routine Household Chores and Care
events.description: As usual, I completed daily household chores such as laundry and cooking today. At noon, I delivered some steamed buns I made to my parents. I noticed my father was in good spirits and had a chat with my mother.

events.name: Community Craft Market Preparation (Day 3)
events.description: Ma Xiulan continued creating her market pieces and encountered a challenge with color matching, so she decided to seek help from her craft friends.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic, contemplating today's savings plan and manual learning.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Focused and full of learning passion, counting her savings gives her greater confidence in achieving her goals, while studying traditional patterns immerses her in the joy of improving her skills.
