2025-12.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Ma Xiulan continued her gradual efforts across multiple fronts. She persisted in attempting to communicate with her teenage eldest son using more equal and open topics, delighting in the subtle positive changes she sensed. Practicing the Baduanjin exercise in the morning had become her unwavering routine, bringing tranquility to both body and mind. Meanwhile, she settled into the meticulous work of embroidering the traditional "Magpie on Plum Blossom" pattern, stitch by stitch, finding focus and peace in the rhythmic motion of the needle.

events.name: Continuously Improving Parent-Child Communication
events.description: When picking up Ma Mingxuan from school in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan noticed that her son seemed to be talking a little more than usual. After dinner, while tidying up the kitchen, she thought for a moment and then carried a plate of sliced apples into her son’s room. Instead of asking about his studies, she struck up a casual conversation, saying, "Take a break and have some fruit. I heard there’s a new game that’s popular among your classmates? What’s it called?" She tried to engage with her son as an equal, hoping to understand his world of entertainment. A little later, she found another opportunity to ask him, "Did anything particularly happy happen at school this week?" She listened attentively to his brief response and nodded at the appropriate moments.

events.name: Consolidate the habit of morning exercise.
events.description: For Ma Xiulan, the morning practice of Baduanjin is no longer a task that requires 'persistence,' but has become a natural part of starting her day. She can calmly complete the entire set of movements in her small courtyard, with her breathing largely keeping pace with the rhythm. After finishing, she feels both physically and mentally stretched and relaxed, infusing her upcoming busy day with a sense of calm energy.

events.name: Begin traditional pattern embroidery
events.description: Throughout the afternoon and evening, whenever she had free time, Ma Xiulan would sit in the living room and begin stitching the pattern of "Maggie on Plum Blossom" on her embroidery frame. Starting with the most prominent plum blossom petals at the center of the design, she carefully employed traditional needlework techniques such as flat stitch and satin stitch, meticulously matching the colors of the silk threads. The television played softly in the background, but most of her attention was focused on the small world beneath her fingertips, immersed in the serene concentration that handcrafting brings.

events.name: Handling Household Chores and Neighborly Communication
events.description: In the morning, while buying groceries at the vegetable market, I chatted with the vendor Sun Guifang about the recent vegetable prices. In the evening, when taking out the trash at the door, I ran into Wang Guilan from across the hall. We stood and talked for a while, and Wang Guilan complimented her on looking healthier than before.

events.name: Staying up late to rush through manual work.
events.description: To complete the market project, Ma Xiulan worked an extra hour in the evening, which caused her to go to bed late.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with the stability that comes from established habits.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Comforted and serene, the communication with her son seemed to show promising signs, and the flow experience brought by handicrafts also left her feeling fulfilled.

state.今日运动: Practicing the Eight-Section Brocade for about 30 minutes in the morning has become a habit; daily household chores.

2025-12.daily_overview: For Ma Xiulan, Wednesday was a day filled with 'firsts' and progress. She successfully paid her utility bills online for the first time, enhancing her digital life skills. She was pleased to find that her eldest son had begun adhering to a regular schedule. More importantly, accompanied by her husband, she visited a bank for the first time in her life to open a fixed deposit certificate for the family, marking a milestone in their long-term educational savings goal. In the evening, she also sought her mother's guidance on embroidery techniques with a semi-finished piece, gaining valuable insights.

events.name: First-time online payment of utility bills
events.description: It was time again to pay the monthly utility bills. In the past, Ma Xiulan would take the payment slips and queue up at the service center. Today, with a reminder and some simple guidance from her son Ma Mingxuan, she tried using the utility payment feature in a mobile payment app. After entering the account number, verifying the amount, and clicking to pay, she saw the "Payment Successful" notification on the screen and couldn’t quite believe it. "Is it already paid?" she wondered. Saving herself the trouble of going out and waiting in line, she thought this new skill was truly useful.

events.name: Discovering Positive Changes in Children
events.description: Around ten o'clock in the evening, Ma Xiulan habitually glanced at the crack under her eldest son's door and noticed that the light was off, with no glow from a phone screen visible. A sense of relief washed over her, as this indicated that her son was making an effort to adhere to their agreed-upon bedtime. She decided not to knock and confirm, opting instead to praise him in a lighthearted tone during breakfast the next morning.

events.name: Handle the issuance of a time deposit certificate for educational reserve funds
events.description: In the afternoon, accompanied by her husband Ma Zhiqiang, Ma Xiulan walked into a bank branch in Jinghai District with a mix of nervousness and excitement. It was her first time visiting a bank specifically to deposit money. Under the patient guidance of the staff, she filled out a fixed deposit slip, set a password, and then handed over the prepared stack of 5,000 yuan in cash to the counter. When she received the fixed deposit certificate marked with a one-year term and stamped with a red seal, she felt an unprecedented sense of security and ceremony, as if she had laid a solid brick for her family's future.

events.name: Properly Preserve and Share Joy
events.description: After returning home from the bank, Ma Xiulan carefully placed the fixed deposit certificate together with important documents such as her family's household registration booklet and property ownership certificate, locking them in the bedroom drawer. During dinner, she couldn't help but take out the deposit certificate to show her husband and children, saying simply yet solemnly, "Look, this is the education fund we've saved for you. Study hard in the future." The children nodded somewhat understandingly, and her husband also showed an approving smile.

events.name: Seeking instruction in embroidery techniques from my mother.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan brought the half-embroidered small tablecloth with the pattern of "Maggie on Plum Blossoms" to her parents' home. She showed her progress to her mother and sought advice on several details. Her mother, Li Xiuying, put on her reading glasses, carefully examined her stitches, and nodded, saying, "Hmm, the color transition of the plum blossoms is quite good." Then, pointing to the magpie's wing area, she added, "The stitches here could be a bit denser to give the feathers a more layered look." As mother and daughter chatted over tea, exchanging insights on embroidery, Ma Xiulan felt she had gained a great deal.

events.name: Due to the celebration of the deposit, the diet was slightly excessive.
events.description: To celebrate the successful deposit, an extra dish was added to dinner, increasing the calorie intake.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the residence at No. 156, Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Ordinary yet with some contemplation about handling new matters (such as payment and deposit).

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A heightened sense of accomplishment and security, successfully mastering new skills, witnessing her child's progress, and completing significant family savings—these multiple positive feedbacks made her mood exceptionally bright.

state.今日运动: Approximately 30 minutes of morning Baduanjin exercises; walking to and from the bank and parents' home; household chores

2025-12.daily_overview: Thursday became somewhat dreary in the drizzling rain. Seizing the opportunity during breakfast, Ma Xiulan positively affirmed her eldest son's recent progress, thereby strengthening the trust between parent and child. In the afternoon, under her husband's guidance, she began learning to use mobile banking to manage the newly deposited fixed-term savings, taking a small step forward in her digital financial literacy. Gazing at the rain outside the window, she thought of her mother and called to invite her to join in morning exercises the next day, extending her personal health habits into a shared activity between parent and child.

events.name: Acknowledge the child's self-discipline behavior.
events.description: During breakfast, Ma Xiulan specifically said to Ma Mingxuan, "Xuanxuan, Mom noticed that you've been turning off the lights and going to bed on time these past few days. This morning, your eyes even looked brighter. I understand wanting to play a little longer sometimes, but being able to control yourself is truly remarkable—it shows you're taking responsibility for yourself." She didn’t give a long lecture, just calmly stated her observations and affirmation. Ma Mingxuan listened without saying a word, but as he lowered his head to eat his porridge, the corner of his mouth seemed to twitch slightly, and his expression softened noticeably compared to before.

events.name: Learning to Use Mobile Banking
events.description: The rain continued all afternoon, making it inconvenient to go out. Ma Xiulan took out her phone and asked her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, who was resting, how to use mobile banking to check the fixed deposit she had made the previous day. Ma Zhiqiang sat down beside her and patiently taught her step by step how to log into the app and locate the "My Account" or "Fixed Deposit" section. Ma Xiulan studied attentively, even jotting down the key steps in a small notebook. Under her husband's watchful eye, she attempted to operate the app herself, successfully logging in and viewing the detailed information of the fixed deposit certificate. This gave her a greater sense of confidence.

events.name: Inviting Mother to Exercise Together in the Morning
events.description: Looking out the window at the continuous rain, Ma Xiulan remembered how her mother, Li Xiuying, often complained about her stiff legs and feet. Feeling that her own practice of Baduanjin had indeed been beneficial, she called her mother: "Mom, the rain should stop by tomorrow morning. Come over to my courtyard. I'll teach you a few slow movements to stretch your limbs—it feels really comfortable." Her mother readily agreed on the other end of the line.

events.name: Indoor Activities on Rainy Days
events.description: Due to the rain, Ma Xiulan spent most of the day at home. She sorted out seasonal clothing and took out thick quilts to air them (under the eaves). In the afternoon, she accompanied her younger daughter, who had returned from school, to draw for a while in the living room. For dinner, she made hot noodle soup to dispel the damp chill of the rainy day.

events.name: Outdoor activities postponed due to rain.
events.description: The originally planned walk has been canceled and replaced with light indoor activities.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calmness, the rainy day slows the pace, focusing thoughts more on the family.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The warmth and slight sense of progress, along with the interaction with my son, the learning of new skills, and the caring gestures toward my mother, all filled this rainy day with warmth.

state.今日运动: Morning exercise of Baduanjin for about 25 minutes (conducted under the eaves); indoor housework

2025-12.daily_overview: On a clear Friday after the rain, Ma Xiulan's mind grew even more active. Drawing from her recent experience in communicating with her eldest son, she adjusted her strategy, preparing to open the conversation with more specific questions. In the afternoon, she formally called her mother to confirm their morning exercise plans for the next day. In the evening, she began to put her long-contemplated embroidery idea—a fusion of modern and traditional styles—into practice, carefully sketching the first stitch under the lamplight. Each day, in her own way, she was connecting the family's past with its future.

events.name: Adjusting Communication Topics with Children
events.description: Before going to pick up Ma Mingxuan from school in the afternoon, Ma Xiulan reflected on her approach and realized that asking her son directly, "How was school?" often led to silence. However, when discussing specific events, he would occasionally share a few words. So, upon seeing her son, she changed her approach: "Did you do that static electricity experiment in science class today? Was it fun? Could the balloon really pick up the paper scraps?" She tried to start the conversation from a specific and potentially interesting point.

events.name: Confirming the morning exercise arrangement with mother
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan called her mother again to confirm the time she would come to the house the next morning. She also briefly described the benefits of Baduanjin, a gentle form of exercise, and reassured her mother not to feel pressured—just to come and move around a bit, enjoy the sunshine, and have a chat.

events.name: Begin creating fusion pattern embroidery
events.description: In the quiet living room at night, Ma Xiulan spread out the previously purchased plain cotton cloth and the draft of the fusion pattern she had drawn herself. She first lightly sketched the general outline of traditional flowers on the cloth with a pencil, then attempted to incorporate the geometric lines she had conceived. Next, she selected silk threads and began embroidering the first part—the outline of a peony. She worked with great care, aiming to preserve the aesthetic form of the traditional flowers while leaving room and possibilities for the subsequent integration of modern lines. Each stitch was made with the caution and excitement of exploration.

events.name: Preparing for a weekend family dinner
events.description: Considering that her younger sister Ma Xiufen might come tomorrow and her husband might also be off work, Ma Xiulan specially bought extra groceries today, including a fish and a piece of pork belly, planning to prepare several dishes tomorrow.

events.name: Due to increased food consumption during family gatherings.
events.description: Preparing abundant food for gatherings leads to increased intake due to sampling.

起始状态.心情: Refreshing, the fine weather after the rain lifts one's spirits and brings anticipation for the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Focused and full of the joy of exploration, both new attempts at communication and embroidery creations make her feel that life offers continuous opportunities for learning and growth.

2025-12.daily_overview: On a Saturday morning, Ma Xiulan’s small courtyard welcomed its first "trainee"—her mother. She patiently taught her mother the first movement of the Baduanjin exercise, with the winter sunlight gently falling on the mother and daughter, filling the scene with warmth. During the day, she immersed herself in embroidery with integrated patterns, pausing to reflect whenever she encountered difficulties. In the evening, when her eldest son requested extra time on his phone, she granted conditional approval and once again gently explained the reasoning behind the rules, demonstrating both flexibility and principle in her approach to discipline.

events.name: Teaching Mother to Practice Baduanjin
events.description: Early in the morning, Li Xiuying, the mother, arrived as scheduled. In the small courtyard, Ma Xiulan acted like a patient little teacher, first demonstrating the first movement of the Baduanjin exercise, "Lifting the Sky to Regulate the Triple Burner," in its entirety for her mother. She then broke down the movements, teaching her mother step by step how to raise her hands, inhale, and stretch. As the mother was older and her movements were somewhat stiff, Ma Xiulan gently explained the key points while using her hands to help adjust her mother's posture. Under the morning sunlight, the mother and daughter slowly practiced the movements together, creating a serene and heartwarming scene.

events.name: Handling Children's Weekend Privilege Requests
events.description: On Saturday evening, Ma Mingxuan walked over to Ma Xiulan, who was watching TV, and asked softly, "Mom, can I play with my phone for an extra half hour this weekend? My classmates are all teaming up." Ma Xiulan thought for a moment and did not refuse immediately. Instead, she said, "Alright, you can relax a bit on the weekend. But no more than half an hour, and you must finish by ten-thirty so it doesn’t affect your schedule tomorrow. The core of the rules we set is about health, don’t you agree?" She agreed to the request but reiterated the boundaries and the reasons behind them.

events.name: Continue creating and encounter difficulties
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan continued her work on the fusion pattern embroidery. While embroidering the modern lines connecting the floral elements, she noticed that the traditional satin stitch produced lines that appeared somewhat rigid and lacked fluidity, failing to achieve the minimalist and fashionable aesthetic she envisioned. She paused, carefully examining the pattern and the half-finished piece in her hands, contemplating whether a change in stitching technique or an adjustment in the color combination of the threads might allow for a more seamless integration of traditional and modern elements.

events.name: Weekend Family Time and Sisterly Get-Together
events.description: That afternoon, Ma Xiufen indeed came to visit, bringing some snacks for the children. The two sisters chatted while preparing dinner in the kitchen. Ma Xiufen mentioned the new shopping mall in the Binhai New Area, which sounded both novel and somewhat distant to Ma Xiulan. The family had dinner together, making the evening livelier than usual.

events.name: Continuous weight gain due to frequent gatherings
events.description: The weekend family gathering featured an abundant spread of food, resulting in two consecutive days of high-calorie intake.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to and awaiting the arrival of the mother, to enjoy the parent-child time on a weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, the morning exercise time spent with my mother is profoundly meaningful. I handled my child's request appropriately, and although I encountered a creative bottleneck, I am actively thinking about solutions.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for socializing and warmth. In the morning, Ma Xiulan and her husband enjoyed a postponed breakfast date at a bustling time-honored breakfast restaurant. They rarely had the chance to discuss their family travel dreams and share their experiences from the outside world, allowing their marital bond to be nurtured through simple food and conversation. In the afternoon, the arrival of her childhood friend Liu Chunmei provided her with a chance to pour out her feelings freely, offering valuable emotional support. The challenges in her embroidery creation also found potential solutions through remote exchanges with fellow craft enthusiasts.

events.name: Breakfast Date with My Husband
events.description: This time, they went to a famous time-honored breakfast restaurant in Jinghai District. The shop was bustling with people, filled with the lively atmosphere of daily life. They ordered guobacai and candied fried dough twists, sitting at a small table in the corner. As they enjoyed the steaming hot food, they began to open up and chat. Ma Xiulan mentioned her wish to take the whole family on a trip to Beijing. Upon hearing this, Ma Zhiqiang didn’t respond with "we don’t have the money" or "let’s talk about it later." Instead, he shared some of the scenic spots and road conditions he had seen during his long-distance trips to Beijing. The two even roughly calculated how much money they would need to save. This breakfast meal brought out their shared aspirations for a future life together.

events.name: Tea Talk with Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: In the afternoon, Liu Chunmei arrived as scheduled. Ma Xiulan had prepared jasmine tea in advance and laid out homemade roasted sunflower seeds. The two childhood friends sat side by side on the sofa—one knitting a sweater for her grandson, the other embroidering flowers—chatting idly. The conversation naturally flowed from their children’s academic performance and work-related troubles to concerns about their aging parents’ declining health. Listening to Ma Xiulan describe the hardships of caring for her parents, Liu Chunmei comforted her warmly, saying, "Don’t push yourself too hard. Your own health matters most. If you need any help, just let me know." These words warmed Ma Xiulan’s heart.

events.name: Seeking Help from Fellow Craftsmen
events.description: During the day, Ma Xiulan was still uncertain about how to handle the challenge of modern lines in her embroidery. In the evening, she sent a video via WeChat to her fellow craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin, showcasing the issue she encountered. Zhou Xiuqin quickly replied, suggesting that she could try using outline stitch or backstitch to represent the lines, with slightly looser stitches and more contrasting colors. After hearing her friend’s advice, Ma Xiulan felt enlightened and prepared to give it a try the next day.

events.name: Preparing for the start of a new week
events.description: After seeing Liu Chunmei off, tidying up the tea set and the living room, Ma Xiulan, as she did on every Sunday evening, urged the children to organize their schoolbags, checked the supplies in the refrigerator, and briefly planned the menu for the next day.

events.name: Returned late due to social activities.
events.description: Chatted with Liu Chunmei until late, staying up later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and joyful, looking forward to the date with my husband and the gathering with close friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Emotionally well-nourished, communication with my husband has enhanced our mutual understanding, confiding in close friends has alleviated stress, and creative challenges now show promising solutions. My heart feels abundant and content.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new week began with a cold, rainy day. Ma Xiulan's body sent its first clear warning signal—due to frequent bending over to care for her father for several consecutive days and prolonged standing while doing household chores, she experienced noticeable soreness and stiffness in her lower back. This made her truly aware, for the first time, of the importance of a caregiver's own health. Meanwhile, her life continued: she focused on purchasing goods for the Lunar New Year, discussed skincare with her younger sister, reinforced the progress made in communicating with her son, persisted in morning exercises with her mother, and successfully overcame a creative block with the help of a fellow craft enthusiast. The physical discomfort cast a shadow of reality over this mid-December day, also hinting that she would need to find a new balance.

events.name: The body first experiences noticeable discomfort.
events.description: In the evening, after several consecutive days of traveling back and forth to her parents' home to help her father turn over and wash, as well as spending long hours preparing meals in the kitchen, Ma Xiulan felt a distinct soreness and stiffness in her lower back when she straightened up. The sensation became even more noticeable when she bent over and stood up again. This was a symptom she had never experienced before—while housework had always been tiring, it had never been so concentrated and persistent. Leaning against the kitchen doorframe to catch her breath, she felt a faint sense of worry.

events.name: Focusing on New Year's Goods and Accepting Sister's Care
events.description: During the lunch break, Ma Xiulan browsed through e-commerce apps on her phone, starting to pay attention to promotional information for the New Year shopping festival. She mainly looked for nuts, candies, and new clothes for the children, quietly comparing prices. In the afternoon, her younger sister Ma Xiufen came to visit their parents and stopped by her sister’s house for a while. While chatting, Ma Xiufen noticed that her sister’s complexion looked a bit dull recently, so she gifted her a bottle of affordable moisturizer that she used herself. She also taught Ma Xiulan some simple facial massage techniques and reminded her not to be too preoccupied with work but to take care of herself as well.

events.name: Strengthen the family communication atmosphere
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan said to the whole family in a relaxed tone, "I've noticed that the conversations at our dinner table have become more interesting lately. Xuanxuan even told me about the experiment class at his school." Instead of singling out anyone for praise, she affirmed the atmosphere of sharing experiences as a family. She observed that although Ma Mingxuan did not respond, his expression while eating with his head lowered had softened noticeably compared to before.

events.name: Continue morning exercises with mother
events.description: Despite the gloomy weather, the mother still came. While teaching her mother the second movement, Ma Xiulan noticed that some details were not performed correctly and gently corrected her. After the practice, the two sat on a bench in the small courtyard to rest. The mother shared with her the recent news she had heard about a neighbor's child who had been admitted to university.

events.name: Successfully Overcame the Difficulties in Embroidery Creation
events.description: Following Zhou Xiuqin's suggestion, Ma Xiulan adjusted her stitching technique, switching to outline stitch to delineate the modern linear sections and using a brighter silver thread. The effect was immediately evident after the attempt: the lines became smooth and lustrous, creating a clever contrast and harmonious blend with the soft elegance of the traditional floral patterns. Watching the design gradually take shape, Ma Xiulan felt both excited and satisfied, with her previous frustrations completely dispelled.

events.name: Preparing for the Parent-Teacher Conference
events.description: Upon receiving the school notice, Ma Xiulan checked the specific time and location of the parent-teacher meeting for her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan. She found a notebook and a smooth-writing pen to record the teacher's requirements. She informed her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, about the matter and arranged for him or their neighbor Wang Guilan to look after their second son and daughter on the day she attends the meeting.

events.name: Adjusting Daily Routine Due to Physical Discomfort
events.description: Due to discomfort in her lower back, Ma Xiulan decided to rest early to facilitate recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The routine calm, with plans for the new week's chores and caregiving.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 156 Jingwen Road, Jinghai District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Complexity, creative breakthroughs bring joy, but physical discomfort sounds an alarm, making her feel not only fulfilled but also, for the first time, clearly worried and reflective about her own exhaustion.

state.今日运动: Practiced the Eight-Section Brocade for about 35 minutes (with my mother); performed household chores, moving more cautiously than usual due to lower back discomfort; took mandatory breaks from handcraft work to stand up and move around.

2025-12.daily_overview: The week began with busyness and physical fatigue. In the morning, I persisted in caring for my father despite ongoing lower back discomfort, while the afternoon was fully devoted to focusing on my eldest son's studies. Today's core tasks involved communication between home and school, as well as attempts to adjust parent-child relationships, with fatigue and responsibility progressing side by side.

events.name: Taking care of father and enduring discomfort
events.description: Although the soreness in her lower back had been present since she woke up in the morning, Ma Xiulan still bathed her father and changed his clothes as usual, as he needed her help. The discomfort became particularly noticeable when she bent over to prepare lunch for him. She had initially planned to lie down and rest in the afternoon, but remembering the parent-teacher meeting scheduled for later, she mustered her energy and tidied herself up. As she prepared dinner in the evening, the pain intensified, making her realize that her body was sending a warning signal.

events.name: Attend the parent-teacher conference for the eldest child and take detailed notes.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at the junior high school where her eldest son, Ma Mingxuan, was studying. During the parent-teacher conference, the homeroom teacher, Ms. Han, first introduced the overall situation of the class and the arrangements for the end of the semester. After the meeting, Ma Xiulan approached Ms. Han for a one-on-one conversation. Ms. Han presented the report card, acknowledging Mingxuan's strong performance in mathematics and logic. However, she clearly pointed out that his reading comprehension and composition in Chinese were significant weaknesses, lagging far behind his other subjects. She provided specific examples of issues frequently appearing in his compositions, such as incoherent sentences and dry descriptions. Ms. Han suggested that during the winter break, he must read and practice more, as relying solely on textbooks would not suffice. Ma Xiulan carefully noted down each of the teacher's suggestions in her notebook. While feeling somewhat anxious, she was more focused on clarifying the direction for improvement.

events.name: Strive for equal communication rather than lecturing
events.description: Returning from school and seeing Ma Mingxuan, who had just arrived home after classes, Ma Xiulan did not immediately question or give orders as she usually would. She took out a notebook, sat down beside her son, and said in a calm tone, "Mingxuan, I attended the parent-teacher conference today, and Teacher Han praised your strong mathematical thinking. She also mentioned that if you want to be more confident about the high school entrance exam, you need to put more effort into Chinese, especially reading and writing. What kind of books do you usually enjoy reading?" Ma Mingxuan was somewhat surprised by his mother's gentle approach and hesitated for a moment before saying he had some interest in science fiction and history.

events.name: Jointly Develop a Winter Vacation Reading Kickoff Plan
events.description: After understanding her son's interests, Ma Xiulan saw a breakthrough. She brought out the old computer at home and said to her son, "Then let's see if the library has any books you're interested in?" The mother and son logged into the community library's online search system together. Ma Xiulan was not very proficient but insisted on operating it herself, while Ma Mingxuan guided her from the side. Following Teacher Han's advice to "start from interests," they searched for science fiction and history books, eventually selecting *The Three-Body Problem (Youth Edition)* and *Those Things About the Ming Dynasty* as their first-choice reading materials for the winter vacation. Ma Xiulan neatly copied the book titles and the library call numbers onto the "Winter Vacation Plan" page of her notebook and made an appointment with her son to go borrow the books together the next day.

events.name: Daily Dinner Preparation and Care
events.description: In the evening, after completing the conversation with her son, the soreness in her lower back and waist grew more intense. Enduring the discomfort, she prepared a simple noodle dish with gravy for the family and separately made a soft, easily digestible noodle soup for her father. After dinner, she tidied up the kitchen briefly, urged the children to do their homework and wash up, then applied a hot water bottle to her waist and leaned back on the sofa for a short rest. Her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, had not yet returned from his driving shift. Gazing at the gradually darkening sky outside the window, she felt a slight sense of relief from the day's conversation, yet also worried about her physical exhaustion.

events.name: Adjust the range of motion during morning Eight-Section Brocade exercises.
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Ma Xiulan practiced Baduanjin in her courtyard. Due to stiffness in her lower back, she reduced the range of stretching movements and focused more on breath regulation and relaxation. Her mother, Li Xiuying, occasionally joined in, and the two moved slowly in the morning light, which brought her a sense of comfort.

起始状态.心情: Fatigued and worried (persistent discomfort in the lower back)

结束状态.所处地点: Sofa in the living room at home
结束状态.心情: Intertwined contradictions (a glimmer of comfort from the progress in parent-child communication, yet heightened anxiety due to physical discomfort)

state.今日运动: Morning Eight-Section Brocade (Adjustment Movements for Waist and Back Discomfort), Household Chores

2025-12.daily_overview: Physical alerts prompt adjustments in actions, while balancing children's academic interests with family social arrangements. A moment of mental respite is found through focused engagement in handicrafts, and preparations are made in advance for the warm family time over the weekend.

events.name: Try to alleviate lower back pain
events.description: When she got up in the morning, Ma Xiulan felt her back and waist were even stiffer than the day before. As she bent down to fetch her father a basin of water for washing his face, she almost couldn’t straighten up. She realized she couldn’t keep pushing herself. During a break from her morning chores, she boiled a pot of water, filled a hot water bottle, and applied it as a warm compress for twenty minutes, which brought her some slight relief. She decided to cut back on non-urgent household tasks for the day—for instance, she only swept the main areas of the floor and postponed washing the heavy clothing.

events.name: Going to the library to borrow books
events.description: In the morning, after her back felt a bit better, Ma Xiulan took Ma Mingxuan on a walk to the community library. The library was small but tidy. Following the call numbers they had noted down the previous day, they easily found "The Ming Dynasty Stories," but "The Three-Body Problem (Youth Edition)" had already been borrowed. With the librarian's assistance, Ma Xiulan made a reservation and inquired whether there were other similar science fiction books available. The librarian recommended "The Wandering Earth (Short Story Collection)." Ma Mingxuan flipped through it and expressed interest, so Ma Xiulan borrowed both this book and "The Ming Dynasty Stories." She reminded her son to take good care of the books and return them on time.

events.name: Immersion in the Flow State of Embroidery Creation
events.description: In the afternoon, after settling her father for his nap, Ma Xiulan finally had a quiet moment to herself. She took out the embroidery piece that blended traditional intertwining lotus patterns with modern geometric lines and began working on the main part of the design. As the needle and thread moved across the fabric, the familiar rhythm gradually made her forget the soreness in her back and waist. She became completely immersed in the thought of how to make the traditional floral motifs appear more three-dimensional through modern lines. Time seemed to slow down, and she felt a rare sense of inner peace and the joy of focused concentration.

events.name: Refine the details of the embroidery work.
events.description: The flow state lasted nearly two hours, and the main outline of the pattern had become clearly visible. Ma Xiulan paused to take a sip of water before beginning the more detailed finishing work. She checked whether the stitches on each petal were even and whether the color transitions appeared natural. Then, she selected golden embroidery thread to add delicate embellishments at the intersections of geometric lines and the flower centers, instantly bringing the entire piece to life with a sense of refinement. Looking at the nearly completed work, she felt a deep sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Contact my sister to finalize the weekend family dinner.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan estimated that her younger sister Ma Xiufen should be off work, so she gave her a call. The other end of the line was bustling with noise, clearly indicating that Xiufen was preparing dinner. Ma Xiulan asked with a smile, "Are you free to come back this Sunday? Mom and Dad are coming too, so we can get together." The two quickly settled on a family lunch gathering on Sunday, with Xiufen and her family of three all attending. Ma Xiulan mentioned that she planned to make Tianjin-style steamed buns and noodles with gravy, while Xiufen exclaimed over the phone that she wanted sweet and sour pork tenderloin and said she would bring some seafood from the Binhai New Area. The sisters chatted for a while longer about their children's recent updates before reluctantly hanging up. After the call, Ma Xiulan felt a warm glow in her heart and began mentally planning her weekend shopping list.

events.name: Received a call for temporary manual odd jobs.
events.description: In the afternoon, Zheng Xiuying called, saying there was an urgent piece of manual work that required Ma Xiulan's help in sewing several small cloth bags for delivery the next day. Ma Xiulan hesitated for a moment, but considering the extra income, she agreed and planned to find time to work on it in the evening.

起始状态.心情: The Irritation and Helplessness Brought by Physical Discomfort

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and serene (creative work and family connections bring a sense of satisfaction)

state.今日运动: Hot compress for relief, light household chores, no specialized exercises.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a slight rise in temperature

2025-12.daily_overview: Gaining emotional support from regular gatherings with old friends, completing the routine organization of seasonal household chores, and seeking formal medical attention for the first time due to health issues, thereby beginning to address the caregiver's own health needs.

events.name: Tea Session for Confiding in Childhood Friend Liu Chunmei
events.description: In the afternoon, her childhood friend Liu Chunmei visited as scheduled. Ma Xiulan brewed a pot of jasmine tea and brought out the sunflower seeds she had roasted herself. The two sat in the sun-drenched living room, chatting while working on some small sewing tasks. Ma Xiulan couldn't help but pour out her recent back pain and the cautious yet seemingly ineffective feelings she had while communicating with her teenage son. Liu Chunmei listened and shared her own experience with her son's rebellious phase some time ago, offering advice such as "listen more, speak less, and only offer guidance at critical moments." The two comforted each other, their laughter and sighs interwoven. This gathering felt like recharging Ma Xiulan's emotional battery, making her feel she wasn't fighting alone.

events.name: Check and organize family winter clothing
events.description: After seeing Liu Chunmei off, Ma Xiulan took advantage of the fine weather to start sorting out her family’s winter clothes. She pulled out all the thick coats, sweaters, and cotton trousers from the wardrobe and spread them on the bed to inspect them one by one. She noticed that the elbow of her husband’s sweater had worn thin, the cuff of her eldest son’s cotton-padded jacket had come undone, her second son’s thermal pants were a bit too short, and her youngest daughter’s cotton-padded coat was still quite new. She made a mental note of each issue, setting aside the damaged items for mending and planning to replace those that no longer fit.

events.name: Go to the community clinic for medical consultation.
events.description: After tidying up the clothes, the soreness in her waist and back reminded her. Ma Xiulan decided to visit the community clinic. Dr. Wang Jianguo, who was on duty, listened to her description and then asked her to perform a few bending and twisting movements. He preliminarily diagnosed it as lumbar muscle strain caused by prolonged bending and improper posture, noting that while the issue was not serious, it required rest and adjustment. Dr. Wang said, "Xiulan, it's not enough to just take care of the elderly and children; you need to pay attention to yourself as well. Let me teach you a few simple stretching exercises. Doing them daily is more effective than using medicated plasters." He then demonstrated cat stretches and several waist-twisting movements in the consultation room, instructing Ma Xiulan to follow along.

events.name: Reflect on and Plan for Personal Health Management
events.description: Leaving the clinic with the note of exercise instructions written by Dr. Wang, Ma Xiulan walked home, deeply moved. Dr. Wang's words, "You need to take care of yourself too," echoed repeatedly in her mind. For the first time, she realized so clearly that she was the core of her family's functioning—if she were to collapse from exhaustion, everything would fall apart. She decided that starting tomorrow, she would set aside ten minutes every morning specifically for these stretching exercises. At the same time, she began to consider which tasks in caring for her father could be adjusted in posture or occasionally shared with her husband and children.

events.name: Working on handmade patchwork bags late at night
events.description: To complete the urgent piecework introduced by Zheng Xiuying, Ma Xiulan sacrificed her rest time in the evening, sewing small cloth bags under the lamp. She focused intently on threading the needle and stitching until late into the night. Though exhausted, she felt a sense of relief at the thought of being able to supplement the family income.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, but looking forward to meeting old friends.

结束状态.心情: Touched and prompted to reflect (realizing the necessity of self-care from the doctor's words)

state.今日运动: Learn waist stretching exercises, do a small amount of housework.

2025-12.daily_overview: A day of putting health awareness into action. It began with leading my mother in exercise, followed by purchasing seasonal clothing for the family, then discussing household matters with my husband in the evening, and concluded with a sense of fulfillment from engaging in handicraft creation.

events.name: Leading my mother in learning new movements of Baduanjin
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan got up fifteen minutes earlier than usual and first practiced the stretching exercises taught by Dr. Wang in the yard, feeling much more relaxed in her lower back. When her mother, Li Xiuying, came to help prepare breakfast, Ma Xiulan invited her to learn together. Today's lesson was "Regulating the Spleen and Stomach Requires Single Arm Raise." She demonstrated slowly while explaining, "This movement is good for digestion." Her mother learned with great seriousness; although her movements were somewhat clumsy and stiff, she was full of enthusiasm. Afterward, Ma Xiulan brewed a cup of hot tea for her mother. The mother and daughter sat at the kitchen door, watching the drizzling rain, feeling warm both in body and mind.

events.name: Enjoying a Warm Breakfast with Mother
events.description: After the workout, Ma Xiulan didn't let her mother go back home but instead invited her to stay for breakfast. She steamed the leftover buns from the previous day, cooked millet porridge, and sliced a plate of homemade pickled radish strips. As they ate, the mother and daughter chatted, planning to stick to their morning exercise routine whenever the weather permitted. Her mother also remarked that this was quieter than square dancing and more suitable for her. This simple breakfast felt particularly heartwarming because of their shared commitment to health.

events.name: To purchase and mend winter clothes for family members.
events.description: The rain stopped in the morning, and Ma Xiulan, carrying a noted list and budget, headed to the clothing street near the Xingwang Vegetable Market in Jinghai District. She first bought a new pink cotton-padded jacket for her youngest daughter, followed by a pair of fleece-lined jeans for her second son. At a fabric shop, she carefully selected several skeins of dark gray yarn suitable for knitting a hat for her father, along with a few sturdy spare buttons. Upon returning home, she immediately set to work, skillfully mending the holes in her husband’s sweater and her eldest son’s cotton-padded jacket with her proficient needlework.

events.name: Knit a Warm Wool Hat for Father
events.description: In the afternoon when she had free time, Ma Xiulan would take out the newly bought wool and start casting on stitches. She chose the simplest garter stitch but knitted it with exceptional density and care. As she knitted, she imagined her father wearing it while taking a stroll in the winter, and her hands moved with tenderness. Halfway through, the hat already showed signs of warmth.

events.name: Communicating with Husband about Children's Academic Performance and Family Affairs
events.description: After dinner, while her husband Ma Zhiqiang was resting at home, Ma Xiulan told him in detail about the parent-teacher meeting and the reading plan she had developed with their son. "The child is growing up; just talking isn't enough—we need to guide him. During the winter break, I want to encourage him to read more. When you have time, talk to him too, but don't just ask about his grades." Ma Zhiqiang listened and nodded, saying, "Alright, I understand. He does need to improve his Chinese." Ma Xiulan then briefly informed their second son and daughter that their older brother would be reading more during the winter break, asking them not to constantly pester him to play, in order to create a more studious atmosphere at home.

events.name: Complete the integrated creative embroidery work.
events.description: After the children had all fallen asleep, Ma Xiulan finally had time to sit under the lamp to complete the final edging of her meticulously crafted fusion embroidery piece. She chose threads that closely matched the base color and secured the edges of the embroidery with nearly invisible stitches. Once finished, she laid the piece flat on the table and stepped back to examine it carefully. The soft elegance of the traditional floral patterns and the crispness of the modern lines blended perfectly, with the golden accents adding the finishing touch. A profound sense of accomplishment and the fulfillment of creation washed over her. She couldn’t help but pick up her phone, take a photo, and first send it to her craft friend Zhou Xiuqin, then share it in the family WeChat group. Soon, likes from her husband and sister popped up in the group, along with emojis from the children saying, "Mom is amazing." The joy and relaxation of this moment were the best consolation for her days of hard work.

起始状态.心情: Positive, determined to start new healthy habits

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction (the work was completed and received family recognition)

state.今日运动: Morning stretching and Baduanjin instruction, household chores

2025-12.daily_overview: On her day off, the character effortlessly transitions between the roles of a daughter, a community member, a homemaker, and a craftsperson. She engages in healthy interactions with her daughter, finds a sense of fulfillment through sharing her skills, discovers broader horizons for her craftsmanship through community invitations, and makes material preparations for tomorrow's family gathering.

events.name: Teaching Craft Enthusiasts to Use Smartphone Functions
events.description: In the morning, Zhou Xiuqin, a fellow craft enthusiast, came to the house to do embroidery together. During their casual conversation, Zhou Xiuqin complained that she had spent a long time looking for a place at the market last time, and she didn’t have enough small change when paying. Ma Xiulan recalled her own experience using mobile maps and payment apps, so she took out her phone and said, "Sister Xiuqin, let me show you how to use this—it’s really convenient." She patiently demonstrated how to open the map app to search for a destination and how to read the route, then showed how to use WeChat Pay. Zhou Xiuqin was very interested and followed Ma Xiulan’s guidance step by step. The two agreed that next time they go to the market to set up a stall together, they would use the phone for navigation and payments. Zhou Xiuqin sighed, "You young people really learn fast." Ma Xiulan smiled sheepishly, feeling a little proud inside.

events.name: Sharing on Indoor Morning Exercise and Health Preservation on Rainy Days
events.description: Due to the rain, Ma Xiulan and her mother conducted their morning exercise in the living room instead. She guided her mother through a review of the two movements they had learned in the previous two days: "Holding Up the Sky with Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Separating Heaven and Earth to Regulate the Spleen and Stomach." Her mother's movements were much smoother than on the first day. During breaks in the exercise, Ma Xiulan also shared some winter health tips she had recently read on her phone, such as eating more radishes and soaking feet in warm water at night. Her mother listened with great interest and praised her daughter for being so knowledgeable.

events.name: Invited to participate in the community New Year decoration creative discussion
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan received a phone call from the community director, Zheng Xiuying. Director Zheng said warmly over the phone, "Xiulan, the embroidery pieces you made last time were very well received! With the New Year approaching, the community wants to add some decorations. A few of us were thinking that it should reflect the unique characteristics of Jinghai. As the representative of craftsmanship in our community, would you be available to come to the activity room tomorrow afternoon and brainstorm ideas with us?" Ma Xiulan was both surprised and delighted and quickly agreed. She had never expected her craftsmanship to be recognized and needed in such a way.

events.name: Develop Community Decoration Plan
events.description: After hanging up the phone, Ma Xiulan's emotions remained unsettled for a long time. She sat at the table, took out paper and pen, and began to think carefully. Drawing on her embroidery skills and the paper-cutting techniques she had learned from her mother, she thought of the chubby babies in Yangliuqing New Year paintings, the character "Fu," and the reed patterns commonly seen in Jinghai. She sketched a few simple drafts on paper, including small embroidered ornaments that could be hung and paper-cut window decorations suitable for sticking on glass. She also pulled out some samples she had made earlier, planning to bring them along the next day for everyone's reference.

events.name: Organize Craft Materials and Works
events.description: After finalizing her plan, Ma Xiulan carefully ironed the fusion-inspired embroidery piece she had completed the day before until it was perfectly smooth. She then placed it, along with the sample orders she had previously made for the community, some harmoniously color-matched fabric scraps, and embroidery threads, into a dedicated cloth bag to take to the community the next day. Next, she tidied up the scattered tools on the table—returning the embroidery needles to their needle case, rolling up the threads by color and putting them back in their places, and neatly folding the fabric scraps. The living room quickly regained its usual tidiness, yet the air seemed to retain a lingering sense of tranquility and fulfillment brought about by the creative process.

events.name: Purchase ingredients for a weekend family dinner.
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan took the prepared menu and went to her usual vegetable market. She first stopped at Aunt Sun's stall to buy fresh pork shoulder and cabbage, then selected a large head of cabbage and several seasonal vegetables. When purchasing flour, she deliberately chose a variety with good gluten strength. Passing by the cooked food stall, she also bought a portion of spiced beef, intending it as a snack for her brother-in-law to enjoy with drinks. After completing her shopping, she carried the heavy bags home, already planning in her mind what time she would get up the next day to knead the dough and prepare the filling.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the day off.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and full of anticipation (dual joy of community recognition and family gathering)

state.今日运动: Indoor Morning Exercise (Review of Baduanjin)

2025-12.daily_overview: A full day of rest brimming with familial affection and the warmth of everyday life. From the busy preparations in the early morning, to the joyful reunion feast at noon, followed by casual family conversations in the afternoon and the tender farewells at dusk, family was the sole and most important theme of the day.

events.name: Demonstration of Home Health Acupoint Massage
events.description: In the morning, my sister's family and my parents arrived one after another, instantly filling the house with liveliness. After lunch, everyone gathered in the living room for tea and conversation, and the topic naturally turned to health. Ma Xiulan recalled the acupoint knowledge she had previously learned and said to her parents, "Dad, Mom, I've learned a few simple acupoints. Pressing them regularly is good for the body." She demonstrated the "Fengchi" acupoint for relieving shoulder and neck tension and the "Zusanli" acupoint for aiding digestion, then guided her parents in locating the points themselves. My parents found it novel, and my sister and brother-in-law also joined in to learn. This small interaction earned the approval of the entire family, creating an exceptionally harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Cleaning and Air-Drying Organized Winter Clothing
events.description: Taking advantage of the fine weather and ample sunshine, Ma Xiulan placed the winter clothes she had sorted out for washing a few days earlier, along with two newly purchased items, into the washing machine. After the wash, she and her younger daughter, Yuxin, hung the clothes one by one in the yard to dry. Sunlight fell on the dripping garments, releasing the pleasant scent of laundry detergent. Ma Xiulan thought to herself that once the clothes were dry, her family would be able to wear clean and warm outfits.

events.name: Carefully prepare a family lunch gathering
events.description: Ma Xiulan was undoubtedly the 'head chef' of the day. She got up early in the morning and was bustling around the kitchen: kneading dough, letting it rise, chopping and seasoning fillings, all with practiced skill. Steam billowed from the steamer as batches of Tianjin-style steamed buns, with their thin wrappers and generous fillings, were brought out one after another. On another stove, the sauce for the noodles with gravy was simmering away, filling the air with its rich aroma. She also prepared several of her signature dishes, such as sweet and sour pork tenderloin and cold mixed seasonal vegetables. By the time her sister's family arrived, the table was already laden with a sumptuous feast, steaming hot and brimming with the warmth of home.

events.name: Warmly received my sister's family and had lunch together
events.description: "Sis! We're here!" Ma Xiufen's voice rang out before she even appeared. Ma Xiulan wiped her hands and went out to greet them with a smile. Her brother-in-law carried seafood brought from the Binhai New Area, while her little nephew bounced along happily. Everyone gathered around the table, chatting as they ate. Her sister praised the well-seasoned filling of the steamed buns, her father remarked on the authentic taste of the braised sauce, and the children eagerly vied for the sweet and sour pork. Laughter and cheerful conversation filled the entire room. Looking at this lively scene, Ma Xiulan felt that all her hard work had been worth it.

events.name: Afternoon casual conversations deepen emotional bonds.
events.description: After lunch, the children ran to the yard to play, while the adults moved to the living room to continue drinking tea and chatting. The conversation shifted from the parents' blood pressure to the children's final exams, and from local news in Jinghai to new developments in the Binhai New Area. Ma Xiulan and her sister exchanged household management tips and parenting concerns, while her husband Ma Zhiqiang and his brother-in-law discussed work and cars. This relaxed and informal exchange deepened the bond between the sisters and strengthened the connection between the two families.

events.name: Seeing off my sister's family and tidying up
events.description: As the sun set in the west, Ma Xiulan’s sister and her family prepared to depart. Ma Xiulan packed the leftover steamed buns into a food bag, added some of her own pickled vegetables, and handed it to her sister. "Drive carefully on the way, and send a message when you arrive," she said. She saw them off at the door, watching the car disappear into the distance. Returning inside, she faced the messy dining table and kitchen. Rolling up her sleeves, Ma Xiulan began the meticulous task of tidying up. Though her body felt somewhat weary, her heart was filled with the warmth of family affection.

起始状态.心情: Busy and full of drive

结束状态.心情: Weary yet with a heart brimming with warmth

state.今日运动: A large amount of household chores, no specialized exercise

2025-12.daily_overview: Continuing the warm afterglow of the weekend, the focus of life transitions smoothly from caring for parents’ health to participating in community public affairs. Personal craftsmanship evolves from a family hobby to a stage for community co-creation.

events.name: Lead the mother in a continuous practice of the Eight-Section Brocade.
events.description: The weather was fine, so the mother and daughter returned to the small courtyard for their morning exercise. Today, Ma Xiulan did not teach any new movements. Instead, she guided her mother through two consecutive rounds of the previously learned exercises, such as "Raising Both Hands to Regulate the Triple Burner" and "Separating Heaven and Earth to Regulate the Spleen and Stomach." Her mother’s movements had become much smoother and more natural compared to the beginning, and her breathing was now in sync with the rhythm. Seeing her mother’s earnest effort, Ma Xiulan felt very pleased.

events.name: Visiting parents and presenting them with hand-knitted woolen hats.
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan walked to her parents' house not far away, bringing the dark gray woolen hat she had finally finished knitting the night before and some steamed buns she had just made that morning. As soon as she entered, she took out the hat for her father to try on. "Dad, it's getting cold. Wear this when you go out for a walk to keep warm." The hat fit perfectly—thick and soft. Her father touched the hat and didn't say much, but there was a smile in the corners of his eyes. Her mother, standing nearby, said, "Our daughter is skillful and thoughtful." Ma Xiulan then helped her mother tidy up the house and reminded them to keep warm before leaving with peace of mind.

events.name: Attend the Community New Year Decoration Plan Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan arrived punctually at the community activity room with the prepared sketches and samples. Director Zheng Xiuying and several community activists were already engaged in discussion. After presenting the preliminary decoration ideas, Director Zheng specifically invited Ma Xiulan to share her thoughts. Ma Xiulan felt somewhat nervous, but seeing the samples she had brought along, she regained her confidence. She took out the sketches and introduced the design concepts for window decorations and embroidered hangings that integrated elements of Yangliuqing New Year paintings with a modern minimalist style, also showcasing the samples she had brought. Her ideas were specific, practical, and carried a distinct "Jinghai flavor," earning unanimous approval from everyone present. The group enthusiastically added further details, creating a lively atmosphere.

events.name: Communicate specific details with the community director after the meeting.
events.description: After the discussion concluded, Ma Xiulan stayed behind to chat further with Director Zheng. They clarified the types of decorations needed for the first batch (such as 20 sets of window paper-cuts and 15 small embroidered pendants), their approximate sizes, and the latest delivery deadline (one week before New Year's Day). Director Zheng also mentioned that the community could reimburse a portion of the material costs and offered assistance with purchasing embroidery fabric and threads if needed. Ma Xiulan felt more assured, sensing that this was not just a "job" but also an expression of trust and responsibility entrusted to her.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a touch of anticipation for community activities.

结束状态.心情: Feeling inspired and with a heightened sense of responsibility (community recognition brings new momentum)

state.今日运动: Coherent Practice of Morning Eight-Section Brocade

2025-12.daily_overview: A relatively uneventful day, primarily spent on routine household chores and caregiving. The highlight was sharing joy with like-minded friends, transforming the excitement of personal involvement in public affairs into nourishment for friendship.

events.name: Sharing Community Activity Experiences with Fellow Craft Enthusiasts
events.description: In the afternoon, taking advantage of her free time, Ma Xiulan sent several voice messages via WeChat to her fellow craftswoman Zhou Xiuqin, excitedly recounting her experience at the community discussion meeting the day before. "Sister Xiuqin, Director Zheng and the others took it very seriously and even asked me to speak first! I showed them the patterns I drew, and everyone said they were great..." She described in detail the lively atmosphere of the discussion and the final design direction that was agreed upon. In her message, she also mentioned that if the timeline for this batch of work was tight, she might need Sister Xiuqin's help to collaborate. Soon, Zhou Xiuqin replied with congratulations and eagerness, "That's wonderful, Xiulan! This is great news. Just let me know what you need me to do!" Their conversation was filled with anticipation for collaborating on the community project.

events.name: Routine Care and Household Chores
events.description: The main part of the day still revolved around her father and family. In the morning, she took her father out to get some sun. In the afternoon, she washed the accumulated bedsheets and duvet covers. While hanging the sheets to dry, she deliberately performed several sets of waist stretches taught by Dr. Wang, feeling that it had already become part of her routine. While preparing dinner in the evening, she made an effort to use her legs more and bend over less. Although it was a bit slower, her waist felt much more relaxed.

events.name: Received a last-minute notice about a school event for my child.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan received a notice from her second son's school, requesting parents to assist in preparing props for the New Year's party. This came as a bit of a surprise to her, but she decided to make time to handle it tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: The joy and subtle sense of fulfillment after sharing

state.今日运动: Incorporate waist stretches into daily household chores.

2025-12.daily_overview: An ordinary winter day shrouded in haze. Outdoor activities decreased, with more time spent indoors handling household chores and caregiving tasks, while preliminary preparations began for the upcoming community handicraft project.

events.name: Adjust Activities Due to Haze and Strengthen Indoor Cleaning
events.description: Waking up in the morning, the view outside the window was shrouded in a gray haze, with a noticeable smell of smog in the air. Ma Xiulan canceled her outdoor morning exercise plan and instead practiced the Eight-Section Brocade movements with her mother in the living room. She reminded her parents to avoid going outside as much as possible today and checked whether the windows at home were properly closed. Taking advantage of the free time in the morning, she conducted a thorough indoor cleaning, wiping the surfaces of furniture with a damp cloth to reduce dust.

events.name: Take inventory of handicraft stock and plan procurement
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan brought out the small box containing handicraft materials and began taking inventory for the community decoration task. She noticed that the red and gold embroidery threads were running low, and large sheets of red Xuan paper (used for paper-cutting) also needed replenishing. She made a list of the required materials and planned to purchase them the next day at the stationery store and fabric market in town. Meanwhile, following the designs determined during the discussion, she practiced cutting several 'Fu' character window decorations on old newspapers to get a feel for the technique.

events.name: Brewing Lung-Moistening Pear Soup for Family
events.description: Considering the hazy weather, Ma Xiulan specifically prepared a pot of lung-moistening soup with snow pears, rock sugar, and white fungus for dinner. She served a large bowl to her parents and also gave a bowl to each family member. Her younger daughter, Yu Xin, enjoyed the sweet taste very much, and her husband, Ma Zhiqiang, also remarked that it soothed his throat. This small gesture reflects Ma Xiulan’s attention to her family’s health in the details.

events.name: Make simple props for the second child's school activity
events.description: In the evening, Ma Xiulan took some time to make a few simple decorative props for her second son's New Year's party using discarded cardboard boxes and colored paper. Though crude, they were filled with heartfelt sentiment.

起始状态.心情: Affected by the weather, it is somewhat dull.

结束状态.心情: Rest peacefully and prepare for tomorrow's procurement tasks.

state.今日运动: Review of Indoor Baduanjin, no outdoor activities.

date_attribute.weather: The haze dissipates, turning to overcast.

2025-12.daily_overview: The weather improved, so I went out to purchase handicraft materials to stock up on "ammunition" for community tasks. At the same time, I handled an unexpected household chore, demonstrating the adaptability of a homemaker.

events.name: Going out to purchase handicraft materials
events.description: As the haze dissipated, Ma Xiulan went out in the morning. She first visited a large stationery store in Jinghai Town, carefully selecting several sheets of bright red rice paper and a few sharp new scissors. She then made her way to an old fabric market, where she purchased ample red and gold silk threads, as well as some velvet fabric pieces for backing, according to her list. The shopping process went smoothly, and she even received a small discount from a familiar thread vendor. Carrying the heavy materials home, she felt much more at ease, and a creative urge began to stir within her.

events.name: Dealing with Minor Water Pipe Issues at Home
events.description: Returning home at noon, Ma Xiulan noticed the kitchen faucet was dripping slightly. She initially intended to wait for her husband to fix it, but worried about wasting water. She then tried tightening it herself with a wrench, only to make the leak worse. She quickly called the community plumber, Master Liu Jianguo. Master Liu arrived in the afternoon, inspected the faucet, and explained that a washer had worn out. He promptly replaced it with a new one, charging only five yuan for the material. Ma Xiulan breathed a sigh of relief, grateful to have a reliable professional and feeling that her emergency response had been timely.

events.name: Commence trial production of community window paper-cuttings.
events.description: After dealing with the minor incident with the water pipe, Ma Xiulan spread the newly purchased red rice paper on the table. Following the previously drawn design of the "integrated character 'Fu' (福)," she began cutting her first window decoration. She worked meticulously, ensuring both the traditional fullness and auspiciousness of the character "Fu" and the smooth lines of the integrated reed patterns. When the first piece was completed, she held it up to the light for inspection and was pleased with the result. She pasted this window decoration onto the living room glass as both a decoration and a sample, intending to use it as a reference for subsequent batch production.

events.name: Agreed on the division of cooperation with Zhou Xiuqin
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan discussed the division of labor for the community decoration task with Zhou Xiuqin via WeChat. They decided that Ma Xiulan would primarily be responsible for the paper-cutting part, while Zhou Xiuqin would assist with embroidered ornaments. They also agreed to work together over the weekend to complete the task.

起始状态.心情: The sense of ease brought by sunny weather

结束状态.心情: The procurement was completed and the first work was successfully trial-produced.

state.今日运动: Going out for a walk to purchase items, doing a small amount of household chores.

2025-12.daily_overview: The morning exercise routine has firmly become a daily practice for the mother and daughter. The subsequent day unfolds around caregiving, household chores, and craft tasks, maintaining a steady and orderly rhythm.

events.name: Engaging in a proficient morning practice of Baduanjin with my mother
events.description: The morning sunlight bathed the small courtyard as Ma Xiulan and her mother, Li Xiuying, began their Baduanjin morning exercises with natural ease. The mother's movements grew increasingly precise, to the point where she could even remind Ma Xiulan to "raise your hand a little higher" in certain postures. The two stretched their bodies gently in the morning light, occasionally exchanging soft remarks like, "Doesn’t your back feel warm after finishing this movement?" The atmosphere was tranquil and harmonious. This had become a moment of unspoken understanding and shared anticipation between mother and daughter.

events.name: Mass Production of Community Paper-Cut Window Decorations
events.description: Ma Xiulan spent most of the morning working on paper-cutting. She cut red rice paper into appropriate sizes, stacked four or five sheets together, secured the corners with a stapler, and then began cutting according to the sample patterns. Practice makes perfect—after completing several sets, her speed noticeably increased, and her lines became increasingly smooth. By the end of the morning, a thick stack of "福" (fortune) window decorations had piled up on the table, with red paper scraps accumulating at the edges, filling the space with a festive atmosphere of diligent work.

events.name: Tutoring the second son in completing his homework.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Mingzhe, the second son, returned from school. While doing his math homework, he got stuck on a word problem and went to ask his mother for help. Ma Xiulan put down her needlework, patiently read the problem twice, and then used examples from daily life to help him understand step by step. Although she had little formal education, she was patient and resourceful in tutoring elementary school lessons. Seeing her son suddenly exclaim, "Oh! I get it!" and then bury his head in calculations, she felt deeply gratified.

events.name: Community Window Decoration Production Sprint Commences
events.description: Ma Xiulan decided to focus on completing the community paper-cut task starting today, planning to produce a certain quantity each day for three consecutive days to ensure timely delivery.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful and serene

结束状态.心情: Steady and Substantial

state.今日运动: Eight-Section Brocade in the morning, household chores

2025-12.daily_overview: In the relaxed atmosphere of rest days, there is both natural sharing among neighbors and proactive planning for long-term family matters. Healthy habits begin to generate spillover effects, influencing those around them.

events.name: Sharing the Benefits of Baduanjin with Neighbors
events.description: When I went out to take out the trash in the morning, I happened to run into my neighbor across the hall, Wang Guilan, who was also basking in the sun at her doorstep. We struck up a casual conversation, and Auntie Wang mentioned that she had been feeling weak in her legs and feet lately. Ma Xiulan then took the opportunity to bring up the fact that she and her mother had been practicing Baduanjin. "Auntie Wang, my mother and I have been practicing Baduanjin in the mornings recently—you know, those slow, deliberate movements. I feel like my body has become more relaxed, and my energy has improved. Why don't you give it a try? The movements are really simple." She even demonstrated a couple of the moves briefly. Wang Guilan was quite interested and said she would ask her daughter-in-law to look up some instructional videos online so she could learn it too. This chance encounter made Ma Xiulan feel that her persistence had gained an extra layer of value.

events.name: Begin the main part of the embroidery pendant.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ma Xiulan began working on the embroidery portion of the community orders. She chose to start with the relatively simple "Year After Year of Abundance" small ornaments. After stretching the cut velvet fabric onto the embroidery hoop, she lightly sketched the outline with a pencil, then selected gold thread along with red and green silk threads to begin embroidering. Embroidering auspicious patterns was second nature to her, and the progress went smoothly. By the afternoon, she had completed the main embroidery for two ornaments.

events.name: Initial discussion with husband on parental care arrangements for elderly parents.
events.description: During dinner, Ma Xiulan mentioned to her husband Ma Zhiqiang that her older sister might return in a couple of days, and they wanted to discuss their parents' future care arrangements together. "Dad needs someone to take care of him now, and Mom is getting older too. Relying solely on me to run back and forth between them is becoming too much to handle in the long run. Even though my older sister and younger sister live far away, they should also contribute, whether through financial support or ideas." Ma Zhiqiang listened silently, took a few bites of his meal, and nodded, saying, "It’s time to discuss this. We’ll see what my older sister and the others have to say. If we need to contribute more, that’s fine." With her husband’s support, Ma Xiulan felt somewhat reassured and began looking forward to the sisters gathering to discuss the matter.

events.name: Progress on the Second Day of Community Window Decoration Making
events.description: Continuing with the community window paper-cutting project, the remaining half of the quantity was completed today, and the progress is smooth, which has boosted her confidence in finishing the task on time.

起始状态.心情: Relax

结束状态.心情: Comfort (Having gained her husband's understanding and successfully shared health insights with the neighbors)

state.今日运动: Morning Eight-Section Brocade, Embroidery Handicraft
