2025-12.daily_overview: The Sunday at year's end is filled with the bustling atmosphere of pre-holiday preparations. From stocking up on household supplies to personal image management, and even to examining and strengthening core family relationships, thoughts shuttle between the present and the future.

events.name: Centralized procurement of New Year goods and exchanging blessings with neighbors
events.description: Taking advantage of her husband being home on Sunday to look after the children, Ma Xiulan went on a larger-than-usual shopping trip. She visited her regular vegetable market and her neighbor Zhang Shufen’s small supermarket, purchasing more pork, chicken, various vegetables, and fruits than usual to prepare for the upcoming New Year’s family gathering and daily reserves. At the vegetable market, Aunt Sun weighed the vegetables while smiling and said, “Xiulan, getting ready for the New Year?” Ma Xiulan replied with a smile, “Just stocking up a bit. Happy New Year to you too, Aunt Sun!” At Zhang Shufen’s supermarket, the two also exchanged New Year’s greetings, and Zhang Shufen gave her a small packet of candies for the children. This kind of warm, human interaction made the shopping experience feel cozy.

events.name: Incorporate personal hair dye purchases into household management planning.
events.description: While organizing the storage cabinet at noon, Ma Xiulan saw the half-used bottle of hair dye. She picked it up and estimated that there was probably enough left for one or two more uses. Considering that regularly dyeing her hair to cover the gray had become a fixed and necessary expense, she decided to incorporate it into the household's daily management. She jotted down the words "hair dye" in the small notebook she carried with her, reminding herself to purchase a spare bottle in advance during her next trip to the supermarket, rather than rushing to buy it when it ran out. This sense of planning reflects her emphasis on self-maintenance in financial management.

events.name: Summarize and Optimize Ways to Care for Parents
events.description: In the afternoon leisure time, Ma Xiulan reflected on the changes in the way she had cared for her parents over the past month. From simply providing for their daily needs, she had gradually incorporated morning exercise interactions, sharing health knowledge, and demonstrating wellness massages. She realized that these activities, infused with emotional engagement, not only improved her parents' mood but also made her feel less purely exhausted while giving care. A preliminary idea began to form in her mind: to establish a routine of taking her parents for outdoor walks twice a week and organizing a family health-sharing session or small activity once a week, transforming care into more meaningful companionship.

events.name: Review and Confirm the "Couple's Breakfast Date" Habit
events.description: Just before going to bed, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang had a brief chat. She mentioned the occasional early mornings over the past two months when they had breakfast and talked together. Ma Zhiqiang responded with an "Mm," saying, "It’s been nice, better than each eating on their own." Though the words were few, Ma Xiulan sensed his approval. Both tacitly agreed that this small, irregular "breakfast date" was worth continuing occasionally into 2026. It had become an unspoken emotional refueling station in their busy marriage.

events.name: Final Preparations for the Three Sisters' Family Meeting
events.description: Ma Xiulan reconfirmed the details of tomorrow's meeting via WeChat with her elder sister Li Xiuyun in Beijing and her younger sister Ma Xiufen in the Binhai New Area. She briefly outlined their father's current health condition, her daily caregiving responsibilities, and the stress she has been experiencing in the message, hoping that her sisters could be prepared in advance so that they could efficiently discuss some practical sharing arrangements tomorrow.

events.name: Community window paper-cuttings have been completed and organized.
events.description: Today, she completed all the community window decorations, organized and packaged them, ready for delivery tomorrow, which left her feeling relieved and accomplished.

起始状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment derived from planned busyness.

结束状态.心情: Having many considerations but a clear goal (preparing for tomorrow's important family meeting)

state.今日运动: Go out for shopping on foot, do a small amount of household chores.

2025-12.daily_overview: A significant and productive day. The heavy burden of elderly care was transformed into a shared responsibility among sisters through a family meeting, and familial bonds were strengthened with a warm home-cooked dinner following serious discussions.

events.name: The three sisters convened a family meeting on parental elderly care.
events.description: In the morning, elder sister Li Xiuyun rushed back from Beijing, and younger sister Ma Xiufen also arrived from the Binhai New Area. The three sisters gathered in the living room of Ma Xiulan’s home to hold a family meeting regarding their parents’ long-term care plan. As the primary caregiver, Ma Xiulan detailed the daily tasks required after their father’s discharge from the hospital, their mother’s physical condition, her own schedule, and the recent back issues she had developed due to exhaustion. Her words conveyed a sense of fatigue and restrained pressure. Elder sister Li Xiuyun listened attentively, shared some information she had learned in Beijing about community-based elderly care services and age-friendly home modifications, and offered to take on a larger share of the financial responsibilities. Younger sister Ma Xiufen also expressed her willingness to return regularly to help and volunteered to look into the local domestic helper market in Tianjin.

events.name: Reached a preliminary consensus on responsibility sharing
events.description: After a candid and in-depth discussion, the three sisters reached a preliminary consensus: daily personal care and routine tasks would still be primarily handled by Ma Xiulan, who lives nearby, but Li Xiuyun and Ma Xiufen would significantly increase the monthly living expenses provided to their parents. These funds would be used to improve their diet, purchase assistive devices, or cover part of the future costs of hiring a caregiver. Meanwhile, the three sisters would jointly take responsibility for researching and evaluating the feasibility of external assistance options, such as hiring a live-in/daytime caregiver or utilizing community day care centers, with the goal of alleviating Ma Xiulan's long-term physical burden. The eldest sister, Li Xiuyun, clearly recorded these key points using pen and paper. They agreed to maintain communication through a WeChat group and to develop a more specific preliminary trial plan around the time of the Spring Festival.

events.name: A Warm Family Dinner After the Meeting
events.description: After the serious meeting concluded, the three sisters worked together to prepare a simple home-cooked dinner using the ingredients Ma Xiulan had prepared in advance. The eldest sister stir-fried her specialty dish of shredded pork with garlic stems, the younger sister tossed a cold salad, and Ma Xiulan cooked porridge and steamed buns. As they gathered around the table to eat, the conversation lightened, turning to amusing anecdotes about the children's final exams, the brother-in-law's new job, and the TV dramas they had been watching recently. The tension from the meeting room dissolved amid the aroma of the food and the sound of laughter, and the emotional bond between the sisters grew even stronger after facing challenges together.

events.name: Gathering with craft friends and sharing health insights
events.description: Before the afternoon meeting began, Zhou Xiuqin, a fellow handicraft enthusiast, came to Ma Xiulan’s home as scheduled to do embroidery together. While embroidering pendants for a community order, Ma Xiulan chatted with Zhou Xiuqin about how she had indeed felt much better in her waist and back, and less prone to fatigue, after persistently practicing the Eight-Section Brocade exercises. She suggested that Zhou Xiuqin, who often worked with her head lowered, could also try these gentle exercises to protect her cervical and lumbar spine. Zhou Xiuqin was very interested and asked Ma Xiulan to send her the video link.

起始状态.心情: Nervous and full of anticipation (feeling both pressure and hope for a turnaround regarding the family meeting)

结束状态.所处地点: Living Room at Home (After Sending Off My Sister)
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief and profound warmth (as pressure is shared and family bonds are nurtured)

state.今日运动: Eight-Section Brocade in the morning, household chores

2025-12.daily_overview: The outcomes of the meeting are beginning to be implemented, with the sisters taking action separately. Meanwhile, the end-of-month family financial review proceeds as planned, organizing scattered income and expenses into a clear economic overview of the household and setting the tone for the new year's budget.

events.name: The sisters separately followed up on pension information.
events.description: After returning to their respective residences, eldest sister Li Xiuyun and youngest sister Ma Xiufen immediately sprang into action. Li Xiuyun consulted with friends in Beijing to gather more details about community-based elderly care services, while Ma Xiufen began asking colleagues and friends in the Binhai New Area about reliable domestic service companies or the reputation of potential caregivers. They promptly shared the preliminary information they gathered, including contact numbers and approximate costs, in the three-person WeChat group. As Ma Xiulan watched the continuous stream of messages popping up in the group, she felt the weight on her shoulders lighten ever so slightly, no longer having to navigate the darkness alone.

events.name: Confirm with mother about her long-term intention for morning exercise.
events.description: After finishing their morning exercises, Ma Xiulan and her mother sat in the courtyard to rest, basking in the warm winter sunshine. Ma Xiulan said to her mother, "Mom, we've been practicing this Baduanjin for almost a month now. I think it's really good. What do you think? Can we make it a long-term habit? Not just to stretch our muscles and bones, but also as a reason for us to talk every day." Her mother smiled and patted her hand, saying, "Sure, I feel lighter and more energetic. As long as you're up for it, I'll practice with you." This simple promise gave the morning exercise a meaning that went beyond health itself.

events.name: Prepare materials for end-of-month family financial review
events.description: During breaks from housework during the day, Ma Xiulan gathered all the receipts and records she could find: the household ledger, her husband Ma Zhiqiang’s December payslip, her own income records from handcraft side jobs this month (mainly 500 yuan from community orders and small odd jobs), as well as receipts for utilities, gas, her child’s school fees, nutritional supplements purchased for her father, and daily groceries. She sorted them into categories and prepared for the formal inventory meeting in the evening.

events.name: Conducting a monthly financial review with my husband.
events.description: After the children went to bed in the evening, Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang sat by the tea table in the living room, opening their account book and a pile of receipts. They went through each item one by one, calculating the total income for the month (including the husband's salary and Ma Xiulan's income from handicrafts) and the total expenses. They found that due to additional expenses for medicine and nutritional supplements for the father's illness, as well as some miscellaneous year-end costs, the month's spending slightly exceeded the budget. However, they also confirmed that the 5,000 yuan fixed-term education fund successfully deposited at the beginning of the month remained untouched, and the family accident insurance had been renewed on time.

events.name: Confirm savings and insurance coverage, and plan next month's budget.
events.description: After completing a thorough inventory, the couple began planning their family budget for January of the following year. They identified fixed expenses (mortgage, utilities, prepayment for their child’s next semester tuition, and basic food costs) and reaffirmed that the goal of mandatory monthly savings must remain unchanged. Regarding Ma Xiulan’s fluctuating income from her handmade crafts, the two agreed that any amount exceeding a certain threshold would be split equally—half to supplement household expenses and the other half to continue depositing into the education reserve fund. Ma Zhiqiang particularly acknowledged the positive impact brought by this month’s income from handmade crafts.

events.name: Document Financial Consensus and Draft Budget
events.description: After concluding the inventory review and budget discussion, Ma Xiulan neatly wrote down several consensus points reached that evening on a fresh page of her ledger: 1. Adhere to monthly inventory checks; 2. Prioritize mandatory savings; 3. Control non-essential expenditures, especially social expenses, according to one's means; 4. Draft budget for January (listing estimated amounts for each item). After finishing, she closed the notebook, feeling a clearer grasp of her family's financial situation than ever before and a greater sense of control over the future.

events.name: Deliver window paper-cut artworks to the community
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan delivered the completed community paper-cut artwork to Director Zheng Xiuying, receiving praise and gratitude, which made her feel proud.

起始状态.心情: Steady, carrying the hope after the meeting

结束状态.心情: Clarity and Steadiness (Financial Transparency Brings a Sense of Security)

state.今日运动: Morning Eight-Section Brocade and Waist Stretching, Household Chores

2025-12.daily_overview: The final day of the year was spent in busyness, warmth, and heartfelt reflection. From the diligent preparations for the reunion dinner to the candid year-end conversation with my husband by the fireside, and finally to the family gathering to welcome the New Year's chimes, the emotional transition and ritual traditions from the end of the old year to the beginning of the new were fully realized.

events.name: Reflecting on and Embracing the Process of Improving Parent-Child Relationships
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Ma Xiulan recalled the conversation she had after the parent-teacher meeting half a month ago. She realized that the cautious attempt at equal communication between her and her eldest son, though occasionally reverting to old patterns over homework issues, had already undergone a change, and the direction was right. She reminded herself that improving a relationship is like knitting a sweater—it cannot be rushed stitch by stitch, and there will be setbacks, but as long as the thread is in hand, patiently knitting will eventually create a garment. She decided to enter the new year with a calmer and more accepting mindset, continuing to learn how to be a mother to an adolescent child.

events.name: Procurement of Ingredients for New Year's Eve Dumplings
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan went to the vegetable market for her last purchase before New Year's Eve. She bought minced pork from the front leg with a good balance of fat and lean meat, fresh chives, and flour for making dumplings. At Aunt Sun's stall, the two exchanged greetings of "See you next year" and "Happy New Year," filled with festive cheer. Ma Xiulan also specifically bought a small bunch of cilantro to enhance the flavor of the dumpling filling.

events.name: Prepare a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner
events.description: In the afternoon, the kitchen became Ma Xiulan's 'main battlefield.' She kneaded dough and prepared fillings for the evening's dumplings while also making dishes for the New Year's Eve dinner: the fried pork tenderloin awaited a sweet and sour sauce, the noodles with gravy had its broth simmering early, and a fish was steamed. The children peeked in and out of the kitchen doorway, assigned tasks like peeling garlic and setting the table. Steam rose and aromas filled the kitchen, creating a busy yet joyful family atmosphere.

events.name: Year-end Family Review and Outlook with Husband
events.description: After enjoying a lavish New Year's Eve dinner, the children went to watch the New Year's Eve gala on television. Ma Xiulan and her husband Ma Zhiqiang, while wrapping dumplings for the next morning's meal, conducted their annual year-end review. The husband candidly said, "Dad's illness this year has cost us quite a bit, and we didn't manage to save as much as we had originally planned." However, he then shifted his tone, looked at Ma Xiulan, and added, "But everyone in the family is safe and sound, and the child's studies are going fairly well. Especially you—you've been able to contribute to the household income with your skills, which is no small feat." Hearing this, Ma Xiulan felt a warmth in her heart and expressed her understanding of her husband's hard work driving the truck. In their quiet conversation, they talked about their wish to take the whole family on a trip to Beijing next year and their determination to continue saving for the children's education funds. By the warm stove, they looked forward to the new year together.

events.name: The whole family stays up together to welcome the New Year.
events.description: Approaching midnight, Ma Xiulan and her husband gathered their children in the living room, where candies, sunflower seeds, and fruits were laid out on the table. The family sat together, watching the New Year's Eve gala on television and counting down with the host: "5, 4, 3, 2, 1! Happy New Year!" Faint, sporadic sounds of firecrackers drifted in from outside the window, while laughter and joy filled the home. This simple ritual of staying up late on New Year's Eve strengthened the family's bond and brought the past year to a close with a sense of reunion.

events.name: Demonstrating the Eight-Section Brocade movements to her husband
events.description: After dinner, having tidied up the kitchen, Ma Xiulan said to her husband, who was watching television, "Zhiqiang, look at what I've been practicing with Mom recently." She stood in an open space in the living room and slowly and earnestly demonstrated the first two movements of the Eight-Section Brocade. "After practicing, I really feel much more relaxed in my shoulders and waist, and it doesn't take much time. Shouldn't our whole family pay more attention to exercise from now on?" Ma Zhiqiang looked at her and nodded, saying, "As long as you feel good." Although he didn't say much more, Ma Xiulan could sense that her husband had taken note of her emphasis on health.

events.name: Morning Indoor Baduanjin and Waist Stretching
events.description: In the morning, Ma Xiulan performed a complete set of Baduanjin exercises in the living room, incorporating waist stretching movements learned from Dr. Wang, such as the cat-cow stretch. She felt an improvement in her body's flexibility and sense of balance.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a faint sense of sentimentality toward the year's end.

结束状态.心情: Warmth, Gratitude, and Hope (Bidding Farewell to the Old and Welcoming the New with Family Reunions and Fond Reflections)
